links_Review_Title: The dress was super comfy and soft! Loved the sleeves too! Just a great maxi dress over all!
links_Review_Text: Pros soft material and fit well. Love how comfy! No cons
Only with an RTR unlimited subscription does one get to wear a fab Pyer Moss dress straight from the runway. It was super comfortable and an amazing color and super fabulous!!!

links_Review_Title: Wore to work and again for airplane travel day
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable and the length was good even for my short legs. You have to choose your undergarments carefully because lines will show. I wore with suede booties and felt very on trend!

links_Review_Title: Photos don't do this dress justice!
links_Review_Text: I love this dress!!! The photos don't do it justice, the color and fit are beautiful. I don't think it's as unforgiving as some of the other reviews have said however I could have gone down a size too. A must rent for sure!

Lovely soft and comfy dress! Deducted a star because of a small tear at supper though the dress was brand new. Since the zipper goes up so high you will need a buddy to assist. Was not too long at all.
Unique color and made from a really comfy stretch material. Just a little plain on its own. Can be clingy. I added the vest and belt which added to my winter look. But I liked it overall.

links_Review_Title: Deli mustard yellow adds all the flavor to a virtual work outfit!
links_Review_Text: I loved this color & my current hair is blue so the contrast was ON POINT. Dress is stretchy but fitted- shows your body. There's no hiding in this dress! So you better be feeling yourself or sporting some spanx - but I'm guessing we're all letting the spanx take a vacation during quarantine, right? Even though I'm WFH, I'm on lots of Video calls. I styled with a simple gold necklace and rainbow crystal demarson earrings and matching suede Manolos. Yep heels- I was feeling myself!
The overall fit of the dress was great. I loved the way it hugged my curves. However the dress is very long and it required heels.

I LOVE the detailing of this dress and may rent it again in the warmer months. But the fabric is so thin for colder temps. The fabric clings and not very forgiving. It shows every little lump and bump. As a result of the fabric this sat a bit more body con than I wanted it to.
Yes this dress is form fitting and elegant. I'm a tall girl and it was long enough! The color is beautiful and the caped sleeves are fabulous. Would rent this again!

links_Review_Title: Great fabric, LOVE the design. Slim fit. I would have worn it if I'd gotten a size or 2 bigger.
links_Review_Text: Love love love the fabric, yum color, weird but interesting sleeves; need to steam it before wearing...came a bit wrinkly.
This is such a gorgeous, unique dress, but it is utterly unforgiving. The material was so clingy that I could see my belly button through it. Like walking into a party naked, only less flattering.

This was a perfect going-out dress: fun, sexy, and unbelievably comfortable. The color is a little less magenta and a little more plum in person. It has shoulder pads, but I didn't think they were very noticeable. The overlapping hem was generous enough that I was never worried about being indecent. I would recommend this in a heartbeat.

I liked this dress. The color is beautiful, and I added a filter to this photo to better show how vibrant it is. It was short even on my short-legged frame (thus the tights). It was comfortable and stretchy but I felt it hid my curvy figure. Definitely had to pin the chest.

links_Review_Title: i felt like a million bucks
links_Review_Text: it was definitely boobalicious. highly recommend double sided tape to stay covered.

links_Review_Title: If you like shiny that's your dress
links_Review_Text: Didnt end up wearing it cause The color was too much for me but i think the cut is very flattering

links_Review_Title: It was a special night for one of my oldest friends!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress...it was so comfortable and the long sleeves were perfect for a winter wedding. The purple color was brighter and more sparkly than i anticipated but really pretty.

Loved this dress, it is sparkly but not overwhelming. Wore it for some of my engagement photos on a COLD day and stayed relatively warm. Great fit on the waist and chest, very comfortable. A little tight for me on the butt but I have a bigger one and I think that's how it's supposed to be.
I rented this for my work holiday party. I didn't end up wearing it, i wore a green donna morgan sequins dress. But loved it and it fit great.

links_Review_Title: Loved every aspect. Gorgeous and compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: Fit is awesome. Color is beautiful. Would love to own and wear again.

links_Review_Title: Good winter party dress, but low-cut and short in the front!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for the long sleeves because I didn't want to hide a cute dress under a cardigan when it's cold. However it is very low cut so you have to pin it, and the bottom is actually shorter in the front where it wraps. Need tights! So it was a lot more revealing and also tighter than I expected. I considered getting a different dress but ultimately stuck with this one and I am glad I did. Also it's over the head, so if you have broad shoulders you need to size up just to put it on!
Fit nicely ... the dress had good stretch which made it comfortable to wear. Just enough sparkle without being too much! Received numerous compliments all night
Super cute. Wore with fishnet stockings
I wore this to a winter wedding and it was so cute! Looked formal from the regal purple and pair with black tights but it was still very fun from the glitter and v neck shape.

links_Review_Title: Easy to wear and looks fabulous!
links_Review_Text: Look glamorous with ease! Great color and beyond comfortable. A tad short, but just be careful while sitting down. Wore the medium but could have also worn the small, the medium just felt slightly more forgiving. Overall, a fun party dress!

I didn't end up wearing this dress to my occasion as it turned out to be a little more of a casual look than I was going for. But this dress is still beautiful. i love the way it drapes and feels. I was worried the sleeves would be too long and would look bunched up since I am on the shorter side and that often happens (5'3). But the sleeves were the perfect length. The only issue I had was the color felt a little off from the original photo. I feel in the light it is a much lighter purple than expected, rather than a dark violet color. So something to consider depending on the event you attend and their lighting situation.

links_Review_Title: Not Your Average Company Christmas Party Dress
links_Review_Text: In a sea of red and white dresses, this purple dress stood out! I received compliments left & right. The dress was a little TOO low cut for the occasion (husband's company Christmas party) so I safety pinned it. The material is thin but not sheer & it travels well. I was happy with the level of sparkle although this picture does not do it justice. I recommend!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a night out!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for my company holiday party and I absolutely LOVED it! The material & color are so beautiful in person and it photographed really well. I got the Large & XL but wore the XL as it was a little less tight in the midsection but the dress drapes nicely & has a good stretch to it throughout. I don't like to show too much cleavage so I did pin it with a small safety pin to make it a bit more comfortable in the chest area. Overall a great dress that I would definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: Fun, comfy dress perfect for a NYE party or wedding (and flattering)
links_Review_Text: highly recommend it. I'm usually a large or xl depending on the designer and went with the XL for this. It was a Friday night wedding in the Midwest so it was cold. Wore black tights and black shoes. Stretchy material. I did pin it at the chest for less cleavage. Loved it. Would make a great NYE dress. The only thing I didn't like was the shoulder pads but they didn't end up bothering me or making me feel too broad!

Great dress for a holiday party. It's sparkly but tasteful. It is quite short and I felt I needed a colored hose. I'm only 5'4" so it would be even shorter if you're taller. The cut is very flattering and hides any flaws.

I rented this for a singles party later this week -- it finally became available from my Hearts list so i had to get it! It's a rich royal purple sparkly dress that hits mid-thigh and just enough cleavage to let you wear a bra! I feel sexy and vibrant in it! A must rent!

This dress is very cute and the color is fun. The only issue I had with this dress it that it needed to be pinned in the front because it would not lay right. The lining in the skirt part laid strangely too, and the seams showed through which I found annoying.
True to size, very comfy, didn't have to wear a bra, a bit shorter than I had thought.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a winter wedding. Worn with black tights and booties.
links_Review_Text: The deep v in the front needed to be pinned by safety pin otherwise there was too much boobs (and not appropriate for church wedding ceremony). Sitting down was tricky too, there's no actual skirt and just folds of fabric so beware of showing too much leg when sitting down. Otherwise, this was one of my favorite rentals I've done!

links_Review_Title: Worn to my husband's rugby club awards ceremony/date night.
links_Review_Text: This dress is super sparkly and the color really pops in person. It was a little shorter in person than I was anticipating but I just watched how I stood/sat for the night I wore it. Overall, it's a really fun party dress and I'd definitely wear it to another event. The dress almost feels a little 80's with the shoulder pads and sleeves which is super fun!

links_Review_Title: The perfect cut to hide the flaws and show the goods!
links_Review_Text: The dress fits perfectly in all the right places. It is a little large in the chest and I have a large chest. Overall felt very sexy and it was extremely comfortable!

I would rent this dress again in a heartbeat. It is so FUN and comfortable! I am a true size 10, 5'8" and 152 lbs and had to size up to the XL. I got so many compliments on this dress all night. I wish I could have kept it.

The fabric is sparkly and looks very cheap. The shoulders are slightly ruffled and have shoulder pads. Basically the dress looked atrocious...! Didn't wear it to the wedding. Easy return and great service from RTR!

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress for new years party. Nice flattering.
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress for new years party. Nice flattering.

I wore this to an office Christmas party. I am an 8-10 and fit in the large but wore the XL, it was more comfy. I used fashion tape on the deep V which worked out fine. Unfortunately don't have a picture but this was great and comfortable and I'd wear it again. The fabric is a purple shimmer which was really pretty.

Gorgeous dress but runs small! It is also pretty short. I am a true medium and the large fit like a medium except in the chest. Also I had to wear tights; it is short for a company party. Gorgeous color and very pretty overall.

Gorgeous color, shiny material up-close but, the sparkle doesn't really show up on camera from a distance. It looks like a flat purple color on tv, when you're not up-close. I work in entertainment so, these details are important for some folks :) Great overall fit. The top was a little loose but, was fine with fashion tape. Flattering material, breathable, stretchy, not too tight in hips, stomach area. Sexy dress.

links_Review_Title: Nice for a taller/ thinner figure.
links_Review_Text: Fabric was perhaps more stretchy than expected. I expected more of a draping fabric. Im 5'4" 135 lbs 34D and it was far too tight.

I rented this for my husband and I's first date post-baby. At 7 weeks postpartum I was feeling pretty self conscious about my body and wanted something sexy that wouldn't hug the wrong places. The wrap on this falls in just the right place. I was surprised by just *how* purple this dress was because in the photos it looks like dark purple shimmer. It is like orchid purple lurex on a black fabric so it's PURPLE. It was pretty, just unexpected.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress for a Fall wedding!
links_Review_Text: This dress was really cute and I got a lot of compliments. Fit wise, I am usually a 10/12. I felt the large was a little tight around my mid section and I liked the fit of the XL better, which I ended up wearing. The XL was a little big in the vneck area though, as when I bent forward it was really baggy and you could fully see down it. Double sided tape didn't stick to the fabric so I ended up safety pinning it shut a bit and that did the trick.

links_Review_Title: The fit was good but ride up in the waist area. Like the color and fabric.
links_Review_Text: Great dress for party.
Great stretchy material, although it was a bit roomy in the hips. Easy, sexy and feminine. Lots of compliments and it's so comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Like thin scuba material- great for roomy hips
links_Review_Text: Others have commented that you need a smaller bust size. I have a 34D bust and my boobs looked amazing but I think any bigger bust might have issues. That said, I am an hourglass figure but I think this dress would go great on a pear shape or anyone will bigger hips and booty as the hips had room. The material is not a knit- it feels like a thin scuba material. No zipper which is nice too- I stepped into it, but you could also put it over your head.
I rented this for a date night and my boyfriend loved it. Very form fitting but the fabric had give so it didn't feel tight. Very comfortable dress and it held everything in place even without a bra.

links_Review_Title: Flattering and fun. My friend said I looked "snatched"!

links_Review_Text: Very low cut at bust so my strapless made a few unwanted appearances. Fairly true to size but the space in the hips was large.

Super comfortable held everything up top in. Hips were a tad big like everyone said. Hips made such a difference I had to go down two sizes and I definitely have hips and a bottom. Love this dress though, the cut is nice and it was perfect for a evening event.

Couldn't wear - I consider myself pretty proportional, but there was a ton of extra room in the hip area that made the dress bunch up around the waist as well. Would have been impossible to go any smaller or the top part would not have fit my chest.
Fit perfectly - amazing material

links_Review_Title: I received many compliments on the dress and how comfortable it looked. It was great for a night out
links_Review_Text: The dress was a little big but I wanted to go with the larger size since I had my spanx on. It was stretchy but really comfortable to wear. I liked that it wasn't too snug and the straps did not fall off. Great choice for a nice dinner.

links_Review_Title: Wore a sweater over for the day
links_Review_Text: Excellent dress! Puckers a bit at the hips but I think sizing down would help
Gorgeous dress. Some extra room in the hips, but the stretchiness of the fabric made it ok, even though I didn't quite fill it out. Absolutely beautiful and so comfortable
The dress is very cute and well made, but very hippy. I don't have hips so it looked like saddle bags on me. Maybe a smaller size would have been better.
Wow this dress was beautiful and fit perfect. Shows all your curves.
I needed a dress that would sstay looking fresh and neat for 6 hours. This dress was very comfortable and form fitting. Easy to move around in while still hugging the right places. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Dress was perfect and super comfortable for a girls night out
links_Review_Text: Dress had a lot of stretch if you have bigger hips and fit perfect! Want this in my closet permanently.

links_Review_Title: I did not end up wearing this dress
links_Review_Text: I normally wear a 12/14, and the website recommended a size 52 for me. Although the dress fit, it was a little big, specifically around the legs/hip. Nice dress!
Very form fitting yet flattering material.
Stretchy material. Really comfortable. Definitely made for women with a smaller bust. I gave a 4 just because I had a really had time finding jewelry and shoes that complimented it.

This dress is very simple, feminine and sophisticated. I am a 10 in most designers on RTR and have worn an 8 or a 6 in this designer. I almost needed the 4 in this one! I bet the shoulder straps would have been to tight though. I wore it, it's slimming and beautiful.

links_Review_Title: I did t end up wearing this dress
links_Review_Text: Fit to size except there was strange wings almost in the hips as if meant for someone with wider hips
Thick, stretchy wetsuit-feeling material. The detail at the bust and the seams are one of my favorite things about the dress. Fit like a glove, not too short, very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Fabric was a bit over worn
links_Review_Text: Dress is cute but a bit over worn. Fit great on top and a bit big on the bottom for me but I would say it runs true to size.

links_Review_Title: Rented for a school formal dance!
links_Review_Text: Fit was amazing! The bra part ran a little large on me but it felt and looked amazing.
The fabric on this dress is a stunner - there's a slight shimmer and it's just gorgeous. Absolutely no stretch and seemed to run a little small in the ribcage. Long enough even for me. Loved it.

Great party length on my tall frame. The A-line cut looked flattering in my curvy/muscular frame. I created a more casual look by pairing it with my leather jacket. I really liked the subtle metallic sheen of the fabric.

Rented for a work holiday party. At first I was concerned with the chest area but when worn without a bra it fits perfectly. The dress wasn't too revealing and hit the right length on me. If you look closely you can see the nice silver shimmer in the fabric. Loved that for the holidays!

Fit TTS! I wore with a strapless bra for better support but also could've been worn without one. Got SO many compliments. Dress has shimmer which didn't expect, but I still loved as someone who usually only wears neutrals. I'm 5'9 and didn't feel like this was too short. Cinched at waist but flowed out so was forgiving. Straps were only thing that were too big and not adjustable so fell a couple times throughout night. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Good dress for weddings or parties
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a wedding in Vegas and a birthday inner. Perfect fit and shows the right amount of cleavage. Received many compliments.

I liked this dress, just not what I was looking for. The material was lighter than I expected, and the boob area wasn't very flattering. Wish it would've worked out because the color/pattern was beautiful!
100% gorgeous! The length was very good for my teenage daughter: short enough for a teenager, but long enough to pass school dress codes. Very nicely made.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but I didn't wear it because it was big on me.
links_Review_Text: Pros : it is a beautiful dress and is well made Cons: I am 5'1" weighs 116 lbs; it runs big on the top portion and the shoulder straps keep on falling off; it's true to size from the waist down.

links_Review_Title: Cute top cut, the bottom was a bit too structures for my taste.
links_Review_Text: The hems run from both sides giving the dress a structured flared out look. Surprisingly formal.

I originally rented this for new years but loved it so much I couldn't wait and wore it to a wedding before. I wore is with a pashmina and heels and it was perfect. I am 6 feet tall and it was a great length for me, I was able to dance and move around without being self conscious. I got so many compliments and was very felt super confident. The only con was that the straps were a little long so it showed a little more cleavage than normal but it wasn't enough to stop me form wearing it!
Very nice material and the 6 fit perfectly. Just wasn't as formal as I would have liked so I didn't wear.
This didn't work for me at all as the material has no give at all could be problematic for hour glass women

links_Review_Title: Dress is gorgeous and lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: The fit was a little tight around the chest (which was surprising for me. I'm a bit flat chested but this certainly gave an illusion). I'm 5'5" and it was probably a little shorter than I anticipated but all in all, fit great and very cute. The 6 was too large on me, especially in the straps which fell off my shoulders.

links_Review_Title: Amazing jumpsuit, love the tie bow detail
links_Review_Text: This is a great jumpsuit. I decided to size up as it was my first jumpsuit from Lilly, but I should have ordered my true size 10. It still fit, just a little loose. I love the print, the length, the fabric. It comes with a waist tie that shows as secured at the back, but I preferred it as a front tie so styled it that way. Check out my Instagram at : #renttherunwayfashionista to see more reviews and pics.

links_Review_Title: For someone with super long legs?
links_Review_Text: Besides that, really fun color and cute bow tie. The pant legs are to the floor and dragging and I'm 5'6. But it fit my body. So maybe if you have really long legs this works? (Still wearing because I like it, but not ideal)

I typically wear a 0-4, XXS to S. The size 2 fit perfectly with just a little breathing room, other than in the bust, which didn't really feel tight but needed a stronger or maybe additional snap to keep the neckline closed, as it did pop open a few times - but it was only mildly revealing when it did so, so not a big deal. No stretch to the fabric so if you're between sizes definitely size up rather than down. Super flattering dress, would rent agin and might even buy. Highly recommend!

I was worried when I rented this because only one size was available. Thankfully, the 14 fit perfectly. The fabric is soft and I felt GREAT in this dress. The only thing that keeps me from a 5 star rating is that the snap that held the bust in kept popping open. I had to pin it in the middle of the wedding to keep it closed. Other than that, it was perfect!

I rented this for my 40th birthday. The print is subtle and rich. The sleeves are gorgeous. I had a sexy amount of cleavage. The dress has a snap to hold the top in place but LOL I still needed a safety pin for it to *actually* stay in place. It's a shorter dress than I would normally wear but I paired it with black tights and booties (because Chicago) and felt dynamite!

links_Review_Title: Super cute but beware of the button popping.
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a holiday event, it was a great length and I really liked the details of the sleeves. The only thing to consider would be the button in the front of the dress. Every time I sat down it would pop open. Other than that it's really cute!
Lovely dark green silk, falls really nicely

I normally wear a size 4 dress and this fit perfect! Just the right amount of cleavage and good length for my husband's work event. It was really comfortable and received compliments. Would definitely rent again!
Loved this dress! Got so many compliments all night! Great color and perfect with a red lip! Doesn't have any stretch!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely stunning and so many compliments !
links_Review_Text: This dress was one of my all time favorites. Probably could have sized up to a 2 (I'm right in between sizes) but the 0 fit like a glove. felt so glam and up to date. Would rent again! I love this brand

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing it to the bridal shower that I rented it for.
links_Review_Text: It runs larger on top, and is very tight on the bottom. The sleeves were also a little too big, and the material is very thin.
Rented for baby shower. It is an incredible dress! The big "pirate" sleeves make it a bit different. The fit is outstanding. I didn't have issues with the front button popping but I am a 32B.

Lovely dress and excellent quality and color. I wore it to a holiday party and received lots of compliments. Because it was roomy in the arms, and slim in the waist, it was perfect for my figure. I wish I had more occasions to wear it or else I would have bought it.
Pretty color and fabric, but thin material with no lining. Shape wear necessary.

I rented this dress for my mother in law's milestone birthday at an upscale venue in January. I'm not very busty so this dress fit well in the chest area and was quite flattering still. I did size up, as I'm most often a 4 and it was on the loose side but I could see where the 4 wouldn't have been as comfortable. I would rent this again!

links_Review_Title: Great dress. The size up fit perfectly.
links_Review_Text: Fit was great. Dress was very comfortable and flattering.

links_Review_Title: Couldn't wear the dress, didnt fit.
links_Review_Text: Fits small on bottom and large on top. Definitely for a large chested woman. I'm a 38C and it was so loose the dress didnt look good on me. Ended up not wearing it ðŸ˜¥

links_Review_Title: Dress doesn't fit full hips well
links_Review_Text: I was excited to try this dress, but the fit didn't work for me. The top was large and gapped with a very low neckline that made me feel like my bust was on display too much, and the skirt was too tight. I didn't wind up wearing this to the party I rented it for. It might work better for women with narrower hips or a more straight and narrow body type.
THE CUTEST TOP! So silky and soft, got soooo many compliments

Love this top, it's the perfect top for any night occasion! Dates, cocktails, dinner. Fancy but flirty. I got it in a medium and the sizing was not too large. Love finding things in black that are still unique.

links_Review_Title: So cute and flattering but more cropped than expected !
links_Review_Text: Super cute and flattering - I wore with high waisted jeans and was a little short still.
love this top!! was so close to buying it and may rent to buy it again! i wore it with a pleated leather skirt and got so many compliments!
It was so comfortable and I was able to war a strapless bra!

I love this shirt and can wear it with jeans or nice pants. I would have probably gotten a medium because you can adjust the waist and the sleeves are large. I forgot to mention it's VERY slimming. Makes your waist look very very tiny and for a small breasted girl, makes them look a little bigger because of the fit. I want to keep this shirt forever. Haha very elegant.

I really liked this top! I wore it to a concert / lib venue and had guys and girls alike commenting on how great I looked ;) I also got to cut the tags off this one so that was satisfying! It definitely does not run as cropped as I was fearing which was good. Loose in the bust. The arm was long but it ruffled nicely. The bow on the side was cute. I felt comfortable and would rent this again! Top pick for a going-out top!

links_Review_Title: Looks good but didn't work IRL
links_Review_Text: Wanted to love this too but it was not meant to be. I have a waist that should work with this top but there was so much material it was like a sack and any hint of shape was lost. Sad because it is really cute in the photos
Wore to an office holiday party with wide leg black pants. Looked good, nice material

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments on this top. Loved it.

links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this top! Super fun, perfect for a New Years Eve party I attended. Wore with black corduroys.

This shirt looks as great as it feels. It's comfortable, billowy and beautiful. I wore easily with a strapless bra, and it looks great with high-waisted leggings, jeans, wide legged pants, or a pencil skirt! Rented for a Friendsgiving.
Super cute. Would be 5 stars, but my rental was missing a button on the sleeve!
Such a cute flirty going out top. Wore it with fun jeans and it made for such a great outfit. I didn't want to return it
Wore this top to a Christmas Eve party, very pretty!
Beautiful drape, needs a cami

links_Review_Title: Great evening made better with a cute outfit!
links_Review_Text: The top is a really nice fabric, super flattering. Sexy, but sophisticated. Love love!
Beautiful blouse. very pretty sheer detail. Received a lot of compliments! Deff recommend.

The fit is perfect, it's v-neck without being too low and the designs in the fabric are beautiful. The tie in the front does cause your stomach to show a little bit but it's hardly noticeable because the ties hang down over the part that comes up to your stomach. Loved so much that I bought it!

links_Review_Title: Cute for a Casual NYE in
links_Review_Text: I definitely had to wear a cami underneath, but the shirt was equal parts comfortable and cute. Didn't photograph terribly well, but it has a fun subtle animal print pattern that adds a level of fun.
Love this shirt!!! It's not too sheer but it's definitely low cut and you need a cami underneath. Otherwise it's very sexy and good for dates!

links_Review_Title: good fit but didn't love print
links_Review_Text: Like this designer and fit was spot on. Since there were no reviews yet I didn't realize it was an animal print (thought it was just lace) so it wasn't really my taste.

links_Review_Title: Cute but a little tight in the arms/chest
links_Review_Text: Pretty fabric... sheer leopard print. Need to wear a camisole under (unless you want to show skin and belly button because of the tie). It was a little tight in the chest and arms but not restricting.

links_Review_Title: Felt so comfortable and elegant in this one!
links_Review_Text: Really loved this dress and felt like I could dress it up or down. Super comfortable and elegant.
Very beautiful dress that can be dressed up or down. However the static cling was so bad nothing I did got rid of it and made wearing the dress a little annoying. Nevertheless a beautiful piece.

The square neckline is not conducive to wearing a standard bra. Also had to use fashion tape to keep the shoulders up, as they kept falling off without it. Even though I had put some effort into getting it ready to wear, my boyfriend loved it and I did receive a lot of compliments.

Lounging in this cute little number brightened up my quarantine! I sized up 2 sizes based on reviews that said it runs small, but 2 sizes was a bit much. Could have sized up one or possibly not at all. (I have an average size chest).

I truly LOVED how this dress fit, but after wearing it for 45 seconds it would cling to my legs creating a terribly unflattering look so I never wore it in public. I didn't try any sort of static spray so maybe that would have helped, but beware that if you rent this dress it will cling in all the right and the wrong areas.
Too small

This is a beautiful dress but unfortunately I couldn't wear it because the sizing is way off. I almost always wear in 8 in dresses and this one wouldn't even come close to zipping. I probably would need a 12 or 14 to make it work. Also, this dress really needs a belt to make the waist look right. Other Nicholas dresses in this style (with different fabric) all have a really cute belt and I wish this one had a belt as well.
I am a regular size 10 and this dress wouldn't even zip. It's so beautiful in person!

links_Review_Title: Would Not Zip Over My Chest
links_Review_Text: The dress was lined and looked nice but it wasn't particularly flattering and it didn't want to zip over my chest. I'm normally a 12/14 so not being able to wear a 16 caught me off guard. If you are busty, don't rent.

links_Review_Title: Great print and comfortable to wear
links_Review_Text: Very cool print, cute dress, comfortable to wear (even for nearly all day long). I wore tights under since the slit goes up pretty high.

I loved this for a working from home, with the occasional videoconference. Beautiful fabric. I did have to Size up (which I never do, there is no stretch in the bust area however). The size 2 was perfect. On the bottom it is way too short for work in person but awesome for at home.
Fit was true to size, I am 5'5 and 130 pounds and wore size small. Definitely short but that made it fun.

links_Review_Title: Unique dress but some paper clips were needed..
links_Review_Text: This dress is definitely unique. between the puffy shoulders and turtle neck, it was different and I got compliments for that and a few "not everyone can pull this dress off" comments! I struggled between small and xs, small was too big up top but xs was a snug getting over my hips. Also beware with dancing.. i had to paperclip it closed as it was a high slit! Also the arm button popped off while I was sitting, hence the 4 star rating. Overall loved this dress though!

I got lots of compliments wearing this to my son's school fundraiser. I had to wear tights bc it was so short on me, even though I'm 5'1". Fit me a little snug across the hips but not too tight that I could sit. A very fun dress for a winter evening.
I wore this to my food tasting for my wedding and I LOVED it. I got so many compliments and it fit like a glove. It was really flattering and comfortable as well. Didn't want to send it back!

I wore size 6 and it's a bit short for me even I'm just 5"3 tall. But overall it was just perfect. Several random people approached and told me that "it looks great!" "Where did you get it?" "What brand is it?" I felt it's worth my money.

I loved this dress! But be aware that this dress is SHORT! If you want to show off your legs, go for it. Otherwise, skip this dress. I love the sash with side tie and asymmetrical hemline. The sleeves and color made it a perfect winter choice.
Perfect fit, short but not too short and still high neck and long sleeve so you are covered but have a little leg showing. Love the color and print. Very good quality.
Didn't wear, right and short! Size up x2!

Not my typical kind of dress, but I loved it and so did my fiancÃ©! I have a short torso, so the sleeves were a tad bit long and The pleated material in the front sagged. It was short, but it was very comfortable, light material and loved that it covered neck and arms for winter months. I would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Fits perfect! Hugs in all the right places.
links_Review_Text: Only con -can be a little short if your tall
This dress fit perfect and was so adorable and comfortable. Perfect for a wedding or date night!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful! But a little snug in the hips
links_Review_Text: Normally a 6, I had to size up. The hips are snug if you are more of a pear/hourglass shape.

links_Review_Title: Everything came in on time and the product was just as it was described!!
links_Review_Text: It fit beautifully. Literally fit me like a glove. I've got pretty large boobs but this dress fit them perfectly. The front can be a little short especially if you are planning to get down on the dance floor that was the only part. Otherwise I would literally love to have this as an item in my closet.

links_Review_Title: I wish I could buy this dress.
links_Review_Text: Couldn't be happier with the style and fit. Super comfy and super flattering. Definitely pretty short but perfect with opaque tights. Worn for a holiday party and will definitely be renting again.

links_Review_Title: Went a size up based on reviews...
links_Review_Text: Could have potentially stuck with my normal size M. It was very comfortable and the L was a bit longer which is good but I wish I got a M. Overall perfect for a party though!
I wore this for my winter party and received lots of compliments. It's sophisticated and sexy!

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable and light - got tons of compliments !
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'4 130lbs & wear 34C bra. I wore a small and it fit perfectly. The slit does come up a little high so I chose to wear stockings with it but also because I wore this for a Christmas party. The material was so light and comfortable so I didn't get hot. The pattern and sleeves make the dress. I paired with black heels and gold earrings. My thighs were a little smushed when I sat. I didn't chose to try on the medium because the small fit perfect enough for me. Loved it, would recommend

I liked the dress, rented it for a fall wedding, matched it with a nude trench coat and sandals. I had size XS and S and ended up wearing S because it was a little longer on the bottom and didn't uncover too much of my thighs BUT it felt a little loose and the sleeves were a tiny too long. Very comfortable and eye catching - received a lot of compliments. Even though the top goes up your neck, the bottom is uncovers good portion of legs what gives a good balance. Would rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Fun, out of the box dress!
links_Review_Text: Event: evening, dressy, work related fundraiser Height: 5ft: the length worked well for me but if I was taller the upper end of the hem would have been way to short for an event that had work related people at. Size: XS which fit perfectly. If in doubt I would size up. Material has 0 stretch. The color is more of a burgundy which I actually liked and it paired well with nude heels I received many compliments on the uniqueness of the dress. Had to brag about RTR all night. Would rent again!!

links_Review_Title: First order wasn't what I thought, and they overnighted me to replacements. Great service!
links_Review_Text: This dress is great. It fits a bit loose, but I was between a large and an XL. I'm happy I went up thought because you can draw it tighter.

This dress is super cute! The fit is very flattering and great for showing off a little leg. The fabric has no give, so keep that in mind for the sizing. I am 36DD and the size Large fit well in the chest area.

links_Review_Title: VERY high slit in the front
links_Review_Text: Overall it fit well and was comfortable. If you have a larger butt, definitely size up! The sleeve were a little puffy around my shoulders, which are more on the broad side. The main reason I can only give it 3 stars is because how short the slit is in the skirt! When I sat down, I had to keep a napkin on my lap to avoid my underwear being seen! I am 5'4", and the length was perfect in the back, but the front slit was very inappropriate.
Rented this for a friend's bridal shower and did not end up wearing because it was too small and RTR did not give me an option of a larger size. Very cute, great detail but size up!

The only thing that kept me from totally loving this dress was the drape across the chest. It was a little to big, I wanted to tack it at the waist to pull it in tighter. I'm a 34 D for reference. Otherwise it was light and comfortable and my boyfriend was a fan.

links_Review_Title: Great for petites! Loved the design and fit great!
links_Review_Text: Was a unique design and great fit. The dress was short when you sat down but luckily the waist ties fell over your lap so it became a great shield.

links_Review_Title: Unique & fun dress. Lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress with black tights and booties for a holiday party and got so many compliments! The front part is slightly awkward and fairly short, so do be careful when sitting down.
Even with a high neck, this dress is so fun and flirty! There is a slit that can go up a little high but it doesn't ruin the dress. A fun take on a holiday dress.

links_Review_Title: Received so many compliments. Stunning dres!!!
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress!! Hides what you want to hide and showcase what you want to show off!!

This dress just wasn't for me. It was designed for someone much taller with a more traditional figure. I am petite and curvy and looked like a little girl playing dress up! The dress is beautifully made and the colors are awesome. Just not for my body type.
a little tight in the bust. would have been a better fit in XS

links_Review_Title: Cute in theory but runs way small
links_Review_Text: Couldn't wear this dress as the bottom was way too short and tight. Would recommend sizing up at least one size if not too
Really like this top. Would rotate it in to my closet for sure!

links_Review_Title: Wore to a friend's birthday dinner. Got lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Good fit overall

I wanted to love this shirt. It is beautiful but I had some fit issues. I am a curvy lady and found myself pulling down the bottom all day. The waist area did get a little stick on my chest when I put it on and took it off. The neckline is lower then I was comfortable with for work, but would be okay as a night out top.
Perfect for a night out
This shirt is one of my favorite rentals. Fitted at the waist which I found to be flattering and loose enough in the chest. For reference I'm about 160, 36G. Rent this if I ever send it back ;)
So cute and light weight ! Darling.

links_Review_Title: Totally cute, but not my favorite.
links_Review_Text: Rented for a birthday party. It is a little cropped but not terribly so that someone who doesn't like cropped looks can still enjoy. Fun print, soft fabric. Overall seems like it would be a nice fit on many different body types.
Was a little shorter than what I normally wear, but flattering. Would rent again!
The fit of this just wasn't right for me.
Fit perfect and very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Loved the details, but too fitted at the bottom
links_Review_Text: I gave this shirt two stars for the details and fun pattern, both of which add some variety to a wardrobe. But the two main issues are that 1) this runs short-ish, from shoulder to hem, and 2) the bottom of the shirt is quite fitted. If you have a long torso and/or any muffin top, you'll be fiddling with it the whole time. I tried it on with high waisted trousers, and it worked more or less, but I just couldn't commit to wearing it because I didn't want to be pulling it down all day long. Additionally, if a long torso and muffin top are not issues for you (!) and you decide to rent it anyhow, I will note that the slit in front goes down pretty far, so if your office is conservative, this won't work.
good
This is a great work blouse but you'll probably need to wear with high waisted pants - it's a little short.
This was so cute for Christmas Day. I wore it with black pants but it would have been good with jeans. The waistline was slimming. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: This was my holiday go-to top for at-home parties! Lots of compliments - very very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Comfortable, stylish and flattering - what else can you ask for. It can be worn with jeans, skirts or pants! My go-to this season!

links_Review_Title: Got many compliments on this fun/sexy top.
links_Review_Text: Fit just right, very flattering.
Great with fitted or suit pants. A little low cut, and the shirring (which is very slimming) rides up while walking.

I should have gone with the next size up. Being a flowy shirt Iâ€™m not sure if the next size up would have been too baggy but the waist was so snug- and a shirt waist. Iâ€™m a 32C and wear a size 2 pant waist, being 5â€™9â€ I also worry about length... sleeves were perfect though tight around my bitty wrists, tight waist, keyhole was too revealing for work so had to wear a tank top under vs a small cami. Only wore it once in the full month I rented it.

links_Review_Title: If you like compliments, get this top!
links_Review_Text: Great fit. Perfect for work and play. Sexy and classy all in one.
This was so comfortable. The top is fitted but the rest is loose fitting with pockets! It was very comfortable for a long night but still looked special!

links_Review_Title: Not for those who are slightly different sizes on top and bottom
links_Review_Text: Top fit great, bottom was snug, but there was a huge amount of extra fabric around the middle. Not sure if this is due to the way the pockets are set, but it made the garment unwearable for my body!
Wore to a large dinner and got tons of compliments. Perfect length for me. I'm normally a size 4 and the size 2 fit just fine.

links_Review_Title: I loved this jumpsuit I want to keep it!
links_Review_Text: Fit great, however, I am fairly tall and I think it was a little short (or shorter than it shows on the model) but I think it still worked great.

I really wanted to love this jumpsuit. It looked nice in photos and I made it work for a night out, but the fit was funny. The crotch is really long and the bust is really large. Even the size 2 felt large on me. I used a skinny belt to try and give it more shape and hold it in place. It was comfortable and I liked the pockets - but I think would fit better on someone taller/more busty!
Wore this for NYE and it was perfect! So comfortable and how can you not love anything with pockets?!
Fitted up top but a little baggy in the butt/leg area probably due to my height. Great basic black jumpsuit that I wore to a company holiday party!
This piece was exactly what I expected! It fit perfectly in the bust area and right below my ankle with a shorter heel. Fits wonderfully and looks great on.

links_Review_Title: I wore this jumpsuit for a birthday night-on-the-town.
links_Review_Text: I wore this jumpsuit under a blush over-sized blazer. I thought the combo was perfect. The jumpsuit does run large, but I ended up loving the fit and the pockets.

I am short so it was long in the legs and was hard to find the right heels for it. Also it was long is the crotch, so a little MC Hammer for me. All in all it was fine for a date night once because I had it. But I wouldn't rent it again.

This jumpsuit didn't work for my body. It was great in the hips, legs, and waist, but the top was too big. The wires may have held it up if my chest were a little bigger, but it was just too wide up top. May be better for women with bigger chests and smaller hips.

links_Review_Title: It fit well, and the pockets are great.
links_Review_Text: The small detail at the neckline makes a huge difference and made this jumpsuit feel special. Lots of compliments, and I enjoyed this outfit. It is a big long, but I am very short, so this was doable with heels.
The top half ran very small, but the bottom half was too big!

links_Review_Title: Gorgreous piece, was so excited to wear but...
links_Review_Text: ...the ehest and belly area were too big for me and I didn't end up wearing. Hips and legs fit. I am smaller busted but usually a 4 works for me.

links_Review_Title: Great jumpsuit. Very elegant and nicely structured.
links_Review_Text: This was way too big on me.

links_Review_Title: Not a great fit for hourglass shapes
links_Review_Text: This was sent to me as a backup outfit after my original order was lost in the mail. I love the idea of this but it was tight at the hips and huge around the bust area which is a dealbreaker since this is strapless. I think this would better fit more athletic or straight and narrow body types with slight curves.
Very cute. Could wear date night or party. Love.
I love this top so much I plan on renting it again! Great fit.

I sit typically between size 8 & 10- sometimes size 8 won't zip all the way up if the material doesn't have stretch... I sized up to a 10 in this one as the material isn't stretchy and it was perfect.

Loved this top. There were two little loops that kept popping out by the chest area from the inside lining so I had to safety pin them down. Other than that it was a great top and fit well. Material was a little thicker than I expected. Wore it three different times.

links_Review_Title: Cute but too short waisted for me
links_Review_Text: Too short in sleeves and waist for me. I have a long torso and this hit me all wrong
Fit a little awkwardly! I felt like I couldn't move my arms very well.
Wore this multiple times and received multiple compliments. Clean, classy and sexy!

Love everything about this top! The fit was perfect, it looked classy and elegant, but with a bit of sexy flirtiness with the bare shoulders. I was surprised at how easily and comfortable the top/sleeves stayed up - I never had to fuss with it or tug at it to keep it up. My bf told me he dreamed about it that night!
I have a larger bust and was worried about the fit but it looked great on! I got many compliments when I wore it.
Beautiful top, very elegant. Keep in mind the fabric is quite thick and wrinkles easily so may need a steam (mine did).
I loved this top. I sized up and it fit fine. Probably would've been perfect with my exact size. It still looked good. I love the neckline and it hits perfectly at the waist.
A fun LBD but not a favorite. Zipper is a bit tricky to zip up if you're alone. Size up for a more comfortable fit.

Looks exactly as pictured. Super comfortable. Also engineered for ease of self-zipping (important since many HervÃ© dresses require a second set of hands that kill the magic of the initial entrance for date night).

Confusing dress to put on. Changed out of my pj's for date night in the living room. Boyfriend hated it, because he doesn't like me in dresses that have cutouts. I'm still not talking to him today. Should have just stayed in my pajamas and not made an effort.

links_Review_Title: Stretchy and well made but awkward fit
links_Review_Text: I wanted this dress for a party look. I loved the construction and quality, but the structure of the dress is awkward. The middle section is just two strips of fabric that stretch, making it look a bit like overalls. The straps were also awkward. Still, it did fit nicely, just not what I was looking for.

links_Review_Title: Beeeee you couldn't tell me anything in this dress!!!! Drop dead amazing
links_Review_Text: Went salsa dancing

links_Review_Title: Comfortable, flattering and oh so fun!
links_Review_Text: Huge fan of this beauty, the embroidery is intricate, the fabric is high end and the fit is perfection. So many flirty ruffles that makes this dress fun!

links_Review_Title: Expect mutters of "that's a cute dress" when you pass complete strangers ;)
links_Review_Text: I ordered this dress because I almost wore a very similar dress (same designer, same cut, diff fabric/length) for another event and was sad I didn't have the chance to. I loved the pattern. It was so comfortable. Wore normal undies and a sticky bra (I have smaller boobs, the top on the 10 was a touch large) It seemed less stretchy than the other dress because I expected to wear the 8, but was glad I had the 10. Only draw back was I needed the straps as tight as possible, but they kept loosening

I wore this dress for a wedding rehearsal and dinner after and was in love with the details and colors. I received so many compliments! It was snug up top (I am a 34DD), but it was surprisingly comfortable and had some stretch. I recommend this for anyone!

I rented this for a wedding and really can't say enough good things. It has built in padding so I didn't have to wear a bra and I got countless compliments. My only complaint is the straps kept slipping down so someone was constantly having to tighten them for me throughout the night. I'm not sure if this is how every dress is or if mine was a result of overuse. Regardless, I highly recommend this rental!
Fun dress but straps are loose and not able to be tightened. Fits TTS. No bra needed bc of bra like top.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a summer wedding! So FUN to wear!
links_Review_Text: This dress was such a HUGE success!! I loved wearing and had several women, from a range of ages, all tell me at the wedding that my dress was their favorite! Haha. It brought florals to a bright summer wedding in a non-obtrusive way, and the v-neckline wasn't too low either. The straps are adjustable (like bra straps) but needed to be readjusted a few times throughout the night. Nonetheless, an amazing rental, that I wish I could wear again if I hadn't had taken so many photos in it!!

This dress was perfect for a late summer outdoor wedding. It was well made and the material felt expensive and structured. The straps were adjustable which was helpful and the peplum skirt was very flattering. This is a dress I would love to own!

Wore the dress for a wedding across the country. When I tried the dress on, it was about a size or two too big in the ribs and the waist. My backup dress had gotten claimed by my older sister, so I did my best with safety pins to try and pull the dress in a bit. Luckily the pins worked alright and I was able to wear the dress. Sizing issues aside, I loved this dress. People came up to me all night to look at the beautiful embroidery and compliment the dress. If the dress fit correctly, I would buy it.

This dress is just so stunning, great quality and vibrant colors! I wore it to a wedding and got so many compliments! I'm usually a size Small (between a 2 and a 4) and the 4 fit perfectly. My only complaint is the same as everyone else, the straps kept coming loose and I had to adjust them numerous times throughout the evening.

I loved this dress! It fit perfect! I'm super tiny and was nervous it would be to long, but it was perfect. The straps don't stay tightened and kept sliding down, but other than that it was the perfect dress!
Loved this dress! Has a bit of stretch so dancing was fun and easy, very sexy thigh slit and hugs the curves in all the right places! First order from RTR will definitely be ordering again!

links_Review_Title: Looks even prettier in real life
links_Review_Text: This dress I cannot rave about enough. It was so beautiful in person the colors are vibrant and it is all embroidered not just printed on the dress. The only complaint I have is that there was a small hole in the seam by the hip. It was small and no one would notice it aside from me. I wore this to a wedding and got loads of compliments on it.

This was such a beautiful, colorful dress. The fabric is thick and holds you in and has corset ribbing. The length was perfect and I really loved this dress! A couple reasons why I didn't give this dress 5 stars: the bust has underwire and the top is for very (unnaturally) narrow boobs. I didn't fit in the top very wellâ€”it looked just fine but not as flattering as it could be. Also, the straps would not stay cinched up so my husband had to keep fixing them all night.

I had to go with the bigger size. Some other reviews said there was stretch, there was NO stretch. Ironically wore this to a wedding and another girl was wearing the EXACT same dress!!! We hugged at the ceremony and laughed "rent the runway?" During the reception my dress twin said the boning in hers was jabbing her rib and she def sized up. We agreed the dress is gorg!!!
Perfect fit! Probably my favorite dress I've ever worn to a wedding, loved everything all out it! It's very flattering

links_Review_Title: Fun and colorful, perfect for a Vegas wedding!
links_Review_Text: The dress was very comfortable with a bit of stretch but pretty tight through the bodice which made me have to size up. Also the straps stretch out quickly and have to be tightened often! Otherwise it was perfect!

This dress was absolute perfection! I loved all of the tulle overlay detail at the waist over the floral designs. Beautiful navy blue with pops of pink, magenta and green. Paired it with bubblegum pink heels and a navy blue fur clutch. One of my favorite designers of all time. Highly recommended!! Blonde of the Burbs

The thing I liked about this dress was the pedlum-style of the hip ruffles...it allowed me to skip Spanx and enjoy a wedding dinner without worrying about my tummy. I liked that the straps adjusted to fit tighter. This dress doesnâ€™t boost your cleavage but you shouldnâ€™t need a bra. Im rather curvy with wider hip and I felt it accentuated my curves nicely...the pendulum isnâ€™t â€˜too muchâ€™ for a curvy girl. Thereâ€™s a small slit up the right side thatâ€™s just the right amount of sexy. I sized one size up from my normal 8. Pretty for a fall or winter wedding...the colors are a bit drab and deep for summer.

links_Review_Title: The most beautiful dress I've ever worn
links_Review_Text: Absolute stunner! Pictures don't do this dress justice. It is a stretchier, thick material with such intricate detail, it hugs every curve perfectly. Get this and be a show stopper at any event.
Gorgeous dress. Made me feel so good and was very stretchy.

I usually wear basic colors and similar dress styles, and I wanted something different for my third wedding of the year. I loved the pop of colors from the pink and red embroidered flowers. The colors and cut of the dress made it stand out. It was a little longer than my usual length, but it was still very flattering. Tip #1: My dress did come with a small tear in the seam (first time out of 15+ rentals), so just make sure you check the dress. Tip #2: I found a color coordinated tie for my BF on amazon!

links_Review_Title: Flattering dress with great embroidery detail! Straps don't stay tightened, and ribbing stabs you
links_Review_Text: Both the 6 and the 8 fit, but I wore the 8 because my chest looked obnoxious in the 6. I tightened the straps, but they kept falling throughout the night. Also, the ribbing in the body kept stabbing my in the stomach and in the side. I think it just came through the seams. Also, the straps had been sewn previously, both of the 6 and the 8, so I could tell it had been worn many times. But I got tons of compliments and felt great in it!

THIS DRESS IS AMAZING!! I felt like a rock star in this dress. All the compliments didnâ€™t hurt either :) Fits perfectly! Like many other reviews mentioned the straps did loosen, but it fit well on the top so it wasnâ€™t a problem.

I wore the 12 and it fit a little snug through the waist. The 14 probably would have fit better but it wasn't available. I loved this dress and got so many compliments all night and I felt so pretty in it!
I'm a 34DD , 5'8" and the 4 fit well. It does have some cleavage. The straps did loosen but weren't a problem. I'd rent again.
Fit perfectly. It doesnâ€™t look like it would, but this dress has some stretch. It was so comfortable. The adjustable straps are also a plus.
Loved the colors and design. The fit was perfect, except the adjustable straps keeps loosing. Overall loved it and got tons of compliments.
Everyone at this wedding came up to compliment my dress. What a stunner!!! Hugs you in all the right places and it's super comfortable. My favorite rental so far!!!!!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a nice "wow" factor
links_Review_Text: I'm usually a size 6, but thanks to other reviews, I went with a size 8 and it fit perfect! I'm not one for color usually, but it was a summer wedding and I was thrilled with this dress. Really highlighted my butt and chest, but super flattering. Only con was the straps become loose quickly, so I used little safety pins to secure behind. Rent this dress, you will not regret it. Looks great in photos!

I loved this dress but ended up not wearing it for my event. I liked the adjustable straps but did notice that they shifted pretty quickly while trying on the dress and moving around. I loved the pablum in the front as it hid my "little food belly". Lol. It was sort of "Carmen Miranda " ish and I thought it was fun to wear. I will definitely rent this again so I can wear it out. A fun dress.

Love this dress - I got so many complements. I got a 2 and a 4, ended up wearing the 4. the straps did move around, and I had to tighten throughout the night, but the dress was tight enough that it didn't fall down. Definitely would recommend!

links_Review_Title: Received many compliments on the fit, style and color of this dress.
links_Review_Text: Loved the pop in color and the slight slit on one leg giving me room to move and dance freely.
I'm usually a size 2 but it was a little tight so I went with the 4. The straps came down a little but the dress is beautiful and definitely turned heads.
I am 5'3" with a 34C and 124lbs. I felt this dress in a size 4 was just right. It has a sturdy slightly stretchy material and was very figure flattering.

They didn't have my size avail (6) so I went with an 8. It was a little roomy but still gorgeous and fun! The colors of this dress are stunning. The material is stretchy and easy to dance, sit, move around in. I wore it with nude sandals which I think pair best with these deep colors. Lots of compliments on where I got this dress and how beautiful it is- turned a lot of heads! I'm average build, B cup- think this dress works well for someone my shape. Love it and didn't want to give it back!!

links_Review_Title: I felt like a DIME in this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so much fun to wear. My boyfriend was best man in his friends wedding so I wanted to look my best. I'm normally skeptical about peplum dresses and was afraid of being lost in the ruffles. But the dress fit me perfectly and was really well made. I saw people talking about the straps slipping; on me they did get looser while moving around and dancing but they weren't falling off my shoulders. Everything felt structured and was so beautiful I got a million compliments on it. This dress is an eye catcher and I'm glad I tried something I never would've before!

I wore this dress to a tropical destination anniversary party. This dress is GORGEOUS!!! I received soooo many compliments and felt fabulous in it! The fabric is not heavy and worked well in the island heat. I loved the inner boning within the top and how well the bottom hugged my curves. I'm a 36 B and the cups fit perfectly with out a bra or padding. I didn't have any issues with the straps falling. I honestly felt like this dress was made for me. It fit like a glove! Sooooooo happy I rented this dress!
I wore this to formal night on a cruise. Got tons of compliments from other passengers. It's a very elegant dress. I would definitely rent again

links_Review_Title: I felt so beautiful in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress to a wedding. It's true to size, so I should have gone a size down. The dress is well structured and made out of a great material. Perfect for a spring wedding. Got LOTS of compliments on this.

This dress is self is well made and is very flattering. I was not feeling the belt it came with so I paired it was a brown belt of my own. The top of the dress was pretty big on me definitely when I sat down. I felt like I was always adjusting it. Otherwise, loved wearing it and got lots of compliments.

I wore this dress to view temples on my vacation. I needed something that covered knees and shoulders, this was perfect for that. I had enough cleavage to still feel cute and flirty. The fabric is on the thick side and I didn't feel was very breathable. I cinched the belt pretty tight. I think a smaller size would have suited me better, esp since the fabric stretches. Over all was cute and looked nice.

links_Review_Title: I've never had a dress make me look so good.
links_Review_Text: The top was a tiny bit loose, but the rest laid perfectly. I had to buy it immediately.
Great dress! For well and got a lot of compliments. I forgot about the belt, but still looked great!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for my engagement photos.
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous! The flutter sleeves are the perfect length and the v-neck is not too deep (even for a small-busted gal like me). I definitely needed to size down in this dress, although I did need to use the belt from the larger dress since the other one was too small (wore the size 2 dress with the size 4 belt). The dress photographed beautifully and was super comfortable to move around in. I couldn't have been happier with it! (Picture credits to Michelle Kujawski Photography).

I was afraid this dress might be too much - for work and for me. But I received compliments all day long! It's extremely comfortable and I love the pockets! The belt was too big but I wore it anyway. Not sure I'd rent this one again, but it was a bit nevertheless!

This dress fits true to size. It has pockets which is great! I only gave it four stars because the right shoulder kept falling down. I had to pin it to my bra strap. Otherwise, the material is great. It wrinkles a bit but It was breezy and comfortable for a nice summer day.
I love this end-of-summer piece and wore it with a cami for a professional engagement. In person, the flowers have amazing watercolor details!
Another wonderful piece by TT. True to size and great length for work. A little low cut but not bad.
I LOVED this dress. I got so many compliments, I almost bought the dress! Perfect for work or brunch!
Comfortable fit, loved the belt! Very flattering!
Love this dress. I wore while in vacation to Dubai and it was super breezy and stylish on hot weather. I received a lot of compliments so I wore it again to a baby shower.

links_Review_Title: This is a stunning dress that I loved more and more as I wore it. I wish it was in my closet!
links_Review_Text: Fit runs a little small IMO. I usually wear a 4 but got a 6 and it fit really well. The belt hits in a great spot to create an hourglass figure. I love this dress! 100% Recommend!

Love this dress and got a lot of compliments on it at work. Love the print and the cut. Because I'm petite/short-wasted, the top was a bit big/baggy - especially in the back. The belt was a little tight - event on the largest setting. The picture is after I work it at work all day and sat in it -- as you can see the linen does get wrinkled. But overall really loved it and was a fun dress.

This dress was everything and MORE! Highly recommend renting -- I received so many compliments and it was so comfy. I rated this as larger than I expected, but the belt helped a lot. I think I'm probably just in between sizes.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments from both genders!
links_Review_Text: I ordered a size down based on reviews so a big thanks to everyone who take time to do this! I loved everything about this dress. I wore it to a conference and the outdoor networking session after. So many compliments! I had strangers stopping me to remark, which blew me away. My only dislike was the buttons on the top of the dress were starting to show when they should be hidden.

I absolutely loved this dress and got tons of compliments on it. I knocked off one star because the shoulders kept slipping off (like, a lot) leaving my bra strap exposed. I would totally rent this again if I could figure out a way to keep them on. I wore a regular push up bra with no other issues. It is a beautiful light-weight linen that required just a little steaming out of the bag. The gorgeous colors really give you a lot of room to dress it up or down and play with accessories.

This dress was super cute for our beach side after wedding brunch, except that the shoulders made me look bigger than I actually am. I found myself sneaking behind people to hide them a bit. Great waist with the belt, but wide shoulders
This dress is stunning! Pictures don't do it justice. The silhouette is so flattering and it's perfect for spring or summer events!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful flowers, pockets, perfect for spring
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. Wore it to church, brunch, and mother's day party. Only problem was there is a snap in front at bottom of v neck. It was gaping open. I had to put a small safety pin or fashion tape to keep closed

links_Review_Title: This dress is comfortable and flattering. It has pockets and is a great length.
links_Review_Text: This dress runs a little large, but the belt runs small. I ended up using the belt from the larger dress, but wearing the smaller size. It is really cute.

Love this dress! Its light, has pockets!!! It zips in the back but the top 3 buttons in he front snap. Did not have any issues with it in snapping but it would be great for a nursing mom. The belt has a nice ribbon through it making it stiff enough not to fold over. Felt like a breath of fresh air!
I have a short torso so this dress was a little bit of a danger zone when I sat down. It was still beautiful and comfortable for a trip to the symphony.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments about the way it looked like a spring day. Loved the cotton material!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'10" and 150lbs. The dress needed the belt to look fitted. I wondered if a 6 would have fit better.

When I chose this it had no photo reviews and I was a little nervous, but it ended up being the best decision ever!! It is light weight linen, so comfortable, and the belt made my waist feel so tiny and sexy. I will be hanging onto this guy for a while!

links_Review_Title: This dress can go anywhere. I dressed it up and wore to a party.
links_Review_Text: Took a front & side photos without any embellishments. Very comfortable. Very pretty. Great colors. The sleeves helped hide my upper arms. Has straps on the shoulders to hook you bra in- I needed these. You can wear a regular bra with the "v" back. Top front snap had a little gap when worn with a bra - one safety pin fixed that. It is a cotton dress, but holds it's shape & is a solidly made dress. Could easily wear casual or to party.
Sent without the belt. Dress seemed very worn and was not steamed/dewrinkled as other dresses often are upon arrival. Disappointed as I LOVE TT! Other styles in the future for me :)
Like this dress. Got lots of compliments on the pattern, but be warned you can't wear anything over top of the puffy sleeves. But overall a solid dress

links_Review_Title: It's so flattering!! Such a great spring dress !! Wore it for my birthday!!
Didn't end up wearing this dress in public - cheat fit wasn't right
links_Review_Text: The 'hidden' button closure at the chest pulled and showed the metallic gold button. That combined with the material didn't pack well and I needed this dress for a work trip, I never wound up wearing it in public. Too bad - cute pattern!
This dress has a big wide belt that I really didn't like at all. I didn't wear it.

This was a fun dress and I loved that it had pockets. I almost didn't notice the belt in the garment bag but I'm glad I did - the dress felt/looked loose until I added the belt (though the loosest notch was quite tight).
Wore this for my baby's baptism - we had a whole weekend of family events, profesional photos. The dress was so comfortable and looked GREAT! Very feminine and flattering.
This was a cute, casual dress I was hoping to wear at our house warming but the chest didn't fit. I'm a 34 DD, usually a size 6 and rented a size 6. I did not end up wearing it.
Had to return as I couldn't even get it snapped on the chest. Not for full Busted ladies.

links_Review_Title: Pretty, but wrinkly fabric and hate the snaps on the neckline
links_Review_Text: I had this on my hearts list forever, and was excited when it was finally available--but it didn't quite live up my expectations. It has these snaps at the neckline that are slightly exposed and look sloppy, in my opinion--especially when combined with the fact that the fabric is quite wrinkle-prone. I did love the belt and overall fit.

links_Review_Title: This is a beautiful and comfortable dress. Love the pockets.
links_Review_Text: This dress did major double, even triple duty. I wore it for a work event during the day, then got on a flight to a wedding reception and wore it at the outdoor cocktail reception. It went seamlessly from day to night with just a switch of the shoes. The belt was stiff enough to hold things in and cinch the waist without being constrictive on the plane. I loved the pockets and the lightweight fabric (it was hot in both places). The top was a bit baggy but nothing a small safety pin didn't fix, closing a maybe too deep V for a work event. Loved the pattern and the flowers, would definitely rent again, I wish I owned it!
Color is kind of drab--a beige-white. Very wrinkly because it's linen. Ended up not wearing it.

great summer dress for work or date night...was one of the best items i've gotten from rent the runway. FYI...if you're a full bust your girls will be on full display. I had to add a safety pin, and the girls were still spilling out. But I would still highly recommend this dress.

links_Review_Title: Cute top but kinda weird draping
links_Review_Text: I was looking for a one shoulder black top that wasn't super form fitting or tight and this was a great option for that. The side has like a bow thing you can tie and I think it's placed a little weird so when you tie it the draping bunches up a bit. Still a beautiful top and definitely a great look for a night out
Fun and flattering! I dressed it down with ripped jeans and combat boots but also would have looked great with a skirt and heels. My only complaint was that it was a little tight across my bust
Really flattering fit, great for a night on the town!
Gorgeous black top with fantastic shape and draping for a one shoulder piece. Holds it's shape and structure wonderfully and true to size, maybe slightly on the larger side, but still looked great.

These pants are sparkly without being tackyâ€”transitions from silver to pink as you move, and there's this cool pattern all over it designed to catch the light. Love the cut and found it very flattering, and the bow and the paper bag details stay up around the waist if you tie it properly. Looks amazing with a simple black top.
These pants are so much fun! I wore these on Christmas -- super shiny and festive. Not necessarily the most sexy/flattering since they're paperbag waist pants but I loved them!
Enjoyed these pants and got lots of compliments. I did struggle finding the right top to pair and the bow doesn't stay up. Would rent again!

Beautiful fabric and cool style, but these pants were unwearable unless I wanted everyone to see the brand and size I was wearing. The paper bag style only works if the waist stands up, and this waist did not. There was a crease in the front and the back that ruins the look and exposes the tag.
I loved everything about these pants. They're so bold and interesting, people will stop you on the street to tell you how much they love them. Definitely rent these!
I ordered a 14 last go round, and a 16 this go round. Still too small, and thin fabric isn't forgiving across the front if too tight.
These pants are incredible. The color/material is beautiful, and the structure is really cool. I was getting compliments ALL night!

links_Review_Title: I have never gotten more compliments on a garment.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful shape and fabric.
Wore this with a black turtleneck to ensure the pants were the focus. Everyone at my office, even some men who would normally never comment on fashion, said that they loved the pants!
fit well
It fit like a glove with perfect amount of little stretch. Incredibly sexy dress that got me so many compliments. If I had more occasions to wear it I might've bought it!

links_Review_Title: The most gorgeous for a work event
links_Review_Text: Wore this for two separate events and for work with a sweater on top. Such a winner.

Just the right amount of sexiness with the leg slit. The fabric was so flattering and held everything in. I'm a 34DDD and could have gone braless because of the nice fabric and adjustable straps but ended up deciding to where a strapless bra for a little xtra support. I am normally an 8 but wore the 10 because it was overall more comfortable. My favorite LBD ever. Did not want to send back.

links_Review_Title: Great black dress for a date
links_Review_Text: This dress was great - the high neckline keeps it from getting too informal. It was probably a little long for me at 5'2", but otherwise the fit was great. It's a surprisingly thick fabric
Loved the cut, the material was thick and flattering, only complaint was the very very high slit. It made sitting a bit risquÃ©...
I wore this dress on a cruise and I felt amazing in it! Fits snug and the slit up the side is high. I had to watch it a bit when I sat down. I had a lot of compliments!

Perfect for wedding and got many compliments. The dress fit great and snug and has a elegant look. I like the length of this dress - not too short so it looks formal, and not too long that you can still have a great time on the dance floor!

Loved this dress- the material is thick and flattering. I didn't wear it with a bra but I think you could without issue. I got so many compliments, and even though I have pretty long legs, the slit wasn't too scandalous. Would definitely recommend it and wear it again.

This was an amazing dress--I ordered the 4 and the 6 and ended up going with the 6. I had so much fun dancing all night long and felt like this dress was the perfect combination of elegant and sexy. The fabric is stretchy and very comfortable. Another great RTR experience! :)

links_Review_Title: Got a ton of compliments in this dress!
links_Review_Text: Fit well, if not a little snug. Straps are adjustable!

Loved this dress! The fabric is stretchy but still sucks you in. I'm between a 4 and 2 and a 4 fit perfectly. The fabric is thick enough to hide your lumps. I was worried about the length because I'm 5'3 but it looked great! The slight showed just enough skin.
Stretchy enough to be comfortable, structured enough to feel sophisticated. Understated sex appeal. This made me feel so great!

Fit like a dream. I wore this to a holiday work party. Could wear with a strapless bra and the fabric is nice and thick so it kept me warm enough and didn't show lines from undergarments. The straps are adjustable and it had enough stretch so I didn't feel uncomfortable at all. One of my favorites so far!

Rented this for a rehearsal dinner for a December wedding. It's really lovely and slimming - the fabric is thick with a little stretch. The 4 is bordering on being too tight for me, but in a way I feel like it sucks me in? Shown in my photo without a bra

This is a really beautiful, classic dress but unfortunately the proportions of the lower half are challenging for petites. The nature of the fabric and slit on this one is such that it needs to hit at the right spot. Between being short and having a curvy butt, the front made a weird V downward, with one slit portion jutting out. It was also just a bit too long on me for the style it is. Won't be wearing this one out, unfortunately. Rest of the fit was TTS and the neckline is lovely.

LOVED this dress. Its a thick material, runs true to size. I actually wore a size down because they didn't have my usual size (4R) available. Still fit albeit a little tighter than I usually wear things. The dress looks super sexy while still being conservative enough for a formal wedding.

Overall the dress is beautiful. The slit is flattering and not too revealing. I'm short (5'1") so definitely need to wear with heels. The fabric is pretty thick so may not be best for warm weather. Unfortunately the size I ordered was a bit too small. I normally wear a size 2/4, I ordered the 4, but need to go up to a 6.

links_Review_Title: Tight fit but very flattering and holds you in
links_Review_Text: I could see this being longer on shorter people but I'm 5'3" and the length hit below the knee perfectly.

links_Review_Title: This dress fit like a glove, felt like a million bucks.
links_Review_Text: I am 5'6", Chest is 40C, broad shoulders. Fit perfectly in chest, very flattering. Felt fabulous, unfortunately ended up not wearing it because I became sick, stupid flu!
Perfect fit!

I love this dress; it's a classic beautiful black dress and was perfect for a wedding.
