Since I have a trifecta of wide hips, large breasts and a wide back/shoulders, the material of this dress made it DIFFICULT to zip up and nerve-wracking to sit in without worrying it would rip. I ordered a size 8, wouldn't zip up. My backup size was a 10 and even that was tight. A size 12 may have been perfect, so heed my warning: SIZE UP IF YOU GOT CURVES.
Simple and sexy. straps are adjustable.

links_Review_Title: Great impression at the company holiday party
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a company holiday party with a casino theme. It felt sexy but completely appropriate. The fabric was thick enough to hide lines, and the dress was structured in a flattering way through the waist and hips (you can't really see it in the photos). The 2 was a bit tight over my hips, but I chose to wear it instead of the 4 because the bodice fit my small chest better. With a sticky bra, the top fit like it was tailored. The neckline and the slit made it more interesting that your standard LBD. Thoroughly enjoyed the dress and would rent again!
Loved this! Would purchase if It wasn't so expensive.
I'd probably size one or two sizes up and attempt to wear it. It's very sexy but classy and pretty.

I absolutely love this dress! However I am tall and the slit just felt a little risquÃ© for my holiday work party so I didn't end up wearing it and I regret it. The fabric feels so good and it's such a hot dress. Very flattering! The neckline is divine! I could definitely see someone wearing this to a holiday party, New Year's Eve, a wedding! It's probably one of my favorite things I've rented

The overall fit was tight, but I felt like this really sucked everything in. I was also able to wear it without a bra as a 34DD and everything was held in place. The straps are adjustable so I was able to tighten them which is a great plus for a rented dress. It was comfortable enough to dance all night and the fabric is nice and thick so it doesn't really wrinkle and it looked great all day and night long. I ordered a 4 and 6 and wore the 6.
Received many compliments on this dress

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a black-tie wedding, and it fit great.
links_Review_Text: While this dress fit my frame perfectly, it was skin tight.

links_Review_Title: Ordered my normal size and was way too small, didn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: Cute dress, very thick fabric but I couldn't zip it up and I ordered my normal size. Looks like the bust area would have had some extra fabric (I have a small bust).
The six fit very comfortably and I got so many compliments on it.
Was way too tight in the hips, but I did appreciate that the dress is brand new still had the tags on it.
Great for black tie events - slit is hidden for the most part so it's appropriate. But it's still fun and sexy, and allows for good movement while dancing.
Fit perfectly - petite and curvy, so it was a little long but the length and the high thigh slit looked great together. Loved it and can't wait to rent again.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, runs a little large
links_Review_Text: I am always between a size 4 and 6 and went with the 6 based on availability. The dress is beautiful but definitely ran large on me. I hope to rent a size 4 for a perfect fit in the future

The fit with a bra was a little wonky but perhaps bc I'm so y'all so I wore it without a bra and it hung better up top; overall great fit, easy to wear with boots for thanksgiving dinner outdoors in Texas.

links_Review_Title: Loved everything about this dress! So great to have long sleeve, maxi dress options in the winter
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this dress, particularly on the pattern. It was super comfortable, very flattering. Great length and bonus of a long sleeve make this such an awesome winter option.

Super comfortable and flattering. This is one of those, no effort dresses. Just throw it in and go to work. The sleeves were a bit puffy and the waist could have been more tapered, but good none the less.

The dress fit perfectly! The sleeves are flowy and gorgeous. I loved the way they fit and are the highlight of the dress. The waist is fitted but plenty of room. The dress fit right at my ankles, which was perfect for wearing with ankle boots. The dress is airy, but still perfect for indoors in Autumn. I would rent again for brunch, at the office, or general wear.
Wore this on vacation to Morocco as I needed something that was covered up but still fun. The color, pattern and cut are flattering. The fabric is on the heavier side.
true to size, long, easy to wear.
I received a lot of compliments when I wore it to a casual holiday party. I would certainly rent again.
Comfortable with enough small details (e.g. the cuffs) to feel more special than just a simple maxi
great for long legs (and torso) subtle shoulder pads give it a great structure on top! perfect fit through the waist and love the way it flows! easy to dress up or down! absolutely love it!

links_Review_Title: Cute and flowy for a taller person
links_Review_Text: Didn't fit me quite right, and the length was awkward. Much better fit on taller people.
Did not wear. Hugs your tummy and wrinkles easily.
I thought this dress was great for work and can be worn in many different ways. It runs a little big so I would size down. The fabric is super soft and the print is lovely.
Wore this to my friend's baby shower with brown boots- was cute and flattering. But it is thin fabric and stretches out after an hour or two. Also looks worn....
Definitely fits close to the body, but it was a beautiful dress and still looked good on curves.

links_Review_Title: This dress didn't fit me at all. Way too long waisted for me - I could not wear it. Shoulder pads?!
links_Review_Text: Too long waisted, shoulder pads felt like a costume.
Didn't love the style, big puffy sleeves, but very snug through the waist, not good for any mommy pouches. Maybe would work better if you size up. Didn't wear.

Nice conservative dress for work, but I wish it was lined. I had to wear leggings underneath for work, and the static made it sit weird. Otherwise I would have worn it again. I sized up to a 2, and that seemed to work well.
This is a great dress, and keeping it a bit with Unlimited. Beautiful colors, fabric, and fit! Heels dress it up and I love it!

links_Review_Title: It was a little snug in the waist but it may just be my body shape- I love the dress!

links_Review_Text: Love love love. So comfy, not too bulky and warm. The only thing I would change is to have one more closure near the bottom.

links_Review_Title: Perfect coat for a fall wedding
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable, true to size

links_Review_Title: This jacket will be taking up one of my spots the next few months!!!!
links_Review_Text: I'm absolutely obsessed with everything about this jacket. It's perfect for a fun dinner. It's warm, oh so soft, chic, goes with anything, more stylish than the plain black fur jackets. The only negative is that there aren't any pockets inside or out. I seriously adore this piece. If you're on the fence about renting it, just do it.
I would have bought this coat if I could have. Very comfy and cute. No pockets are a bit inconvenient, but worth it.
Amazingly soft and loved it on the hanger but put it on and everything just looked super WIDE. Even with skinny jeans, didn't feel balanced. Returned without wearing.

links_Review_Title: Loved this jacket and very fun.
links_Review_Text: Just for looks and not for warmth. Wear it to look good and not stay warm. Or on a not so chilly night. Well made too.

It was a gorgeous fit! Worked with jeans as well as a fancy dress. I took it out only a few times because it was such a warm month. It was soft and rich looking, and feeling. Everyone thought it was a real beaver jacket.

links_Review_Title: Looked like a bear, and not the cute kind
links_Review_Text: Wanted to love this so badly. The material is soft as can be and looks so luxe, but the shoulders were so broad and massive. Made me look like a linebacker. Definitely size down to try to avoid the football comparison...

Comically large. I ordered a small, I don't even think an XS would have made a difference. I'm 5'3" 120lbs, relatively petite/fit frame. I looked like someone from GoT wearing a fur pelt and/or a football linebacker. It was way to full and wide across the shoulders. I could see on someone taller it working out ok.

links_Review_Title: I wanted to be warm and stylish for a dressy evening party. Bingo, this coat was perfect!
links_Review_Text: I ordered a medium. It was a little loose. A small would have fit my 5'1" 126 pound, 36A frame just right. It was so soft, I wanted to wear it to the grocery store the next day!
Warm and luxurious - would rent again
I wore this coat to a holiday party and loved the extra touch of elegance it added to my dress.
I wish I had a picture in this coat because it was so cute. I rented it for a wedding I was in this fall and I'm so glad I did because it was freezing that day and this coat saved me!

links_Review_Title: So soft but makes me look huge!
links_Review_Text: I love how soft this is and it seems to be high quality. However, it makes me look at least 30 pounds heavier. I even had my stick thin daughter try it on and it makes her look very broad shouldered (which she isn't). If I lived in a world without mirrors, I would love this!
I have long arms and this coat barely came to my wrist which is why I reviewed it as runs small
I have a large bust and for me, this coat just made it look large, instead of slim and flattering as in pictures. I believe it would work for a different body type!

This coat is exactly what I needed for a dressed up event. I hadn't worn fake fur in a while and it REALLY passes for real --- which is a plus or a minus, depending on your perspective and peers! Super warm and soft. The sizing chart correlated 8 = L and the coat was labeled as such with European sizes as well, which made me assume European sizing and to size up. However this is truly a US large! With my dress I was swimming in it --- I easily could have worn a sweater or sweatshirt (or two!) underneath. If I was going to rent again I would pick a M.

links_Review_Title: So fun for a bachelorette dinner!
links_Review_Text: The fit was nice & comfortable - fitted but has some stretch to it. I have a small chest so the cut was perfectly fine.
The sequins, color, and fit are fabulous. The button didn't stay clasped but I thought the amount of cleavage was fine for dinner!
This top fit perfect and not low, wore those to Christmas dinner and to church services that evening. The blue was a nice change from the traditional holiday color pallet.

This shirt is one of my all time favorite rentals! It is a beautiful dark blue color and the sequins make it sparkly and fun! I wore this to dinner and the theater, it was the perfect combination of dressy yet casual. The shirt is a flattering peplum style, that zips up at the back. The fabric had the perfect amount of stretch so it is fitted but not uncomfortably tight. I received so many compliments - do yourself a favor and rent this one!!
Fit perfecfly. Wore it for a sparkly evening with the ladies and it was the perfect top for the event. Wore it with jeans. Sparkly yet subtle

The fit of this top is very flattering and slimming on the waist. The sparkles are understated so could be worn in multiple situations without being too much. The neckline was appropriate for my chest size. Showy without being too much. There is a helpful snap at the chest; the snap is not super strong, but offers some additional security. I felt sexy and sophisticated while ringing in the New Year.

This fit true to size. Hugged me in all the right places and was very flattering to my pear shape. I felt beautiful and best of all it was so comfortable and easy to wear with dress trousers or jeans.
This is a beautiful top that's is so flattering and dressy ! I wore it to a Christmas party and it looked great on. I wear a size four and it fit perfectly I looked glamorous

This top was so fun for the casino party I went to. It was cold out so I knew I wanted something warmer. It dressed up my black pants perfectly. I have a bigger chest (34DD) so the little snap button kept opening up but it never showed too much. Parker sizing always seems to run small to me, so a 6 fit perfect.

links_Review_Title: The sparkle was gorg! Fit was flattering. Not itchy
links_Review_Text: #glamorous
Wore this fun top to a friends Friendsgiving dinner with black jeans. So fun and flattering. Lots of compliments. Definitely true to size. Low cut...but for me, very flattering. Will rent again!
very slimming

Super cute top perfect for date night. The lining is soft so you don't feel the sequins under your arms, which is always a concern. Fits tightly at your natural waist and is incredibly flattering. Would definitely rent it again.
Love the sparkles! Great for a fun night out. The top is also very flattering in shape.

links_Review_Title: Too small, didn't wear. No time to exchange.
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a night out in Vegas. Beautifully made, but sadly I didn't wear it was too small in the chest, arm length and over all torso area. Tight in the chest and the little snap to keep the top closed kept opening. On me the waist just didn't sit in a great place. Granted I am almost 5'11" so have a long torso and arms Had this been one size larger or an xxl it would have fit better.
Very versatile. Liked that it had some stretch to it - comfortable and cute. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: I rented this for a Vegas trip, but did not end up wearing it.
links_Review_Text: The M top was too tight for me, I need an L with my size. I'm not sure if the top runs small, or if I'm still figuring out sizing for my body.
My usual size wasn't available so I sized up. It worked great because of the fabric and cut. Beautiful color, flattering fit, would rent again!
Flare and fit is perfect. Didn't wear to party as I chose my other option but I will be renting this for the next party. Highly recommend.
I am a size 18/20 up top; the xxl was just too small :( ; beautiful piece but too small for me at this time; will rent when i get back in shape!

links_Review_Title: It looked nice but was too small for me.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful color and details for someone small and petite.
Fit perfectly

This was perfect for my husband's work Xmas party. I wore it with dark jeans. It was sparkly but in no way loud, and the sleeve and peplum added some interest. I really liked the snap that kept it closed at the bust. Medium fit great, as mediums usually do on me!

This top was beautiful and very comfortable. The dark blue color was so pretty and the sequins were so sparkly. I would rent this again in a heartbeat. I ended up putting a black tank top under it because of the low neckline and it still looked and fit great.

links_Review_Title: It was so sparkly and cute. Fit like a glove. I wish I could keep it.
links_Review_Text: It literally fit perfectly, love this top so much. Perfect for a night out.

links_Review_Title: This shirt is beautiful and comfortable- not for big busted ladies though.
links_Review_Text: I got tons of compliments on this shirt. So glad I ordered the backup M because the small was short and tight. M fit like a glove. Iâ€™m also smaller in the chest area so leaving it unbuttoned worked and was still classy. FYI- The button does does not stay clasped, no matter what you do.

LOVED this shirt. I wanted to keep it. It was perfect - stretchy (even on the wrists) and a subtle dark blue color. It was low cut (but that's the best part of this shirt) with a peplum flair on the bottom. I kept this one for over 2 weeks and wore it 3x.
Gorgeous! Not too revealing but shows a bit of cleavage
Wore this for my birthday dinner with girlfriends. The only complaint I had was that the shoulder area was more structured / shoulder pad looking than I was expecting. Other than that loved it

I rented this for the Lady Gaga concert in November in Vegas and it was perfect! Light weight sleeves, but the perfect amount of sparkle. I usually wear and 12/L, but decided to go up a size to an XL given that I have a 34G bust and that was a great decision. The snap hit exactly where it should to keep it from being too revealing.
Great fit, neckline plunged just right for small breasts - comfortable and made a great statement, if it wasn't so expensive I would be buying this!

I rented this gorgeous blue sequin top for a Fall trip to Vegas and it did not disappoint! It was comfortable and warm enough for the chilly Vegas nights without sacrificing being sexy. Will rent again!

I wish I had taken a photo in this top. I wore it for a Gala I worked. Loved it! I will say that my bust is not large (34B) and I had trouble with the tiny button in the front staying closed. I eventually used a safety pin to keep it closed. It is low cut and sexy. So, expect some cleavage to show. I have any average torso and this just fit. I wore slimming body suit under. You may want to consider an additional size up. I feel like sizing is for Juniors.

I wore this sparkly top on a girls trip to NYC. It was really fun and got compliments on it. However, it ran a little small and in particular was very short. I still loved it, just make sure to plan on wearing with high waisted pants unless you want your stomach showing.

Because of the flare, you can really wear any pant with it because the style of the top of the pants does not matter. There is a small snap on the wrap part which was helpful, but hard to keep snapped. It was not too revealing, but still a bit sexy.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a work party
links_Review_Text: This top has a really flattering, I typically wear a small and the small fit true to size. It is a bit low cut but when I wore it to a work event I work a little plan tank top underneath and it was perfect.

links_Review_Title: Sooo sparkley, lovely fit, with a front clip to keep it from revealing too much.
links_Review_Text: This was very comfortable, very sparkly and has a great design

links_Review_Title: Edgy dress! Short girls: this is wearable!
links_Review_Text: Surprised by how much I like this dress! Im 5'1 and the length is not touching the floor so that's good. My size is between 0 and 2, I ordered a 2 and it's a little loose specially on the bust area. Size 0 will probably work better on me.

I think this dress looks better in person. It's very flowy and feminine but with an edge. I think it pairs well with some heeled calf length boots opposed to the biker boots shown on the model. I do think it runs a tad big, especially if you have a small chest or shoulders.

Like other reviews I needed to tape/pin down the chest opening. I wore heeled motorcycle boots with it to give it the edge. Loved everything about it. The length, the sleeves the pattern. Was tight in the rib cage. I would not have been able to go down a size in the ribs, but other places could have gone with the 0. If you've got a wider rib area size up.
Was a comfortable a pretty dress for a staycation in Williamsburg and for dinner and drinks! Very flattering and easy to wear
Beautiful dress and fit. As pictured and true to size. Loved the fitted waist and flowery pattern and flowy feel

This dress made me feel super chic, but let me still a little edgy at the same time. I am usually a 4 in most brands, but I think this ran a bit big. I wore a 4, I could have sized down to a 2. My waist is 27 inches, I had at least 2 extra inches in the waist. I do have a small chest, so the top gaped when I was sitting, but a safety pin easily fixed that issue. Runs a tad big, but don't hesitate to rent it. It made me feel so cute and confident while leading a workshop at my office.

links_Review_Title: Needs a pin in the chest
links_Review_Text: Comfortable for weekend day and quite unique, but needed to pin the chest to avoid total exposure

Sleeves and waist were perfect. I'm a little on the shorter side but the length was fine, even with combat boots. I'm 34A and it was too roomy in the chest area. Too much fabric flying around. Maybe I can tighten it to fit better with a safety pin. Cute, but only going to wear this once.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful hem and skirt that moves with you.
links_Review_Text: This dress was feminine (floral patter and silky, flow) with a bit of edge (studding at the waist). Perfect dress to wear with tall boots or a simple pump.
The dress was artistic but I felt that in order to pull off the hemline it should be worn with a heeled bootie, not a combat boot, as I did.
Super flattering blazer, will order again can dress down or up.
Loved this jacket, sexy yet chic at the same time. The overall fit is flattering and the cut is complimentary to all shapes.
Fit like a glove. Goes great with black leggings and boots.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments loved the cut.
Classic Twist on a Fitted Jacket
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a love Bachelor show. I went with a more sporty look and paired with white tennies. I ordered it twice and both times it DID NOT INCLUDE BELT. Beware if you don't have it fitted just right, you may not have a belt to fall back on. Loved it and hoping to order another 4 to see if a belt will end up in rotation so that I can buy it.

links_Review_Title: Super unique and comfortable, tight belt
links_Review_Text: Loved this for a day at a museum and dinner. But the belt is super tight! Didn't look great without the belt but I had to squeeze hard just to get the first hole looped. The arms and shoulder were a bit large so it was an odd combo. I felt great in this, though
THIS is why I do Rent the Runway. Where else would I find such a cool "blazer?" Loved this!

links_Review_Title: Such a fun twist on a classic style!
links_Review_Text: This blazer really puts a spin on the classic blazer and blue jeans style! The off the shoulder feature is absolutely breathtaking. This style can be dressed up or dressed down so easily. One day I wore it with jeans and the next I wore it would leather pants. Both ways looked fantastic. I usually wear a 0 but in this I wore a two since I am larger chested and that was a good call on my part!

links_Review_Title: The cut, the fit, the style!
links_Review_Text: Wore multiple times with faux leather leggings and jeans. Perfect fit!

Sexy, sophisticated, stylish, and warm! Wore it with navy accessories, leggings, and gray boots. It fits wonderfully and doesn't slouch around the free shoulder, so just a strapless or one side bra will do. It can make the open shoulder limited to movement but nothing dramatic, dinner and drinks is easy. Size up if you're more built in the shoulders or waist, if I had been any more muscular it wouldn't have fit right. Highly recommend, rent this one!

links_Review_Title: The fact that I can't afford to buy this is a tragedy! This is a perfect garment.
links_Review_Text: Looks SOOOO good on. I'm on Unlimited and i'm definitely hogging the size 4. Sorry girls! Worn it with jeans, 'leather' moto leggings. Would be amazeballs with cute tap shorts and heels/ankle booties, but it's still too cold here. I'll get it again when the weather warms up, don't worry! Mine came w/out the belt, but I don't miss it. RTR offered to replace, but I didn't want to part with it :) The generous stretch made it super comfortable - usually these off the shoulder numbers aren't great for anything but posing, but I could rock a Warrior 1 AND 2 in this. Not sure it's for ladies with big boobies as the chest fit quite well on my B's. Def size up if you're a C+. I have very broad "athletic" shoulders. It fit perfectly there too, which is rare. Also - made me look WAYYYYY skinnier than I am, lol.

This was such a flattering blazer, it hit right at the natural waist. if you are relatively high-waisted then this will look amazing on you. It is quite warm with the wool, but the lining definitely helps. It is clearly very good quality and the right amount of edgy and chic. Highly recommend

links_Review_Title: Wore to work (I work in a casual environment) and for a night drinking with friends.
links_Review_Text: SO CUTE, I was obsessed with this. The belt felt a little tight towards the end of the night so I took it off, but it looks good with or without!
Fit so well. Got lots of compliments. Wish i could've purchased it. LOVED IT !
I loved this dress. Felt great wearing it, and received many compliments. It has very pretty details, definitely one of my favorite rentals.

links_Review_Title: Great for a London business trip
links_Review_Text: This dress is elegant and structured. My only complaint is it was a bit tight on the waist.

I'm a regular US size 4 and 34C and the size 10 was the best fit. The size 8 was tight in the chest and arms. Loved wearing this dress so much that I will rent it again. Easy to dance I and very comfortable.

This dress was so fun! Wore for a date night and had so many compliments! Not your typical black dress...it has so much detail and will make you stand out in a crowd! It was a bit snug but I made it work!

links_Review_Title: Very pretty and unique. Great quality! One of my favorite dress rentals ever.
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a February wedding in the northeast. The heavy fabric kept me surprisingly warm! It looked very expensive. The stock photo doesn't really reflect how it looked on my so I included a side view. The back ruffles were my favorite part! I also have a very flat chest and the front ruffles gave me a nice feminine look. As for the fit... I am SUPER TINY on top. Barely AA cup size and narrow shoulders. This was still VERY tight! There was no give whatsoever in the fabric on top. I got the 4R which I guess is the equivalent to a 0 (?). It was fine for me but if you're on the fence about sizes, I'd suggest sizing up. My bottom half is athletic/curvy so the flowy fabric worked out well to balance everything out.

links_Review_Title: Got many compliments on this dress. Size 8 fit perfectly and was very comfortable
links_Review_Text: Awards banquet. Fit great! Great quality!
Rented this dress to wear for a gala. Love love the detail. Millions of complements. Does run small thru the chest and upper back. Usually wear a 4 but needed the 6.

Iâ€™m typically a size 0/xs and the 4R was the correct size for me. The length was accurate, the waist was very tight and I couldnâ€™t raise my arms very well but it did give as I was wearing it so it wasnâ€™t uncomfortable. I have pretty toned upper arms but the sleeves were big, however, it didnâ€™t look bad. I loved this dress and will definitely be renting it again. It was classy and unique and I felt great in it! This was my first time to RtR and I had a great experience.

Comfortable and true to size. A way to stand out despite not wearing color. Great for a small intimate winter wedding. Strapless bra worked great. The only issue (especially if you're a person who dances a lot), is you can't lift your arms over your head.

I love self portrait dresses, they are very well made and fit like a glove. I love the see through parts of the dress, they make it interesting without being too showy. The length adds to the flowy, feminine feeling as do the ruffles but they are very understated, you hardly notice them on this dress. Trust me, rent this dress if your looking for an understated wow show stopper. I wore this to two holiday parties and had many, many compliments. I'm tempted to buy this dress I loved it that much!

Great dress for a very tall person!! I'm 6 foot 4 with my heels on. Very tight in the arms and the bandeau was tricky, but I wore those sticky boobs. You would have been able to see a strapless bra, can't wear that. I wore this to a rehearsal dinner. Received so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Classic, elegant style with a little flare
links_Review_Text: Very flattering and elegant. The dress ran slightly small and was nearly impossible to close the clasps of the collar without help. I rented for a family portrait and was very happy with this selection

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a New Years dinner party! Loved it - classy but edgey at the same time
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'1 so the dress was a bit long but I was fine with it. The fit is a little odd in that it was tight in my stomach area but loose in the back - but overall looked great and loved it! It was perfect for the night - classy but edgey with the lace and skin. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Such a cute, comfy and flattering dress!
links_Review_Text: One of my favorite RTR dresses yet! So flattering and easy to move in. No bra or spanx required. I'd call it a win!

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress to a semi-formal event. It made me feel glamorous and BA at the same time. LOVE.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit true to size, but was very tight in the bust area (36C for reference).
I would have given it a 5 if it fit just a bit shorter but it was still gorgeous.
This dress is unique, classy and sexy. The tea length made it appropriate for the formal holiday party I was attending. It was comfortable and I loved wearing it!
Absolutely loved this dress! It ran a little bit, but fit comfortable. I was able to dance and move without any issues and received tons of compliments! I would definitely rent this dress again!
The detailing with the grill and lace parts are gorgeous. Very tight at the busy, kind of loose at the sleeves, but overall flattering and comfortable.
This dress was perfect for a date night in Monaco! The fit is true to size and the lace details & ruffles add flare.
Loved this dress!! Fit true to size, the lace detail was beautiful + I was so comfortable all night. You won't regret this rental. One of my favorite rentals to date!
Beautiful details. I wore a black cami underneath which made it work appropriate.

Pros: gorgeous for a black tie wedding, lace detail adds layers, sleek, classic Cons: size up!!!! The waist was teeny, but I wore it anyways and ended up having to unzip it towards the end so the night to dance. I wore a 6, usually 00-0/XXS-XS.

It actually fit really well all over, which I was really nervous about. I couldnâ€™t get over how it long it was. It came below mid-shin and just didnâ€™t look right. There were also pieces of fabric that were ribbon like on the skirt part, which were beautiful, but I didnâ€™t feel pretty with how it laid on my derriÃ¨re (which sticks out ~ pear shape). So, all in all, beautiful dress, just not for me.

links_Review_Title: Size didn't work out, but determined to rent again (in a larger size)
links_Review_Text: I actually LOVED this dress, but sadly, wasn't able to zip it up entirely in the back. I generally wear a 2, so went with the 6R, but definitely needed the 8R. Would love to rent again for a cocktail party, date night, or even a wedding.
I'm 5'8 and athletic built - normally wear a size 8 but had to size up to the European size 14R. Strapless bra is needed - overall great dress with lots of fun details!
The fit is great!! I was surprised by how cute this looked. I decided to throw some cute black heels with it and wear it to work and I have received so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: This is absolutely gorgeous. Self portrait is one of my all time Favs
links_Review_Text: Highly Recommend, got a ton of complements
This fit very well and TTS compared to other Self-Portrait styles I have worn in the past. Very comfortable, lots of compliments, and different from other LBD. Highly recommend!
I loved this dress so much. Fit like a glove. Got so many compliments!
Great dress, but ran a little small. I'm usually a 2, sometimes in the 2/4 range, so if you're a larger 2, especially in the torso/back area, I'd recommend sizing up.

links_Review_Title: Such pretty detailing! Classy black dress!
links_Review_Text: A classy and romantic dress! It is based off of UK sizing, so a 12 is a US 8. Oh, and no bra needed!

links_Review_Title: Twist on a little black dress
links_Review_Text: Great for a fall or winter wedding. Tons of compliments.
Loved this dress. Glad I sized up. I think it looked better with a little extra room throughout. Beautiful dress and my rental was in excellent condition.
I wore this while on vacation in NYC. It was gorgeous and fun to wear. I loved wearing it!!
Great quality dress. It is a little heavy, but that was perfect for the fall weather.
Rented for a work event at the JP Morgan Library. It was perfect. Stunning and edgy while still being work appropriate.
I love self-portrait and this was even better than expected. Wore this the night I got engaged and loved it so much! Perfect for a special occasion.
Definitely want to rent again. Easy to wear but very elegant. My first time with Reformation and glad I read reviews and sized up.

links_Review_Title: Very flattering, get ready to turn heads!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a gala that was cancelled. I wore it out that night with friends anyway. I was a little overdressed for just a normal night out, but I felt so confident and sexy in this dress! The colors are lovely, the slit is HIGH so be careful (that makes it not so family friendly), and I would say it's true to size but there is no give in the fabric. The holes in the back are more gaping than pictured, so you can't wear a regular bra but the material is dark (though a little thin).

links_Review_Title: Perfect fall dress - fits like a glove!
links_Review_Text: Bought this for everyday use but wound up swapping because it was a bit chilly outside for the slit in this dress. The print was beautiful, fabric wasn't too sheer, and the dress fit perfectly. The slightly puffed sleeves and sleek silhouette paired with the slit was SO flattering! Since it is very form fitting, if my waist was bigger than 30" I would have needed to size up.
A bit chilly with the open back but beautiful, lots of compliments. Open back will limit bra options. Sleeves were long for my petite upper body but still worked ok

I liked this dress! The only reason I rated 4 stars is because I wish the fabric was more form fitting up top. It is a lightweight, flowy fabric which takes away the shape up top and in midsection area. Loved the high slit but note it is high!

links_Review_Title: Such a comfortable, easy to wear dress
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress for a winter wedding! Got tons of compliments. If between sizes, size up/order your back up size up one your usual size. There's no give in the waist. I wore a backless bra, fabric was too thin to go bra less.

Another Reformation success! I wore this for Christmas Eve dinner and it was beautiful! It fit true to size and i was very comfortable all night. The slit is high but still classy. I got so many compliments! The back is open so I wore nipples covers instead of a bra but it worked well. Will be renting again for sure.

Loved the dress. Had great compliments. Slit is really high, you have to be comfortable wearing it. The back also has peek-a-boo holes. Con: I typically wear a size 8. This dress fits well on top, sleeves are great too. Tight around the waist area, there is no give since it is not elastic. I would have preferred to have some room. I don't think sizing up will help. The top would be too loose. Overall, enjoyed the night and really felt feminine and flirty.
This brand runs slightly small. I'm a 4-6 and the 6 fit snug but nicely. Great to dress up or down.

I loved the print and sleeves of the dress but the slit was aggressively high, which you can't see in the picture. I ended up getting over it but my family commented on how high it was. If it was 2 inches lower it would be perfect. It also had signs of pilling but only I noticed it. You also either have to go braless or backless bra. I felt great in it all in all and loved the length of the dress. It was thin material so even with sleeves it was not hot at the wedding (but very cold when outside
Form-fitting, yet flattering - this was the perfect thanksgiving dress. The slit up the leg add just the right amount of flavor to spice it! Love it - would def rent it in more patterns.

links_Review_Title: Puffed sleeves, not a fashion fail.
links_Review_Text: When this dress arrived I was afraid I was going to look like a homeschooled Anne of Green Gables. However, it ended up fitting me perfectly (runs a bit small and is very form fitting). While it has a very modest neckline, the high slit gives it a little extra something. I really liked this one.

links_Review_Title: So flattering! Size up for backup.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! I usually wear a size 4 but the 6 fit better in the waist and kept the leg slit appropriate. Would definitely rent again. Paired with the Sondra Roberts python clutch.

The slit up the side was very high but the rest of the dress keeps you well covered so it was a nice detail. Overall great dress. I'm six feet tall and the sleeves were long enough for me which I appreciated.

Wore this to an outdoor new moon dinner party and loved it, it was light enough that it wasn't too warm, but as the sun set it was nice to have long sleeves on. I usually wear a 10 in reformation as their material is more structured, and this fit perfectly. The slit was just the right amount of flirty fun!

links_Review_Title: I got tons of compliments, great dress!
links_Review_Text: dress fit great! the slit is a little high and I do have really long legs but it wasn't an issue and didn't take away from the classiness of the dress

I loved the dress - the long sleeves made up for the high slit and open back. Wore a bra that did show in the back, and many people thought I forgot to zip my dress up all the way because of how the back connects in two different spots.

Ok ok, so I'm a self described thigh slit addict but this dress has a mildly agressive one for work and I rented in the winter when this is obvs best executed in the summer. So this one's on me, not the dress and I'll probably try again in the spring.

Obsessed with this dress! Slit was a little high, so I had to pin and inch or two, but otherwise I would totally purchase this dress. If you are shorter than 5'7" I don't think this would be a problem. Classy and fun dress for any occasion.

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear it to the event because I didn't feel comfortable with how the dress fit.
links_Review_Text: As usual, the experience with Rent the Runway was wonderful! I got my package on time and it was easy to return. However, this was the first dress I have rented that I could not bring myself to wear to the event! I looked like Laura Ingalls Wilder meets Victoria Secret! I think it might have helped if I ordered it a size smaller so it was a little tighter. I also think it would look better on girls with a little tan to their skin color, it kind of washed me out. Definitely order a backup size.

links_Review_Title: Flattering fit for curves and comfortable
links_Review_Text: Great fit for curves! Slit was high, but it also added some flare given the long sleeves and high chest line.

links_Review_Title: I liked the dress but didn't end up wearing it.
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a wedding. I have a short torso and so the waist of the dress fell on a strange place on my body. This happens to me with a lot of dresses, so if you have an average waist, you should probably be fine. I also realized that the slit was way too high for a church wedding in which I had to walk up to the pulpit and do a reading.

This dress fit me beautifully and the leg slit (although pretty high) felt sexy without being trashy. The material is pretty light, so this is definitely a fall (not winter) dress unless you happen to live somewhere warm. The open section of the back was indeed a little more open than I anticipated, but I think my shoulders are slightly broader than average for my build, so most women would be fine. Normally I'd be nervous about not wearing a bra, but the fabric was just loose and light enough that I wasn't as self-conscious as I thought I'd be. Single ladies beware â€” the top two buttons of this dress can be hard to fasten or unfasten yourself!
Love this dress. The slit was high enough that it provided a bit of flare. Super comfortable. Wore to the church before a wedding.

links_Review_Title: Fun dress for a fall wedding
links_Review_Text: Loved the pattern of this dress and the sleeves. The slit was a little too high for my comfort level, so I chose to wear leggings. The back had a subtle opening so I chose a bandeau style bra because you could see a little of the back band. If the slit hadn't been so high, I would have given this 5 stars.
It's a fantastic dress. It's a little tight but the fabric stretches. Hard to wear spanx with though due to the slit.

This dress looks exactly as it appears. I am only 5'1 and while the dress hit a little lower on me, it was not too long at all. I was so comfortable and received lots of compliments. Perfect for a fall event.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to an LA non-profit event and wanted something fun that Iâ€™d never wear at home
links_Review_Text: Very fun, modest neckline, some fun in the back, and CRAZY high slit. Had to be careful not to walk too fast or get caught by a breeze. Loved the fun of it, though, it was perfect for La La Land ðŸ˜Š
Love the sleeves, length, slit, and cloth button details. I would buy this dress in every color.

This dress was amazing! Classy, fall-inspired with a subtle hint of sexy. I am a size 0 in stores and in all my RTR dresses, I'm a size 4 due to my waist/chest (I'm a size 36 for a bra band). This dress was no exception, fit as a size 4 like a charm, It was a perfect length, the sleeves hung beautifully, and the shoulders had awesome structure. Wrinkles are easily steamed out, and the material is lightweight for dancing once you're warmed up. Sad I need to return it! Fit perfectly all around.
Super cute, rented too big size but that got solved thanks to a green/pink "off white style" belt, received many compliments

I wore this to my boyfriend's birthday dinner. I felt very chic in it, especially wearing it to a french restaurant. My only complaint about the dress is that the slit goes up SUPER high and I kept having to pay attention to it since it was a windy night. If you're comfortable with a high slit or are not wearing this dress somewhere windy it's perfect!
One of my favourite RTR rentals. This dress is beautiful, classy and relaxed. You just have to be prepared to go braless or have the band of your bra showing.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments, it is a beautiful dress & fits well.
links_Review_Text: This dress is a definitely a favorite. The fit was great & I received so many compliments. The front slit is pretty high & I had to figure out what type of bra to wear. The back of the dress has buttons but the bra is left exposed. Overall, the dress was a hit.

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress for my wedding website photoshoot.
links_Review_Text: It was very comfortable and the kind of drama that I needed. I would not be able to wear it around in public though since it literally stops at the bottom of my butt. It's perfect for bigger chest.
Rented this for a night out in Atlantic City. It was a hit! Felt comfortable in it, sexy and classy at the same time.

links_Review_Title: The dress was more flattering in the picture vs reality.
links_Review_Text: The fit was very short (I am only 5'3) and the cleavage area was very low. I felt as though I was shifting the dress more than I care to while wearing a dress. I was either pulling it down or pulling it up. I did love the sleeves and the ruffle on the bottom was a great touch. This dress would be more suited for someone less curvy and with less cleavage. It was flattering, and I did receive a lot of compliments but it didn't make me feel confident.
A classic fit and flare that hugs your curves in all the right places!

links_Review_Title: Sexy and flattering lbd for a winter wedding. Material is stretchy and super comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Loved it and was comfortable all night. Does run a bit short and low cut.
I rented this dress for a trip to Vegas and LOVED IT!!! I wore it with tall black boots and it fit great!

I usually wear a 4 or 6. This dress is stretchy and very fitted. I got lists of compliments and it was perfect for the Mardi Gras party I attended. My only complaint is that it tended to shift and twist around my body. I had to keep aligning the zipper in the back.
I usually wear a size 6 but I ended up wearing the backup size because the 6 was a little too short and a bit tight. Overall I was very pleased with this dress.

This was actually a back up dress option. The original choice didn't fit but everyone loved this! It's a tad snug in the arms (I'm muscular) and on the short side for sure, but overall I loved the fit!

Pretty, flattering and versatile. Short enough to keep it fun and material is not to dressy. Not too low cut and sheer part in front does not stick out with a black bra. Could wear to a dinner/movie night. Pair with tights for a winter look. The material did look a little worn and there were a few snags/strings but nothing deal breaking.
This dress is stunning! Stretchy and flattering.

links_Review_Title: Long sleeve cocktail dress with sass and classs
links_Review_Text: Fit great. Great length. Fitted to body. Great cocktail dress

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but not if you're tall!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'10" and this was too short for a wedding with dancing. When I pulled it down it was cute and a good length but if I moved at all it was very short. Loved the dress if it was just a little longer or I was a little shorter :)

There was a small tear in the sleeve but in a fairly hidden spot. Fit is tight but not uncomfortably low cut. Almost too short for my tastes but wore opaque tights and booties and that balanced things out nicely.
Kind of short. I'm 5'7 and was tugging it a bit. Looked really sexy and cute though. Lots of compliments.

This dress was super cute and comfortable. I am 5'2" and it was mid-thigh on me similar to where it falls on the model. The ruffle gave it somewhat of an 80's vibe to me which I couldn't figure out if I loved or not but I wore the dress anyway!
na

Rented this for Valentine's Day date night and it looked great. I could wear both the 0 and the 2. The 2 was a little longer, which I preferred, but there was extra material that bunches up around my hips so I went with the 0. I got compliments from friends and strangers throughout the evening, so I think the dress was a hit. My husband loved it!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Dress. Great for any special occasion or event.
links_Review_Text: I usually fit a 6 or 8. I went with the 8 that fit perfectly and was comfortable. The fit definitely grabs hold of every curve. 5â€™3/148/36DD

I'm 5'4", 145 pounds and the 8 was pretty tight on me and short. I decided to wear another rental instead of this one. The dress is high quality and is cute if you're okay with a tighter fit. I don't think I could have sized up more b/c of being too big in chest/shoulder area.

links_Review_Title: Cute yet sexy, great for winter wedding
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable dress however, if you want to feel like you are being 'held in', I recommend a body shapewear for underneath. The length was fine for me (I am 5'5). I wish the bottom had been a little more 'fluffy' - it was flat and did not really photograph. Overall though this is a great dress for a cold-weather event; I felt elegant and still sexy!
Super comfortable and super cute. It hugs curves in a tasteful way.

I wore this for my anniversary dinner with my boyfriend. The sleeves and neckline made it perfect for a steakhouse dinner in December. I loved the mesh arms and how figure flattering the top half that clung to me was. The flare at the bottom was cute, not my favorite because at times it flared weird, but it was REALLY short. Luckily I didn't need to bend down completely at any point. Otherwise, beautiful dress. I'm athletic build, 5'3, 130 lbs, 32B/C bust

links_Review_Title: Loved this! But it was a little short for me!
links_Review_Text: Fit was great, just on the short side for me.

links_Review_Title: Fantastic service! The dress was gorgeous! Prompt shipping! Canâ€™t wait to rent again!
links_Review_Text: I chose to rent from Rent the Runway when the dress I purchased for my 50th birthday party arrived and didnâ€™t fit. I was in a pinch and RTR saved the day. I canâ€™t wait to rent again.
SO OBSESSED OMGGG. Fit perfectly and so flattering!!

I was going to wear this to a formal event but the Medium I needed wasn't available and I was shipped a replacement last minute. This is the Small, and the torso was too short and went up my butt, so I couldn't have worn it. I had a black lace bralette on because it was low-cut. It's much more of a darker red than I was expecting.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a 007 Casino Royale Gala!
links_Review_Text: This was so beautiful! I received so many compliments. Generally true to size - I usually wear a 6/8 or Medium and am 5'3". I chose the M regular length because I wear super tall heels. It was a smidge shorter in the torso - I wore Spanx so it didn't cut into my behind! Wonderful wearing a pants option for a gala so we could easily dance without restrictions. I would 100% recommend this!
Wore this to ring in 2020. So many compliments! Truly and diva jumpsuit. Very flattering and super comfy!!! Would wear in again in a heartbeat.

THIS IS IT - pick this jumpsuit. So flattering and extremely comfortable. Wore this to a holiday party and felt amazing. Had compliments all night. True to size and can be set down with double sided tape in the bust if you're prone to slips :) length is somewhat long but not unusual. I wore this with 3" heels so might need hem tape for my petite ladies.

links_Review_Title: Stand out jumpsuit for a formal party
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a cirque themed party at my local art museum. It was a standout among at beautiful dresses, and I received so many compliments. I am 5'7"ish and usually a size 4 and the medium fit comfortably. It was very low-cut so I did end up safety pinning it up a bit.

links_Review_Title: metallic red standout - david bowie vibes in the best way
links_Review_Text: so happy i wore this to my NYE parties! what i loved: -color is so flattering and fun -super comfortable and not itchy -shoulder pads are subtle and complement the ruching heads up: -very deep v (nipple covers worked perfectly) -recommend 3-inch heels or lower -no pockets -the extra panel of fabric that drapes over one of the legs threw me off at first but i decided it adds to the uniqueness of the jumpsuit

links_Review_Title: Too Short in the Torso for Tall Gals
links_Review_Text: I had high hopes for this funky metallic jumpsuit but unfortunately it runs small and is very short in the torso, which lead to the dreaded camel-toe. Big no no. I am 5'9", 36B, 165lbs and typically a size 6/8. The Large fit me like a small/medium and the torso is designed for someone around 5'6". Sadly, it doesn't fit and I've got to send it straight back.
This jumpsuit is absolutely magical. Strangers were coming over to compliment me on it! Plus it's surprisingly comfortable and stretchy. Very much recommend for special occasions.

Loved this jumpsuit! Would recommend sizing up. I wore the medium but would have been more comfortable in a large as it had a very short torso and gets tight in the crotch. Otherwise, super comfy and absolutely stunning.
This was my first time wearing a jumpsuit and I'm hooked. It was a super fun outfit and I felt great wearing it! I'm renting it again for NYE!

This jump suit was a hit!! I worn it for a huge Christmas party and got so many compliments on it. The fit was spot on for me. It was a little right in the crotch area but once it was all zipped up it was great. I would definitely love to have this in my arsenal for other parties!
Such a cool piece. However, the sizing is super odd. Runs small and very short in the crotch.

links_Review_Title: Really hugs every curve, which was not flattering on me. Had to return it.
links_Review_Text: Very stretchy, except through the back, which was actually tight.

I rented this for a masquerade gala and it was perfect! I rented both the medium and large and ended up wearing the large. I would say it runs a little bit small, I am an 8/10 and typically wear a medium but it was a little bit short in the torso so if you're tall you may want to size up. It is low cut but not too over the top, I wore without a bra and used double sided tape to ensure everything stayed in place.
Torso was too short, and it looked awful on me. The material is thin and hugged me in all the wrong places. I think this would work great on a tall, thin frame.

links_Review_Title: Wore to my NYE celebration with friends! Everyone loved the outfit, made for great dance moves!!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect, and I'm glad I received a much larger size, my expected size would have been snug. Very comfortable and easy to move and dance in!

links_Review_Title: I didn't want to take it off.
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit was like a second skin. It fit like a glove and was very flattering. I had a hard time parting with it, but it was the perfect outfit for New Year's Eve!

Outrageously awesome and fit great in every way - except that I have junk in the trunk which created camel toe in the front - it was concealed by the wrap piece, but was uncomfortable. Late would have been awesome (though I am usually a 4) but it was not available.

links_Review_Title: This jumpsuit is even better in person. I wore it to a disco themed party.
links_Review_Text: So well made and the material is stretchy.

Seriously though, consider sizing up if you have a chest or don't have super skinny arms. Because there's zero stretch. I've rarely had issue with an XS shirt not fitting in the arms, but these were uncomfortably tight. It's a fabulous shirt though and I'll probably rent again in a size larger.

links_Review_Title: I'm in love with puffy sleeves!
links_Review_Text: Runs a bit short and has to pair with high waisted pants. Great feel and sleeves. Received tons of compliments

links_Review_Title: Perfect trendy blouse with a twist
links_Review_Text: This top is fabulous, the ruffled neck and exaggerated sleeve offer a Victorian feel, while the leather material makes it current, and edgy! I wore this for a date night and felt VERY chic! I'd recommend 1 so up for larger breasted women
This leather top is completely on trend and so fun. Wore it multiple times and loved it every time! Fit is true to size.

This top was adorable. I went with the large because I am long waisted and was worried about the length. It was a little bulky without tucking it in, so I tucked it in this adorable Marchesa Notte skirt. I added a leather wrap belt just to finish off the look. I don't have super big arms, so I would say the arm band was fitted, but not tight. If you carry more of your weight in your upper arms it could feel a little tight. I got a million compliments!
Love this too! I've worn it a few times both causal and dressy. Gonna hold onto this for a little while longer!
The medium fit perfectly & I usually wear a small so size up!
Definitely out of my comfort zone but I loved it. I got a ton of compliments on it. And it's not a complaint but it is a bit more cropped than most tops I wear so plan accordingly.

Loved this top - the sleeves are VERY puffy, if that's your thing. It was a fun option for work, the leather/sleeves make it "not stiff" but the black color and ability to tuck into high-waisted suit pants made it wearable for business professional setting. A good day-to-night option for sure. Just wish the top was just a tad bit longer because it's hard to tuck in, and looked odd just sitting on top of my bottoms/skirts (was not as cropped as shown on the model). Would definitely rent again given the versatility

I rented this just for a Friday night and it was just what I needed. The small details of the puffed sleeves and high neck gave it that edge. Looked great with ripped black jeans and a statement colored bootie!

links_Review_Title: Second time to rent- I love this jumpsuit!
links_Review_Text: Typically elegant and sophisticated Black Halo styling with great substantial stretchy fabric. I received so many compliments on it at my son's rehearsal dinner. The only negative thing I can say is that it requires help to zip and unzip, but once it's on, the fit is amazing.

links_Review_Title: Great fabric. Well constructed. Very professional. I'd buy it.
links_Review_Text: Based on reviews I went larger because of height... 5' 7 1/2". 12 was too large... Added wide belt. It worked. This brand I typically need an 8. I will try again, but size 10. Very slimming.

This was such a hit at my office that people were still talking about it after I left! However, there is one big problem (for me at least): it was pretty hot and I live in Texas and it was hard to zip back up after going pee...
Didn't end up wearing this but it fit really well and could be dressed up or down

links_Review_Title: Cute but could not zip up on my own
links_Review_Text: Non starter for me as I could not zip up without help. Also, it was cute but had two issues besides the zip situation: 1) not forgiving in the belly area. And 2) it was slightly long in the leg. From the pictures I thought I might be able to wear with a low heel but the legs were slightly too long. I'm 5'4" and I probably needed a 3-3.5" heel to make this work. Since I wanted to wear this for work, and I can't comfortably wear heels that high all day long, it didn't work for me.
Zipper was difficult - needed assistance in the ladies room. But lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Perfectly tailored jumpsuit great for many occasions!
links_Review_Text: This fit me perfectly- I have a bigger bottom, but it looked sleek and polished. The material is thick enough for winter as well. I did find the shoulders to be a little tight, which is just something to keep in mind for putting it on and taking it off!
Love this brand for its sophisticated cuts. This was gorgeous on and brand new when I rented it. The neckline is low cut so beware - but all around felt great in this.
Very flattering on the waist. I am 5' 9" and it was a little tight length wise but that always happens to me with a jumpsuit so I just deal with it. Nice material no stretch though

I really loveseat how this jumpsuit looked as it tapered around the waist and created a nice silhouette. I am a bit petite, so the sleeves were a bit long on me, about two inches too long. The pant length was perfect though! Other than that the longish sleeves, I really felt comfortable and confident in this jumpsuit and would wear it again!

links_Review_Title: One of the best pieces I've ever rented
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous, well-tailored, good for petites (I'm 5'4). came NWT. It's really a perfect piece for a night out or even for work w a blazer

links_Review_Title: Rented twice in two sizes...didn't work.
links_Review_Text: Tried to like this but the first one I rented was way too tight and the next size was tight and falling off at the top...wanted to like this but it was weird.
Nice jumpsuit, true to size to slightly small. It's hard to zip and unzip independently. The V is very deep--so typically would be too deep for work but appointments currently are via Zoom.
Fit was great everywhere but it is a little short in the stride. Couldn't wear it.

5' 5" and ~130ib - I consider myself pretty fit and usually wear a small. This jumper ran too small that I couldn't zip the back and returned it the next day after trying it on. Would definitely re-order in a bigger size in the future, but for now, will try different clothes. Order up if uncertain.

links_Review_Title: Do not order if you're on the taller side
links_Review_Text: I wouldn't consider myself to be a super tall person, only 5'7, but this jumpsuit is definitely not made for anyone over 5'5 or anyone with generally long features. There's no way I could've fit into this very nicely made piece unfortunately
So many compliments

I wanted to love this, but I think it would be much more flattering on a straighter figure. I have hips and the cut bulged out a bit in the lower belly. The fabric and color are nice. Wish I could have worn it.
This was a stunning jumpsuit. It hugged my body in all the right places and made me feel really confident. I would definitely rent this again!
Unfortunately it did not fit me-I had the 12R and it didn't fit my body. Maybe I should have tried 12L?

Once on, this jumpsuit fit me like a glove. It was great for my height (5'3") and hugged my body perfectly. I almostttttt considered buying BUT the arms were so tight I could barely lift them while in the jumpsuit which is not only uncomfortable in its own right, but made it nearly impossible to zip up after a bathroom break. I would end up sweating and in pain just from trying to put it back on in the bathroom stall, which rendered it just not worth it despite the impeccable fit.
This jumpsuit was really cute and the material was great. But the sizing is definitely off. I sized up and it just fit. I'm only 5'2 and I'm not sure how someone taller would be able to wear this.
Rented this for a date and the legs were so short almost like cropped. A bit tight all over so it was tough to get on and off

links_Review_Title: Too small/snug! Size up if you're curvy.
links_Review_Text: Too tight in the hips/thighs (a problem area for me) so size up 1-2 sizes if you're curvy.

It fit comfortably on the bottom and even in the bust area but the arms and shoulder are very tight, It was hard to lift my arm up. This is my second jumpsuit from black halo and the same thing. I would say size up but concerned the bottom may be too big.

I am normally a size 12 I went up to a 14 and it fit but I probably would have better fit for a 16. The neckline is a deep-B so you may want to pin it or put a tank under it for work. I loved the jumpsuit. The fabric doesn't stretch and felt like it was holding you on place. If your curvy, busty or have larger arms go up a size. If you have a straighter or athletic build you should be fine.

links_Review_Title: Very low cut but very fun dress
links_Review_Text: I was surprised at the fit of this dress. It has a tight liner in it, so although the dress looks loose and flowy, it is not. I wear 16-18 and am a 38 DD, hourglass, and this fit, but my cleavage almost felt indecent. The plunge in the front required a plunge strapless. I ultimately had to use a plunge nude regular bra because the straps of the dress cut into my shoulders without that extra support. I did dance the night away and had a blast in the dress!

Wore this for my husbands birthday party. It was so cute and fun. Super hard to figure out a bra situation though. Not enough support in the cups to go braless. And you can't adjust the straps. Tried a sticky bra but it showed still with the deep v. Finally had a to get a special deep v corset type bra that had very thin straps that weren't very noticeable. After that I got multiple compliments from people. Even strangers I didn't know stopped me.

The color of the dress was much more bronze than I expected. I liked this-- I thought it would be more rainbow and I'd look a little silly! The fit in the bust was a bit off-- I have pretty small breasts given the size of my ribs (36B-ish), so maybe this would fit better on a larger chested person. The pleats on the skirt were really fun!
Absolutely beautiful dress. I wore it to a Mardi Gras themed Gala. I received so many compliments - it was perfect for my event.

This is prettier in person. The sparkle is vibrant but classy. The cut of this dress is super flattering. Wore this to a premiere screening and only had it on for a few hours but I received so many compliments. I would definitely rent it again.
Loved it for Vegas! Lots of cleavage
Absolutely beautiful dress! Even better in person. I got compliments all night!
Great fit. Low cut.

This dress was my back up to my back up dress and I wish I had seen this first! It was gorgeous! I got a large, but could have gotten a medium. It was a little loose on me. The pics online didn't do it justice. The colors were amazing in the light ask danced the night away.
Loved this dress for NYE in Paris. Runs small and definitely low cut for chesty people, but was sexy and sleek for a night out.

links_Review_Title: Loved it! First renting experience and it was totally worth it.
links_Review_Text: Got tons of compliments on this dress! It was a little loose up top and tight on the bottom, but thatâ€™s common since Iâ€™m pear shaped. Iâ€™m about 190 lbs, 5â€™4, 36B and wore size L.
A gorgeous Christmas dress. This dress was so unique, the colors were fabulous. I looked like a million dollars, and I would rent it again! It was too small, I wish I got a medium!

links_Review_Title: Runs slightly big but SO pretty!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a New Year's Eve wedding, highly recommend. I am a S/M so I got both sizes but the M would have been way too big, the small was a perfect fit. I wore a Heidi Klum sticky bra which worked well.

Wore this to a New Year's Eve event. I may just be wildly between sizes but the XL fit me (I believe that's usually a 12/14 with this brand) but I also easily fit into a 16 of another brand so not sure what to say about size. I did not wear a bra with this dress but could have been helped with some boob tape. So comfy and flattering!

I rented this dress for New Year's Eve. My family let me know last minute the theme would be the roaring 20s. I just bought some accessories and the dress work perfectly. I will say if you are modest this is not the dress for you. There is a lot of cleavage in this dress. I wish the straps were adjustable. I felt like I needed them to be just a bit tighter.

links_Review_Title: Holiday dress full of sparkle but without the mess of glitter
links_Review_Text: Compliment worthy dress. Wore this to a holiday party. On me, the straps were a bit long and the top fit a bit looser (I'm pear shaped) but it was super fun!

links_Review_Title: Made me feel fun and edgy!
links_Review_Text: It definitely was a little tight around my upper body but that is with all my clothes. I loved the colors the most. The rich colors complimented my skin and hair!
Pictures don't do it justice! Super bright and sparkly colors perfect for a night out. Great for for curves but would definitely recommend double stick tape to hold things in place.

links_Review_Title: Sparkling dress perfect for holiday party
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'9 160 with a smaller bust. I wore the medium which was a little snug in the waist but the large was too big, especially in the bust. Can't wear a bra with this. Very pretty and definitely stands out!
Great for parties. The cleavage runs a bit deep, but nothing vulgar. The colors look beautiful in the night time. It's easy to match with shoes and accessories.

links_Review_Title: One of the worst dresses ever (from the back)
links_Review_Text: Such a bummer because I loved this dress from the front. Fun fabric. Awesome colors. But the back is stitched to the lining of the dress in a way that makes it look like you are wearing an adult diaper and the dress got stuck up in your nether regions. I honestly want to chat with the designer. Mayyyyybe if you have a pancake for a rear end you'll like it but otherwise, avoid. Or rent it and stand against a wall all night.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments on the dress!
links_Review_Text: It was so glittery, the picture doesn't give it justice. Not giving it a full 5 stars because the straps kinda dug into my shoulders, and the chest also fit kinda weird. I had to wear a bra to fill it out, but it looked great. The dress also snagged on my bracelet, so beware of the jewelers you wear.

It hid my tummy. Showed off my chest. Hugged my curves in all the right ways, felt a Marilyn Monroe vibe. I would of worn higher heels in a lighter color but, I was dancing and walking a lot so I went for comfort heels.

links_Review_Title: Glittery fall colors and so flattering!
links_Review_Text: I had rented this for a wedding but ended up wearing another dress so I dressed this down for a more casual ladies night out. Love this dress and will likely rent it again!

I was unsure about the neckline when it arrived, but it turned out to fit perfectly. I wasn't able to wear a bra with it--not even plunge!--but the support and coverage was definitely there. I danced all night without worry! Plenty of compliments, and just the right amount of sparkle.

I wore the XS but would've preferred the small (unavailable). I had the medium as backup but it was way too big in the chest for my small A chest. I used boob pads and ds tape to keep things in place but the chest band was a bit tight in the XS for my 32-34 band size rib cage (again, i would've preferred the small size). Tons of compliments and LOVED the metallic sheen. Would look amazing with gold heels.

I ended up not wearing this because it was just a tad too low cut for a work event (my bra was showing in the front), but I wanted to leave a review anyway because it's so fun and flattering! Feels well-made and the colors are vibrant without being obnoxious. For the glitter-averse (me!), the sparkle is in the thread, not glitter! I would not have felt comfortable going bra-less but others might. You will love this dress as long as you have a lower cut strapless bra than I did.

links_Review_Title: It's the best dress to dance it! The colors are amazing.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress, but it was a bit bigger in the busy and low cut... a dangerous combo while dancing. It would have been perfect if I brought some dress tape with me. Overall, super flattering and fun.

I wore this for a wedding. It was super comfortable. I rented a size up and it was a little roomy but I think my regular size would have been too small. It was fitted up top but had a pleated skirt so plenty told room to eat drink and dance comfortably. Highly recommend!

I wore this dress for my high school reunion, I loved it and got lots of compliments. Note: the zipper isn't the highest quality so it bunches. Also, it's v low cut and you cannot wear a strapless bra with it!
Stunning dress. Compliments all night! Really flattering for curvy women. Normally a size 4-6 and the XS fit like a glove!!!

links_Review_Title: Great metallic material. Bust too small
links_Review_Text: I really liked this dress but couldn't wear it because the bust was too small.
This dress is very bright and fun! It runs pretty large (especially if you are not busty).
The dress bunched up near the zipper but otherwise was comfortable and fun!

This dress had beautiful colors and was flattering but I wish the straps were adjustable. It fit pretty well but slightly large even on my DD chest. If I could have raised the top by shortening the straps I think I could have pulled it off.
I rented this dress to have something festive on hand during Mardi Gras! It's really a beautiful dress! My only complaint was that the straps were a bit long for me and they're not adjustable.

links_Review_Title: This was an amazing dress-- I felt amazing, looked amazing, and got tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit was good-- however it would have been nice if straps were adjustable
I didn't end up wearing this dress as it was too small in the chest. I felt like my boobs were spilling out. (32DD) but for some I'm sure that would be okay. It fit perfectly every where else though!
Very, very pretty--and comfortable to wear.

links_Review_Title: Wore for a holiday dance party, very sparkly, fun to wear
links_Review_Text: This is good for women who are pear shaped or have hips and dont want to wear skirts that are straight. I wore without a bra but there is no bra built in. Im a 12, 38C and I wore a L, but a larger chest size might have required an XL.

links_Review_Title: Wow - this dress is so beautiful with the color, embroidery AND comfortable!
links_Review_Text: The gold accents and dupatta made me feel royal. Only complaint is that it was a little long for me, but Iâ€™m 5â€™1â€™â€™. The details of this dress are exquisite and tasteful. The versatility of the dupatta definitely was a plus, great accent piece and used for a chilly night. Really love this brand!

links_Review_Title: Ordered a large - too small for my ribcage. Runs very small.

links_Review_Text: I initially ordered the small (I'm typically a 2-4 in dresses) and it was too big so returned for the xs. So glad I did- beautiful dress and got lots of compliments. It is not fitted at all through the hips so base on your bust size. Very comfortable as well. Would definitely rent again if I didn't have so many pictures in it.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and easy to wear maxi
links_Review_Text: Fits well, flowy, straps on back make fit easy to adjust, gold in dress is a pretty touch

links_Review_Title: Amazing! Light and flowy with a hint of glam
links_Review_Text: This dress was really light and breezy. It has a romantic silhouette and specs of gold in the fabric. The red is slightly pink in person. My favorite was the back of the dress. I wound up not wearing a bra and going with the smaller size and I felt comfy and supported all night.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous!! Runs a tad large. I normally wear a 4 or small but got the XS and it fits perfectly
Oh hello boho sexy Flowy dress
links_Review_Text: Wore this to one of my best friends marriage celebrations. So fun and flowy on the dance floor. Pair with some delicate gold jewelry and a red solo cup.

I loved this dress! I paired it with a jacket for casual Friday. Wore it out 2 other nights. The only issue is I couldn't get the straps tight enough so they kept falling. But totally worth the look of this dress!!!!

Absolutely beautiful color with the gold speckles in it. I consider myself petite through shoulders but I have D-cup breasts. I felt a bit insecure without a bra but I'm summer months probably wouldn't have bothered me. Love the slit up the front but hope for no wind or wear great underwear ;)

Beautiful dress- wish I was yâ€™all enough to wear it! Iâ€™m 5â€™3.5â€ and 118lbs and it was still several inches too long even with 3-4â€ heels. I tried to make it work but couldnâ€™t. Gorgeous dress for taller ladies!
Wore this dress for a photo shoot which turned into an engagement! Love this dress and received MANY compliments! Fits TTS, good quality.

Perfect for a hot, summer wedding. The low back still looked appropriate for a formal event. I usually wear a 4 and ordered the S and sized down to an XS as recommended by other reviews. I'm 5'4" and the XS was a little bit long but wore tall heels and just lifted the dress up when I walked. The proportions of the dress still looked good and it didn't look too big or too long. I pulled the tie in the back tight, which helps shorten the dress, but could have used an XXS! Love the adjustability thanks to the tie back. There is a long wrap-style slit that goes up the side of the dress all the way to the waist, but a snap is built into the dress to help keep it closed. I put a small pin in the dress around my knees just for extra security. Overall, very comfortable, beautiful dress. Would recommend! Size down!!!
memory stays, south france, this dress is beyond words, beautiful back,

This dress is stunning! It was too big on the waist but it still looks good it just falls really low down your back when it's too big. It's also really long so I ended up wearing it but just picking it up when I walked. The material is very thin, it's made in China so not great even though its crazy expensive to buy but it's a great rental item!!! Will definitely rent it again at some point

links_Review_Title: comfortable and flattering formal dress with unique red color
links_Review_Text: I got the large because it was the only size available, but it worked because the tie in the back was adjustable and I could tighten the straps. The overall fit was flattering in the front and back and was super comfortable yet formal. 10/10
Such a great flattering fit for a date night at a nice restaurant on the beach. It's not too low in the front and the tie back and high slit is great. Love this dress!

Love love love. I rented for vacation and it was perfect for cooler evenings. It's such a stunning fabric and so flowy. Endless compliments. It runs long so I had to carry it a little bit otherwise fits well.

Easy fitting dress. Loved it. The back is very low. Runs large, would have been better with an XS. Somewhat adjustable as you tie the back together. Wore to a summer formal wedding in the south. Wouldn't be dressy enough for a winter formal event.

Wore it to a formal wedding and was a little worried about the backless aspect, so I paired it with a gold pashmina. Everyone loved it! Super flattering and comfortable / easy to wear! Would definitely rent again.
Gorgeous red print with open back. I'm 5'10 it went to the floor. Was able to wear heels. Didn't need to wear a bra. Such a pretty color and sexy dress.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, nice and special fabric, lovely controlled high slit
links_Review_Text: This dress was nice but it did not fit me in the top. I am small on top and there wasn't a way to adjust the dress tightly enough with the back ties. So the dress looked nice on but from certain angles you could see that the top bagged way out on the sides. My sister mentioned it : (
I didn't wear this out of the house - although my husband liked it fine. The top just smashed me. Not quite enough room in the bodice for me - maybe next time I will rent the next size up.
Cute but material seemed a little flimsy, I'm 5'3" ordered M PETITE and it was still too long even with wedges.
Pretty
A little too long for being 5'2'' but rest of the dress fit great.
Beautiful dress
Very high slit, not flattering for wide hips. Showed all of my bra. Didn't wear. Better for slim hips, small chest/no bra. Gorgeous fabric- wished it worked for me

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. Comfortable and fun for formal wedding
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size, plus the back ties so it's a little customizable. Obviously a little long for short girls, but with the slit and some solid heels it wasn't much of an issue. Comfortable all night - highly recommend!
Did not end up wearing this. The material is a bit cheap, but the cut is fun.

links_Review_Title: The color and material is beautiful.
links_Review_Text: The chest areas and strap were too big.
I loved this dress so much! IT fit perfectly and looks amazing in person

links_Review_Title: Love so much will likely buy
links_Review_Text: Love this dress! I've rented this over the summer and wore it a bunch. Even to work with a jean jacket. It's long so I recommend wearing heels if you are short like me . However this time I rented it for a wedding in Mexico and wore it with sandals and it was perfect. Easy to pack (doesn't wrinkle) and was so nice and light for those humid evenings!

Wore it to a beach wedding, definitely long as the other reviews mentioned but it didn't bother me. Wore the small, was a bit big in the bust for me but the open back made up for it. It's also hard to see the silver detail in the pics but it's quite lovely in person.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, fabric and pattern. The fit is very flattering.
