links_Review_Text: It fits beautifully and the back is stunning. I received many compliments and felt comfortable and feminine in it. I wore the small and the extra small and the extra small fit a little better. It runs a touch big.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear it, but it was very pretty
links_Review_Text: Liked the dress, but it was way too long. Had on platform wedges and it was still dragging on the ground.

links_Review_Title: Lovely dress, can't wear a bra
links_Review_Text: Pretty fabric, flattering cut. Very low back so a bra is impossible.
Did not wear this. The fabric was light and there were gold accents that were pretty. It was too loose. Maybe I should have tried a smaller size. More like a pretty beach dress than a cocktail dress.

links_Review_Title: Couldn't wear as it was too big
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress but runs big so unfortunately couldn't wear it
Really beautiful dress. Has a skit that goes pretty high, but has a button clasp. The back is so pretty, such a fun dress

The fabric is flowing and cool and the low back is sexy but pretty. Great for an island vacation. This dress is very long. I had to wear very high, stacked heels...which isn't so great for an island vacation.

I rented this dress for Easter at home and it was perfect. The dress runs large so size down a size. The neckline is gorgeous, the print is beautiful. This was my first Tanya Taylor and it was perfect. I would rent this again for a real event.

I am so in love with this dress! The textured silk is light as air. Beautifully made and the colors are just perfect to brighten up days spent sheltering in place. Runs very large. I consider myself a true size 6 but always have a perfect fit in a Tanya Taylor size 4, I could have easily sized down to a 2. The belt definitely helps but arm holes and bust were very large. I will be renting this one again! Oh, and it was NWT. ðŸ˜Š

I rented this for Easter, and liked it even more than I thought I would! It did run a bit large, and as I'm in between sizes I wish I'd rented one size down. This is an extremely lightweight dress that is perfect for spring and summer.
I rented for Easterish forecasts I was doing from home, unfortunately we had severe weather and I had to change gears but, Beautiful flattering dress would love to own.
Super comfortable to wear, the elastic in the wrists and neck is great. The cut is definitely big, but the effect is cute.
The fabric is luxurious and color was beautiful. I was initially concerned about the length before it arrived, but it was just fine with a high rise jean/pant. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous, rich color and a fun texture, too!
links_Review_Text: I wasn't really expecting to like this top as much as I did, especially given the rusty color of the shirt and the coloring of my hair/skin, but it was gorgeous. I think it's a shade that would look great on just about everybody. The sleeves were big and dramatic! I rented it as a "what the hell, worth a shot" kind of rental, but I ended up wearing it multiple times. I got a medium that fit well (usually wear a small), so it runs a little small-ish and is certainly shorter/cropped.

I should have kept this top! Super flattering for a bigger chested girl (32DDD) and the cropped waist makes you look tiny and curvy! I was going to get the small but it was not available, however, the medium size fit perfectly! Super fun top, love the color as well!
Such a flattering fit, comfy and pretty material. As soon as i stepped out into NYC for the weekend, i received so many compliments & even paired this hat to complete the look. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: felt awesome in my engagement pics and going out with friends!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful color and fabric. so many people asked to touch the sleeves to see what the shirt felt like! I wore a medium which rode up a bit around my waist showing about an inch of skin above my (very) high wasited jeans. Not sure if sizing up would prevent that since the bottom of the shirt is stretchy.
Loved this top so much! Typically wear a medium in tops, but the large fit well in this one since it is tighter on the stomach area. Loved the color and the material was high quality

This was the second type I had rented this top just in one size up. The piece is fitted in the waist and because there is no side zipper in the waist it was difficult to get the over my shoulders with the size small. I was nervous that the medium would be too big in the waist but it was great. Looks much better in person.

Very sophisticated top and the texture felt high end. I also love the color. The fit was as expected - the only complaint I had was the sleeves were really long! I am only 5'1" so my arms aren't super long. I felt like the fabric was really billowy on the arms because of the length. However, if you have a longer frame you probably wouldn't have that issue.
This is such a fun top that looks good with jeans or a skirt
Super fun and unique top. Very tight fit in the mid section, need to tuck to avoid it riding up

I received so many compliments, not to mention felt incredibly FAB! in this billowy-sleeved blouse. My only complaint is that it was more of a midi top, so I kept pulling it down throughout the evening to cover up my belly button. I normally wear a Small but sized up to a Medium based on other reviewer's suggestions.

links_Review_Title: Wow! This top was stunning! I wish I could own! Will rent again.

links_Review_Text: The fit on this is so perfect. Tight but not too tight! The fabric has a slight sheen to it so could definitely dress this up! Absolutely loved this.

The material of this shirt is thick so it would be great for a cold evening. It's definitely a crop top and hit right above my belly button. Gorgeous color and the fit was great! There isn't much give to the piece that's meant to wrap around waist so it can be difficult to get over your head. Mine had a giant hole in the seam for this piece, assuming it was from someone who had that exact difficulty... did not end up wearing because of it.
Pretty top, but it's a bit of a crop, just so you know
Definitely feels more fancy in person. The color and quality are beautiful! Only thing is the puffy sleeves make you look a little bit more broad but your waist will look snatched.

links_Review_Title: Great date or night out top
links_Review_Text: Loved this top and got so many compliments. It actually looks better in person than the picture and it all over pleated. This is definitely a more cropped fit and with high waisted jeans I had a sliver of skin showing. This was the look I was going but be aware it isn't providing a ton of coverage and hit right at my belly button.

links_Review_Title: Can be difficult to get on - do your makeup after
links_Review_Text: This top is gorgeous! Only other feedback I have is it was a little right to get into and it rises up easily so maybe not so great for work (note to self) but definitely fun and I could have possibly avoided those things sizing up!
I got just about a dozen compliments on this showstopper top at work. Amazing color and print!!!

links_Review_Title: Sophisticated --- love this shirt - can't wait yo wear it with the matching skirt -

links_Review_Text: Nice material and colors. The part around the wrists and forearms is tight! Which made it hard to zip the top up all the way by myself. Top was fairly fitted in rib cage area but not too tight overall. Sleeves are a bit poofy
Love the fit and pattern. Wore with Navy dress pants. Perfect for work and date night out.
Loved it. Wore with plum pants
Great print and awesome fabric. No stretch but it fit very well.

links_Review_Title: This was very cool - Sort of retro 70's but it worked! Tons of compliments. Great colors.
links_Review_Text: Runs small - size up. Short so beware!

Beautifully draped with stunning details from the pearl accents to buttons at the cuffs. Easy to dress up or down. Caution the sleeves are very snug so consider sizing up if you have any meat on your forearms...
I loved the look of this top..
I was so exited to get this set. So beautiful in person. Received compliments all day!
didn't like the way it looked on me
Fit perfectly
Very Narrow sleeves between palm and elbow. Made it impossible to wear. Very pretty though and fit great on the body, but sleeves were too tight.
Beautiful shirt in person but was too small overall. The fit was off and felt very tight around neck.

links_Review_Title: Rented it for an intimate R&B concert. I looked amazing. So many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size.

I wore this top multiple times with jeans very casually and dressed up with jeans and boots. It is well-made and a little bit fancy(?) even with jeans. I got compliments every time I wore it. I would say the only negative is there is a long zipper in the back it goes all the way down, so it has a tendency to bow out a little bit. But I got over it. I forgot to take pictures.
Super sweet dress- I should have sized up for my recent weight gain - the dress is true to size!
Received a ton of compliments. Great top! Comfortable. Would definitely rent again.

The fit was true to size and I felt great in this. You can dress up or down - I wore with blue jeans and leopard booties. You could also wear with a skirt to work no problem. The keyhole is conservative and the tie on the side allows for some adjustments.
Very see-through and the buttons around the neck are so tight and difficult that I couldn't put the top on
Perfect layering under jacket or alone.

This top is well lined in the front, but I had to wear a camisole for the back. Too sheer for work. I rented this with tags and the fabric buttons were a little difficult. It would be a great date night shirt, not too low it in front but enough flirty detail with the back and side tie. I would rent again.
This is great for work or a night out. Loved the neckline. Looks good with hair up or down. Would rent again.
Elegant and flattering. So many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Loved it enough to keep it

links_Review_Text: The colors and print on this are so pretty! It is a cropped shirt, so keep that in mind. I have a short torso and it hit right at the top of my mid rise jeans. My belly came out anytime I reached up. The cuffs were a little tight on my forearms and I had to wear it with one of the buttons undone, but I think that's more of a me problem than a fit problem. This went into my "Will Rent Again" hearts list right away!

I got this for a work trip but it was too low cut so I wore it for a dinner with friends. Loved the feel of it, it definitely hits right at your jeans so if you have a long torso you will show skin. Really flattering though for someone with not much of a chest.

I got sooo many compliments on this top. The print is pretty, the sleeves are interesting, the fit was good except it just felt a bit too short for me. If I lifted my arm, the top hiked up on the sides.
Feminine, comfortable, high quality. Perfect for all seasons! Loved the elastic bottom to give that 'tucked in' look without actually having to bother with it

I wore this twice for evenings out. It's croppy and expect it to rise with the elasticized bottom. I found myself constantly pulling it down. The small snap at the V-neck helps to prevent over exposure.
Wore both for work and for fun! Beautiful detail and fit perfectly
Stand out silk blouse
Really pretty, but didn't work with my chest size. Also extremely lightweight, so not great for fall/winter in colder climates.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty top; v neck too low cut
links_Review_Text: The colors and print are so cute but like most of the wrap style shirts that are popular right now it's too low cut to wear alone. Would be fine standing still as in photo but actually moving my bra sticks out. Also this top is short and requires high waisted pants. Will wear once but will not purchase.

Loved this beautiful top. different from any I've worn before because this was cropped with an elastic waist. Deep v but wasn't too revealing. No special bra or tape needed. if it wasn't so expensive I'd consider buying. Wish it wasn't quite so cropped. But still beautiful.

Absolutely loved this top! It was fun and colorful - more elevated than my normal t-shirts or blouses still felt appropriate for everyday wear. There's a little button to secure the top, but isn't super strong so it did pop open once or twice. Not a huge deal, but definitely made it much more low cut / revealing. Would rent again!
I wish i had purchased this piece. The colors are beautiful and I received many compliments. It runs true to size but it is a but cropped. It fit me well but I am inly 5"4'.

links_Review_Title: Solid work day or weekend choice
links_Review_Text: Flattering, flowy, easy fit while still looking put-together. Elastic around the waist keeps it in place. V-neck fine for me but beware some may need a cami underneath. Comfy in freezing AC and outside on a really hot day.
Loved so much and received so many compliments! Wore with white shorts for the day and white jeans and heels for date night.

links_Review_Title: Such a cute print, beautiful fabric
links_Review_Text: So comfy/cute. I wore twice without a shirt underneath and once with a tank underneath for work - elastic around the bottom makes it easy to style either tucked in or not. Gorgeous shirt!
Perfect top to wear with high waisted black jeans! I wore this on Valentine's Day and would definitely recommend renting!

links_Review_Title: Nice bright top to put a little color in my wardrobe.
links_Review_Text: I wore this with a tank underneath as it is quite low and also can rise up on the belly, but I did like the elastic waist to help keep it in place. Got a lot of compliments on it. It felt super comfy and was a pleasure to wear. It was particularly fun for me as I rarely have color in my wardrobe. Would rent again.

The pink floral print is a very girly in the best way. Don't plan on wearing it with low rise jeans, the length hits much better with high waisted jeans with a belt. Also, be aware that the sleeves are sort of an odd length - not a deal breaker.

links_Review_Title: So cute! The print is super fun and makes for an easy outfit.
links_Review_Text: Relaxed fit flattering wrap top, the fun print makes it easy to through on with a pair of pants and minimal jewelry.

links_Review_Title: The colors and pattern were beautiful. Great with a pair of jeans.
links_Review_Text: My only con was that I wished it was a little longer.

It's a beautiful blouse but unfortunately it's very short in the torso, and also has a very deep v cut. The combination of which made it impossible to wear without showing either too much cleavage or too much stomach

links_Review_Title: If you can wear a crop top to work wear this one

links_Review_Text: Loved this top and got lots of compliments on it. It was perfect with high waisted jeans. I did have to pin it closed on the chest because it was just a deeper plunge than I was comfortable with.

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments. Very nice shirt.
links_Review_Text: It fit ok. Could probably have worn teh smaller sixe, but it was not available. It is very comfortable and flattering. Can be dressed up with dress pants or worn with dark jeans.
This top is great for some, but I didn't have a large enough bust to pull it off. Maybe I needed to size down? Not a winner.

links_Review_Title: Love this top - great pattern, flattering cut, real silk
links_Review_Text: Wore this to dinner twice and loved it both times. Cute with jeans and booties or black pants and heels. The arms are not full length so great for a petite frame. The v neck isn't too low, so you could wear to an office. Overall, really happy with this rental!
Didn't like it. The material is really pretty but the fit was too large and very sloppy. The neckline opened very low. I tried pinning the neckline but the look just wasn't great.
I rented this for vacation but lived it so much I wore it several times. Had to wear high waisted with it and wear a cami but not a big deal, it was a beautiful top!
Loved this pattern but maybe I was sent a size 0 instead of 8?
It's adorable. It's got plenty of coverage. The only downside is that the bottom hem is elastic. I wish it were just a straight hem.
Rented for work and wore a white cami under with blue jeans. This top is stunning in person. The floral print is vibrant. I loved wearing it and received several compliments.

links_Review_Title: It's super cute and soft! I love it-
links_Review_Text: Slightly low for me yet I wore with a black cami and black skirt.

Wore this for a casual Friday to the office and paired it with jeans. Very pretty colors in person. As other reviews have mentioned, it's a bit cropped. I have a long torso and found it kept rising up a bit. Otherwise nice choice.
This is such a cute blouse. The colors are beautiful! I wore it casually with skinny jeans and a fuchsia tank underneath (it requires a camisole/tank).

links_Review_Title: LOVE this fun top! Cool print and pretty neckline. Good for work or out to dinner/bars.
links_Review_Text: Definitely on the shorter side for a blouse and need to wear with semi high waisted pants.
Pretty print.

As others have stated, it's a shorter top, but being 5'5" it's not a problem for me. Love the colors. It fit well, but is a bit lower in the front than I prefer. Had to wear a bandeau with it to work. An evening out, I could probably skip that extra item. Make note, it's silk!
The top is super cute. Should have died down as it is pretty billowy. Also, it is rather revealing so you may want to wear a camisole underneath. Would rent again in a smaller size.
Beautiful colors and fabric. The fit was nice. Clasp came undone a few times when moving my arms around.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable, but not cute. Confirmed my opinion of (Meh)dewell.
links_Review_Text: First time trying a slip dress and I don't understand the obsession. Fit was boxy and not flattering. I liked the side slits that made it a little more interesting and the adjustable straps. The material said silk, but was not shiny at all, wrinkled very easily, had lots of loose threads, and showed every sign of sweat. Wore a strapless bra easily, dressed up for the wedding with cute wedges and down after for a more casual night out. Comfortable, good color, but overall meh.

links_Review_Title: Wore this several times before returning!
links_Review_Text: I love the ease and versatility of a slip dress. The color is what I was drawn to. I wore this several times in different combinations. In the picture I belted it and wore it with a blazer. This was true to size, if anything maybe a bit oversized. Loved it!

Wore this for a winery tour on a recent girls trip. It was super light weight and comfortable, but also really cute and flattering. Perfect item to dress up or down. It did wrinkle a bit after sitting for a while, but to be expected with any silky material.

links_Review_Title: This dress ticks all the boxes.
links_Review_Text: Comfortable, stylish and versatile. A little bit sexy, a little bit classy. I loved it so much that, now that I have to return it to RTR, I decided to buy it from Madewell. During my rental I wore it dressed up with ankle boots and nice jewelry to an art museum and dinner, then dressed it down with high top converse and a denim jacket to go to a friend's party. I have long legs but a short torso, so I particularly love that the shoulder straps are adjustable! It has a bit of a shelf liner (non-elasticized) so you could get away with no bra.
Easy to wear, loose fit Madewell dress. Fits true to size.

Effortless, comfortable, and didn't wrinkle too bad. Beautiful deep red wine / brighter maroon color. Dress did not have too much stretch, has adjustable straps, and zipper on back. I paired it with a jean jacket for work and without for happy hour/dinner.

links_Review_Title: was able to dress this up with a blazer and fun hat!
links_Review_Text: Wore an 8, needed a 6- but do-able since its a slip dress!
Was really hoping this would fit. The top and back were very loose while the bottom fit my hips.
beautiful fit

Pros: This is a very season-less dress, easy to layer with tights and turtleneck in winter but could also look great with a jacket in spring or even by itself in warm weather. As a petite person I appreciated the adjustable straps. The fit is flowy but not too flowy, and the garnet color is beautiful. Cons: The silk material is extremely delicate and shows every single wrinkle, crease, drop of water, etc., so it likely would have to be cleaned and steamed often. I was seriously thinking about buying this but then not sure I want to deal with the dry cleaning bill (or environmental damage). Still a great rental though.

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately I didn't get to wear this piece as I chose another one. Super cute and flattering on.
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size. Would look extremely cute dressed up with heels or if you want to wear it with white tennis shoes.
Very comfortable and paired well with over sized sweater and cute heels

I really liked this dress - I wore one size smaller than my usually size because I'm smaller on top, and it still fit the lower part of my pear/athletic body. It came below my knees and I'm pretty tall, so it might be too long for shorter ladies. My only complaint is I thought it would be more satiny/shiny, but it's more of a matte red color. It was perfect for the casual party I went to with a cardigan and booties!

links_Review_Title: Fit perfectly! Was great to wear out for my after formal party!
links_Review_Text: It was great to wear for after formal I dressed it up with booties and a jean jacket and got a lot of compliments!
The strap was hanging on my a thread so I wound up not wearing it, but it wasn't so flattering either. Fabric is kind of see through and it's just meh.

links_Review_Title: super comfy and can be dressed up or down
links_Review_Text: loved the side slit

This dress was strange. The top opened up so wide that I felt like I was very close to a wardrobe malfunction, and there's some weird dart situation going on that is very noticeable and looks dumb. Even if it would have fit, when I received it the top was safety pinned together and it smelled funky, which made me concerned about if it was clean. I didn't wear it.

I order this dress for a black tie holiday party. Unlike the other reviews this dress seemed to run small throughout the chest and waist. I'm usually a large but couldn't even zipper it. The cutout on the model drapes beautifully but once on it puckered open. I had to keep perfect posture and not dance or sit in fear my boobs were going pop out all night.

links_Review_Title: Sexy, trendy, and most importantly UP TO DATE!!
links_Review_Text: runs small and the zipper was hard to zip but when I finally got it up It was good.Iâ€™m a full breasted woman (36H) and although it was a little small in the chest this is a French brand so that makes sense.I was told this dress was a size 12/14 it definitely runs a lot closer to 12. reason that Iâ€™m giving it a 4 is bc this dress comes with an amazing belt that rtr does not have with it which DEFINITELY takes away from the look.I hope rtr starts to put more sexier, trendier clothing on their site

links_Review_Title: It's better looking in person! Definitely a show stopper!!!
links_Review_Text: The fit was great from the waist down, it was not structured enough for my breast size so I had to use A LOT of fashion tape and still had to adjust a lot. I feel this dress would be better suited for smaller chested women but over all received tons of compliments !

links_Review_Title: Huge on top and not for short girls
links_Review_Text: I am 5'2 and ordered a small. The top was VERY large. With the opening in between my breasts the gals were at high risk for peeping out. Moreover it was 2-3 inches long even with 4 inch heels. This would be better for taller and/or bigger women with larger chests.

Loved this dress, I got tons of compliments all night! I got the regular length and it was a little long even with heels on but it wasn't a problem at all. The dress fits very true to size, the top where the slit is a lot more open then in the picture. I had to safety pin it to keep it closed, deff something to note because it almost stopped me from wearing it but once I figured that out it was perfect !
The top was ill-fitting. There is a lot of fabric, and the darts are quite visible. I wear a 32C, and I could not fill up the top with all the fabric. I should have ordered the small.
It was too small on one side of the sleeve and too big on the other and then it didnt zip. Very weird construction.
Definitely should've invested in some boob tape but other than that very comfortable and tons of compliments!!!

The top needs to be quite fitted for this gown to work -- I ordered the XLL and while the waist was fine, the bust and arms were way too roomy so I couldn't wear it. Pretty though! Wish I'd sized down.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a wedding and truly felt like a million bucks! Would definitely rent again.
links_Review_Text: This dress fits to size. It is very flattering and looks amazing on and off the hanger. I got so many compliments on this dress. It was girly and feminine and I loved everything about it.

links_Review_Title: I got a ton of compliments on this dress! It was very different and fun to wear.
links_Review_Text: It fit as described. I'm fairly tall and liked the length.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on the dress!! Made my night :))
links_Review_Text: The dress fit perfectly! The embroidery is gorgeous!! Very versatile as well, can be worn for any event!

This might be one of my favorite RTR dresses- it was so comfortable and I got tons of compliments. I loved the floral overlay and the ruffles on the shoulders make it very unique. I didnâ€™t have to wear a bra (I wear a 34A) and the mesh was not too revealing. I have a small chest and waist and the dress was fitted in the upper body.

The details on this dress are amazing. I loved that it was fitted enough that I didn't have to wear a bra. The cut is flattering. I did sort of feel like it was 2011 though because it reminded me of the high-low dresses of the day that were sheer maxi's.

This dress was beautiful with its detailed embroidery. The sheer v-neck seemed a little scandalous when I tried it on at home but with the dark lighting at the wedding reception, it was fine. I was able to dance all night in this dress and felt like it was flattering on my post-baby bod. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: You absolutely will NOT regret choosing this 1! I received so many compliments on how good I looked.
links_Review_Text: The only reason I didn't give it '5' stars was that zipper stuck on both dresses I received. It all worked out in the end, but I literally wore the bigger of the 2 dress sizes just in case the zipper stuck again at the end of evening (so there would be extra room for me to wiggle out of it if need be without getting it all the way unzipped).

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for work holiday party
links_Review_Text: I loveddd this dress! It was very comfortable and true to size. The dress had room to sit, move and eat. I have a small chest so the top part was slightly loose for me. If youre C cup and up, it may be a tighter fit. For me, no bra was needed which was nice. Overall I think this dress is great and perfect for any dress up occasion.
Looked great!

links_Review_Title: I had several compliments when I wore this! Perfect for a winter wedding!
links_Review_Text: It fit true to size and was just above my ankles without heels. The flower embroidery on the sheer neckline made allowed for just the right amount of coverage.
Great fit. Very busty.

links_Review_Title: Try a fun spin in it!
links_Review_Text: I loved the floral pattern. The short black dress under the sheer was a nice fit. It is not comfortable to sit in with the flower stitching. The top was great, did not wear a bra and really felt the material on the chest was flattering on my smaller bust. I am athletic body type 5'8 170.

links_Review_Title: Did wear this time around but a beautiful dress just not for my body shape.
links_Review_Text: I found this dress runs a little small in the bust. The embroidery is gorgeous. However, I think you have to have a more narrow/ finer shoulder arm build to be flattering with the way the ruffles come off the shoulders.

links_Review_Title: For an A to B cup.
links_Review_Text: These dresses usually look great on me. However, the bust was tiny. If you order this, order several sizes up. The dress is pretty. It did not wow me and must be brand new because it still had the tag in it.

links_Review_Title: Fun fit and great party top
links_Review_Text: You can get very creative with how you tie this cool top and choose how gaping or conservative you'd like to go

links_Review_Title: Great top to go out in
links_Review_Text: I wore different extra high waisted leather black pants with this top but took the picture only in these high waisted good American blue jeans. I'm a 36D so the 6 was a little small making it more revealing but because it worked for the venue I was going out to. Got compliments, great sleeves, fun top.
Wore this shirt during Mardi Gras and the sleeves were very big- I would definitely size down if smaller bust as well. Loved it and would wear again if I could!
Rented this for everyday use and ended up wearing it out in NYC for a night out. Really cute with bell bottom jeans!

Wore it for a holiday party. The tie does loosen so I had to tighten it a few times during the evening. Usually wear 8-10 and wore the 10 and it was a little baggy. I would have probably fit better in a size 8.
The fit was a little bit on the small side and I had to pin the top to make it slightly more conservative. I also enjoyed it to wear once but didn't necessarily need to wear again.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments!! Such a fun top!!! Loved the low cut/big sleeves!
links_Review_Text: Wore it with a high waisted skirt from RTR! Combo super flattering

i always forget self portrait runs small so definitely size up. the shirt was extremely short waisted and i'm petite so i don't know how it would fit on someone tall. i wore a tank underneath it so you wouldn't see my stomach. very nice quality. Love the statement sleeves.

I wear a size two or four typically and this shirt ran incredibly small. I knew it would be cropped short based on other reviews and photos. However I have DD breasts and the shirt wasn't even close to offering enough coverage.
This blouse is such a pretty color! When I tried it on it didn't wrap all the way to cover my bust I ended up no wearing it

links_Review_Title: Runs very small. I'm normally a 0 and this wasn't even close to fitting

links_Review_Text: Love the green color of this top, but the bow does NOT look that big. It's very limp. The sleeves are huge! Didn't love it. Also EXTREMELY low cut. Whole chest was out and not covered as pictured. The V went all the way to about two inches above my bellow button.

This was the perfect top for me except I should have ordered up. I wanted a tight fit but I didn't realize there would be zero stretch. It unfortunately wouldn't fit me and I question if even the next size up would.

I really liked this top! Definitely have to wear pasties (no bra will work with this) and high waisted jeans. It took some well-placed pins to keep me decent but I loved it! Good for a winter going-out look.
Love color and idea but this is cut for a very flat narrow chest -- I sized up but it was oddly cut even for my c-cup.
Couldn't get the size 2 to fit when I'm normally a 0. Double size up! Even if you have a tiny waist

links_Review_Title: Didn't find it too small, just paired with under tank
links_Review_Text: With a black under tank it was appropriate and cute for work or going out

Runs small. Couldn't get the top to wrap around my boobs so had to wear a tank top underneath. Also, the wrap hit right under my boobs instead of lower as on the model. Was a pretty color and probably would have been cuter if it fit right. Size up!
Definitely cropped. Hard for people with a larger chest. Very cute for a night out.
This shirt is super cute, but it ran pretty comically small on me.

I am really small on top and this wouldn't have come close to closing around me. It's also really short. I feel like the model makes it look as though it comes down to the belly button and it barely was beneath my bustline. Maybe sizing up would help?
Be prepared for low cut but with no bra, this thing is flattering as hell. I loved it, very sexy. Can't believe I didn't take a photo. So mad!
I usually wear a small sometime xsmall because of my short torso and small bust (32B). Unfortunately the size 2 was not big enough around my rib cage and was way too short. I

Sexy fabric with glittery snake print. Length was fine, not too long for me at 5'4". Two issues: 1). Going to the bathroom; zipper is tight and hard to do alone; and 2). Keeping the top up over my breasts. At dinner, I had to frequently pull it up. Otherwise, it's a flattering, sexy look.

links_Review_Title: Best night ever! Felt confident and beautiful..
Make sure you have a buddy in the bathroom
links_Review_Text: I love this jumpsuit and Iâ€™m so glad I rented it, but it can be tricky to get on and off. The zipper is in the back and impossible to get up by yourself. Make sure you don't need to visit el baÃ±o if you don't have a zipper buddy.

Loved the look and feel of this jumpsuit. Fit me perfectly from the waist down, but due to my small chest I couldn't feel comfortable wearing it out. If I lifted my arm up I was totally exposed! I don't think I could size down due to my hips and backside.

links_Review_Title: Do yourself a favor and rent this jumpsuit!

links_Review_Text: I've honestly never gotten as many outfit compliments as I did wearing this. I wore it for a night out for my birthday. It was comfortable and looked amazing. Was such a fun look!
Wore this to a Lady Gaga concert. I was able to dance around without being uncomfortable. The zipper got stuck while I was wearing it so I couldn't pee all night but totally worth it.
Amazing jumpsuit. Styled it with a white t-shirt and received a lot of compliments for the outfit.
Loved this jumpsuit. It fit perfectly and was comfortable to wear all night. Back clasp is hard to do without assistance though.

Rented for a holiday party. Top was snug with a strapless bra but the bottom was loose in the hips, waist, and legs. Wore 4inch heels and was still a little long in the legs. Overall such a beautiful jumpsuit. 5'5 and 130lbs with athletic build for reference.
This was fire.

I loved this rental. Took a gamble not having many reviews but I am so glad I did. The zipper in the back did not have a pull tab so I had to use a safety pin. Needed help to zip for the bathroom. I am a 38C chest and the fit was snug on my chest. Did not need a bra (I tried it on with a strapless bra and it was too tight). Has pockets! Loved it for a nigh out on the town

Not to give TMI but this is NOT FRIENDLY for the lower stomach/ upper pelvic fatty area. It clings to it and also has extra fabric there and pockets. I looked pregnant wearing this. Fine length. I have 34 C cup and it was pretty tight on chest.
Glitzy and sure to turn heads. Couldn't wear because it was really tight in rib cage and wouldn't zip. Fit everywhere else. Will re rent one size up. Will also pin the pants up a bit bc I am short.

links_Review_Title: Beware if you have a larger chest...
links_Review_Text: Got this to wear out in Vegas. I was worried the hips would be too tight, but the legs were fine. It was the top. See how thereâ€™s cups like a bra? If you at or over a D cup, your cuppeth will overflow. If you stuff them in, your bounty will stuff below the cup line and look odd from the side. Itâ€™s also hard to do the zipper by yourself, so make sure you can tag team it all night. Oh and one more thing, the zipper in the back at the bottom didnâ€™t lay flat, giving the impression of a mini tail. Other than that, the material is nice and thick and has a shimmer. Definitely wear with heels since it makes shorter legs look even shorter.
The top was a tiny bit big but I expected that and waist was a little tight I had to roll up and pin the long legs

I rented this in a L because the M wasn't available. It was WAY too big on my frame. I'm usually a size 6 in street clothes, 8 in RTR brands, and the L was literally falling off of me. It's too bad, because the jumpsuit is adorable! The fabric is perfectly shimmery, the length was perfect on me, and the pockets were lovely. I will most definitely be renting again when the M is available!
Looked great in the pic, the fit was not great. Too big in the pants and butt area, and the chest was flattening.

links_Review_Title: the outfit made the evening perfect
links_Review_Text: This was adorable. The bust was a bit tight and the bottom half was a little big. But overall super comfortable and I received a ton of compliments.

links_Review_Title: I couldn't wear this as the large was too large for me
links_Review_Text: I typically fit a size 8 and this was too large for me - really needed a smaller size but it wasn't available due to the holidays. Less of a sequin look than I was hoping for too but is overall cute!
Loose on top, be best for large chested

I was unable to wear this - got it in two sizes, the XS and the S. For the record I am 5'5 about 118 lbs with a bigger chest. Around the hips and leg area was HUGE (think MC Hammer pants). I'm trying to think what body type this would work for - maybe curvier on the bottom? It's really cute so it's unfortunate the fit was so off.

links_Review_Title: Flattering! Great for any fancy occasion.
links_Review_Text: A little long for us shorties ( 5'4") but you can cuff under and it's fine :)
The length of the pants were prefect on me. The cut up top was a little risky you may want to plan on not wearing a bra because it will probably show.

links_Review_Title: Size down for this megawatt outfit!
links_Review_Text: Loved the shimmer and shine. Too bad it was saggy in the tummy and bottom. Will try a size 0 next time because this is sooo cute!

Such a cute and fun jumpsuit to wear! Very comfortable and received so many compliments. The fit is true to size. Better for mid to small chested ladies. There is a lot more shine to the fabric than what it looks like in the picture.

Cute dress, that's easy to wear and makes you feel very special! Loved the draping to adjust it to my waist (I size up but I think it wasn't necessary). Sooo it still worked out for me. Great for Christmas or dates.
This is a great dress for work because it's conservative, comfortable and very eye-catching. Got many compliments and would rent it again.
I love the pattern of this dress. Looked a tiny bit frumpy on my frame/shape, but not enough to keep me from rocking it.

Loved this dress!!! Hid my midsection perfectly well. I will say - if you have a larger chest (like me), it's not quite as flattering. But is anything? Wore twice - once with nude heels and another with white tennis shoes for a more casual look.

Sorry my pic is terrible but the colors are kind of 70s, in the best way possible. Like all Kate Spade this runs huge, but since it ties that doesnâ€™t really matter (and the tie is long enough to either wrap once to make a bow in the back or wrap another time to tie in the front, which is how I did it). I do wish it wasnâ€™t quite as long - Iâ€™m 5â€™6â€ and it was just about to my ankles. Itâ€™s really pretty though, and very flattering.

I enjoyed the pop or color and print but I felt the fit was a little frumpy. This is partly on my end because I wore the dress with the tie in the front and not the back (I didn't realize this until later in the day). It was comfortable and easy to throw on.

Fit my 14/16 bod in a very flattering way. Got tons of compliments and felt beautiful and unique. The tigers on the bottom are a wonderful detail. The wrap around part worked great - sometimes that makes me look bigger around the middle than I like but this worked out fine. Wore it to a dinner party and celebration at work - gave a welcome in it and was featured in it for a community article.

I absolutely loved this Kate Spade dress. I rented a larger size, since my size wasn't in stock. A bit big but still worked. Super comfortable to wear all day. Didn't need a special bra. It is very lightweight, wore in the winter and had plenty of room for warm tights and a warm liner shirt. Rent this dress if you love some color in your life.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous Kate Spade dress makes perfect winter work option
links_Review_Text: Love this dress, the colors and patterns were great, it was perfect and reliable Kate Spade sizing. Highly recommend

links_Review_Title: Loved it so much I bought it
links_Review_Text: I like this best tied in the front. Looks great with a navy fitted blazer.
This dress was on the Mannequin in the Prudential Kate spade for months - it felt good wearing it knowing I could send it back in a couple days. Nice material. Midi is good for a girl over 5'7

This is a beautiful dress with a bit of a retro feel due to it's cut. It is very long and full, which i loved but I would caution anyone who is petite to think about the proportions before they rent it. It was very comfortable for a day at the office but I would highly recommend it for many occasions.

links_Review_Title: Stand out from the sea of black
links_Review_Text: Love the uniqueness of this dress. The print is wonderful, the waist and top are interesting, the skirt is fun to have longer in the fall/winter, and the overall dress is super flattering. You could wear this dressed up or down. I went for a more classic work look with navy heels.

Great dress for work - especially if you're tall. This is probably best for spring or fall. I have navy tights but was hard-pressed to find the right shoes to wear with the the tights. It was definitely a little chilly for cold temps.
Absolutely love this dress! Wore it for a week straight!!! Super comfortable and flattering.

links_Review_Title: It's a gorgeous maxi if you're short!
links_Review_Text: The sleeves are dramatic without getting in the way. Lots of room up top and thru the hips, but true to size at the waist. Fearless colors and pattern. Great movement! I will def rent again.
This was cute for work but way too long. It was like a full-length dress on me at 5'1".

This is quite possibly my favorite rental to date! (And I have rented a TON through RTR Unlimited.) I crossed the ties in front and tied it in the back, which works splendidly. It is absolutely gorgeous and comfortable. So many random strangers have complimented it. It's a little fancy for work, but the whimsical print (love the jaguars) makes it less so. It would be appropriate for any number of occasions!

This dress was amazing. I got comments from every person who saw me at work. It fits perfectly. The cutout in the front is very understated and very few people noticed it. The length is great- I wore 3 inch sandals with it. Sleeves are great. I would say size up if you are big in the chest, so the hole doesn't gaps too much. It is so flattering. My husband loved it too!!

I couldn't wait to wear this dress. It's absolutely beautiful and fits really well. Super comfortable to wear. My only issue was a bit of extra fabric at the chest area, but my bust is pretty small - just something to keep in mind!

This dress fits to size and is comfortable. I tied my bow at the back which was kind of annoying when seated, but you can tie in the front so not a big deal. People loved the tiger print at the bottoms of the dress.
Feels a little bit like a nightgown. The wrap around sashes also make a weird shape at the chest but still got lots of complements.
This dress is very comfortable and true to size but it's sort of dowdy. It has a little house on the prairie meets Studio 57 kind of vibe. Love the pattern and colors.

Loved this dress! The fabric was thinner than I expected but such a great pattern and nice fit. The 6 wasn't available so I got the 8 and it was too big but I wore it anyway because the tie belt helped add shape. The cut out at the chest could cause some wardrobe malfunction though, if you go too small.

I tried a size larger because I have wider shoulders and a large chest based on other reviews. The larger size fit but I think I could've gone with my regular size. I LOVED this dress. It worked out fine with my mommy pooch and I got so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Look pregnant with my big boobs
links_Review_Text: It is a beautiful dress but made me look pregnant so I did not wear it:(
Size down at least one size. Compliments all day. The front tie part made the fabric bunch in a weird way on my chest, but I was the o my person who noticed.

I rented this to wear for work but felt it was too formal so sent it back without wearing it. It would be pretty for an occasion but not my style. I found the wrap tie awkward and the overall fit unflattering as it made me feel bulky. Plus the slit in the middle opens easily so you'd have to wear a cami underneath. This is great for a tall, slim person. The quality of the material is great and it doesn't wrinkle.

links_Review_Title: I cannot believe the reviews of full bust women do not mention the cutout where a camisole is needed
links_Review_Text: Lovely dress, but runs big everywhere but waist. Needs camisole if larger bust and wearing at work. Do not understand why it does not show in any of the review pictures.

Love this dress! Pattern and colors are amazing. The fabric is beautiful. Pleating derail is great. Was a little loose on mid section but there's a sash which helps with shape - I tied in the front based on other reviewers. So many compliments all day! Wanted to buy!

I thought this dress was a bit tacky. Fits true to size, but I took off a star for 1) Very thin crepe fabric, and not soft 2) Somewhat ill-fitting cut - a bit lumpy with too much material in places and 3) The button slit at the neckline which I didn't even notice on the model. The slit is almost too low to be appropriate for work, and the style of it is very off trend. The 70s print plus the tailoring of the dress was just not a good combo, in my opinion. Wouldn't rent again

The dress is a lovely fit. It was a tiny bit large on top for me (32c) but because it had a button at the top of the chest I could wear it without showing my bra. The colors are gorgeous and the fabric is very comfortable. Everyone at the party loved this dress.
Loves the print!
This dress fits comfortably and is so beautiful. I got compliments every time I wore it.
Fun colors and print as you'd expect from Kate Spade. The waist tie was flattering and the length was good for my tall frame.
Loved everything about this dress. Was flattering, fun, professional for a work conference, cut well for my 6' body. I would buy it if it was a bit less $$$. Will likely rent again.
The fit was large and flowing but was a bit overwhelming to wear. I might have been too short for the full length. However I got lots of compliments on the dress.
Perfect dress for a big meeting. Tons of compliments! Felt so feminine and loved the little panthers at the end of the dress! So cool and different! Also very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE - Wish I owned!
links_Review_Text: This dress is absolutely beautiful and special. I rented it for an important work event in the late fall and it was perfect. My day started at 4am and then after a 2 hour plane ride, 8 hours of meetings, and a full working dinner, it still looked great and was comfortable/polished the whole time! It is bold enough to be notable but the neckline, length and sleeves make it very refined when paired with a nice heel. I loved it so much I wore it again to an industry awards dinner where my team was being recognized - favorite thing I have ever rented from RTR!

I rented this to wear for a tv interview but since coronavirus cancelled everything I just wore it into the office instead. It's really chic and easy to wear (although the zipper is difficult doing alone for restrooms breaks). I had to put a blouse under since it's only about 45 degrees in Michigan today but it still works. Loving this rental even if it didn't get its 15 minutes of media fame! Thanks rent the runway for making us "essential employees" in healthcare still look and feel great!
Gorgeous material and fits like a glove! As others have said, the zipper is tough at first.
This is so so flattering I usually am a size 10 but I was able to wear this in an 8

links_Review_Title: Great fit for hiding the tummy
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit of this jumpsuit! Perfect for a rehearsal dinner. It was fitting without being too tight. It also fit my longish torso, so I didn't have a wedgy (it's a problem in some jumpsuits!) I really liked the peplum-esque waist to cover the tummy and really made my waist look smaller. Great color as well, very fitting for fall/winter in the south.
Easy to wear. A bit difficult to unzip from the back for bathroom breaks, as is usual for jumpsuits. Maybe not for long torso girls.

links_Review_Title: Loved. And it had pockets. Super comfortable fabric. I added the belt!
links_Review_Text: It was too tight for me on the chest but I made it work

links_Review_Title: It fit like a glove and was so forgiving in all the right areas!
links_Review_Text: Loved this jumpsuit! I wanted to buy it but it was a little pricey still since it is a new item. Material didn't wrinkle and everyone told me I looked fabulous.
Fits great on petite sizes. Plenty of room in busy and great waistline.

links_Review_Title: Great outfit. I sized up for height and turned out perfect!
links_Review_Text: Great color. Great fabric. Great jumper. Professional.
I had such a fun time wearing this statement outfit. I'm 5'9" and so was nervous it'd be too short but it fit perfectly. I wore small heals.
I really loved the look and style of this jumpsuit. Unfortunately I could even zip it. Runs at least a full size small.

links_Review_Title: It is a lovely outfit, just a touch too small across the back.
links_Review_Text: Nice material and nice style. Too tight across the back.

links_Review_Title: I felt like a MILLION bucks in this outfit! The color and style was gorgeous.
links_Review_Text: I normally wear a size 6 but had to go up a size because I am 5'6" and with a long torso - even going up a size, this jumpsuit was still short in the torso for me, I was extra careful when bending over or sitting down! Standing still, it was absolutely perfect and I might just have to rent it again....and be careful again about bending over and sitting down!!
This was stunning but size up.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous jumpsuit. The color is stunning.
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit ran small. After researching the company I found that most of their items run 1 - 2 sizes small. I am on the shorter side at 5'4 and have a very very short torso and the 6R was still small. The inseam is very short.
peplum is so flattering, great length for shorter legs

links_Review_Title: It was very comfortable to be in this all day.
links_Review_Text: Perfect color, form fitting, hugs your body in all the right places. Absolutely beautiful!

Would buy this if renting weren't my excuse to not by clothes! This is the second jumpsuit I've ever worn and it was incredibly flattering, fun, yet professional. I wore it with a blazer and flats. The zipper was tough to reach but they all are. Totally cute.
Wore to work, out with friends, a conference, etc. So flattering and versatile. No length issues even though I am 5'2".

It's okay -- not fabulous on me. PROS - figure flattering and hides any issues around the middle and it's a complete, versatile outfit -- just accessorize and go! Doesn't wrinkle and works for lots of occassions. CONS -- hard to zip the back by yourself and runs short through the bodice. Also, I'm 5'5" and the length is a little weird imo needs to be slightly longer or shorter for my size.

links_Review_Title: Fit like a glove, gave me so much confidence
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit makes you feel amazing. I'm 5'6 and when sitting the jumpsuit dug into my shoulders, so I think its probably not a great fit for anyone taller than 5'6.

Great fit but did have a little extra in the crotch but couldn't really tell. Like the style, it was a bit different. I did need assistance with the zipper so don't wear this outfit alone. Perfect length too for a 5'0" petite gal.
I"m usually a 4P, the 6R was still too small :)

links_Review_Title: very nice fit, thick material, very flattering and comfortable...pockets!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful color, cut, fabric. Perfect pant suit!

links_Review_Title: If you want to turn heads and don't mind being in pain this is the jumpsuit for you!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for my company Christmas party. Jumpsuit honestly looks great on & very figure flattering. That being said, it is very uncomfortable: armholes cutting in, front rise is too short (I am not tall), pant legs cling to my calf. Forget trying to bend over. It fits true to size in bodice and waist so I probably wouldn't size up but if I rented again it would be for a short event, not something to spend the day in & no dancing.
Best for someone shorter than 5'6". Standing was ok, but when I sat down, it pulled.
Fit perfectly and very flattering. I got a number of compliments and felt dressed up without having to be in a dress

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately I did not get a chance to wear it because it did not fit.
links_Review_Text: My bust is on the large size due to that I couldn't fit this outfit.
Legs too long for 5 foot 1

links_Review_Title: Loved it! And it has pockets!!
links_Review_Text: It fit great and was flattering in the chest area, it was a little tight under the boob area but wasnâ€™t awful. Loved that it had pockets!

A simple yet elegant dress - I felt gorgeous and received a ton of compliments. My one complaint is that the under-bust seam was a bit tight. I wore a bra because it was a work event and there is a chance it wouldn't have felt so tight if I didn't have the bra on. The pockets were a great addition.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress. My friend said I should buy it.
links_Review_Text: Length was ultra flattering and who doesnâ€™t love pockets?! It was a little lower cut than I expected and finding a bra that didnâ€™t peek out was tricky. But overall gorgeous! Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: I got tons of compliments on this dress.
links_Review_Text: I loved the dress, in fact if I could have bought it, I would have. I'd definitely wear it again. The top was pretty tight though, and the fabric was thick and heavy, which allowed me to wear nothing underneath it. Finding a bra to fit the cut would likely be tough.
Unbelievably gorgeous. Women stalked me in the bathroom just to ask where I got the dress. Didn't need to wear a bra as the top of the dress fully supported me. Also has deep pockets! I real winner.

I wore this to a Christmas time wedding and it was super flattering and fun to dance in. I'm normally a size 4 but had to size up from a small to a medium for the dress to fit on my chest. Took 1 star off for the dress still being somewhat constricting in the chest and having to use fashion tape for it to lay flat. Otherwise the empire waist is very nice and the shape is fun and different from your everyday LBD.
Rented both her xs and S and both were way too small in bust. Even small through arm. Was disappointed!
Nothing but great
Lovely dress that needs nothing more complex than a low-cut strapless bra. Very flattering and forgiving and great for a party.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, a little small in the chest
links_Review_Text: I love this dress, and definitely plan to rent again in the right size for a future wedding or event! It was just a bit too tight in the chest, so if you have a somewhat larger chest you may want to go up a size. I got this in Xs and I think a S would have been great (5'4, 125 lbs, 32D-DD). I think A and B cups, maybe C, would be fine with their normal size! The dress is very well made, nice thick material, and I loved the hem line.

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable, easy to accessorize, and loved the pockets!!
links_Review_Text: The dress was so comfortable to wear for an all-night cocktail party and I got tons of compliments. It's very flattering and my favorite part were the pockets! Highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: pin up chic and so dang fun.
links_Review_Text: slightly thicker than I expected, was going for more of a light sundress vibe- but honestly the material made it feel so much more elegant! would be perfect for a fall / winter wedding!
This dress was beautiful and perfect. It was super flattering on me. The only downside was that was bust was a little big for my chest, but it was nothing a little fashion tape couldn't fix!

This dress did not fit my bust well at all but I still got many compliments!! And it was generally very comfortable with stretchy fabric. If you want something super tight, go down a size - the dress runs a little big but I didn't mind that. Perfect for a beach wedding :)

I read the reviews before renting this dress that recommended sizing down. I am typically a 4 so I wore the 2 and I honestly could have even worn the 0. The material is verrryy stretchy so if you're wanting a fitted look, definitely size down 1-2 dress sizes. It's a beautiful dress and I received compliments on it all night; very comfortable but not a lot of support for the bust without a bra (I wore a sticky bra!)

I am so glad i listed to the other reviews and sized down. I ordered the 4 and 6 when my normal size is usually a 6-8. I probably could have fit the 2 but the 4 worked perfectly as well. My only con here is that the straps aren't adjustable. Nothing a few safety pins couldn't fix though! My petite friends don't be afraid to trent this it is such a cute length!
Fit great and stretchy material to accommodate for curves. Top is not tailored great, so some tape is required.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress! Lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Really loved the fit of this dress for a wedding. It runs a little large so I ended up wearing an 8 but generally wear a 10. The fit is lovely! My ONE complaint was that the boob area was suuuuper stretched out-even for my after pregnancy boobs (3 months post). Kept having to make sure I wasn't popping out all night.

links_Review_Title: I would love to buy this dress!! It was SO comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Other reviewers were definitely right with the fit of the dress being a bit larger. I figured I would risk a dress being a bit too big vs too small. Everyone commented on how much they loved this dress and honestly, so did I. There is something to be said about a dress when you just feel beautiful in it, despite the other parts of your ensemble not quite coming together. I would 100% recommend this dress to anyone for a summer or spring affair!
I received nonstop compliments on this dress! It ran a little large up top, had an issue with the straps staying put. Other than that, I was very happy!

I loved the fit of this dress! Yes, it runs extremely large so just be sure to size down at least two sizes. I'm usually a 6 and I wore a 2. Honestly could have fit into a 0 as the fabric is slightly stretchy. The straps were a little long but nothing that couldn't be fixed from sitting up straight which I supposed helped my slouching! I was a little nervous about the color at first as I didn't want it to be too white since I wore it to a wedding but the peach undercolor really stood out. I definitely received a lot of compliments! I don't have a super large chest so I wore a sticky bra. Bustier girls could probably go without.

The dress runs very big. I typically wear a 10-12 in dresses, but ordered a size 6 and 8 in this dress. I wore the size 6 dress because the top of the size 8 was way too big. The straps on the dress are a little long so they kept slipping throughout the night. The dress is not restrictive and I was able to dance without any issues.

I wore this to a cousin's outdoor wedding and it was a huge hit. The dress definitely runs large, so I'm glad I ordered a size down and may have even fit in 2 sizes down. The dress fits very comfortably. The only thing that was kind of a surprise was that as someone with a larger bust size, the dress is more low cut than I was anticipating. Would still definitely wear again though!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for summer garden wedding. Lots of compliments for this full figured girl.
links_Review_Text: Stretchy not clingy. Thick straps for W sizes. Good length for long torso, short legged ladies.

The dress was so comfy and so stretchy I definitely could have worn a size 12 but there was only one size left so I just chanced it. I got so so so many compliments and I felt comfortable all day. Highly recommend.

Overall fit was a bit big. It is a thicker dress which is nice for outdoor events that might be chilly. The top was very large on me and nothing to adjust the straps. I would recommend using boob tape to help keep everything in place

My favorite RTR yet! I wore it when I was 15 weeks pregnant, and the stretch and fit was perfect to accentuate my tiny bump. It was a hot NOLA wedding, and I couldn't have been more comfortable. Love the color, the fit, the comfort. It was perfect!!

links_Review_Title: Very cute style and nice quality!
links_Review_Text: This dress was near-perfect although I would warn bustier women to make sure you have a bra that would fit well. Perfection would've been if it had adjustable straps because the top does tend to be loose and if you get too padded of a bra it looks funny. Otherwise such a great dress!

This dress was beautiful and the fabric was so comfortable. It's a little bit thicker so on a hot summer day it will be warmer. It runs SOOO large. I'm usually a true 4 in dresses and after reading reviews I rented a 2 & a 0 and the 0 was still big and not very fitted. There was pretty loose fabric around my mid section.

Overall a great fit. Nice quality of fabric, thick enough to smooth you out but still breathable enough for hot weather. The cups are a little small, so it might not be suitable for larger chested people. The straps arenâ€™t adjustable.

links_Review_Title: Despite being nearly 100 degrees and on a rooftop this dress kept me cool and cute!
links_Review_Text: Loved the stretch in the material. Wish there was a bit more structure built into the chest area but overall loved this dress! Definitely size down I normally wear a 14 and the 14 was too big so ended up wearing the size 12.

To be honest, I wasn't very excited about this dress when I rented as it was last minute and when I initially tried it on it was loose and ran large all around and straps we a little long. However, when I wore it I think it worked out to my advantage it hung a little loose as I never had to pull or tug it (with the exception of making sure I sat up straight to keep the straps up). It really laid nicely and made me look tall and lean! Tons of compliments and the ruffles at the bottom gave it a romantic and classy look when I moved. Highly recommend and would rent again. Def size down. And for women with larger chest, I do agree with other reviews that it could be an issue but I'm a size A and got away with no bra but was a little nervous I would bend over and have a little exposure. But luckily no wardrobe malfunction!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color and pattern for a wedding.
links_Review_Text: Runs very large - per other reviews, I sized down to an 8 (normally 10-12), but could have easily worn a 6. Bust was very large (I am usually a C-D cup) but it had built-in wiring on the outside that was made for a smaller cup, so that part of the dress isn't great. But with the help of some double-sided tape, you can make it work. Non-adjustable straps did not bother me as much as it seemed to bother others. Received TONS of compliments!
This dress is very forgiving. You should absolutely size down. I am not busty and my bra tried to pop out a few times so watch out the girls

I wore this to a rehearsal dinner for a wedding and I loved it! I got so many compliments and several people asked me where I got it on social media. I am usually a size 14 and the size 12 was comfortable and flattering with a little room to breathe (I ordered a size down per the previous review suggestions). The material is stretchy. Definitely a great option for a formal event!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress, perfect for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: I read the reviews and sized down. I normally wear a 6, so ordered that and a 4. I could easily have worn a smaller size. It was hard not to have adjustable straps, especially since I have a large chest, but I made it work. The material is thicker, but very comfortable! I received tons of compliments on this. Loved wearing it even though it wasnâ€™t the most ideal fit. I am 5â€™8â€ for reference.
I didnâ€™t feel this dress was wedding appropriate. Also, the cups were too big for my chest.

This dress runs pretty large. I've been a size 8 as of lately (5'11" 160lbs 34DDD) and the 6 was too big at the waist for me. It's a comfortable and stretchy dress but I did not like the bust. It has the built in cup lining on the outside that would probably fit a size B or C cup at best, and looked ridiculous on my DDDs. Instead of wearing this to the party Friday night, I wore it to brunch on Sunday with a white cardigan over it to hide the weird looking bust. This would look better on someone with a box frame and small bust.

Usually I wear a size 6 or 8 depending on material. This dress was very soft and had a flattering shape. Based off all the reviews I ordered a 6 and a 4 and wound up wearing the 4 which was still a little loose on me. The straps are not adjustable so a smaller size probably would have been better for me strap wise as well. The color and design was perfect for a day time summer party! I would totally rent this dress again however would order a 4 and a 2 to feel more comfortable.
This dress runs very large. The top was huge on me and I had to wear a jacket otherwise I think my strapless bra would have shown. Maybe would be better for someone with a larger chest
The dress is very stretchy and comfortable to wear. Because of the stretch I couldâ€™ve went down the size and there a lot of gaps in the back. I would purchase this dress.

I loved this dress bc its obviously super cute, but it was surprisingly comfortable too. When i ordered it, I didnt expect the material to be as breathable and stretchy as it ended up being. It fit well overall and i got a lot of compliments, but the straps were a little long (i duck taped them and they were fine for the night)! Love this dress. FYI for sizing i ordered a 0 and a 2 as my back up thinking this might be too tight restricting, but i ended up wearing the 0 bc the material was so forgiving. Its like a thick stretchy cotton. Very comf!!

Loved this dress and received so many compliments on it! Was perfect for a June beach wedding & the perfect amount of formal. I followed the other reviews and got my usual size 6 & ordered 4 as the back up but ending up wearing the 4 and still having a good amount of room! It was a great fit for me, the material is SO comfortable and I felt like it breathed really well being outside. My only complaint is the same as the others in that you will definitely be pulling up the straps all night, but honestly it didnâ€™t bother me much.

links_Review_Title: How comfortable and confident I was in my dress.
links_Review_Text: Wow! This dress was perfect for my friends early summer wedding. I received so many compliments and best of all, I was super comfortable all day/night long. I think the fit is super flattering and I didnâ€™t notice the long length of the straps like some other renters have. Overall, so happy that I chose to rent this dress, would recommend!
So I loved the dress, but it definitely runs big. The top required a whole lot of double sided tape to keep it in place but it worked!

links_Review_Title: The dress is SO comfy! It is stretchy and soft.
links_Review_Text: Such a beautiful material!

This was my back up dress and I'm so happy I ordered it. It does fit large so I wish a 0 was available. I ended up having to wear the size 2 but i added a nude belt around the waist to cinch it tight. The straps are also way too long and I had to keep putting my dress up all night so my bra wouldn't show. Other than that I got so many compliments and my boyfriend kept telling me how beautiful I was. Size down!

links_Review_Title: Great for spring, runs very big
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a spring wedding. It was perfect for the fiesta theme, but it runs very big. I rented the two (usually go for a four) and I would have felt more comfortable sizing down again. It's also super low cut, so have a good strapless bra or be prepared not to wear one. The straps aren't adjustable either, so would occasionally slide off my shoulders. I gave this dress a four star rating because it was super cute and I did get a lot of compliments, but I struggled with the fit and inability to adjust the straps for my body.

It fit me perfect and was very form fitting and flattering. I am 5'4" with a 34DDD bust and a curvy waist-hip. I had plenty of room and could wear a normal bra with it. (I wore my hair down to cover up the straps) Everyone commented on how pretty the print was and how the bottom and overall fit was so unique and pretty. Only complaint is, the straps kept falling down and in certain lighting; in some pictures the white shows up more than the peach. White made me nervous to wear to a wedding as a guest! But it was absolutely gorgeous and just perfect for a spring wedding! Would rent again in a heartbeat.

Great dress for a wedding or cocktail party. It runs very large-- I sized down two sizes, and it was still a little big. The underwire cups don't provide any support, so a bra is necessary. Overall it was very comfortable, springy, and sexy!

This dress is super cute! I received many compliments and it was great to dance in the whole night. But the sizing of it is very big. The fabric is stretchy and the straps are very long. I normally wear a size 6, but sized down to a 4 based on reviews. I should have sized down again for a better fit. Still loved the dress regardless!
Wore it for a night out to dinner, but could be dressed up, definitely an expensive fabric'
A very fun top that I would imagine can be worn with a lot. It was great with black jeans. I would definitely wear this again!
Obsessed with this top! Great quality, adorable bow detail, & flattering fit. In only 5'3 with a short torso so the front could be a little cropped on some one taller. Will def rent again!
True to size- perfect for a night out!

links_Review_Title: Super cute and easy to wear. Looks great from day to night!

links_Review_Text: I wore this with a long cardigan for work, as-is for a date. So comfortable! Yes it's on the short side, but I am tall so it wasn't unexpected. Black tights and ankle boots completed the look. Got so many compliments!

Absolutely loved the print and colors on this dress. Very flattering cut, but I found it to be slightly loose on me, I think I could have gone with the 4. Loved the buttons on the one side of the chest and neck along with the draping detail at the waist.

This dress is amazing. The cut is super flattering. I'm 4'10" so it hit me just above the knees and was church appropriate. I did notice that after wearing it for a few hours and sitting in it, it did wrinkle very easily.
It was a little short on me, but I loved the fun print and it worked with tights for a rainy day!
I liked it and it's comfy but pretty basic. Fit true to size.

I wear a size 6, but I got the 8 because pp said it ran small. The 8 was a tad big, but there's no wiggle room, so I'd prefer a tad big to not being able to wear it. I got so many compliments on this dress. Pp at work, pp after work. Felt great, was thin/summer material. Wore it with leggings and boots, was fine.
This dress is gorgeous, fun, sexy and sassy .. fabric is very luxe. Such a fun dress with a bit of mystery. Fit perfect everywhere, length was on point. Love love love!!!
Slightly snug for a larger bust. Order up if you're too heavy. I felt like a bombshell in this dress.
This was a little short for my taste and planned to wheat it with tights and high boots. Worked great for a professional women's dinner.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a nicer dinner or event!
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress to a friends rehearsal dinner. It definitely fit TTS and looked great with or without tights. I was a little nervous about the ruching on the side and how it would look/photograph but it was totally fine!
I have and hour glass shape and this fit me perfectly
I got tons of compliments on this. Great work dress. I sized up to an 18 and it just fit!
Fit was very loose and comfy for the office all day!

Loved the flow of this fabric! Fitted but not tight, plenty of room in the arms which I some times find constricting in silk. I usually wear a 4, but size up in this brand to a 6 for comfort/lack of stretch.

I ordered this dress as a transition piece from winter to spring. This dress fit perfectly and i love the button detail on the chest as well as the slight ruching of the fabric at the waist. Got many compliments from co-workers and my husband. Great little dress!

I loveddd this dress!! It fit so perfectly, I have an hour-glass shape and it was super flattering - it fit in at the waist without being too tight. And I really loved the colors. I wore it to work, and loved it so much I wore it once more to my birthday dinner. I got so many compliments on it and it looked great in photos!
The print on this dress was pretty and an unexpected color way. I sized up to a 6 based on recommendations and what was available, but my normal 4 would have worked.
Not a good fit for my short torso....it was tight around my waste and too big in the shoulders and chest area.
Great fabric and detailing, but the style wasn't for me.
This dress is beautiful. It has a great material. It is very flattering and comfortable. My husband loved it!

links_Review_Title: The dress is super cute. The colors are very vibrant
links_Review_Text: I ordered a 14 and a back up 16. The 14 ended up being too big, kinda loose around the waste even though there is a gathering portion. The length hit right ant my knee and the sleeves fit perfectly with some wiggle room. I am on the heavy side 5'2' 200lbs and I believe the 12 would've fit perfectly.
This dress was lovely. It was perfect for thanksgiving bc it was loosely fitted of the belly area. I could eat to my heart's content!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress and lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: It was very comfortable. Could have sized down. Wore 6 and I usually wear 4. I did not have any issues with fabric wrinkling. Will plan to rent same dress in different pattern as well.
Fit is true to size. Cute print. Good for work with tights or for an event.
Got so many compliments on this dress!! Absolutely stunning!

links_Review_Title: Cute but not for the short-torsoed
links_Review_Text: Like all Tanya Taylor dresses, this was a lovely silk print and was well-made. It was a little big for me (I tend to be between a 14 and 16 in her clothes), and the waist hit me in the wrong place. Still wore it and enjoyed, though!
True to size
Cute, too loose to be sexy and the static cling was a problem that I couldn't solved.
Versatile, very cute, and comfortable. I love this dress have to wear again before I return it!

links_Review_Title: I loved this! The colors pop more than in the photo.
links_Review_Text: This one is a must-get for women with larger busts. It fits so well on the chest without looking like a tent on your body.

links_Review_Title: Very small, I normally wear an 18 and the 20 barely fit over my hips

links_Review_Text: They did not have my usual size of 12. I ordered the 14 and it was a little too big. Lovely fabric and great cut. I will rent again in a smaller size. Perfect for wedding, light weight fabric with vibrant accent colors.
cute dress, fit well. sleeves are super voluminous!

links_Review_Title: Wore this to work and then dinner and drinks, followed by an event
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove up top, flattering silhouette, particularly with the ruching across waist/chest. Ruching also helped mask any wrinkles that developed over the day. I received many compliments throughout the day and felt stylish, chic, and professional. Beautiful silk and unique pattern

links_Review_Title: Ran true to size, not small but it is short
links_Review_Text: I saw reviews that it ran small so got a 4 but it made it shapeless and too big in the chest and waist and somewhat the hip. Also, it's too short for work on a tall person. And a little too cutesy for work with the puff sleeve and button detail.

This dress is very interesting and elegant. I had hoped to wear this dress for a date night with my boyfriend, but it ultimately ended up being too baggy in the midsection and not sexy enough for a romantic night out given the fit, the high neck, and more conservative design. I normally wear a 22 in this brand, but I think I could have sized down a size for a more formfitting silhouette.

links_Review_Title: Pattern was cool and flattering. Not too short
links_Review_Text: Sleeves were a cool feature

Dress has great coverage with the sleeves and neckline and was lightweight enough for this weird in between end of Summer, beginning of Fall type weather. The fun flora print also plays well to this transition. Wore it during a high 60 degree day without a jacket and it was perfect
i got a size too big
This dress is not a good fit for a short, curvy girl. It would probably be better on someone long and lean.
Rented this dress for Easter, fit great and was SO comfortable!!! I might just have to buy it!

Loved the look of this dress and liked the fit (I'm an 8/10, and the 10 was form-fitting, so size up 1-2 sizes), but had two complaints: the buttons are a pain and there's no zipper, and the central slit was so high! I'm 5'9" and wouldn't recommend this dress for anyone my height or taller.

links_Review_Title: Perfect For a summer wedding. Very flowy and fun.
links_Review_Text: Thereâ€™s no zipper, so you have to undo a bunch of the buttons to get in and out. The bust runs a bit small if you are full chested (buttons pull apart in the middle) so I sized up to an 8 and it fit great.
Usually a 6 but I sized up to an 8. Really comfy dress, wished the waist cinched in a bit more!
Hugged you in the perfect places just right. Still appropriate for a wedding, very bright and cute
Rented this for a wedding on a lake. I got so many compliments. I love that you could adjust the straps, too. Would totally rent again!

Ah, this dress was amazing! Both my friends and fiancÃ© wanted me to buy it so that I could wear it again and again! This dress was so comfortable and I felt so good in it! I probably could have gotten away with wearing a size down but I felt like the dress still showed my figure in a flattering way!
