The only con was that the dress did wrinkle fairly easily, especially after sitting down for a prolonged period.
I wore this dress for a steamy (humid) summer wedding. I felt comfortable sitting and dancing in it. It's also the perfect dress for kitten heals (if you don't feel comfortable in high heels).
The buttons are a little tedious, but worth it :)

links_Review_Title: Very small on the bust and the straps were so flimsy - the strap broke while I was putting it on.

links_Review_Text: Definitely size up I got an 8 and it was fitted could have used a 10

links_Review_Title: This dress was comfortable and cute.
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for my engagement photos which were supposed to be casual. I loved the way it looked and how comfortable I felt. I am about 138 lbs, I usually wear a 4, sometimes a 6. The 6 was perfect and flattering. I got the 8 as a backup and it was too big. I've tried on Reformation's 4 before and found it uncomfortably snug. Warning, you HAVE to unbutton a fair amount of buttons every time you get in and out of the dress. The buttons are not easy and are pretty annoying.
This dress is adorable on! Form fitting yet comfortable. My only con would be that the buttons take forever to put on and off, but it's worth it!

links_Review_Title: Loved it and so did everyone else
links_Review_Text: light but fancy

So this dress is lovely, and less 'clingy' around the mid-section than many Ref dresses. However - there is no zip. Plan to spend a long time doing up all the little buttons... and undoing all the little buttons... If this dress had a zip it would be a total winner. I wore it to a picnic date and it was easy to sit and move around in :)
I vary from a size 6-8 depending on style but I couldn't even button this. Definitely size up for a comfortable fit.

This dress fit perfect. I was a little worried when there was only a 2R available since I typically wear a 0 in reformation but it fit like a glove! I am a 34C, 26 waist and weigh 125. There was not a lot of room in the bust area so I suggest sizing up to make room for the girls!
The buttons are a nightmare. It needs a zipper.

links_Review_Title: Pretty everyday dress but the buttons!
links_Review_Text: This is cute sundress but it's not easy to get on - takes a lot of patience to button. If you're busty, size up!
Rent with Caution if you have a larger bust. I have rented and own reformation size 8 dresses and have had little issues with size. This dress is very much made to size up.

links_Review_Title: If you have boobs, or hips/booty, size up!
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately, although I usually wear a size 8, this particular size 8 dress did not fit me at all. Particular around my boob area (36C) and around my hips. I loved the way it looked on the model and perhaps I'll size up the next time I get it. Was bummed out because I had plans to wear it out :(
I sized up from a small to a medium because the photos looked fitted and the medium was perfect! Like another renter mentioned, very low maintenance. Loved it!

I love the color of this dress, but I wish it had a zipper! The buttons are tedious. Beautiful day time dress/could be worn to a casual wedding. I'm usually a XS in Reformation, but the 4 fit my recent post baby body perfectly. Best worn without a bra or you'd need a strapless due to spaghetti straps.
Loved this romper and the fit was great. Since it was cold paired with tights and boots. Easy classic look that didn't require much effort.
Actually a romper which makes it super comfortable and easy. So chic and cool. I'm small up top so had to use some tape but not bad at all

I wore this outfit for a fun night out with my spouse's business partners but wasn't sure what to expect. I'm so glad I wore this over the dress I brought - I felt professional yet could party all night in this! Pairs great with high heels! A bit of a pain to remove when you have to go to the bathroom (as with most rompers) - zipper, buttons, etc. The front has a deep cut, may need a lace detail underneath or tape to secure. I'd definitely rent this again though.

links_Review_Title: Perfect oversized blazer look for my bday!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'1" and around 130 lbs and everything fit perfectly! The sleeves were even the right length although I rolled them up as I felt it was a little too boxy on my small frame with them rolled down. It was exactly what I was looking for: a versatile outfit for a fancy dinner, cocktails and dancing. Only con was it required a LOT of body tape to keep the V from not revealing too much (probably would be fine if you had a longer torso) and there were a LOT of steps to take it off to have to go to the bathroom. All worth it for the look though!

This is a great option for a party, it is sexy but you are still fully covered. It fit great and the cut is forgiving. It is very low cut so be prepared to have tape or I used a bra that I didn't mind if people saw slight glimpses of, I considered it part of the outfit. The icing on the cake is I paired it with Kenneth Jay Lane-Gold Leaf Necklace from RTR and it is a total show stopper together.
Fit just right. I loved the idea of a suit but with the option to show lots of leg in a classy way.
So many compliments all night. It's a hot item! And very flattering.
Loved this, got a medium for an oversized blazer look and had to safety pin the front. The 4 would have been a true fit. Very well made and would consider buying. Such a versatile piece.

I wore it to Miami for a little shopping day and got many compliments on it! I was able to make it casual with sneakers and then switched into heels for dinner. I almost didn't end up wearing it. It fit a little big/blousy. The arms ran long as well so I rolled the sleeves. If it fit better I would buy it in a heartbeat but overall I'm glad I was able to enjoy a lovely day in it!
Wore with lug boots but I can see it looking sexy with heels

I rented this romper for my birthday celebration and felt amazing in it. I have an athletic build so if you have broad shoulders this works well for that body type. I went bra less and used fashion tape to secure the girls in. This outfit also hides a food baby well! I highly recommend.
Was not flattering. Fit large throughout.

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable, I received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: It felt a little bit short on the bottom because of my height, but it still felt comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Only option but made it work
links_Review_Text: This is a modern take on the men's dinner jacket look. Glad it was a jumper instead of a dress. Only could order a large but I made it work. Definitely a great piece to wear at an alumni ceremony.

Loved the fit of this romper. Usually can't pull them off, but this one fit amazing. I didn't wear a bra with it bc I didn't have one that was low enough. Would have been fine but went to dinner with a friend's parent and then became very self-conscious about not "slipping." But once we got to the party, it was go go go! Would rent if not buy!

links_Review_Title: Perfect except for one minor detail!
links_Review_Text: This fit beautifully - it wasn't too tight in the arms (so good for dancing), was forgiving in some areas I'm not as confident about, and was the perfect length (not too short). The only detail that I didn't love was that it seemed to be missing a snap in the front. I will wear anything low-cut, but I had to pin this because it was literally coming open to the point where you could see my entire chest without the pin. Maybe mine just had a missing snap, though!

links_Review_Title: The perfect mix between classy and edgy!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a company holiday party and it stood out amongst the typical party attire. Since I rented an XL and I'm 5'2, it was pretty low cut but I was able to use a safety pin to close up any gaps. The sleeves were also really long but that was remedied with fabric tape. You might have to pull the romper down every now and then if you have a long torso, but it fit great and hit any problem areas. I would definitely rent again and try a different size.
I got a 6, which was available, and it fit a little snugly. I would've preferred a size 8. I still felt great in this piece. Wore this to my work's Christmas party.

At 5'7"+, I'm definitely at peak height for this outfit (at least in XS). I have a typical torso length and long arms, but the sleeves were a perfect length when usually they're too short in this size. The interior button plus the three exterior buttons and zipper keep the piece right in place. The shorts are nice and short, yet long enough that the lining in stockings didn't peek out. I wore this to three separate late-night events and had eyes on the outfit.
loved it was cute, sexy and comfy.

I am a size 10 and rented the XL (10-12) as I have an hourglass figure and didn't want the item to be too tight in the hips. The item was just big overall. I couldn't wear the item. I would consider trying the L (8-10) size. I also wanted to note that the fabric is a lighter weight than I typically would have expected from an RTR designer product (although it does have a lower retail price).

This romper is IMPOSSIBLE to get on. I couldn't get the buttons out of their holes, so I didn't even get a chance to try it on. I have no idea if it's true to size or how it fits or anything. Literally the only reason I'm giving it 2 stars is because it's really cute and I really wish I could have at least tried it. Not even my boyfriend could get the buttons out of the holes. Super disappointed.
I wore the Large but definitely should have got a Medium (my normal size, but was not available). Still looked great and was really comfortable. Has pockets, which is always a bonus!
I'm usually between an XS and a S. The small was perfect. Runs a bit large
I wore this a few different ways. It was easy to dress up and down. Will def rent again for the holidays.

Dress it up or down. Who knew sequins could be so versatile. I wear a 6 in skirts dresses usually and had plenty of room in the small. Actually could have had a smaller Waist so I could wear it higher. It's long! I'm 5'10" and it went well past my knees. Fun to wear and super cute. Loved it.
I sized down so that it would give me more shape and I'm glad I did. I wore this thing like 4 days in a row but completely different each time.
Such a fun versatile piece for Day or night! I've had it for a few weeks and plan to keep it one more. Runs tts and is so comfortable.
Rented for everyday and got tons of compliments. It's a good 'elevating piece'. I sized down, which I would recommend
Perfect for a rehearsal dinner in casual coastal California. Lots of compliments for dressing sequins down!
Runs large & long so size down. Great skirt & surprisingly soft for sequins. Would rent again but smaller size.
Wore to a show in Vegas- easy to dress up or down. Comfortable. Loved the length.
Comfortable and flattering pencil skirt. Easy to walk in and can be dressed up or dressed down.

Fun skirt, great for a weekend in CA wine country. Comfortable and received several compliments. Stretchy and kept its shape all day. Recommend for something a bit blingy fun. I tempered it with a black top, leather purse and black adidas. Great!
The skirt fit in size, however I am only 5'4 and it was way too long to wear. It hit very low, low to mid- calf. I think it might be better for someone with longer legs or if you like longer skirts.

links_Review_Title: I wasn't able to wear it. Too big.
links_Review_Text: I am 5'9" and weigh 155lb. Based on sizing guidelines I went with a L instead of a M. It was WAY too big. About 3 extra inches of room in the waist and hung to mid calf in an unflattering non pencil cut length. I usually wear an 8 in dresses and a 10 in pants. So, just know to order a M if you wear an 8 usually or even a 10.
Made me look three sizes larger- cute to look at though
Next time I'll get the S so it can sit higher up on my waist with a tucked in shirt. The M was a little looser (aka lower) than I would have preferred.

I wore this skirt to a party I was cohosting so I knew I wanted something holiday-ish and cute, but still comfortable. So I did this skirt with holiday sweater and sneakers, it was cute but not as cute as pictures because I'm shorter. It did work and I received compliments. I kept skirt to wear it again to Church service when I have to greet people thought it will be quite festive.

links_Review_Title: Stylish but tiny and no give
links_Review_Text: Pretty sequin skirt and super versatile, but the side zipper is very short and I couldn't get it over my hips (in a small, and I am usually 4-6). No stretch. So I couldn't wear it at all...
I love this skirt! For reference, this is the â€œMartaâ€ style. I tried on the â€œPaulaâ€ which is a straighter cut and I didnâ€™t like it at all. I might purchase this skirt!

links_Review_Title: The waist is huge. I could have worn it as a dress if I wanted.
links_Review_Text: This does not work for an hourglass body type. You should have an equal hip to waist ratio to wear this because it is cut in the shape of a tube with no tailoring to a woman's body.
Cute fabric but so long! Hit below-calf on me (5"5'). Looked awkward so I sent it back unworn.

links_Review_Title: Looks great dressed up & dressed down! Flattering fit with great sparkle!
links_Review_Text: Very flattering fit! Looks great dressed up and dressed down. Wore well with flats. Surprisingly nice length (I'm 5' 6"). Perfect for work evening receptions. Almost bought it!
It was a little long, I wish it hit right above the knee. This went just under my knees

links_Review_Title: It is unique and I received many compliments.
links_Review_Text: It fit true to size. It is an elegant length.

I rented this skirt with an after work charity dinner in mind. Great quality, nice sequin work, soft and not scratchy. I opted for size 4 but it was rather big in the waist and hip, definitely size down. I liked this skirt and the only reason I decided not to try it in a smaller size was that it was an awkward length for me -it hit me in the most unflattering point between my knee and mid calf (I'm 5"10). I may give it a go again when I have more time to find an outfit for an event :-)

links_Review_Title: Way too long for a petite frame
links_Review_Text: Didn't end up wearing as the pencil skirt fit hit at the ankle and it looked bad. But the material was fun and if I was 5'8" or taller this would have been a great item.

I like this skirt, but it definitely doesn't look quite as cool on me as it does on the model. It runs bigger and as such is a little too long on me. It doesn't stop right below my knees, more like mid-calf. I'm not short either at 5'6". I typically wear a 4 in most brands and a 6 in a few like Reformation and HVN.
DVF prints are always beautiful and this top has two of them! Paired with black skinny jeans but I looked great with a black high waisted midi skirt too.
Although the coloring is odd - I loved this flirty dress
This dress does run small and is short (I'm 5'3"). Overall I loved it and the straps are adjustable ties which always helps. Would definitely rent again!
Like all the reviews were saying, this dress is teeny tiny and so so short. Would not be appropriate anywhere except the beach!
I wanted it to fit looser so I sized up

links_Review_Title: Such a cute and fun dress! Perfect for vacation and summer!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress! The color and details on the print were amazing. It was the perfect flirty, fun, dress for a nice dinner on vacation. It runs very small! I usually wear a 0/00 and the 2 was tight and VERY SHORT (I'm 5'6'') - however, I love a short dress so this didn't bother me. I added length by adjusting the straps. I did have issues with the straps slipping off my shoulder.

I love Reformation but their dresses are not always ideal for the petite. This dress worked! I normally wear between 2 and 4 but went with 6 for this dress and it was perfect! It also helped that the shoulder straps are adjustable/self tie.
This dress fits amazing but it's very short so just keep be aware if you're tall! It fits like all reformation dresses (go one size up)
A little snug in the top area but fits great and looked great!

Reformation can do no wrong in my opinion. I was lucky to snag this dress as a new arrival for a trip to Mexico. The fun print and feminine detail were perfection. Fair warning, this dress is short. I normally would have paired it with wedges, but opted for flats. Have fun with this one!

links_Review_Title: Cute print. Runs two sizes small.
links_Review_Text: Wrinkles VERY easily. Would not rent again. Super short. I'm usually a size 4 and the 6 was too small in the stomach.

links_Review_Title: Love the Reformation. I'm 135lbs, 5'6, 34D. Usually wear a 4-6. Rented a 6 in this dress
links_Review_Text: Shoulder tie straps were the best feature on this dress.

links_Review_Title: Super cute & fun but also super short.
links_Review_Text: I know all the reviews say the dress is short but I was not prepare for how short it actually is. When I first tried it on, I almost didn't wear it because I felt uncomfortable with the length. But I decided the heck with it I paid for the rental so I'm going to wear it! I ended up feeling good in it & I'm glad I wore it. Also, I wore a 4 in another Reformation dress I rented (the butterfly dress) but the 4 in this dress looked like it was for a small child - very grateful for the back-up size.
Definitely runs small and is VERY short. If you can get over that, the dress is extremely flattering and cute. One of my favorite rentals!

links_Review_Title: Fun print, but be ready to show skin!
links_Review_Text: As far as waist goes, the dress fit great. However, I have a full chest and there was a lot of cleavage. I'm also taller than average at 5'9" and the dress was SHORT. It wasn't completely inappropriate, so I did wear it, but it was a lot more va-va-voom than what I was going for. The adjustable straps allowed me to lengthen the dress a bit, which was nice, but there wasn't much I could do. The print is super fun, and for a quick dinner it wasn't too bad.
Loved it. I've worn it several times and got many compliments. As others mentioned it's short and a bit smaller but I sized up and it fit perfect. It's a perfect summer / vacation dress.
loved this dress but it ran very small! I am 5'0 and petite but athletic shaped and wore an 8 and probably could have sized up to a 10.

Was super excited about this dress because of its fun shape and pattern! Went with the bigger size I ordered which is normal because I am between a 4-6. HOWEVER!! THE BOOBS WERE SO SMALL!!!! There are little lines like cups on the dress for your boobs and I swear mine were only halfway down my boob like the line was hitting my nip when it was supposed to be under. Also if you want padding there is none. If you're zoomed out in pics you can't tell but omg if you zoom in I look super silly. I wore it anyway cause I loved the dress so much and was on vacation, but seriously some bigger boob cups would have been nice. So beware!!
Love that the straps are adjustable. This one is short so it's good for petite ladies. I was pleasantly surprised that it skimmed over my hips and stomach nicely.
Ended up wearing this dress twice in the same weekend I loved it so much. Definitely on the short side, so wore with flats (sneakers). Perfect for a hot day or night.
This dress was so cute for a little night out on the town! It is a little short but it worked out perfect ! Loved it

links_Review_Title: love this dress, wanted to keep it
links_Review_Text: loved this dress so much! the only downside is it was very short. i'm 5'1 with 32D and 107lbs. i tried on size 0 and size 2 and they were almost identical in size and length. i didn't need a bra with it either. i rented to wear it to my boyfriend's graduation but decided against it because of the length, so i wore it to a party the night before instead. it's tight and snug but thin and light material. i got lots of compliments! only downside was super short, even on a small person. loved it!

Wow, this dress made me feel so good about my body! It was the perfect summer dress, and transitioned easily from day to night. I rented the XS, which was true to size for reformation. It is definitely a short dress, so taller women may have an issue. I wore it without a bra and felt it was perfect for my 34A chest, but it would not likely work for curvy women. Overall, highly recommend!
Worn to concert. Adorable and girly, a tad short! Not fit just make.
Super cute dress, tie straps and elastic back make this dress super comfortable. Great spring print perfect for an afternoon date at the horse races.

links_Review_Title: OMG this dress is literally THE perfect sundress. I want to keep it. I would wear it everyday if I c
links_Review_Text: Fit runs slightly small in the top area. The dress has like a cup detailing on the front that your boobs are supposed to fit into, but as a 32-D, that did not work out for me. It still fit fine, but if you looked closely you could tell that my bust was not the same shape as the detailing. However, I would not have sized up, since it skimmed my curves amazingly, and doing so would have left the dress too loose, and too long for my liking. I got compliments all day with this dress, and it was a perfect day party look.

I love every red dress. They're always cute and femme. I ended up wearing this in a freak warm day in NYC for drinks with a friend with a leather jacket. Can't wait until it warms up to wear it again. I'm usually a size 0 in dresses on RTR but I'd recommend sizing up one size. Anything tighter than a 2 wouldn't have fit!

I loved this dress - the straps are adjustable (they tie so you can tie at any length). The material is lightweight and fit is great. It is definitely on the smaller/shorter/tighter end but I loved it and it was great for everyday and also for work. Got a zillion compliments on it.

links_Review_Title: cute color and print, but too short
links_Review_Text: Super short for women with long legs, did not wear it.

links_Review_Title: Not for ladies with C's D's and beyond
links_Review_Text: Material is pretty but breast cup is too small to cover the bust area. (I wear a 32D) The strings also keeps faling off my shoulders.

I had been coveting this dress for a while and finally had the perfect occasion. As always, I read through all the reviews and sized up from 0 to 2 based on others' suggestions (there were no backup sizes available). For reference, I'm 5'5", 34"-26"-36", normally wear a size 0. The dress wouldn't even zip and barely covered my bum. I sent it back without wearing it and found something else last minute. Definitely size up at least two sizes, especially if you have any curves. The dress itself was pretty, the fabric was thinner than I expected.
Super small for me, but I have hips. Cute, so may order again in 2nd size up

links_Review_Title: Way too short even for short girls
links_Review_Text: I saw other reviews saying this dress is a bit short, but I figured it would be fine since I'm only 5'5 and don't mind short skirts and dresses. Big mistake! Huge! This is a glorified tank top. It didn't even cover my whole butt. And I was already wearing it so low that a nip slip would've been imminent. Could not wear this in public.

Beautiful print and fit, aside from the length. I'm 5'7", usually a size 6 and sized up to an 8 since Reformation tends to run small. While it fit and was flattering in general, my butt literally would've been exposed with a slight breeze had I worn it, so sadly I had to skip it. For what it's worth, I do have a butt, but I don't have a problem with most dresses.
I ordered 2 sizes up and it was still way too short!
normally wear a 4 dress size, wore the 8 in this dress. I am 5'9" and it was shorter but I got away with it. love the print.
This dress is SO short. If you have any sort of butt I would not recommend renting. I sized up and it was still unwearable.
Was way too short / tight for me. Couldn't even get it above my hips. When I pulled it out of the bag I thought it had shrunk!!

i absolutely loved this dress. it's so flattering! it's kinda small in the boobs but i just loosened the ties and it was fine. love love , totally considering buying it. I normally wear a size 6 and i got a size 10 (that one hurt, lol), and it fit perfectly.
TOO SHORT!

Size up! I could hardly zip this up, and the size 4 did not want to stay on my 34C chest. I'm 5'2 but have broad(ish) shoulders and hips. The material is beautiful, wanted to love this, but it was very short and tight on me. Didn't wear.

links_Review_Title: Good for petite, tight top half
links_Review_Text: Good material, not too long for my height it was a bit above the ankles. The elastic neckline was tight and I wore as regular collar instead of off the shoulders. The chest and torso was borderline tight for me so might be too tight for those with bigger chest. Fun sleeves for work from home.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for tropical vacation photo shoot!
links_Review_Text: Loved how this dress fit. The lining on the chest and skirt kept it modest. The length was flirty and fun. The tighter band around my waist made me look smaller. I am so glad I re-read the description and saw the part about the side zipper - I was *this close* to sending it back! If I had any other occasion to wear this dress, I'd buy it. But that's the beauty of RTR - I could just borrow it!

Wore this for my bachelorette (obviously :)) and loved it! Definitely on the short side for my height but great for a party. Thick material was super flattering and I loved the waist detail. Could have worn a 6 but was happy for a little extra room.

I absolutely loved this dress! It was sooo cute. Not see through at all, and fit so well! It was a little short but obviously I'm super tall so most dresses are like that. It hit perfectly on the chest, the sleeves weren't awkwardly poofy and got so many compliments.
Can't say enough good things about this dress.
This is my back up dress, thank goodness this dress arrives earlier. I wore for my bridal shower, I wish I have more time to get another dress even though this dress is OK.

Loved the dress. At 5'10 with a large chest, it didn't quite hit my at my waste. Could have worked better if I was shorter or had a smaller chest. Did enjoy wearing it regardless. Got lots of compliments.
Nice
Fit beautifully. Good for small bust. Short but not too short (5"8)
This dress is the PERFECT summer dress. It is not too short and not too long. It has a very nice eyelet fabric. It fit true to size. I can't wait to rent this one again.
Great length for someone taller! Fit very nicely and was flattering!

links_Review_Title: LOVE this dress. Held onto it for about 3 months because I couldn't let go of it. Considered buying.
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove. Warning if you're a D cup size, you may not be able to wear a bra without popping a button off.

I wore this dress for our wedding rehearsal and rehearsal dinner, and I really loved it! This was actually my backup dress, but I ended up loving it even more than the dress I intended to wear. I ordered a size too large, and I think the 10 would have fit better, but that's on me for ordering the wrong size. I was worried that it would be too short to feel appropriate in a church, but the length was perfect. The sleeves and so cool and very on-trend right now. Highly recommend this dress for fellow brides!
LOVED THIS DRESS it was so comfy and it was light and airy which was perfect for the summer heat. got so many compliments
Perfect dress for rooftop birthday drinks. I felt so pretty in it. Fits true size.

links_Review_Title: This is for my graduation, I need a white dress to go under my white gown.
links_Review_Text: It is so pretty! It fits me very well, and it is a great length!

links_Review_Title: I looked like a little girl playing dress-up
links_Review_Text: Pro: the lightweight fabric was cute and the waist was REALLY flattering Con: the bottom was horrible! Flared out as if I was wearing a jumbo diaper and SHORT. It looked like I was wearing a child's dress as a shirt or something ridiculous.

Was perfect for an island vacation. Felt dressed up without feeling overdressed. Could be dressier with shoes and accessories. Eyelet material is beautiful. The girls were not compromised though it showed just a bit of cleavage.

This dress was so flattering and comfortable! The neckline is lower than I thought it would be but I still liked it. If you don't like showing cleavage this is not the dress for you! I received a lot of compliments. I usually wear a 6 and the 8 fit perfectly!
Good overall fit. Material is not great. Fits a bit stiff. Great day/Summer dress.
Really cute and comfortable summer dress but it is a little short and hard to wear if it's super hot out because of the longer sleeves. Got lots of compliments. Prettier in person.
Really pretty dress with a nice fit. It flares out a bit more than expected for a rather young look, but I didn't mind that.

links_Review_Title: The front bottoms are impossible. Took me 10 min to undo one.... gave up. did not wear
links_Review_Text: did not wear
Big billowy sleeves, eyelet holes make it necessary to wear a skin tone bra and underwear

links_Review_Title: I'm wearing this for graduation next weekend. It's perfect!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly. A bit low-cut (for my mom's taste) but I'm gonna make it work.
Pretty but it was a little too long and the sleeves a little too poofy for my liking. The torso was flattering tho but still wore something else.
The perfect LWD. Will likely wear for Mother's Day and for a Friday night picnic!
Really great looking dress and well lined. It does have a deep V neck but the length of the dress offsets it. I probably should have gotten my usual size.

links_Review_Title: perfect for a sunny weekend, super comfy.
links_Review_Text: AMAZING dress. I wore it for my bachelorette party and felt so comfortable all day. I even had strangers come up to compliment me on the dress!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful wedding with family in wine country.
links_Review_Text: Runs small!!!!!!! I'm usually an 8 in jeans, L in tops, sometimes M. Dresses 10-12 (for the girls) 8-10 if chest didn't matter... Regardless, LOVED the dress; classic, comfy, feminine, fun. You don't have to worry about the length either!

This dress is so beautiful and fun. The polka dots are so cute and it's actually a pink dress! Runs smallish, I may try the 6 next time though since the waist and tummy area was a little roomy. But so so flattering and fun.

links_Review_Title: So hard to send this dress back!
links_Review_Text: This dress is everything. The colors, the fabric, the shape, the quality, everything! So well made and unique. I felt like a million bucks in this dress, I didn't want to send it back!
The most compliments and the most comfortable. This strapless dress actually stays up! The front has great structure inside for your chest and to keep everything up. I couldn't recommend this more!
This dress was perfection. I agree with other reviews - size up. I am normally a 6, rented a 6 and an 8 and the 8 was much more flattering!

I'm super curvy and this dress just fit in all the right places. It's very fitted and I received so many compliments! I'm a professional event planner & wore to a wedding showcase for my business. Super fun & flirty

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous, but didn't get to wear due to tight fit. Very flirty, great quality.
links_Review_Text: Runs small. You'll see how hard it was to zip in back, but the fit was fine elsewhere and I do worry it may have been too baggy/bunched in the waist if I sized up, as it was already a bit bunched. Maybe not an issue for those who are not petite.
This dress fit like a glove. I received so many compliments. No need for bra either. I would definitely rent this dress again. Wish I could've kept it.

links_Review_Title: I love this dress. So so so much. I wanna buy it haha!
links_Review_Text: Where do I start with this dress. I absolutely love everything about this dress, it fit me better than my wedding dress did and I paid $800 in alterations for that dress. There is a corset in the top part of the dress that holds you in perfectly and accentuated what little waist I have. The asymmetrical hem was beyond cute, flirty, and fun. The flounce at the top and the sweetheart neckline was so flattering on me. It runs small so I sized up and it fit like a custom dress. I loved it.
So much fun to wear!! Fits like a glove, although I did use my larger size. The top is secure and material super comfortable. Looks and feels incredible.

I rented this for a destination wedding in Mexico. It was perfect- fit great, comfortable and definitely stood out. I received compliments all night and everyone asked where I got the dress. PERFECTION!

links_Review_Title: A nice change from the typical wedding guest LBD!
links_Review_Text: Dress is unique and fun! Definitely size up one size, runs small in the bust. Love this dress...would wear again!

links_Review_Title: Amazing formal dress, fun and flirty
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a wedding in the Bahamas. This dress is good quality, thick fabric. It has boning and corset built into it which really holds you in. It was a little tight around the tummy area so I still wore a shaper under. I got so many compliments on this dress

Runs SUPER small. I had to wear spanx to get the zipper up and the inner corset wires were still digging into my gut. BUT I felt like the bell of the ball in this dress!!! Only wish I had a better photo!!!

links_Review_Title: Endless compliments, felt bad for the bride
links_Review_Text: Great material for a Florida wedding in the fall. Which really means thunderstorms, 85/90 degree weather and outdoor weddings. Fit was amazing and the compliments I received were endless.

My favorite Rental yet, it has some boning built in around the bust so it will really push your girls up, very tight around the chest but not uncomfortable. Kind of like a mini corset built in. Lovely drape of the fabric and very formfitting. Very sexy!

I sized up with this dress due to reviews and I definitely could have gone down a size as the bust was slightly large and I have 38 G's but with a little creativity I was able to make it work. I felt like a million bucks in this dress and I got compliments all night!! One of my favorite rentals for sure. Love it!

I am usually a 2 in dresses but sized up to the 4R for this dress and it fit perfectly. I wore this to a cocktail style wedding and it worked great. It has great structure around the upper rib and chest area which increases confidence in dancing that it won't give any wardrobe malfunctions. I wanted to take a picture showing this fun little pop of leg the dress gives. It's subtle but fun.

Loved this dress! Super flattering cut, and the boning created a nice waist line. The fabric was thick enough to not need spanx and even wear a black bra under without it showing through. Got lots of compliments, highly recommend. I usually wear a 4 but the 6 was perfect for this one.

links_Review_Title: It got the dance stamp of approval!
links_Review_Text: The material was stretchy enough to move around in all night and the top stayed up. Loved wearing it and especially the ruffles!

I ordered a 16 but it was too small so luckily I had read that ahead and ordered an 18 also. It fit perfectly! This dress is so cute and was fun to accessorize! It moves wonderfully while dancing and keeps you secure. I got so many compliments! #wedding #curvy

Beautiful dress, amazing quality! Thick material and form fitting. It has a corset at the top which helps hold everything together / didn't need to wear a bra. Love the way it falls and fits. Got tons of compliments. Definitely my favorite dress I've ever rented I wish I could've kept it!!

links_Review_Title: Great dress, perfect for showing off on the dance floor!
links_Review_Text: Great fit and nice shape. Thick material, so good coverage. Fits well for a short, petite frame!

I received endless compliments from everyone all night long, especially from my husband. This dress shows off all your assets. It has a built in bodice, which holds everything in nicely. The dress is feminine and flirty and has a unique shape, which I loved. I paired with a statement necklace. Can't say enough about the dress!

I opted for a 6 and an 8. The 8 was probably a better fit for me except the length. I chose to wear the 6 (with shapewear) bc the 8 bunches too much in the belly. I'm 5'5" and the 8 probably would've been my size if I were 5'8" or taller. My main issue with this dress was trying to wear it with shapewear. I must have gone to the Ladies 6 times in 4 hours to hike the dress up, twist it and pull it back down. It just kept migrating. The zipper is down the back but after 15-20 minutes (not just while dancing), it was on my hip. It wouldn't stay put. The dress is gorgeous, and I truly loved it and felt special, but it wouldn't stay put. Maybe the 8 would've done better, but it was too long in the torso and would've bunched so much that I was self conscious in that way.

links_Review_Title: Stunning glam dress, stand out design with a summer vibe!
links_Review_Text: The dress is gorgeous, it moves beautifully when you dance. I felt amazing in it and received a lot of compliments. However be aware that it has a corset top which squishes your breasts. I am 32 B and had to wear a strapless bra to not look completely flat. It did feel a bit tight in the chest. If you have size C and higher, order a size up.

links_Review_Title: Fun and sassy - just what I was looking for!
links_Review_Text: The ruffles, cut and fit of this dress is fun and sexy. It's perfect for dancing and you'll get a ton of compliments. It does run small, so order up. It has a bodice that holds it all in, which also doesn't make it the most comfortable, but comfortable enough for a long night of dancing and standing out.
One of my favorite rentals. It was stretchy, hugged curves in the right areas and fun to dance in. The perfect little wedding-guest dress for the summer.

links_Review_Title: Dress that had everyone talking about me!
links_Review_Text: I am 5'1" and wanted something form fitting with structure but also cute and fun! This dress had every quality I was looking for and fit like a glove. I'm usually a size 2 but I'm glad I went with what the other reviews said and went up a size. Also, I wore spandex underneath because the tummy area is what you mainly notice besides the top so wanted a smoother look for sure. I would highly recommend getting a good pair of spanx. Everyone at the wedding loved the dress, definitely makes you stand out amongst the crowd. This dress was painful to return as I loved it so much.

As soon as I put this dress on I felt amazing in it. I'm between a 6-8 since I have broad shoulders and the 8 ended up fitting like a glove-definitely true to size. I didn't need to wear a bra and it held up great all night. But if you hold your weight in your love handles and lower stomach like I do, the brace inside pushed right down on that area so just make sure you wear spanx. Other than that, I was completely obsessed with this dress and got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Stop shopping and order this dress!!
links_Review_Text: This dress turned heads - I have never received so many compliments! This is the first dress I was extremely excited to from RTR. The fit for me personally was true to size. It is ribbed at the top but still breathable and structural. I have small boobs, so I had no issues with the top portion. I have wider hips and this dress is PERFECT if you have curves. Extremely comfortable, great quality dress, and looks like it is off the runway.

links_Review_Title: This dress was super fun for my birthday party! Very fun and unique!
links_Review_Text: There is boning and a corset like support structure in the diaphragm which was tight but fit great - no need to wear a strapless bra.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress for the wedding reception dinner
links_Review_Text: I usually wear size 2 or petite 4. The dress runs small so I wore size 4. The asymmetrical length covered my short height for the dress. The fabric is quite thick but it was perfect for our reception dinner at a restaurant.

Make sure you've got some good spanx on underneath, but other than that, it come with a corset on the inside to help you out. I was super comfortable in it all night. I loved the asymmetry of the dress and the sweetheart neck line.

links_Review_Title: Perfect balance of classiness with a fun flare!
links_Review_Text: This was my first time with RTR and it was everything I expected! The dress looked exactly like the photo and fit like a glove! I felt absolutely beautiful in it and I received so many complements. I love making statements with dresses I wear - this dress looked so bubbly and fun and I couldn't stop thinking about it once I saw it. I can see this dress being unforgiving if you don't get the proper size because the fitted style and boned corset can either do wonders or be really uncomfortable. Fortunately, the extra support fit me well and I was able to dance all night without having to pull it up. I was nervous about the size of the dress because other reviews mention it running small, however, I am normally a 6 and that size fit me perfectly. (Although I am tall and thin, I often have trouble finding a dress that is fitted around my narrow waist but fuller hips.. this was not a problem at all wearing this dress.) The only small inconvenience was the back seam had to be perfectly centered in order for the fabric not to bunch up oddly in the front. However, I am extremely picky and I do not think it was something big enough for other people to notice. Overall, perfect dress that made for the perfect night and I wouldn't change a thing! Amazing dress for my tall/long legged ladies!

links_Review_Title: The dress was beautiful and perfect for a June wedding.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. I ordered the 4 and the 6 but ended up wearing the 4 because it fit better and more snug. Usually strapless can be very annoying but this dress has boning in it the keep the top up all night long. Im about 135 pounds and only 5'1. Its hard to tell online but the dress is actually a pale pink with the red pattern which I loved. The dress has a 50's pinup vibe with the shape and style so it was something different than what everyone else is wearing at weddings. I would recommend this dress and wear it again!

links_Review_Title: So many compliments, especially on the BOOTY!
links_Review_Text: The dress is super unique but just a bit snug. The back zipper is impossible to zip up by yourself so make sure you have someone who can help you zip it up. It was super comfortable to wear without a bra, it just runs small so I'd recommend a size up and I wore it with spanx underneath. It made my butt look so good, I recommend for a wedding or other formal event! Material is on the thicker side so not good for outdoor events.
5'2 128lbs 34 DDD loved this dress hates to return it

links_Review_Title: Runs small but otherwise it's perfect!
links_Review_Text: I usually have a 2 as my backup and just as other reviewers said, this dress ran small. The 2 barely fit but it does have a little give so I was able to make it work. I got tons of compliments and felt great in the dress. Was able to dance and move around all night without a problem. One of my favorite rentals!
Wore this during WFH in April and really wish it could see the light of day for a party!! The ruffles and colors are beautiful for the spring, can't wait to rent again!!

Love a wrap dress because I feel like it's so customizable to every body. I wore this for valentines dinner and got SO many compliments from the Uber-hip servers at the silver lake restaurant we went to. I chalk the great service (it's usually pretty crappy) at the restaurant to this dress haha. I felt like a chic flamenco dancer. SUPER light weight and can dress up or down.
Beautiful wedding dress, unique colors, comfortable

The fit is amazing it's a tie dress so you can tie as loose or as tight as you want. I wore it on vaca as a bathing suit cover up to breakfast and lunch. The material is very thin and casual but the cut is more formal which I loved! Many compliments I felt so beautiful in this dress. I had planned to wear it somewhere formal but after reading other reviews it is much more suited for a chill beach day or casual event.
COLOR was incredible! a little long as i'm super short but it was all adjustable! i wore platforms so it wasn't too long! lots of compliments and loved the dress.
Wore it to a flamenco party and people were amazed how perfect and glam it was!

Amazing dress. Made me feel like a princess on a breezy spring day. Perfect for my baby bump. Warning: the side of the dress has a gaping hole for the belt, but the belt is too skinny for the hole and it just looks like a hole. It's not very obvious, but it's there. Otherwise, great material and beautiful style.

Beautiful vibrant purple and green dress! I didn't realize the dress was just cotton so I wouldn't recommend it to anything formal. Fit was very comfortable but did require a ton of steaming to get the wrinkles out. Overall great dress for a wedding
Wore on vacation, such a fun tropical print and the fabric is very lightweight and breezy! Fun to wear, lots of compliments!

I'm a size 10, 5'3, 160lbs, with big hips and a small waist and this wrap dress was perfect. I could've sized down and if you have a smaller bust definitely do. Got a lot of compliments on this dress from random people and other guests.

Loved this dress! It's a comfy cotton material (great for the sweltering heat that day). The only bad thing was that at 5'3 in flats it did drag the ground lightly at the back. A couple people stepped on it. The fit was great though!

links_Review_Title: Pretty color fabric, did not like cotton material
links_Review_Text: The color of the fabric is fabulous. The cotton material does not feel fabulous... Someone mentioned that it made a great swimsuit coverup - I agree.

links_Review_Title: It's a beach cover up. If the wind blows, you are fully exposed in the front. Couldn't wear
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear
Thought fabric was heavy, due to cold weather where I live. But a beautiful dress. Loved it
Fit perfectly!
Gorgeous gorgeous! I will rent this again! I didn't end up wearing it because it was too hot outside, but this would be so pretty for Easter or a spring outdoor event.

I really like this dress! The material is lighter than I expected (my own assumption, not anything RTR did/said), so I didn't wear it, but I'll definitely rent it again when it's warmer out. Because it's a lighter material, I think that makes it easier to dress down or up in this.
I was really excited about this dress, but unfortunately the fabric used is not of the best quality and a bit paper-ish. It is definitely an empire waist and not bust flattering in my opinion.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a Havana Nights themed party. Received so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: The material is definitely on the thinner side as many others mentioned. However, I wouldn't say it was cotton or beach cover up like. It was so perfect and I'm so sad I don't own this dress.
We had the best night dancing the night away at a black tie event! The dress is so comfortable and flattering! Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Fit was lovely. The fabric as pictured on the model looks like silly luxury but itâ€™s actually cotton
links_Review_Text: The cotton does not flow or allow for easy movement of the gown. The Freddyâ€™s arrived extremely wrinkled and was not wearable. Returned immediately upon reciept.

links_Review_Title: This dress was phenomenal and I LOVED it.
links_Review_Text: Think the dress runs large. Consider ordering your Norma size and up for a cushion. I will definitely considering ordering this dress again.
Will need to wear a slip or something. It is more like a cover-up than a dress.

links_Review_Title: Rent this incredible dress. I felt amazing.
links_Review_Text: Very forgiving and highlights the girls beautifully.
Great light weight materials and perfect colors!
I rented it in the summer because it's lightweight, however, it did not have a liner so wearing it someplace warm/without A/C just made it highlight any sweat! It was anxiety inducing.

I wore this to dinner with my husband. He loved it! So did half of the restaurant! I am considering buying this beautiful summer dress. You can dress this up with heels or dress down with flats. One reviewer said she felt it was cheaply made. I do not agree. The material is breathable, for the layered style the breezy fabric is perfect for a hot summer night.
I wanted to love this but it was cheaply made

Beautiful dress and fit my figure well. It is hard to get over your head, and I do feel that there needs to be another layer so it isn't quite see through. I think I would have been worried had I worn it in the sunshine. The ruching is very flattering and you can move it around to look the best.
I couldn't even begin to get it on- it was at least 2 sizes too small - looked beautiful but very disappointed
Beautiful colors in this dress but it is very figure hugging and sheer. Ordered a M, but definitely needed to upsize to a L.
This is the perfect jumpsuit if you need something a little conservative and very classy.
menswear gone girlboss. subtle brocade pattern ups the cool factor. flattering v cut neckline and cropped pant leg.
This was adorable! I was able to dress this up for work or down for a date. I don't think this would work well be a bigger chested girl.
Fit well in all the right places and had room to move. Got a ton of compliments!

I could have sized down to a medium in this jumpsuit but the cleavage was too prominent for a work holiday party when I sized down. The waist was a little looser than I'd like, but it still looked good. I got so many compliments. The pattern is unique and it's more than a boring black jumpsuit. It was perfect for my work holiday party.

Everything about this jumper is cute, classy, chic. I would purchase it but it's only 10% off of its original price currently. Will 100% be renting again in hopes that the price will go down & I can purchase!
Sometimes I have trouble with rompers or jumpsuits because I have a long torso but this one fit great. The fit and neckline was flattering and the floral print was subtle and elegant.
renting this for a rehearsal dinner and find it super flattering and fun to wear. Runs true to size, fitted at the top - great rental overall!

Surprisingly, this hit me at just the right length at 5'1. I loved the neckline and the design on the fabric. I got a large, and it fit well, but do wish it was a bit more form fitting. The medium might have been too tight in the waist. Either way, would rent again!
so flattering & perfect for the rehearsal dinner i went to!
I'm not usually a jumpsuit gal, but I'm so glad I rented this for a winter wedding. It was so comfortable and I got so many compliments. I would absolutely rent again!
Wore this for a big, brunch in the city and it was perfect. Stylish enough for day but not so overdressed that I looked out of place.

links_Review_Title: So much potential, not enough fabric
links_Review_Text: The jumpsuit was beautiful and I was looking forward to wearing it to a friends pre-wedding party but was met with disappointment as it was a bit too small for me. The material was thick and the pattern is very noticeable in person.
Wanted to wear this as I loved the material but my larger chest would not allow it to close Bummed because it's a really nice formal romper
Didn't wear the chest area was too small. If sized up pants would be too big. Love the material and the quality.
I don't usually wear jumpsuits but this was one is specially nice. The fit was perfect.

links_Review_Title: My husband picked this out when he refused to ask a host what the dress code was. It was perfect!
links_Review_Text: This piece is perfect for dressing up or down. I wore it with booties and a sheer cardigan for a fancy house party. It can definitely be dressed up with heels, bare shoulders, and some nice jewelry. The fit was extremely flattering and I could see myself renting this again!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable, cute and perfect for my work holiday party!
links_Review_Text: RTR was so helpful, giving me options I never would have picked out!

links_Review_Title: Cute jumpsuit for a night out
links_Review_Text: This was super cute. Only thing I didn't like was no pockets
Absolutely loved this romper. Super cute pattern.

This skirt fit well and felt expensive- not cheap sequins like you can often find. It was comfortable and was a great stand out piece. Wore it to a concert and felt great. My dog was a little less enthused...
Made my legs look good and made me feel fabulous!! Tons of compliments. Worn for a NYE party but definitely not too flashy/shiny for a regular party or night out.
#glamfun #hot #current
I wore this to a bachelorette party, it's so fun and sparkly. Super comfortable and not too short. Loved this
Fun and different. Everyone loved it. Fit so well.
Skirt hangs beautifully - felt like a mermaid!

links_Review_Title: Added some sparkle to my engagement pics
links_Review_Text: This skirt fits true to size with a little bit of stretch. The roughing makes it incredibly flattering. I wore this for my engagement photos and couldn't be happier with my choice. I recommend renting this skirt for a party or a date night out in nyc (or any big dirty) <3 @mackinstyle for more shots in this look to come!
I wore this on a night out to dinner and then the club! I loved it I felt classy and sexy.

links_Review_Title: The best skirt i have ever worn
links_Review_Text: I would have paid $1,000 for this skirt. Literally the most flattering skirt i have ever worn. If i happen to rent it again, i might buy it for real. I want it to be part of my closet collection until i die lol. I wore it to wine tastings in Napa Valley, CA. FYI, 1. Size runs the way it is described 2. Will look good on any"body". @stylein.haeun

Rented this for an event, and I loved how playful it was! Sit down dinner and when I stood up, multiple people complimented me and couldn't believe I'd been hiding that skirt under the table! Pair with a crop, would be super cute for holiday!
Love everything about it. More on @thanksitsrtr

I rented this for my best friends birthday party and it was perfect. I typically wear a size 4 but ended up going with a 2 because i wanted it to fit high waisted and shorter. The draping in the skirt is comfortable and has great movement. Looks very expensive and easy to style. Will definitely rent again!
This skirt was perfect for NYE! Got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: This skirt is so fun! I got so many compliments
links_Review_Text: I loved this skirt so much! I rented for Nye. The pink is great. I went up two sizes based on other reviews and availability but it was comfortable to wear all night, could've gone done a size though. It's not itchy and the ruching helps hide any belly or bloat from drinking all night. Love this skirt and got so many compliments!!

links_Review_Title: Skirt was super cute! Fun color and sparkles. Would rent again.
links_Review_Text: The sequins were very uncomfortable and scratchy. Left many makes and scrapes on my leg.

Cute miniskirt, with bright pink sequins. It ran small, though I could have worn it in a pinch. I'll size up and rent again for a future party. It's cute and bright enough to make an awesome statement, without being too short. Size up and try it!

I absolutely loved this skirt. Definitely an eye catcher, I'm between 4 & 6, and I got a 6 for this skirt, it fits perfectly, 4 will be too small. I like the tie on the side of the skirt, which allows me to show a little legs without being too exposing!

Love the top and really wanted it to work, but I can't fill it out so it looks boxy. Considering the material isn't very stretchy, a medium is perfect for my 34 chest, but it doesn't look right with A/AA breasts. The waist is also less fitted than I expected.
The top ran small so i couldn't wear a bras with it which made me look like I had no boobs but it was very pretty

links_Review_Title: All dressed up and no wear to go
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a girls night that hit cancelled, it's cute, the description says it's slightly cropped and it looks that way on the hanger, but it wasn't for me, since I have a shorter torso. I'd rent it again.
None

I didn't wear this because getting it over my arms was so painful! I guess I should have sized but but I am not sure how the shirt would have fit under my arms if it was bigger. I couldn't get this on because the sequins were scratching up my arms.

I did not wear this out because it did not fit the way I expected, but I was so disappointed because the sequin work is GORGEOUS. This is 100% a crop top. The lower seam was above my belly button by several inches. I knew it would be short but it was several inches shorter than I expected and didn't feel comfortable wearing it out. Also, I couldn't quite get it zipped. Wish they had the same cami with a longer option because it really is a beautiful piece.

I ordered this top to wear out with girlfriends and it did not disappoint. I paired it with high-waisted ripped black jeans and a great belt and it was perfect. This is definitely a crop top and I have very short torso but it worked perfectly on me. It looked expensive and didn't chafe under the arms like sequins can sometimes do. Would highly recommend.
Got a lot of compliments while wearing this shirt. My only complaint is that it was a little tight in the chest

links_Review_Title: So fun. Not your average animal print
links_Review_Text: Such a fun top. I didn't end up wearing it because I wore something else but will def be renting this again. Runs small so I went w the large and it was fine
As long as you have a friend who can help you tie the straps, this dress is an easy rental that will likely flatter many figures and not require special undergarments.

Really loved this dress! Extremely flattering in the body. The size I got was unfortunately a little big in my chest (I never have this Problem being a DD). The fabric is heavy so beware if you're thinking summer wedding! Would be perfect for spring or fall.

links_Review_Title: Stripes in all the right places!
links_Review_Text: Loved the detailing on this dress and curve-hugging fit! Perfect holiday party dress.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress, super flattering and unique.
links_Review_Text: Loved this! Alexis generally runs a bit small but this fit true to size and was both flattering and comfortable for all night dancing.
Loved everything about this dress! I wore it for NYE. It was a standout piece.

Wanted this to work but ended up being a bit more formal than I needed. Looked great ... could have possibly sized down to Make it really hug the hips. Might be better for a fall or spring party and not middle of winter.

links_Review_Title: More dramatic and beautiful in person!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress and am kicking myself for not snapping a pic. The shape is perfect for CURVY girls, and the straps are fun, adjustable big bows. I'm 5'3 and this hit right above my ankles. Add black strappy heels, red lipstick, and you're ready to go!

This dress looks to be silk in the pictures but is actually more of jersey-type material. It's quite heavy. I prefer the look with it tucked back to expose my jeans - otherwise it made me look quite wide even with the belt. Still, it was different and I felt great in it - I got tons of compliments.
I love how much of a statement this piece makes and how versatile it is. Lots of compliments on NYE!
I've never worn a duster before. I felt fancy & loved every moment. Definitely recommend! Would also be great over jeans. There are shoulder pads, which I liked.
This was such a statement piece. Dressed it differently for Christmas and NYE, plus just hanging around the house. Not the most breathable but worth it.

i layered this over a flowy pleated zara cami too that had matchingish lace detail to this duster and black skinnies, add glitter boots for ba-bow! love!! i was worried this wouldn't fit/look great because it isn't technically a 14/16 friendly brand, but the stretch in this was great. it's meant to be open a bit so that worked in my favor. super comfortable and so many compliments. i think this could be cute over a LBD too!

I wore this over a black silk jumpsuit for a Christmas party and loved it! What makes this piece so special is the quality and details. Could it look like sleepwear? Sure. But it doesn't! Runs tts. If you want a special piece to elevate what you own, give it a try.

links_Review_Title: This glamorous bathrobe / duster is quite interesting!
links_Review_Text: It definitely can look bathrobe-y if you don't pair it right. I paired it with black jeans, Louboutin spiked boots for some edge and a RTR top which had some lace detailing and a detailed neck. Perfect for a dinner date :)

The front opens with a black tie waist that is not removable but attached. However if worn open the 2 ties just hang there and may look sloppy. The cloth consists of 2 layers, and the inner layer is sort of a black organza material. Shoulder pads are not that noticeable. The lower sleeves have lace that is a bit scratchy but not exactly itchy.

Very cute and easy to dress up! I am 5 2 and it was not too long but if you were taller it would be midi length instead of maxi length. The tie makes it easy to fit any shape. Very flattering cut. I wore it with jeans and boots and it really dressed up my outfit for dinner. I wore it to work once before sending it back but considered keeping it!
I wore this to work with black jeans and a black t-shirt. It looks so stylish but is so effortless to wear. I got compliments all day!
I tweaked the brightness to show this is a sparkly, night on the town dress. You will need Spanx. I'm 5'7" and lowest part of dress hit just above my ankle. Not super itchy but super sexy.

Loved this dress. Fabric is think but flattering and if size down as it stretches out a little. The slit made it super sexy too. The fabric is sparkly which I loved but you can't tell in the photo. If you're sensitive to wool like I am, it can be a little itchy but not too bad

links_Review_Title: Not the most flattering on a pear shape
links_Review_Text: Really wanted to like this dress but the waist area bagged on my pear shape, making me look larger and more shapeless. The length also proved awkward. It would have probably looked better with heels on, but I opted for the more culturally appropriate flats since I was in a Muslim country. The slit wasn't too high or too revealing for me.
Good fit cute thigh slit
Fit so well, body hugging but looks great! Shinier than expected but beautiful
This was okay - I didn't personally love it, I thought the turtleneck was a little tight and itchy. But I got multiple compliments so it must've looked okay.

Wore this on a date to see Wicked with my husband. It was extremely fitted and flattering and just the right amount of festive. The slight is high it I wore tights and wedge booties and felt covered. Got several compliments.

This dress fits great and it made of quality material but you cannot tell from the pictures that is woven through with sparkly/silver threads. I rented it for everyday use (work) so the shiny material made it inappropriate. I would rent again for a party/event this winter.
Snapped this up when it became available even though it's still February. Such a beautiful cotton. Waist band is a little tight but not avail in a larger size. So pretty anyway, I'm ready for spring!

Loved this dress! It was so flattering. The ruffles and ruching on the top are so cute, and the waist perfectly cinches you in. It hit a slightly funky length on me, but I don't even care! Definitely renting this one again. Oh, also, bonus pockets!

This dress fits like a dream!! I'm a big fan of this designer because her clothes give you the best silhouette, are comfortable, and come with a convenient fabric string on the zipper so you can easily zip yourself up. I got tons of compliments on the dress.
Perfect beach outfit! The cotton material is breathable and super comfortable. Really loved this rental and the bag is from RTR as well.

I wore this to a girlfriend's birthday brunch and it was super comfortable but a little chilly for 55Â° - hence the tee under it. The pleats on the waist are a little bulky but once I got used to it I didn't mind it, l'll probably try to wear it a few more times before returning. At 5'1" it came almost exactly to my ankles.

links_Review_Title: As cute as it looked online!
links_Review_Text: Great fit with a flattering empire waist. Love it!

links_Review_Title: Love the way this dress feels
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous cotton dress, fits perfectly. Lots of details in the waist and neck. Many complements. It does feel a little worn, a few threads pulled around the waist, but the beauty of the dress makes ip for it.

Loved the dress, didn't want to return it! Ordered a 2 and 4 and ended up wearing the 2. I love how easily you can zip the back up by yourself - especially if no one is around to help. Super comfortable and a great dress for an evening dinner on the water!
Beautiful high quality dress, fun for a party and everyday
Fitted at the waist with nice pleated detail. The fabric is comfortable, soft- not stiff. I would say it runs true to size.
Super comfortable and flattering work dress. Fits TTS. Would rent again.
Nice cotton fabric with pretty floral design. Just ok.

This dress was so fantastic. One of the best features is the extra long zipper in the back...it helps when you don't have someone to zip you. The print is a great boho floral. It was longer on me than anticipated but I still would totally rent it again.
Loved this dress! The cut was flattering and the print was very cute
Tee length - I am 5'8 - great for my height
Great fabric. Fits TTS. Length was just right for my height.

I wore this dress for a casual summer wedding. The material has a nice weight to it but the dress is not hot. It has lovely little details that are hard to see in the photo like tiny pleats around the neckline and waist and some delicate and tasteful embroidery. Since I am only 5'5'', the dress hit me closer to my ankles but that was not a problem.

Really liked this dress. Overall the fit was a bit big, I could have sized down a size as the chest was pretty big exposing my bra on the sides. The waist details are really nice and show off your natural waist. The length was perfect and the pockets are a pleasant surprise. The fabric is very breezy making this an easy summer outfit.

I have been hoping UJ would show up on RTR for years! Beautiful, high quality summer dress. Fabric was a great weight for warm weather. The zipper helper/string made it extra easy to put on. Probably not the most figure flattering for my shape, but this dress made me so happy! Plus there are pockets! I'd say it runs true to size, perhaps a tiny bit big in the chest for me.

Fits true to size. I had never rented clothing from this designer and was surprised at how much I loved this dress! It is very comfortable and easy to wear. You can dress it up or down. I wore it to work with red espadrilles and received loads of compliments on my outfit. Lovely light cottony fabric makes this easy to wear on a hot summer day.

links_Review_Title: Nice pattern, but didn't love the sleeves
links_Review_Text: I like the fabric. My issues was the sleeves aren't flattering as they stick out from the shoulder. My solution was a denim jacket.

links_Review_Title: Soo many compliments and a flattering fit.
links_Review_Text: This dress has such a flattering fit and is super comfy. Did I mention it has pockets?! I almost don't want to return this. I received so many compliments on it.
I loved this dress and wanted to wear it, but it does run small, especially around the bust. I'm petite, with a larger bust, so it unfortunately didn't work for my body but was so beautiful!
Soft and comfortable. Dress up or down. I took mine on a vacation to Santa Cruz.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric, but the top of the dress is odd.
links_Review_Text: The top made my chest look enormous. The under-arms are cut very low, and the sleeves are too big and flouncy. The fabric is beautiful, but the top of the dress was a disaster on me.
It fit well and is comfortable Wore to Thanksgiving dinner.

links_Review_Title: Loved it - flowy and fun - dressed up and down!
links_Review_Text: Bra shows slightly under the arms, but otherwise so cute!

links_Review_Title: Date night with my handsome husband; you definitely are noticed in this pretty red dress.
links_Review_Text: waist is a bit high. otherwise it is an easy dress to wear.

This dress is an absolute show stopper. I wore it to the library and everywhere I went men were tripping over themselves because it's such a stunner. I'm in my mid thirties and I've had four children, so I am not used to that kind of attention these days. I'll have a hard time returning this beauty. I have a large rib cage and an average bust and felt very comfy in this all day. The length was perfect with a kitten heel or with sandals.
Actually considering keeping this one. Beautiful quality and rich floral print. Have worn with white pointy boots and sandals.
Loved wearing this dress during the day, out with friends. It was so comfortable and I received a ton of compliments. I will definitely rent it again.

This was my first Ulla Johnson rental and I am so happy I tried it. This dress fit beautifully and I loved the fabric and design touches. The dress is long with a lot of volume so might be a better rental for tall people but for me it was perfect.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress. Wore it both with heels and flats!
Loved this dress so much, didn't want to send it back.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful color, got a lot of compliments!

Ulla Johnson details are so wonderful - the pleating and bodice like are so delicate and lovely. TTS and can be dressed up or down as the material is pretty lightly cotton. LOVED! Don't want to return.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a summer weekend!
links_Review_Text: I am a big fan of Ulla Johnson, so was excited to get this dress. The bust was PERFECTLY fitted to my chest so it the fabric didn't look stretched, but didn't look billowy either. The waist was the perfect size for my ribcage and provided some shape. Any smaller and I wouldn't be able to breathe. Nice boho print.
This was so cute! The top was perfectly fitted with the bottom nice and flowy. I am normally a 2 and this fit nicely. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress once a week for 8 weeks. I wore it with sandals and sneakers. It is perfection!
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous, lightweight and swishy! The waist detail is divine

links_Review_Title: Such a beautiful piece! Ulla Johnson, you are my dream designer.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous, but I found it to be small in the waist - absolutely no give. Wish I would have sized up on this one, I had a hard time breathing.
Just an easy, pretty summer dress. Totally work appropriate. Really handy detail on the zipper that makes it easy for you to zip yourself! Plenty of room for a larger chest
I threw a blazer over this for work, then took it off for the perfect date night dress! It was perfect!
Has a very weird fit and pulls in certain areas

I rented this for NYE and it didn't disappoint. I loved the trendy square neckline, the sequins were blingy but not chintzy. The color was a beautiful coppery brown that's really flattering. The peplum looks amazing on frames with narrow hips like mine. Super cute party top!! I found that the sequins did start to itch me a little around my chest but not under my arms. Also, the bust and waist were a little too loose on me even when the zipper fit my back/shoulders well.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for winter when a dress just isn't happening
links_Review_Text: I loved that the inside was lined in jersey cotton because it made it super comfortable. It definitely has some stretch to it which is why I probably could've worn a large. I do have a bigger bust so it did come up a little short but it didn't bother me

links_Review_Title: Felt like it was made for me!
links_Review_Text: So beautiful and flattering. I'm 5'10" and long waisted it could've been a touch shorter but I wore it with high waisted pants and high waisted dark skinny jeans for two different looks. It has a hint of stretch and is so comfortable without being shapeless or boxy. The color is amazing in person. Would recommend!!
Fits very TTS, gorgeous top for a night out. Shoulders kind of slid down a few times but otherwise this is a top 3 rental!

I wore this for NYE for a party I threw in my house (festive attire encouraged). It was comfortable and looked elegant. The neckline is beautiful (sleeves did slip off my shoulders a few times during the evening but it wasn't really an issue). I wore a strapless bra and it worked great. The blouse does have a cropped fit, so I paired it with high-waisted black dress pants and it looked awesome- but for a regular rise, be prepared to show some belly.
Loved this top. Very festive and comfortable. Received many compliments.
Love this top

links_Review_Title: Ordered for annual girls Xmas dinner- so cute and went perfectly with black skinny jeans!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size

links_Review_Title: loved how soft this top was. sometimes sequins can be stiff and itchy...loved this one.
links_Review_Text: super fun, sparkly with a touch of velvet. fun sleeves and a nice peplum shape.
Runs big especially on the shoulders. I'm athletic build and they still keep falling. Not a big deal tho. Paired it with a black belt and went braless. Will def rent again for festival parties.

Absolutely loved this top. I wore it to Vegas for my husbands bday trip, with high waist pants. Very comfortable, sequins were not scratchy. I liked that it had some Vegas style sparkle but was still sophisticated and classic. Nice lining on the inside. At time of wearing, I was 185 lbs (5'2") 34G bust with some tummy pudge. Still flattering and peplum hid belly well. Would also be cute on those wanting to show sliver of skin with low rise pants.

links_Review_Title: My husband loved how I sparkled
links_Review_Text: This was actually my back up style for my husband's work holiday party. After he saw me try it on with the velvet pants, it became the only contender. Very comfortable and a great cut (my boobs never looked so great).

I wore this quite a few times after being invited to several work and casual holiday parties - it's easy, comfortable, and festive. Lots of compliments - I loved how pretty I felt in it without trying too hard.

I wore this beautiful Amanda Uprichard top for wine tasting in Napa Valley. This top can be dressed down with denim and boots or dressed up with denim and heels for a holiday party. Loved the bronze sequins!! I'm tall so I got the small to have a little extra length. It's on the shorter side so if you have a long torso. Order a size up. It's true to size minus the shorter length. Over all very cute top.
The inside of this top is super soft, adding an unexpected layer of comfort. Loved the high quality of the sequins. This top can also easily be dressed up or down depending on how you style it.

links_Review_Title: Very cute but not for me
links_Review_Text: Shoulders are definitely larger/ puffier than they look on the model. It's a very 80's silhouette in that sense. It's still a very fun and cute top, but not right for the event I rented it for.
It was too big but yet too short. Even an XS would've been too short. I usually wear an XS or a 2 if that helps.
Got so many compliments! Would def recommend renting for a fun party or celebration!

Such a fun and sparkly top! The detail work is amazing. Would definitely rent again. I only wish the sleeves didn't fall down as much throughout the night. Other than that, be sure to rent for any night out on the town!
This top is so fun and I got a ton of compliments. I wore it to a holiday party and it was just the right amount of cleavage and sparkle.
Just the right amount of sparkle and the sleeves are super fun and flattering
I wore this to my company work party with leather jeans. I got a ton of compliments as well as felt really good in the top!
It was very comfortable and soft. The only issue was the sleeves were a little loose and fell down occasionally but besides that I loved it!

I absolutely loved this top. I wore the L and it was comfortable with some room but I might have been able to wear a medium (I'm a pear-shaped size 8) as the shoulders tended to slip off. This is the perfect holiday top for a date, party, or special occasion.
Obsessed with the cut of this top and the material is so comfortable . Love

I wore this top for my 36th birthday party. I'm 5'2" and petite -- the XS fit perfectly in the waist, but the shoulders would slip off every once in awhile if I wasn't standing up super straight. I love a great puff sleeve, and this fit the bill. Puffy sleeves, super sparkly, low back, perfect for a party!
So flattering, hits in all the right places. Wore it for a night out in Paris!!
It's cute, just looks different (cheaper) in person than it does online. Still liked it.
Loved this top so much! Loved the peplum style. I wore it off the shoulder and it felt so sexy! Wore is with green dress pants to party in LV.

I am normally a size S but rented a XS because that's all that was available. Although I didn't have any issues with the XS, I would rent my normal size next time for more room in the bust. It was pretty short but was perfect with my boots/sandals. Would rent again and possibly buy next time!

links_Review_Title: Worked a lot of magic to make this work
links_Review_Text: The proportions on this dress were strange.... love flynn skye but this designer is definitely made for a certain body type. The dress fit me around my waist and the length was perfect but yet the chest area and length of the top was huge. Had to safety pin both sides on my top back to keep it up. Love the print and was happy i was able to make it work!

I actually really liked the cut of this dress, found the neckline to be flattering, but the length was short (for reference I'm 5'9") and the fit was snug, I'm usually a small but am glad I sized up to a medium. I also rented this in the wintertime in NYC area, and would not have survived in the cold without tights on... the material is pretty thin so this would definitely recommend this as a spring/summer rental.

Rented this for a January bridal shower. I got lots of compliments about the print. I was super comfortable in it but that was mainly because I had dark brown tights on. The dress was pretty short so I think I would be uncomfortable without something truly covering me if I accidentally bent over a bit too far. The small was a bit too large for me and at first the XS seemed a little too tight around my rib cage but it loosened up on me within minutes of wearing it.
