I had to safety pin the back tighter because the bust was a little large and was falling shorter than I wanted (didn't want too much cleavage). Other than that this was a perfect dress. Wore it for my friends birthday dinner.
Absolutely loved this dress for my group date. It was a big hit. Fits great all around.

links_Review_Title: It was perfect! I want to own it!
links_Review_Text: Obsessed!! It was lose and tight in all the right places! Very flattering for my body shape!

I ended up wearing this with leggings because it was so short on me, but the rest of it fit. It was also kind of odd because the waist just fit, but the back/shoulders were really big, but the chest wasn't. And I sometimes have issues with shoulders not being broad enough for me, so it was weird that it was so big. It was cute for one night but I wouldn't rent it again.
Wore this for my birthday but the chest area is a little big

links_Review_Title: Super cute dress but wide neck can gape
links_Review_Text: This fit great in the waist but not so much anywhere on top. I felt like it was constantly gaping and sliding off my shoulders.

This dress was so good I had to take the bathroom selfie... that good! It's a very nice understated leopard print -- a nice change since the leopard print is feeling overdone. The shoulders were a bit big on me but I think the M was necessary to zip over my bust. The S most likely would have worked but may have been a struggle. Wore with sheer black tights and low black boots. Got compliments all day long!

I wish I could have worn this as a dress but it was so short! My butt was completely out! I loved the style of the top of the dress so tucked it into a midi skirt , and got compliments at work. I also changed the skirt for going out (as pictured) and wore it to a concert! Just wish it was long enough to wear as a dress but it's a great top too.
I really felt sexy in this dress but with a touch of class. Fit was really cute except I felt that it's made for women with much longer torsos. Looks great with knee high boots.

The waist fit perfectly, love the square neckline. It is definitely short but not an issue. Also the fabric was more thin than I thought it would be, it could seem a little see through only if standing in the right light. If I had more to wear it to I would buy it I feel like you could dress it up or down.

links_Review_Title: Such a cute weekend party dress!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a rooftop birthday and loved it! I don't really wear short things anymore but I felt cute and got lots of compliments. It's is definitely on the short side, I wore like bike shorts underneath - a gust of wind could be your worst enemy.

SUPERRRR cute and i love the style of this dress (the square neckline is super cute) but the fit is a little weird? I normally wear a L and it fit fine in the waist - like maybe a touch big - but was BIG in the top, like the shoulders and back. But i feel like if i got a large it would be too small in the waist. Overall - cute and wearable but the fit was a little off.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments wearing this dress!
links_Review_Text: I have an athletic build so the sleeves were a little tight on my arms but other than that it fit pretty well. It was very flattering and my husband even suggested that I buy it to wear again :)

This dress was so cute. It fits true to size but the neck is stretched out, maybe from a large hanger? A square neck is usually flattering but because it was stretched out it looked sloppy. RTR needs to cycle out clothes that are over worn

Runs super small I am always an xs and this was so short it was more of a shirt I am 5'6 and my butt would have shown if I bent over Arms were short too Very thin material good for warmer temps Square neckline is flattering Will rent in larger size

Tall women beware! This is a very short dress. I am 5'9" and chose a M which fit well everywhere except length. It didn't cover my butt so I didn't even have the opportunity to wear biker shorts or anything underneath to try and wear it out. Such a cute dress though, wish it worked out!

I ordered this dress for a bachelorette party in NYC in November, thinking it would look cute with black tights and short boots. This dress is insanely short and I'm only 5'3". The neckline revealed a lot as well (I'm a 32DDD) and just wearing the dress felt obscene. If I were younger and a size 0 I might consider this, but as a 32 year old mom, I think this dress was just not made for me.

links_Review_Title: Very cute but SO short. I am 5' 7" and could not wear this anywhere.
links_Review_Text: Super short!
The top is very low cut -- I needed to use multiple safety pins to prevent a major wardrobe malfunction. Once corrected I received LOTS of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my college graduation and was a hit!
links_Review_Text: SO SO SO CUTE

links_Review_Title: Super cute, but Poor quality dress
links_Review_Text: The over all design and pattern is cute but the dress is very poorly made, from cheap fabric. The back of the dress was shorter than the front because of the zipper pulling at the fabric. Unfortunately couldn't wear this.

I'm usually a M/L in everything but tend to size up with RTR. I got an XL in this dress, was horrible. It was super short (I'm 5'8" and the shoulders are loose, very wide, and the chest area just doesn't work. I'm a 36D, the square chest was like at the middle of my bra. Cute print and I'm sure it'll work for some but whewww it was bad for me.
Loved it, definitely mini length. It was tight on my 34DDD boobs so there was a fair amount of cleavage but I was good with it! Love it!!!! Truly may have to buy!
The square neckline great and the print doesn't overpower at all!
The fit of this dress was great, but the length was way too short on me. I'm 5'7 and couldn't wear the medium because of the length.
Great material. Form fitting enough to make it sexy but not tight. If your larger on top, need a medium small might be tight.

I am just under 5'3 and it was extremely short. I sized up since it looked short but I still couldn't wear it to my event. Maybe would look better with black tights but if you have long legs be aware of how short it is.

links_Review_Title: Loved it! Super cute and stylish
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! It fit like a glove, but didn't pinch anywhere. The neck line is super cute (i have small boobs so it was a tad large in that area) and the sleeves made it a bit more work appropriate. Would definitely rent again!!
Beautiful colors, loved the patterns, and received lots of compliments!! It was a little hard to close around the bust but I made it work!

This dress got so many compliments and was super easy to transport in a suitcase. It's also super comfy and the adjustable straps make it so that you can easily adjust it for a better fit. Probably could have sized down but the XS wasn't available. Overall, would 100% rent again!

Rented this beauty for a spring outdoor wedding in south Florida at 22 weeks pregnant and let me tell you.... super cute, fun and colorful. Got so many compliments. This dress is super bump friendly and will definitely rent it again! The colors are so bright and fun I felt so pretty that I was so hesitant to return it lol.

I was a little concerned this dress would be too tight in the chest but it fit just right. I'm normally on the cusp of a medium / large and the medium fit just great. I wore this on vacation but it would be great for a wedding shower or other dressy but not too dressy event. Definitely will order again in the summer time when it warms up in my local area
Probably could have gone down a smaller size.
Great colors and didn't have to wear a bra. Top was adjustable which allowed me to size down.

I wore this in Tulum and two other friends wanted to borrow for the same trip! Huge hit. The chest part is adjustable since it's a front tie which makes it great for any bust size. Loved the fit and look!

This dress is silky and airy--I got tons of compliments. It's great for a night of dancing and would probably be flattering on most people. It has adjustable straps so you can make the top fit well. Loved the colors and the feel of the fabric!
Loved the fun print. Was super flattering on my short/petite frame and got tons of compliments!

What a fun dress. This dress was perfect for a summer vineyard wedding. And completely instagramable... boomerang! It was bright, beautiful and comfortable to wear. It definitely fit true to size and was a perfect fabric for a warm day. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: AMAZING dress!! Wore it for a wedding in Maui. It flows perfectly and makes you wanna twirl around.
links_Review_Text: Adjustable straps and really flattering on body types.
Soft on tanned skin, effortlessly elegant. I loved it and all my friends did, too!
The photos of this dress do not do it justice. It is far more stunning on than on the hanger. The quality and beauty is exceptional, it's super comfy, and moves beautifully. So many compliments.

I wore this to a wedding welcome party on the beach in Key West! XS wasn't available so I rented the S and it worked fine because the straps are adjustable and you can tie the dress tighter or looser depending on your preference! Beautiful colors! Received many compliments!
The top can be tied to accommodate your boobs. I didn't wear a bra but don't think it would hard to do. Hits between knee and ankle.
I was eyeing this for my upcoming honeymoon and was so excited to wear! Comfortable & high quality. Such a unique design.
Everyone loved this dress. No need to wear a bra. It spins out so pretty when you twirl.

I think this dress works for all shapes and sizes and was perfect for a special celebration in Mexico! Because of fit and stretch, definitely was able to work with a smaller size if you are deciding between too. The stretch at the front can make it appear bump-like, so it's clear why this works so well for mamas-to-be. Overall, I would rent again!

links_Review_Title: The most comfy dance floor stunner EVAAAAHH!
links_Review_Text: I'm buying this dress one thousand percent. I wore it with heels and a vintage bag to a wedding (SoCal in the Fall so floral was still the vibe) but can see myself trotting around an European vacation with a shawl draped over my shoulders and woven bag or as a bikini cover up with a floppy hat during a beach trip! So versatile! No bra needed. Could eat and drink all I wanted and tummy was hidden. Flounced and flowed all over the dance floor. Looked cute with a pink half jacket (with gold shoulder studs) when it got a little chilly at night. Compliments all night and my hubby's favorite RTR so far!
People told me I was the best dressed at the beach wedding and i got SO many compliments all night long.
Fit a little on the large size but was beautiful and flattering!
This dress is absolutely beautiful!! The colors don't do it justice in the pictures.
I wore this to a Cancun wedding and it was perfect! Stood out and received lots of compliments. Ordered a S and XS and went with the XS. Adjustable straps and you tie the front yourself.
I got so many complements. Very flattering and colorful. I wanted to keep it!

links_Review_Title: Walking in this dress made me feel like a super model!!
links_Review_Text: The colors in this dress are just as vibrant in real life as they look in the pictures! But what really makes it incredible is the way it flows with every step! Super comfortable with adjustable straps- couldn't even tell that there was a peek a boo tie- take that as a positive or negative. I think it actually ran a little big and long, but not enough that I would need to go down another size. If you're unsure about a bold pattern, DONT be! This one is amazing, I loved every part of this dress!!
I rented this dress for our day before wedding lunch at Breckenridge Brewery. I wish I would have taken a video of me spinning in it. Absolutely loved this dress, wish I could have kept it!

links_Review_Title: So fun to dance in and very comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Very comfortable for dancing and eating whatever I wanted without having to worry because of how it fit! Very bold dress, for sure stands out!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress no need for bra bc it won't work
links_Review_Text: Vibrant floral pattern with colors that pop. Can't do a bra. Very forgiving skirt. Satin material skirt.
Wore this at 29 weeks and it was by far my favorite dress I wore while pregnant. Vibrant colors, sexy, and very comfortable. I wish I owned it!

links_Review_Title: Fun print, but a little big
links_Review_Text: I wore this for one of my baby showers at 32 weeks pregnant. It fit relatively well and was definitely comfortable. It was a little big in the hip area and made me look larger than I am from the side. Overall, I liked it and would probably rent again and just size down.

This dress is an absolute dream! It arrived just in time for a last minute maternity shoot. I was 38 weeks and days away from giving birth and it fit perfectly. The make/cut of the dress is so well done that it will fit everyone. I wish I would have bought this one!
Loved this dress 6 months pregnant!

At 29 weeks, I was nervous about finding a festive dress for a rehearsal dinner, but this waistline falls beautifully above the bump and the pleated skirt has lots of room, even though I ordered my usual size. Got lots of compliments and felt great wearing it.
Loved this dress. Really comfortable. Easy. Breezy. Super flattering and perfect for summer BBQ
Loved this dress! Wore it to an outdoor wedding in summer. Flowy yet flattering. Length was fine- I'm 5'2 and it fit nicely. Very comfortable!!

links_Review_Title: Cutest rehearsal dinner dress for warm weather
links_Review_Text: Received so many compliments. It was super comfortable too. Considering buying, I don't want to send it back!
Fit like a glove. Adjustable straps with a tie front. Held the girls in comfortably without a bra (32DD). No zipper but had an elastic waistband below the tie front.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a country club rehearsal dinner in late September!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect! I wore it to a rehearsal dinner and received compliments all night. I wore a small and it fit true to size. The best part was I didn't even need a bra. I would 100% recommend this dress!
Even the small was a little big around the chest/waist, but still looked good and PERFECT for dancing! Definitely recommend for a colorful wedding or formal event option.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, flattering dress with a flirty skirt you can't resist twirling in!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a formal wedding so while it was pretty bright and a little scandy for my chest, it still worked for the mood of the evening. I'm a 34DDD, 5'5" and 29" waist so finding a dress that fits all parts of me perfectly is kinda tricky. The tied bust area made everything come together. The skirt was by far my favorite part! You won't want to stop dancing with it.

links_Review_Title: One of my favorite rentals ever!!!
links_Review_Text: Love love love. Received endless compliments. If you are debating sizes I would suggest sizing down.
Thinner material Not super tight so it's very flattering

Wore to a wedding and ordered a size up because I was nervous about the slit. It was a little loose in the back and arms, but I still received so many compliments. So unique but I felt super comfortable. I would recommend ordering true to size.
Super cute dress. I am normally a size 10-12 and could have probably gone with a size L vs the recommended XL. Wore to work with a leather jacket.
Loved the fit, print and the open back.

Wore for a bday and again on vacation. Can be dressed up or dressed down. Also wore in 70-80 degree weather in Miami and 30-40 degree weather in NY with tights and a coat. Very versatile - love the prints.

links_Review_Title: This dress was so cute! Perfect for a warm-weather :-)
links_Review_Text: The dress fit is true to size. The material was very light, loved the slit on the side (it's adjustable) and the back has a really cute bow! The dress is great and would recommend it for any occasion. I wore this for a photo-shoot.

I attended my husbandâ€™s employee dinner and this dress was absolutely beautiful. It was sophisticated with a hint of sexy. It was flowy and form-fitting in all the right places. I received multiple compliments throughout the evening and my husband thought I looked beautiful. I kept the jewelry simple and paired the dress with nude pumps and a nude clutch. Definitely a beautiful dress!

Rented this for a gala, loved the dress and details. Could have done without the tie at the bottom. I was able to hide it but tucking it up into the dress but for me it was an unnecessary element that cheapened the look of the dress.
Loved this dress! It does fit true to size (unlike most for love and lemons) I am a medium and got a large and it was a little big, still loved it though.
Loved this dress. It was business in the front with a cute little slit, and sexy in the back with cut outs. So many compliments!! Will definitely rent again

links_Review_Title: Making a fashion statement without spending a million dollars.
links_Review_Text: Love love love this dress! Perfect for hourglass shaped women; the print is fun, the slit is flirty and the back gives it a chic sexy look. Obsessed.
Loved the details, cut and demure sexiness of this dress! But runs very small as this brand normally does. Length was great for me at 5'10 do assume it runs long!!!
Wore for a rehearsal dinner I was a bridesmaid in - so many compliments!! Easy to dress up or down with accessories /for the weather. Loved this rental !
I like the open back and that the slit is adjustable (I have it up as far as it will go) I don't like how loose it is at the top - there is a bit of extra room in the chest.

links_Review_Title: I am obsessed with this dress!
links_Review_Text: I was drawn to this one but wasn't sure if it was too prim or if the bright purple and yellow would work. But I trusted the brand and jumped in. And wow. This dress is just gorgeous. It is beautiful, classy, flattering and so well made. It has so many touches that elevate it like the rouched puff sleeves that are slightly see-through and the interesting tie that cinches up the slit. And the open back is just so sexy. Rent it! You won't be sorry.

links_Review_Title: Super comfy and also a little sexy
links_Review_Text: Obsessed with this. Considered buying. It was flattering and the pattern is beautiful. The chest felt a little baggy but it didn't bother me. The tie in the back is great because it accommodates a range of body types.

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress to a nice restaurant for my birthday. It looked perfect for the occasion.
links_Review_Text: Dress fit perfectly and I have a large chest which is what I worried about. The back has ties but you can absolutely wear a bra with it since the ties cover where your bra strap would sit. I will definitely order this dress again!
This was sent when my original was unavailable. It looks better on... just not my style.
Loved this dress, it was cute and flirty but unfortunately did not get to wear. Will definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Pretty pattern, the back is super open
links_Review_Text: I liked the combination of patterns and fabrics and patterns on this dress, they made the dress flirty and feminine. Somehow I missed the fact that the dress is very open in the back, which would have made it a nice vacation rental but it also sat lower on me than shown on the model so I felt like it was a wardrobe malfunction waiting to happen.

I absolutely adored this dress. I got it to test sizing for a bachelorette party, but ended up wearing it to dinner out. For folks who are a size 0/2, this should fit just right in the waist, but I wished the tie in the back could be just a LITTLE tighter. If I sized up for the waist, the back ties would have been way too loose. I loved the mix of a conservative neckline with the fun leg/back.

links_Review_Title: Stunning and a compliment earner for sure!
links_Review_Text: With the tie and zipper in the back, there is little wiggle room. Fit was definitely true to size and being very flat up top, that was fine with me. I am only 5'4' and surprised how high the slit came so I adjusted the tie to come down as much as it could. For a Fall wedding, definitely still light and breezy for the dance floor. I received so many complements and made accessorizing each. I would love to own this dress!
Very pretty and unique print and material. The colors are perfect for a fall party. I received many compliments on this.

I wore this with a turtle neck under it to work and received so many compliments. The sleeves are not super voluminous and the skirt not inappropriate for work. I would rent again for a formal or fun occasion. So cute
Best dress I've ever rented! Received tons of compliments!

I rented this during quarantine for a "special occasion dress." I wore it to a zoom bachelorette and zoom Easter. It's a beautiful dress, the skirt is so fun and flouncy. It's not tight but skims the body, and is extremely flattering. Shape is different than anything I've rented, and I loved it. The tie in the front can be cinched to wear with a bra, but I also wore without for slightly sexier vibes. Awesome dress! Hard to photograph.
This dress is "prairie chic". Love the movement in the skirt and the fun sleeves, fit was perfect. Didn't want to return it!
Soft fabric, great for transitioning seasons, really pretty print and flattering cut, wanted to buy

links_Review_Title: Little house on the prairie vibes
links_Review_Text: Had to wear a cami to make it work appropriate thanks to the lace up detail. Fits true to size, LOTS of skirt, a cute playful little number.
Parting with this little number is going to be very hard! So flattering and have worn at least 5 times in 2 weeks.
Loved this easy dress! Slight pouf in the shoulder, lots of fabric in the skirt covers wider hips. Lots of compliments on it. Easy print to casualize with sneakers.
Very cute dress, I got lots of compliments. The skirt is heavy so it kept me warm. I went to a country themed party and this dress was perfect. Highly recommend!

This dress looks better in person than on the model photo, I rented it after seeing it on a staff member at the RTR Store. The dress is very well made and moves beautifully. The cut is flattering and the fabric feels very nice against the skin, unlike some of the cheaper polys and rayon. This dress is made for twirling and dreaming of how you'll be walking through the prairie, even if you're just sitting in the office.
Easy to wear. Zipper closure in the back. I was nervous about the drawstring in the front being too revealing for work, but I didn't have an issue with it. Fits true to size

links_Review_Title: Liked it... hair kept getting caught in zipper!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress is very cute. I wore to work with tights and ankle boots on casual Friday since (IMO) it is not quite business casual. I put my hair up but some how pieces closest to the back of my neck were constantly being grabbed by the zipper. Annoying but still happy I rented. I have a wide back and that part was slightly tight.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful piece that you can dress up or down
links_Review_Text: Wore this for Christmas Eve but would wear to work or out with dinner and switch up the shoes. Comfortable and elegant.
Great choice for someone with a large chest. The dress looks like a quality piece, fabric is very soft, and the fit is perfect. I absolutely loved it and will rent again.

links_Review_Title: In love; makes a great seasonal transition dress
links_Review_Text: Pretty fabric and pattern. I'm into florals and the darker colors work well for the cooler months. Gorgeous design - the collar, deep V and sleeve rouching. The top has drawstring and allows for a wide range of bust sizes. The skirt is really heavy, a good thing so it doesn't fly up and stays put over all the cold weather layers I'm wearing underneath so I can wear this around in cold NYC weather. Can be dressed up or down. At 5'3", 115#, 32B, XS is a good size. Recommend!
Not the best photo but this dress was so cute. I love how the neckline was high in the back. Lots of fabric makes it on the heavier side but it had a fun swish to it.
Fabulous dress. Interesting neck, fitted without being tight, extremely comfortable to wear.
Weight of dress was perfect for work. Very comfortable! I had to wear a cami bra underneath as the girls would have been way too exposed.

links_Review_Title: loved this dress. stylish and cute
links_Review_Text: I wore it to work with black leather boots but you can easily wear it on the weekend or for dinner.

links_Review_Title: Fun, different for winter! Ended up loving this!
links_Review_Text: Loved the high neck, long sleeves, fit of the bodice, flow of the skirt. Did not love the poofy sleeves so belted a long cardi/vest over top which covered the poof but kept the rest. Great weight for early winter with tights and knee boots.
This was beautiful but didn't work for my bust unfortunately!

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear it, too big and unflattering. wanted to love this dress, but it didnt work for me.
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear it, too big and unflattering. wanted to love this dress, but it didnt work for me.

This dress was so much fun to wear. The top has wonderful detail around the neck and the lace-up allows for some adjusting to get the right fit. The skirt is very full and has great movement. I wanted to twirl around in it. I received many compliments and would love to rent it again.
Super flattering, comfortable and pretty!

Luxe fabric, and super on-point cut. Everything from shoulders, to neckline, to midi length of this dress is perfect for right now. The fabric is also trendy and interesting. Perfect for all occasions- I wore it to a formal event, fun dinner, and work. I wanted to buy it!

I really loved this dress. Decided to rent something a bit "out of the box" for me and this was so great. Fit was true to size, it was so feminine and chic. There is a ton of fabric so its just super comfy
This is an easy dress. It fits pretty true to size except the arms are just slightly too tight, but not unmanageable. There's not much stretch in the material.

Rented as an option for my rehearsal dinner, but decided against it. This is a lovely jumpsuit, but did not fit my figure. I am an athletic shape, but I do have a decently defined waist and hips. The fit didn't really do much for my figure, but I bet curvier ladies would look great. There was plenty of room in the bust, and there was a modesty stitch to hold it together. At 5'7" there was plenty of room in the crotch, which I often struggle with in jumpsuits. The wrap front was great for hiding any stomach concerns, however it made the hemline on the pants look uneven. No matter how I stood one pant leg was noticeably longer than the other. I was annoyed, but others might be fine with it. Material was on the thicker side - I could see darker colored undies through the material, but no panty lines. Fabric might not be the best for very warm and humid climates. Overall a nice garment, just not right for my body.

So the size here is actually a US 8 I typically wear a 10/12 and this size was still a bit large on me I am small on the top but I even felt I had fabric on the hip that wasn't fitted. I really love the color I rented this as a trial fitting. I have a wedding in June I may size down again to get the best fit! Really different color and a lovely material.
The dress was perfect for a beach wedding. I received compliments all night and material is thick so very flattering.

links_Review_Title: â€œWho is the girl in the lime green dress?â€
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a beach wedding I went to. The material is thick enough it was very smoothing and flattering. I did not wear a bra and nothing showed through. I was complimented all night!

I'm pregnant and this had such a flattering fit and beautiful fabric ! I plan to take it in after the baby is here, just wanted to get my hands on it now as the fabric is stretchy enough for my growing belly !

links_Review_Title: Perfect body con dress for cocktail event
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove, accentuated my curves, felt great on my skin very breathable.

Loved this dress. It was a real showstopper. The color was perfect for a beach vacation. The material is thick enough to hold you in, but stretchy enough to be comfortable. No zipper, so it's very easy to get in to. The only slight negative is that the straps were really long, so they constantly fell down.

definet shoe stopper. great color wore it to a black tir event with silvrr shoes and white purse and short 50s style jacket. in a fprest of dark dresses and tuxes this dress stands out. will def rent again!!

Looked great and the color really popped. It was nice and form fitting, but I definitely could've gotten the smaller size. The straps were too long for me so the neckline was lower than I wanted but still looked great. Gave me a lot of confidence that night.

links_Review_Title: Retro vibe and unusual color f
links_Review_Text: Fun! Loved the color and you stand out in that shade of green. Very old Hollywood look
Amazing dress. It was a little big but still looked great!
Absolutely love. Vibrant mint color. Perfect for a night out. Very sexy with the slit. Would rent again for sure. No zipper to put on FYI.

This dress fit great, I probably could've gone down a size-the material is stretchy but thick. Super flattering, major Rachel in "The One Where No One's Ready" vibes!! Straps could definitely be a little long for some people
Amazing sexy dress for date night. Wore with rainbow accessories and received so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: size 6 was way too big for me unfortunately!
links_Review_Text: great thick fabric, comfortable feel. Couldn't wear it :(

links_Review_Title: WOW. This dress was AMAZING. Super understated and elegant. The slit is stunning
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'11" 135lb and wore a 6R. It fit perfect.

links_Review_Title: Stunning fabric perfect for a "derby" occassion
links_Review_Text: Absolutely stunning material and fit. So elegant. The color is exactly as pictured
Hit calf in unflattering place. Gorgeous color and would have loved it if it had fit.
Got tons of compliments, loved the color

Love this dress and can't wait to wear it for my birthday! Was slightly panicked based on the reviews that it might run small especially since I've been on the heavier side of average lately... ironically this is the best fitting of the 4 items I ordered in my first RTR unlimited order. The material is delicate and high quality but the lining protects and acts as a buffer. It's definitely short but decent coverage considering all things. I'm usually a size 4 and 28-29 in jeans.

This dress was incredibly beautiful. It fit like a glove and was playful. The details with buttons down the sleeves, pleating in the "skirt", corset details, pops of shimmer were perfect. I wore this to Oprah's 2020 vision tour and had people compliment the dress the whole day!
Tons of details. The dress was comfy and definitely a head turner.

I'm glad I had 2 sizes as I went with the larger size. May want to go up a size as this is a European brand and they run small. Besides that the dress was super comfortable and I received tons of complements! Fits great for a short torso petite girl!!
rented an 8, fit true to size, amazing sleeves, tons of compliments all night! bit of a drop waist, which might be clear but i was surprised by that component!

A must rent! I ended up wearing the smaller size the 8, it was a little short but nothing a little pair of black shorts couldn't help to make me feel comfortable. Compliments all night at my work holiday party. Such an adorable dress and not super tight so very easy to move around in.

If you appreciate details, and standing out, this is your dress. UK sizing. So the 10 was perfect for a size 6. I actually would have preferred it a bit more fitted through the corset area but you can tighten it a little. This dress was definitely a conversation starter. Zoom into to see all the detailing on the RTR listing.
Wore this to thanksgiving and LOVED everything about it. Shoulder pads added such a fun touch.
Fit great. Went with the RTR recommended size and it worked well. I'm normally a 10 and did the 14. Cute, shirt mini. Was cute for my party.

Would buy this if it wasn't so $$$ - so many compliments throughout the day. I usually wear size 4 but sometimes a 6 and went with the UK 10 (US 6) - definitely would not have wanted it to be shorter or tighter, this runs on the smaller sides. Sleeves are slightly scratchy due to the metallic thread but so worth it. Also it's not a real/adjustable corset, sort of a stretchy design over the dress. Will definitely rent again.
Super comfortable, flattering, appropriate for a lot of different occasions, but still has a wow/edgy factor. Would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a night out!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress in Vegas for a birthday dinner and I couldn't have been happier with the quality! I got so many compliments and it looks so nice in person. Definitely has a little bit more shine than pictured but it was awesome. The corset middle is tight but everything fits really well and is flattering. I would 100% rent again.

Love the fabric, the shoulder pads. The ties on the side of the corset can be adjusted. I'm a size 2 US. The 8 was perfect. This dress is beautiful, every detail from the fabric to the cut makes it very unique

links_Review_Title: So Short my Butt was Visible when Standing
links_Review_Text: This dress is not for taller people unless you plan on wearing leggings underneath. The dress was so short on me that I didn't even need to bend for my butt to show, just stand. Overall the fabric was OK. The pattern is very nice.

Wore this to the ballet. The corset was such a stunning detail. However it does not adjust. I'm 5'8 and found it to be very short but I wore dark tights which helped. The material is gorgeous and I got tons of compliments.
It fit great except I am 4'10 so everything was a tad long, but still looked good.

links_Review_Title: The twirly skirt and glittery fabric were everything!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a work party and it was perfect. I'm petite so the length was just right. It fit well and looked super luxe. Tons of compliments and the skirt accentuated all my dance moves.

Beautiful fabric and great, edgy style but just did not work for me. The sleeves and shoulders did not lie properly so the shoulder kept flopping over instead of standing up like in the model. Also I am only 5'2" and it was insanely short. Perhaps if you have longer arms this works better. And definitely size up.

This dress is beautifully made and for those who enjoy details, you will appreciate the tailoring, intricate corset and button sleeves. That said, I went two sizes up and still couldn't fit into this dress. It was tight in the bodice and BARELY covered my bum. I'm only 5'6" and have never had this issue, I had to laugh as I looked like a figure skater or contestant on Dancing with the Stars!

links_Review_Title: Rented this to wear to an art show, should have sized down.
links_Review_Text: Fun dress. I ordered a slightly bigger size than I needed so the top was a little large.

links_Review_Title: this dress is everything. love it!
links_Review_Text: no cons

Cannot rave enough about this dress!!! I held onto it for almost the whole month and I probably wore it five different times to completely different events from work-concert-date and it was appropriate and flattering for all! Looks great with heels or bloots and a cute hat. I'm 5'2 and it hit a few inches above the knee. I received SO many compliments in this dress if I hadn't worn it so many times already I would buy it!
An incredibly short dress that reminded me of a figure skater. Not the best. Also ran small.

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up wearing it...Poor fit on the top half.
links_Review_Text: This was a disappointment! It had an odd look on the torso that wasn't flattering. I'm petite on top and the smallest size available was too baggy. It was short as well, but the length wouldn't have been a deal breaker if it looked better on top. Honestly, it looked cheap in real life.

links_Review_Title: Great dress with lots of detail. Just a little short for my liking.
links_Review_Text: Great dress with lots of detail. Just a little short for my liking.
Cottony and comfy! Feels a tiny bit short. Wore it to work and to an after work event. Got tons of compliments. Material wrinkles easily but the print does a pretty good job of hiding it.

I enjoy how this dress looks but I did not anticipated it will be as oversized as it was, I love the fabric and that despite the over large feeling the fabric was light weight. I am 5"3 and around 140 lbs and the dress was not too short.
Sized down based on other reviews. Looks cute with braided tie around waist / loved this dress! Shorter than what I normally wear, but not too short

Love the a-Line frame of this dress, but the best part of it, is the hemline! I really should have ordered a size or two smaller; it definitely ran bigger than I anticipated but that didn't stop me from wearing it and enjoying a twirl or two!
Loved this dress! I'm usually around a 6 and got a medium but there was a lot of material on the bottom so I'd definitely rent the small next time, and I willl be renting it again!
Loved the dress more than I thought I would. Runs large- size down. Super cute pick. Tons of compliments. It's very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed with how fun this was!
links_Review_Text: Wore to a rehearsal party and it was perfect. So fun, flirty and best of all- super comfortable. Usually wear a S/M, it was definitely roomy. Loved and would definitely rent again.

I decided to belt it with one of my belts I already owned and loved the outcome! I got many compliments on the color and fit! The dress is a little short, but it's super fun and the colors are fabulous for a beach or spring wedding!
I would rent this dress over and over and over again. Would LOVE to have more Rhode at RTR. The length was perfect and flattering-not too long not too short. Super fun and comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Lot of material but so fun
links_Review_Text: Loved this rental! I wrapped the belt around my waist twice to help cut down on the extra fabric and shorten the length of this dress. It's super lightweight/definitely blows up in the wind, so be careful there. But I loved it so much still.

links_Review_Title: Great daytime party dress that's forgiving!
links_Review_Text: This was my first experience with RTR. I found this dress in a boutique and didn't want to pay full price for a dress I knew I'd be wearing once for my own birthday party. I knew a small fit great from trying it on, but when it came time to order, small was sold out so I opted for an XS and backup M. The XS was the winner, since the M was too long and frumpy on my shorter frame. The only difference I noticed in the two sizes was the length and amount of fabric at the hem, so only size up or get your true size if you're super tall, otherwise I'd say size down. The rest of the dress is breezy and comfortable. If you want a form-fitting dress, this isn't it, but it's a great option if you want to be playful! Everyone absolutely loved it.

I've been dying for a Rhode Elle dress all year and was so excited when RTR got this one in! I've been worried even the large would be too short but it looked fine and with shorts under felt fine too! Love loved this dress, so sad I couldn't afford to keep it.
This dress is very oversized and flowy but I loved it so much! It's such a cute print and the belt is amazing

IT'S SO PRETTY! I wish I had a better photo. I got so many compliments and felt so pretty and girly. Wore with white sneakers to work and changed into black sandals for a date. It's definitely short but flouncy enough to make that okay, I think.

I wore this for a bridal party, and it was SO CUTE! I love the colors and pattern, and it was comfy and fun. The braid belt looked really cute with it. I wore it with chunky sandals during the day and then later wore flat sandals to a bar and it still looked really cute. Got lots of compliments. I would definitely recommend sizing down--I'm a size 10 and the medium fit great.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric and lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: True to fit, comfortable, light fabric for Florida summer. Fun and flirty in a conservative way. Loved the little bit of flare and movement towards bottom of dress.

I loved this dress so much. The colors are vibrant and the print made it feel like I was away on the coast of France. The material was a comfortable weight for summertime. It felt bohemian but not crunchy-granola.

Probably one of my favorite rentals to date. Definitely a statement piece but so so fun! Got so many compliments. It does run a bit large, but you can use the belt to define your waist. So fun, breezy and perfect for summer. Wish I could keep.

This dress is awesome! I absolutely love the print - it's super vibrant and fun. The cut is sort of 1970's ish - so cute. I paired it with my own belt because I don't like rope belts, but it looked good both ways! Fabric is super breathable but is layered enough at the skirt so as not to be see-through. I'm considering purchasing it!

I rented this for vacation in Mexico and it was the perfect birthday dinner dress! Typically would have rented a M but the L was the only size available, because of the belt it worked but would have preferred the M or S to have a little less excess fabric in the bust. Great dress for all shapes but looked great on an hourglass. Very fun to dance in and the fabric is light enough that despite having long sleeves it works in hot weather. Will absolutely rent again.
Runs massive, definitely size down!

links_Review_Title: wanted to twirl. Makes you look bigger than what you are however it is so cute I didn't even mind
links_Review_Text: Pros so cute many compliments makes you feel so girly Cons makes you look a bit bigger than what you are but such a fun dress!

Was deciding between this dress and a more formal, body hugging option. I had to go with this dress because it made me feel so happy and ready to dance the night away. I hope RTR gets more colors/prints of this Rhode dress soon!
It shows when you bend
Wore this dress to a shower and got lots of compliments. Fun, colorful summer dress
Really large. I'm 5 '0 so it looked like a tent on me
Cute dress. Fit well.
I usually hate body con type dresses! But this is so flattering, tight but not uncomfortable show all your wrinkles tight. Highly recommend
It was perfect
This is short, but adorable. The bottom is ruched so hides any flaws. I do feel like this didn't flatter my shape as well as some other dresses, but it's beautiful and my husband loved it.

The dress worked great for my NYE outfit. The cheetah print on the fabric takes it from a plain black dress to a really fantastic dress. The ruching also hides all the right parts and accentuates the booty. The top is a little tight compared to the bottom, so be aware of you have a larger chest (I'm a 34DD).

links_Review_Title: Great fit, great fabric, subtle way to show curves
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a work Christmas party and it was perfect! Great fit! Great to show off curves without being too revealing! The fabric/print is subtle and adorable!
I loved this dress, it was a little small but once that zipper came up it was so flattering
This dress is so short and the slit in the front shows everything!! I wasn't able to wear it

links_Review_Title: Snug in all the right places
links_Review_Text: The shoulder straps are adjustable! The slit was the perfect length. Just a perfect fit all around for a petite body!
I loved this dress so much! I received a lot of compliments in it too. The tone on tone small leopard print is so pretty. The straps are adjustable which was nice.

links_Review_Title: Beyond flattering! Wish this came in every color and length!
links_Review_Text: Pulled this off the rack as a backup to the other 100 party dresses I was trying on for a holiday party. Didn't even finish zipping it up before thinking, welp I'm getting this one. SO SO SO flattering. Got non stop compliments all night long. If you have an hour glass figure like me do not think twice. I'm a 34E and was fine not wearing a bra which is my ideal situation. Loved how it nipped me in at the waist and the asymmetric hem made my legs look 10x longer than they actually are. Felt like a million bucks. I am usually a size 8 and the medium was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Unable to wear as it was too tight, but overall flattering dress/print. Size up if between sizes.
links_Review_Text: Good length - not too short although only 5'2". Liked the print and cut.
Super flattering and comfortable dress!
We went to an emo cover show at a punk rock bar for Valentine's Day. This dress fit the bill.
The color combination makes this dress so fabulous! Definitely a head-turner and very comfortable to wear! I wore this to a fancy dinner party and got so many compliments. Just rent this dress!

I rented the two smallest sizes, and the "small" fit in the body much better than the "extra small" although under the arms bulged out a little. Overall, the fit is flattering, the fabric is breathable/stretchy/still thick enough to feel of quality, and the design is elegant but still fun. Tons of compliments. I feel like I cheated the system with such a low rental price, too.

links_Review_Title: Very slimming and flattering on hips and waist
links_Review_Text: I intentionally wore shape wear to conceal any visible pantyline but I didn't even need to after all the fabric quality is very comfortable and the straps were nice and secure. Would definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: Rent it! So much fun to wear.
links_Review_Text: It is super comfortable with mid-weight fabric and beautiful colors. Everyone commented on the fit and color all night. Worth it!

Loved this dress. Fit really well, especially once I adjusted the straps up top. I got compliments all night on how flattering and fun this was! For being a form fitting dress, it was actually fairly comfortable and easy to dance in.

I normally wear a medium so I ordered S & M and I preferred the way the medium fit but it was too large in the chest, so I went with the small. For a bit tighter than I'd like but this dress is so thick and gorgeous. Definitely a show stopper
This dress is sexy, show stopper, it's true to size, the material is thick, got a bunch of compliments all through the night!

I don't usually gravitate to form fitting spaghetti strap dresses, but I'm so glad I chose this dress for a late summer wedding. I went with the medium, it fit tighter and held everything in (went braless). I loved the way I looked and felt and received soo many compliments throughout the night. I stood out from the crowd in the best way. Would recommend and rent again!

BEAUTIFUL dress. Thick fabric, and adjustable straps which were a game changer as I have a very short torso and small chest. I am usually a 2-4 in dresses and the SR was a perfect fit. I am 130 lbs and 5'2 but a little wider hips and butt compared to my waist and chest size. I LOVED this dress. Extremely comfortable and flattering. Would recommend for any body type or height. Can't wait to rent this dress again.

Dress fit perfectly -- material is on thicker side so shapes really nicely. I'm tall and it was still on the longer side so something to watch out for. Color is exactly in the photo and really unique!

links_Review_Title: I don't normally wear red or pink, but the two colors together was perfect!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove! The material is heavy which I loved because it's slimming. The top is snug, but it was perfect because I'm small up top so it gave the illusion that I have boobs! Lol I received a lot of compliments! I would highly recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Standout piece and fit like a glove!
links_Review_Text: Perfect for a nice occasion without wearing a full gown! So many compliments and the colors are so bold and gorgeous. Compliments all night :)

Thick, quality fabric holds you in while being very comfortable for fall. Design is beautiful and so much fun. Chest area is a little large but the adjustable straps help with that (34B/C). If you're narrow ribbed, size down. Hit mid calf (5'9"). So many compliments from friends, random wedding guests, and even the band! ~Cowboy hat was not a permanent outfit addition ;) ~
I liked this thicker fabric although I did still wear a spanx. Really nice for curves! Color is great; lots of compliments for a summer wedding.
Absolutely will rent it again! Wow!
The dress fit like a glove! It was super comfortable and very flattering!! Are usually wear two or four and the small fit perfectly!

links_Review_Title: Great for pregnant ladies! 30 weeks along
links_Review_Text: Normally I'm a 2-4, so I rented a 6. It was snug but comfortable. There are adjustable straps which is great and the length was great especially for a formal event. Highly recommend for my pregnant renters.

I'm 5'4 and typically wear a 4. I ordered both the small and medium. I wore the small. The material is thick but doesn't weigh you down. I liked that the straps were adjustable so you can size it to your liking.
Super fun dress. Runs a little large. Thick material, very bright. Received many compliments! I'm 5'10 and this dress was perfect length- probably wouldn't recommend for shorter sizes due to length.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fun dress for a non formal party!
links_Review_Text: Fit was #amazing. Hugged #curves right while still hid the #belly. The design on the front makes the dress even more flattering while giving fun detail. Not overly formal, so it's hard to think of an event this dress would be appropriate for, but if you find one. Wear it!
I worn this to a summer wedding and loved everything about it!! It is so flattering and comfortable!

This dress fit perfectly. I have small boobs so the medium had extra fabric around the sides up top. Small fit perfectly and fit like a glove! Would definitely recommend this dress for stylish comfort! Q

I'm 5'2" , 126, and curvy. There wasn't a need for a bra but ended up with a strapless. The material is heavy, but still stretchy and comfortable enough to dance in. It felt fresh and youthful compared to typical wedding attire. Husband and friends loved it. Would totally recommend.

links_Review_Title: Definitely a showstopper of a dress!
links_Review_Text: The color is absolutely as advertised â€” so bright. I ordered the size M, with L as my backup. Ideally, I would actually be between the two (I am a classic size 6) â€” I absolutely had to rely on Spanx for a cohesive silhouette with the M. The L gapped & hung too much to be wearable. It is low-cut, but I donâ€™t have a large chest (34B) so it was a complete non-issue for me. The top stayed put all night with a LOT of dancing! The slit is not so high that I couldnâ€™t wear mid-thigh-length Spanx underneath & I donâ€™t think they showed. I usually fear a midi length for my thick calves (I am 5â€™6), but with high heels, this was perfect. Such a fun party dress â€” I recommend!

This dress was a perfect rental option. You couldn't wear it more than once due to it being so different! It was fitting in all the right places. Was a bit busty but the medium was just too long. Fabric is very thick and colors are SO vibrant.

links_Review_Title: This dress was the hit of the wedding! Almost more than the bride...oops! Â¯\_(ãƒ„)_/Â¯
links_Review_Text: Size up if your hips are more than 10" bigger than your waist! I go a medium but it was a tight fit and I was NOT taking long steps. This dress has a thick lining and is high quality so its quite warm despite being strapless. It looks great in person, and the cut is super feminine and is meant to emphasize an hourglass shape. 10/10, would buy and I will look at the other dresses from this designer <3.
I ended up wearing the large instead of the XL. It fit great and I got compliments :) the material is nice and thick but still a tiny bit stretchy so you can move around easily and dance.
I had compliments on this dress all night! It does run a bit small and the material is heavy. But it showed off my curves, and I had fun wearing it!

Iâ€™m 5â€™7 and curvy so I went with the medium. Loved the stretchy material which made it so comfortable. Wished it was a little shorter but I still would wear this again. Received a ton of compliments!

This dress is perfect for the hourglass figure girls! It was form fitting without being tight - and the pattern accentuates your waist perfectly. I could have worn either the large or the XL - I'm typically an 8 in a dress that's fitted over the hips. The large would have worked but wouldn't have allowed for as much movement and comfort. I wore Spanx and a regular bra, but the material is thick, so you could go without the Spanx. One fit note: I'm a DD and this was still slightly baggy in the dress. Overall, I loved it and the colors were bright and perfect! A lot of compliments!
Such a unique and amazing dress, I got so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Multiple women on the streets of NYC were stopping me to compliment my dress!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly. I'm 5'6 and 130lbs. Women on the streets of NYC were stopping me to compliment my dress. I've never been complimented on any article of clothing more than I have in this dress. It was super comfortable and easy to move in. Loved it!
Such a flattering fit due to the thick material. The colors are so bright and beautiful. Definitely rent this!!!!!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for an August SoCal wedding
links_Review_Text: Fits like a glove. Colors are super fun. Length keeps it classy. Probably wouldn't wear it again just because it's so distinctive. But that's what made it the perfect rental!
Great fit, coloring is very complimentary to any figure. Great statement dress

This dress was actually my back up dress. After slipping into it, it was clearly the dress to wear. It hugged my curves and the vibrant colors were great. It is a comfortable fabric that has some give, so you can move freely while dancing. I loved that the straps were adjustable. In a sea of little black dresses, this dress stood out. I received so many compliments on this dress and felt really great in it.

I loved the dress style and the fabric was stretchy and thick. I should have gotten a size large instead of an XL (which is what RTR recommended for my measurements) because it was a little big and didn't fit as well as it could have. Fun colors though!
This dress was a dream. Fit like a glove and I got so many compliments. So happy it worked out so well!

Loved the color, cut, fabric...but there were zero tassels on my item...none on the ties or hem...and it came new with tags. It's a cover up more than a dress, even though it has tailored cuffs. Way overpriced.

Loved this dress after a couple of adjustments. It is silk and the print is really flattering, picture doesn't do it justice. Loved the sleeves. It is a little tricky getting on and the zipper was a bit sticky. To prevent gaping in the chest I used double sided fabric tape and that worked out perfectly. I rented to have something special for Easter/wedding anniversary even though we were quarantining. Would love to rent again for date night. Too short for work imo.

It was super wrinkled upon arrival and since it was opening night for Spring Break In Quarantine, I let it stay wrinkled because who has time for ironing. I could have pressed this till it was flat and glassy and it would not have made me look sexy or even remotely attractive. I didn't care, this was a comfort rental. Rich in weight and very loud when walking because of the stiff cotton. Styled barefoot in the house and with dumb boots for a dog walk.

Rented this for a trip to Florida and LOVED. It was super comfortable and very light. The color is to die for and I got so many compliments! Sizing was great, I went with the small and it was perfect.
Got lots of compliments. Quite long. Good for tall women.
So disappointing, even at 6 months pregnant doesn't fit right. Maybe for a tall and slim figure?
IN LOVE WITH THIS DRESS!! It is so fun to wear! It is such a statement piece. It's light and airy. Would be amazing in the summer!
For me, this one was too baggy. I love my clothes baggie but it just look like a big sheet. Also, the fabric was on the windbreaker side? Which made it a little wrinkly and odd looking.
Nice fit, pretty sleeves. Pretty comfortable. Hit just above the knee on me as I'm petite.

I loved how this dress fit and I got so many compliments all night!! It was comfortable and so flattering. The sleeves do not stretch so if you have bigger arms, like me, definitely size up! Overall I was so happy with this dress!
Cute and classy
If you have hips or a booty, consider sizing up! I wore a small and was fine, but think a medium would have been more comfortable. I found myself really worried my booty was peeking ;)
Short but flirty - I loved it!

Pay attention to the size recommendation! I normally wear a 12 and was a little taken aback when I was recommended for a 4xl but glad I listened. It was a little roomy but in a flattering way. The sleeves are a bit long if you are on the shorter side but wasn't a problem for me (5'9")

I'll start with the size, I am usually size 10-12. However, the dress I got was 2XL and it fit perfect! I wore it to work & received to many compliments. The one thing that was annoying after a while were the sleeves, but that just a minor thing. Over all, beautiful dress!
Love this dress it fits like it was made for me but is very short, I'm only 5'3 and tights were necessary for this dress.

I loved this dress! I wore it to a networking event with booties and got compliment after compliment on how great I looked. I usually wear a large and I thought the fit was great. The flare at the bottom was adorable. I was really happy with the dress - it was comfortable and adorable and the right length for me.

Absolutely loved this dress. It's super flirty with the short cut but classy with the long sleeves. Loved the bell sleeves and how comfortable this dress was. I got a lot of compliments and felt great.

I loved this dress and it was great for my event. Even my husband loved it and he is a tough customer :) I do agree with other reviewers that it is short. I don't know if I would have been able to wear it without black tights, but otherwise great dress!

I loved this dress even more than I thought I would. The flowers are embroidered on which is a really nice touch and helps this dress work for evening/formal events. It is a little bit short when you raise your arms up, but overall didn't affect my experience wearing it. I would highly recommend!

I'm short - and so is this dress! If I couldn't wear it with tights I might not have been comfortable wearing it. The flutter sleeves & embroidery are nice touches & the fit was perfect (no stretch) other than the length being short.
i wore this dress for my engagement pictures & felt so feminine & pretty! the length was just what i wanted but it is pretty short so be careful bending down or over. would rent over & over again!!
Have rented this dress on two separate occasions. One for a rehearsal dinner party and for New Year's Eve. Received tons of compliments. I'm short, so the sleeves are quite long.
Great fit! Sweet design. Very comfortable and well paired with tights and boots for a cold night.
Wore it for a dinner and night out. A tiny bit tight but loved it!
Dress was slightly too big in the waist, other than that the dress fit great and I received tons of compliments

links_Review_Title: Loved it even more than I thought I would!
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit! Not exactly form fitting but not boxy at all, hangs very nicely. Wore it to an engagement party in the late fall, was very appropriate even with the sheer sleeves, would totally rent again!

This dress has beautiful floral embroidering across it, is so comfy and is lightweight while still covering up your entire arm. This was perfect for a cocktail party outside during October. Would rent again!
Ran true to size, comfortable, can be dressed up or down, non stop compliments throughout the day
Nice fit but pretty short (I am 5'7). Really pretty details. Definitely worth renting!
Such a fun versatile dress for the weekend.
Beautiful black and yellow dress you can wear from day to night!
This dress is adorable. Fun, flirty, and formal. The only issue I ran into was how short it was. I ended up having to wear tights underneath.
I am short and this was a perfect length--Not sure someone tall could wear it

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately this dress didn't work for me.
links_Review_Text: Was a bit tight. Ordered XS and I'm 5'0" and 103 pounds. The XS was too snug all around and wasn't comfortable. I thought the print was a bit busy for me too. Unfortunately did not wear it.

Loved the fit! I'm 5'2 and felt it was just the right length but may be short on taller ladies. Didn't think the waist was too big either and liked the flared skirt. Could toss a sweater over it to dress it down and take it out in the evening for drinks.

links_Review_Title: Was flattering and easy to dance in!
links_Review_Text: Not too short, not too long. Was fitting but hid any bulges.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress. Fun and flirty.
links_Review_Text: The size I wanted was not available so ordered size up. Turned out a good move. Fit across the chest perfect. Length was perfect too. Shoulders and waist a bit roomy but fine. Loved it.

Perfect for a more-casual winter wedding. I am normally a Medium but ended up wearing the Large which was a bit roomy but more comfortable. It's a little short, but I wore it with shear black tights so it wasn't a problem.
Loved this dress! Definitely a short and sassy dress! I got many complements it is an adorable dress! I would rent again maybe next size up as it was a little snug up top. But LOVED it!
Cute dress, flattering fit... doesnâ€™t accentuate my stomach, short in length which I like.
Loved the dress but it was a little short for me at 5'7".

links_Review_Title: Wonderful event - the dancing was amazing
links_Review_Text: The dress fit me pretty much everywhere. A little room in the chest, but i'm a small A/B cup so thats normal for me. Length is great (5'4). Definitely WOULD recommend this dress!
fit well
Overall large. No real shape. Lovely fabric though.

The sleeves are extremely long in this. Dress also runs extremely small but the size I got fit perfectly. Didn't end up wearing it because I didn't end up attending event. Would possibly rent again. Very flattering fit.

links_Review_Title: Too big but also very short.
links_Review_Text: Not my favorite for fit but loved the pattern and fabric.
I wasn't crazy about the bell sleeves, but the rest of the dress fit like a glove. Very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Perfect top to wear with dressy skirts
links_Review_Text: This top was perfect to go with a dressy skirt. It is low cut so I had to tape it. I think I am going to keep it because it goes with so many things in my closet. The arms do run small like the other reviewers say but once it's on it looks great!
was super cute. wore with a low bralette and was perfect for night out!

links_Review_Title: Great style / arms too small to be forgivable.
links_Review_Text: Listen to the reviews on the arm holes when renting this one. I wore this top for a 4-5 hour date night and although the neckline and puff sleeves were beautiful, they were not worth the loss of circulation in my arms at the end of the evening.

I tried and I tried but I couldn't get over the shoulders. It made me feel like a body builder. If you're into that look you will love this top, it just wasn't for me. I had no issues with the arms like other ladies mentioned and I would have sized down had I known, but this fit comfortably.

links_Review_Title: This shirt was such a hit!
links_Review_Text: I want / NEED to buy this shirt. It's perfect. It was comfortable. Fit perfectly and hit in all the good places. All of my girlfriends couldn't get over it either. A MUST try if you haven't already.
I have a large bust and smaller waist, and this was so complementary of both. It is a little low, so if I were wearing it to a work event I'd probably wear a camisole underneath.

Well, I should have taken the reviews more seriously. Yesterday, the body of the top fit fine, but the arms were a nightmare. So small. So, so small. I was considering squeezing through the (arm) pain to wear for one night, but I must have bloated overnight because today when I tried it on again the arms were even tighter. Squeezed my arm like a blood pressure taker. Back to RTR without a wear :'(

links_Review_Title: Runs both small and large somehow
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to love it and I did love the look at feel of it in person but the sleeves were super small and tight while the chest was huge. It was a good length though and fit perfectly in the torso. Just disproportionate all around.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top, TIGHT in the arms!!
links_Review_Text: I rented this to pair with dark jeans and am disappointed it didn't fit quite right. The openings for the arms are TIGHT. Otherwise a beautiful top made of high quality fabric.

links_Review_Title: Super sexy and very flattering on curves
links_Review_Text: This is a winner for sure because it is just so versatile!

links_Review_Title: This was such a cool dress!
links_Review_Text: It was big on the shoulders but a real winner!
I received so many compliments on this. Great for a curvy/ athletic figure as it hugs in all the right places. Such a fun comfortable dress. Will definitely be renting again.

Wore this dress for Thanksgiving dinner. Loved the fall inspired print and ruched detail along the front and sides of the dress. This was super flattering to wear and was perfect to hide the food baby that would appear after dinner!

Fabulous cut and details. This style has so many nice features with a hook closure for cleavage, or not, if you prefer. Slit somewhat adjustable, though once I pulled the strings I could not figure out how to lengthen again. But still great. I'm not a print person, and this is not my favorite, but still a total 5 stars. Wearing a bit more before returning.

Pros: -Great print -Love the cut. The slit is sexy without being trashy -Comfy and versatile Cons: -Bunches when you walk, so could appear that you have a pouchy tummy -the long strings on top are unnecessary and a bit annoying

links_Review_Title: A dress you can wear to anything...
links_Review_Text: I love this dress. I wore to a wine tasting and received compliments all night. Flattering and comfortable. Would highly recommend, can be dressed up, or dressed down. For reference, I am curvy, and this dress was perfect on me.

initially got this for a weekend in montauk and ended up wearing it again to brunch another time (bc there were no pics the first time so it didn't count). i love this dress soo much. the slit was kinda sexy and had me feeling myself (as seen in picture) this could easily be dressed up or down. i cant recommend this dress enough!

Please ignore the fact that I look ridiculous in this photo I had just had to share because this dress is epic. I wore it for a bachelorette winery day where the theme was sundresses. This dress was spot on and hugged my curves in a way sundresses usually can't. It's got some really interesting details and plenty of room in the chest for us busty girls. I wish I had a reason to hold onto it but hopefully I'll find an excuse to rent again.
This was loose on me and the fabric was too lightweight for my taste.

This dress was so pretty! Vibrant colors, great material, and the ruching makes it super special. I got so many compliments on this. The slot was still tasteful enough to wear to work. I'm bigger on bottom than I am on top so I did have extra fabric above my waist but it still didn't look bad. Fabric does have some stretch to it so I probably could have made the 10 work as well. Definitely recommend!
Gorgeous dress, fits true to size... I made the mistake of sizing up- don't do that. Super flattering (if you buy your true size).

links_Review_Title: family vacation, out to dinner dress
links_Review_Text: it fit perfect and was very flattering. I would rent this again!

Extremely flattering and comfortable. The picture does not do it justice. One of these days I am going to post an actual photo wearing these dresses because I know it helps so much. If you are curvy, this is a fantastic option because it hugs you in all the right places and offers forgiveness in the other areas.

links_Review_Title: Adored this dress. Perfect for day and night. Really flattering
links_Review_Text: Wore with a jean jacket for daytime. Fit perfectly - not too loose but not too tight. Very classy fit.

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable, can be worn up or down.
links_Review_Text: Bigger in chest area, flattering for mid section tummy.

links_Review_Title: Really pretty dress. The season changed here though and it's too summery.
links_Review_Text: Pretty, sexy dress. Love the colors and fabric.

Love the Veronica Beard fit with the rouching/asymmetry. Sexy, easy. Just wore at a casual summer gathering with flip-flops. I would have kept it another week to wear out with heels but there are too many other items I want to rent right now!

links_Review_Title: Stunning with such well made details
links_Review_Text: Veronica Beard always has the best fit and details. The neckline was low enough but not too low and the fitted hips were perfect. Loved this dress!

the colors and print were super cute, but the cut and shape made this the most flattering yet comfortable dress ever (sad i had to part w it). the skirt was long but had a slit that gave some sass (the height of the slit was adjustable w the cinching string), the cleavage had a clasp so u could give more or less cleavage. the cinching not only made it so flattering, but the ruffles gave so much more shape and curves where you would want them. all around i felt so comfortable in this dress but so good. (i would have bought if it weren't for the hefty price)
I really wanted to like this but it was not flattering and the top was huge compared to the bottom.
Tricky to snap all the buttons but once it was on it fit like a glove. Fabric was perfect for summer
Silhouette is so alluring but not inappropriate. Felt comfy but sexy

links_Review_Title: matrials was much lighter then thought, hung very oddly int the back I did not wear it
links_Review_Text: did not wear it fit oddly in the back a little snug in waist
Very unflattering
I am really into loose-fitting dresses. This is not for the boardroom or a Fox News anchor. But it's elegant and comfortable and way on-trend. Might keep this one.

I don't know if I would actually wear this out because it reveals midriff. But the neckline and fabric were perfect for my headshots. Loved that the wrap had a button inside so there wasn't that waist wrap hole you sometimes get.

I loved this top with a high waisted skirt (The Fifth Label orange.black zebra print). It was a little snug, but not enough to classify that it runs small. I am also not well endowed which would definitely change the fit of this top.
It was cropped very short and the bust was too big for the size

I rented this dress for a saint Patrick's day celebration. I read the other reviews which said it ran small and tight. That is very true. I am a normal 4/6 and ordered in an eight because of other reviews. I did not wear this dress because it was so tight and does not have any give . If I had ordered two sizes up it would've been a great dress however the straps would've probably fallen off of my shoulders. If it had been a stretchy material it would have been much better.
Great color. Bottom is very tight. Size up
The color is beautiful and the dress fit true to size. I was able to comfortably dance the night away.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress, but so tight!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved the look of this dress and am usually a 6, sometimes a 4, with an athletic build. The 6 was very tight to zip and I would've been too uncomfortable to wear all night. But I decided to order a larger size for another wedding because the dress was fireeee!

So glad I sized up- regularly a 2 and the 4 was perfect. Was longer on me than the model but didn't bother me as I could still dance! Loved that I didn't have to wear a bra as the chest was tight enough without- May be roomy on smaller chested people

I picked this dress up at the RTR store and I was disappointed to find that it didn't fit as tightly as I wanted it to around my stomach. The women in the store were soooo nice and helped me find an 8, but I found that I couldn't sit comfortably in the smaller size. I wore the 10 and it was A HIT! Literally someone stick their head out of a taxi to tell me they loved my dress! It was super comfy and in pics I just had my bf hold the middle tighter so it looked good. Will def rent again!

I ordered both the 0R and the 2R. I am normally a size 0, but the 0R was too small. I was unable to zip the dress up. The 2R was the perfect fit. It is a great color and I realized a lot of compliments when wearing this dress! I would highly recommend it!

I originally ordered a size 8 and 10 just in case, they both fit to tight in the chest area (I'm a 36D). They ran out of the size 12 so I went with the size 14, it was lose in the waist but it fit perfect in the chest area. I got a lot of compliments, great to dance in and the color is beautiful!!

If you have a big butt or hips, you may want to size one up. Although, I'm not sure how well it would fit on the bum at that point. It was tight on my butt and legs making it hard to walk. But I did love the style and the color is very festive for the Christmas season
Looks great, good quality maybe would size up if I rented this again. Tight especially in the bust, hip area.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress for a black-tie optional wedding
links_Review_Text: Fantastic fitted dress. Gorgeous color and quality. The material is thick, but not hot and the stitching along the outside and bow straps add just an extra flare to an otherwise plain dress. The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars in because the straps fit just a liiiiitle big on me. I'm assuming girls with a bit larger of a chest fill the top out better - but I didn't have an issue with them all night. Worked well with a strapless bra. If you're petite and have a hard time finding fitted dresses - this one is for you!

Rented this for my work's holiday party. Got so many compliments! I'm between a 2 and a 4 but I'm solidly a 4 in Likely. I love that the fabric is thick so it smooths you out (Didnt need my spanks). It was too snug with a bra so I went braless and it was fine. So cute!
Was a bit more fitted than I normally wear but it was a nice, thick material so that helped make me feel more comfortable in it. I got lots of compliments!

I sized up for comfort. The 12 was more snug than I liked. The thick material helps suck you in, and I did wear shape wear. For reference, I'm 5'6" and 175#. The straps were a little long so pull your shoulders back ladies! Overall loved it and got a ton of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Definitely tight but holy cow what a dress!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to my husband's work holiday party. I was freaking out that it was too tight but did what I had to do to not retain water (hello epsom salt baths and sweaty workout) and wore 2 pairs of shape wear shorts to suck it all in. And man, was it a stunner! I felt amazing even if I couldn't touch my toes. It def made me stand up straight! And I got so so many compliments. Could have gone a size up for comfort but this was a beauty is (a bit of) pain situation. Worth it!

Gorgeous color and this structured fabric, but I couldn't wear it. I needed it for a holiday party and I looked like I was poured into it. I really need to size up 1 or 2 sizes for it to be wearable. I'm always a 6... so this runs small.

links_Review_Title: Fun and sexy! But definitely not a dancing dress!
links_Review_Text: VERY fitted with little give. I rented my typical 4 and got the 6 as my backup based on reviews and glad I did! The 6 was somewhat loose up up top because I have a small bust, but it still looked good. I got lots of compliments and felt great! This is not a dress for someone who wants to hit the dance floor...
Very well made dress. Classy cut (small chested) with gorgeous bow details at the shoulders.
Such a gorgeous color! Received so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Favorite dress I have ever worn!
links_Review_Text: This dress was absolutely incredible and I got so many compliments on it!!! The color is beautiful and the fit of the dress hugs every curve in the best way possible. I wish I just bought this dress because I want to wear it to every event! So cute, comfortable, classy, and flattering. Would highly recommend to everyone I know!
Not for the large chested unless you don't mind some major cleavage. But it's a beautiful color and well designed
The dress fit perfectly and the color was great! Compliments all night.
This dress fit perfectly!

This dress was beautiful! I went with the 4R after reading all the reviews about it being a little tight in the 2R. My only complaint is that in the 4 it was too big around my chest. I figured this would happen since I'm a 32A but I just put on two sticky bras and called it a day! Otherwise, color, style, and everything else was perfect! Got so many compliments on it all night!

I absolutely loved this dress! I received many compliments on it & the color is very vibrant in person. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is that it runs very very small. I'm always a size 2 & even the 4 was pushing it. Could have probably worn the 6.

Wore this to a rehearsal dinner at a vineyard. I'm 5'2 so the dress was longer on me. Received lots of compliments but it does run small. Definitely couldn't dig into the food too much and sitting was slightly uncomfortable, but worth it!

This dress had EVERY woman at this wedding coming up to me to compliment it, the fit and color. Thankfully, I had an easy conversation to follow up these approaches with, "oh you can rent it too!" It fit BEAUTIFULLY. I am a 38D and I felt comfortable and secure going bra-less without budging while dancing or announcing to the world that I was cold. It does hug all the curves, and I've got some stomach squish, but I still felt beautiful enough that it didn't bother me. Will likely rent again!
Fit like a glove but super flattering. I'd size up one if you're large chested (I'm nursing so boob galore).

links_Review_Title: Snug but I made it work
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for my high school reunion. I almost didn't wear it at all because even the size up from my regular size felt too tight.
