But with the right shapewear and strapless bra, it actually worked out well and I ended up loving it. It does run quite small, so I would suggest ordering one size up and getting the free second size in 2 sizes up, just in case.

I absolutely loved this dress! The fit was perfect with the right amount of stretch for me. Iâ€™m 5â€™6, weigh 154 lbs with pretty generous hips, thighs and bottom area. I gave it 4 stars only because the shoulder straps cannot be untied/adjusted which the pic leads you to believe so they continually fell off my shoulders all night.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but the measurements were off. . . Way too snug for even a modest bust.
links_Review_Text: I got this dress in a 0 and a 2 to wear for a wedding. The pics show me in the side zero, which was form fitting in the waist but way too compressive in the bust area (could barely get it over my shoulders. Curiously the size 2 was a little punchier in the waist but seemingly just as tight in the bust area. Unfortunately, I did not wear this due to its poor fit.

I really loved this dress. I wore a Likely dress to another wedding this summer and the 8 fit perfectly but this one I could not zip the 8 up- definitely runs tight so size up! However the 10 I found comfortable and flattering and the perfect length. I was able to wear a strapless bra but you don't have to - the material is thick! Perfect for a fall wedding.
I got a TON of compliments on this dress. I loved the color, not too bright and showy. Only thing is that it definitely runs small so be warned! I wore an 8 but it was snug.

links_Review_Title: I rented this as my backup, but it fit like a glove. Lots of compliments, great color.
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a size 6, but liked the 4 on my body better. Thick fabric, but not the most forgiving. I'd wear this again. I'm 5'11", 150 lbs and 34DD.
I loved the length of the dress, just slightly below the knees. The straps were perfect, and the fabric was super soft. It was perfect for the Gala event I attended.
5'7 125lbs, the 4 was really tight but doable

Great fitting dress & easy to personalize with accessories! I wanted to try out a bodycon midi dress and a wedding seemed like the best time to do that. Runs small and pretty bodycon so size up so you can shimmy in and out of it easily. Worked out great <3

This was sent as a last minute back up after I wasn't happy with my original order. I received a ton of compliments and felt great in it. It's really comfortable even though it's form fitting and I had no problems sitting at dinner or dancing during the reception. Wearing spanx were no problem we all, but it needed a strapless bra. Great green color and forgiving stretchy but thick fabric.

Fabulous dress -- received so many compliments all night. The dress is also slyly sexy -- it's really figure hugging without being too tight or revealing. It definitely runs small. I normally wear an 8 but sized up to a 10. I would have sized up to a 12 if it was available! It fit really well on my waist but was tight across the hips
This fit like a glove and pulled everything in!! The color was spot on with my red hair! It was just right in fit and the shoulders stayed up with no issue! Definitely would wear again!!
pretty and comfortable. True to size but is very flowing

Rented this for vacation but wore it multiple times after. I paired it with white jeans on vacation and loved the look. I wore it under a leather jacket in winter weather at home and got so many compliments there too! I was surprised with how many complements I got for what looks like a chic simple top. I love it and will rent again!
Ran a little large, but the fabric was great quality and this was a perfect top for a night out. Got lots of compliments!
Wearing a medium but if I rent again would go down to a small. Really pretty basic crop, the creme/blush color was awesome with my tan.

Loved this top, the thick material made it seem super high quality. It was however a little longer than I normally would like for a crop, so I paired it with a skirt and a jean jacket. Looked almost like a dress and was perfect for a casual night out!

I loved this top! It was so thick & fitting. I normally don't go for form fitting things, but this concealed any unwanted area well. It was good for a night out, under a blazer with a high waisted pants or even a slip skirt. Love this top! Wanted to buy!

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable and cute crop top
links_Review_Text: I'm usually a medium but the small fit well. The straps were very comfortable. I don't usually wear pink but it was fun with white jeans for the summer!

You don't have to wear a bra with this top, but it's also easy to wear a strapless bra. Love this top and was great to wear with high waisted jeans or a skirt! Would have bought as a closet staple but was still really pricey.

Ordered this top to pair with a mid-length skirt for a daytime wedding event. The top does run large as I typically do not wear an XS. The top kept slipping down when I was wearing it to expose a little more cleavage than I wanted.

links_Review_Title: Super flattering and easy to tuck in!
links_Review_Text: I adore this top. I paired it with pants I rented as well. The cut is super flattering and perfect for high waisted pants. It easily tucks right in! I am pretty flat chested, so I didn't wear a bra, and it was perfect. I ordered the XS and S bc I usually am one or the other. The XS was definitely the better choice! Wish I could've kept it!

links_Review_Title: Love this shirt for work to after work events. Very stylish and put together. Could've sized down.
links_Review_Text: The shirt fits tight but stretches a lot so you can definitely size down if you don't want to wear a bra. I wore a strapless with it which worked out because it still gives support. Color is more of a petal pink. I have a long torso and it wasn't too cropped either. Great shirt I would buy it.
Easy cute shirt to pair with fun bottoms
This top is great! Def runs big. I'm a 34 d and could've worn the small. Love that the material is thick and stretchy. Super flattering. Great color

links_Review_Title: Pretty, but didnâ€™t work on me.
links_Review_Text: I didnâ€™t end up wearing this. Itâ€™s pretty, and fits true to size. The material is thick and has good stretch. Iâ€™d rented for vacation with a pair of pants, but didnâ€™t like the proportions on me. With the right pairing it would be cute, but didnâ€™t work for me this time.

links_Review_Title: Did not wear...Not made for a C cup woman in my opinion.
links_Review_Text: Did not wear...Not made for a C cup woman in my opinion.
Great fit - tight enough to not wear a bra. A little cropped

I wore this during the quarantine for Orthodox Easter Sunday. It was relaxed and super comfortable but polished. The material is more substantial than I thought it would be but it was great on a very warm Spring day in Florida. My husband loved it! The tie in the front gave the waist a nice shape. I was hoping to go braless but the way the overlay sits at the top, I looked droopy without a strapless bra. Really wished more people could have seen it! Will definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Super fun blazer for night out
links_Review_Text: I chose to dress this blazer down with a t-shirt and distressed jeans. I got so many compliments and felt super cute!
Wore to an indoor/outdoor hipster evening wedding. Got lots of complements. I'm tall and the length of the jacket and sleeves was just right. I liked it so much, I found one online and bought it.

links_Review_Title: The shimmer is dazzling without being overpowering.
links_Review_Text: Got at least 20 compliments on this blazer! Was very light and easy to wear. I expected it to be more structured and nipped in the waist; it was soft and swingy but still a great fit and very comfortable. I'm 5'6" 130lb and tend to fit mostly small tops, sometimes mediumâ€“ was definitely happy with the small.

This jacket was wonderful. I wore the XL only because i like a looser fit with blazers but totally could have worn the L for a more fitted look. The sequin isn't irritating to the skin. Light weight. Would totally rent again!
Cute, comfortable, and lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Fun bit of sparkle for a NYE concert!
links_Review_Text: I normally wear an XL/16 and this XXL was a pretty good fit. Sleeve length was fine and it was comfortable, but it wouldn't have closed. Super fun thing to wear out, and it really sparkles in the light!

Rented this bad boy for New Years Eve. A simple and fun statement blazer that became a conversation piece all night. It was surprisingly comfortable - not itchy or stiff at all - and worked with both casual outfits and a LBD. I wish I could wear it all the time!

links_Review_Title: Classic jacket. A little big on me, but I rolled sleeves and it was comfortable.

links_Review_Text: Got a bunch of compliments, can dress up or down. Very versatile.

links_Review_Title: It's fine, but I'd recommend one of the glitzy Badgley Mischka blazers over this one.
links_Review_Text: I rented this to wear on a date, but ended up wearing something else.... the jacket is fine. I love sparkles, and was really excited to see this sequined stunner, but it was just kind of lack luster.... cut and details are pretty boring, other than the sequins, nothing special going on here- I'd much rather re-rent the gold sequined Badgley Mischka tie waist blazer, or the black and jeweled/ gold grommet detail Badgley Mischka blazer.

Jacket was a bit big on. Will size down a size next time. Wore it on New Year's Eve and felt comfortable all night. Was not scratchy or itchy to wear. Got compliments all night long. I rented it with the matching pant.

The sequins are soft and look high quality. I wore this to a sequin night out with girlfriends and they all commented on how nice my jacket looked - I also used it with jeans and a tank and it was cute.
I wish I could keep it! I really loved this blazer
I loved this jacket. It was a fun way to make a semi simple outfit more fun.

Wore this with the matching Sanctuary joggers for a holiday party and it was a total hit. It was comfortable, flattering, and warm enough for a winter party. In a sea of sparkly dresses, the full sparkle suit was a sophisticated (yet still fun) alternative. I want to wear it every day.

links_Review_Title: The event was forgettable....the dress was amazing!!!
links_Review_Text: It is a gorgeous fabric and heavy enough that it doesn't cling to places you don't want! Stunning print. Loved it!!!
I received so many compliments. The fit, print, quality was amazing.
I ordered both a 4 and 6 but could have worn either. the 6 was a bit more comfortable for a long day of sitting and standing. Great at hiding trouble spots. Highly recommend this one!

I actually wore this to 2 weddings the same day - black tie optional in the morning and a semi formal in the evening, it was perfect for both. Very comfortable and flattering, and looks expensive. I got more compliments in this dress than anything else I've worn. Absolutely gorgeous in person. And I loved that it looked different from every other dress in the room. I may end up having to purchase it, I don't want to send it back!

links_Review_Title: Wore to church for a family reunion clelebration
links_Review_Text: I got size bigger than needed because I was nervous but did a few tricks to make it fit better for me. This dress is amazing! . It worked well with my skin tone. AWESOME AWESOME DRESS!!
Great dress, very unique cut, large sleeves...I loved
This dress was beautiful and comfortable! I wore the size 10 and it fit me perfect!! I'm 5"5' and 140 lbs and the bust and the length were just right!! I would rent this dress again!

The fabric and the colors on this dress are amazing! I gained a few lbs over the holiday and expected the 10 to be a bit tight, but instead I had room in the hips and the bust. It's very fashion forward, and exactly a piece I'd rent but not buy.

Rented this for a Cuban NYE party and it was perfect. Flattering for big hips. I ended up with a size smaller than my usual size -- with the big sleeves, I wanted the rest of the dress to be more fitted. I pinned the bottom -- it is a wrap dress and had a tendency to flap fully open if not pinned. Gorgeous. Got compliments all night.
This dress was so much better in person than in the images. It was colorful and unique. So many compliments. It was comfortable and fun. I wish I could own it. Highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: Work holiday party - so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fell in love with this dress but 4/5 stars for fit. In no universe would I be considered a size 2 but I needed a 2 in this dress. I ended up cinching at the waist with a belt from another dress, so it ended up looking fine but def recommend getting a size down for your back up.
Loved this- got so many compliments. I am a 16 most of the time but I sized up. I could have maybe swung an 18. I have a full bust as well and it was perfect. Beautiful colors, so unique!

I LOVE this dress! Sadly, I did order a size down due to availability and the fact that this designer tends to run a little big on me. I wasn't able to wear it out, but I definitely can't wait to get my normal size and I may very well buy it! The design is very forgiving in the middle section. The sleeves a a cool shape without making the body look large - the fitted waist helps. LOVE this dress!
Gorgeous fabric and print, but ultimately the design was too fussy for me (huge puffy sleeves, ruffles) and I ended up not wearing it.
Great pattern and flare. The dress ran small around the arms and large around the waist.

I am typically a 14 or 16 (I'm 5'8" hourglass figure and a 38D). Ordered this in both sizes, and it was huge on me. Definitely size down. The dress, however, was beautiful - and I may order in a smaller size for an upcoming wedding.
I received more complements on this dress than any dress I have ever worn.

links_Review_Title: I wear a 16. Wish this came in a 16. It fits like a 18 and that's too big for me.
Easy fit, comfortable, and beautiful print!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a new years party and I got a lot of compliments. After eating nonstop for the holidays, this dress was extremely forgiving but still looked great. I think it would be a great fit for someone with a larger chest (I am not that person). The print is gorgeous and looks better in person than in the photo. It has a little sheen to it, so it dresses things up a little bit. 10/10 would wear again!
fits beautifully, forgiving!
This dress has a bit of an Asian inspiration which does not come through in the photo. Referring to the texture of the fabric and a very creative cut on the sleeve. Received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Goddess dress, feels like someone should be feeding me grapes in this.
links_Review_Text: It's true this dress isn't particularly slimming but the sleeves and cut make this dress feel very indulgent.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, not for short girls!
links_Review_Text: This dress is really beautiful-- the fabric is richly colored and the craftsmanship is lovely-- but the cut isn't good for short women. The sleeves on the model in the picture stop at the elbow, but came down to my wrists and looked ridiculous since they're balloon-y. The ruffle, too, came down past my knees and looked slightly absurd on my smaller frame. If you're tall and have long limbs, go for it! Otherwise it comes of clownish.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric and interesting cut, however, it can make even the slightest of women look large.
links_Review_Text: Very flamboyant/loud...definitely a showstopper on the right body type.

Rented it for the fabric and "Thanksgiving Day" colors. Loved the fabric and sheen of the dress- a very high quality garment. It's very comfortable, light weight, and has a classy but not too racy V neck. Unfortunately, the voluminous sleeves just made me look huge, as I'm so busty. I hated returning this beautiful piece, but it just wasn't for my body type.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: I typically wear a 10, but only the 12 was available. I was desperate as the garment I bought did not work out. This dress saved the day! I was concerned that it was polyester, but it very much looks like shantung. I wore navy blue satin heels and gold accessories. I would purchase this dress I loved it so much! There's no give in the material, but it's a very comfy fit.

I would rent again. PROS The length was great for work. Easy to put on over the head. These colors pop! I know that the stylist description said it would be best for a party, but I like to flare it up for work occasionally. CONS -None- HIGHLIGHTS The sleeves are to die for! Literally. I wish there were more styles available with these sleeves.

links_Review_Title: I'm a short girl but this is too short for work or church!
links_Review_Text: Really really loved the top. Very comfortable and pretty and gave me a great hourglass shape. The only probably was how short and loose it was on the bottom. I wore with thick knit stockings. I think a tall girl could wear with jeans as a top and it would be stellar. If you are any taller than 5'2" don't try to pull this off as a dress with bare legs. I wish this was a top not a dress!

I really loved this dress. It's flattering and I got lots of compliments. I usually need to size up in Reformation so went a size up for this one and it fit great. My hesitation is that it's very short so definitely needs to be paired with tights. Had a slight odor when it arrived as well!
This dress is great for hourglass figure, but it is very short. Almost too short for me to pull off, it was a close one!

Could not have been more pleased with this dress. I felt it fit a bit small. The 4 fit but I could have easily gone to a size 6 and still enjoyed the fit. It was a little short but not shorter than finger tip length. Just be careful dancing! Overall it was exactly what I wanted for a brisk Fall evening wedding. I felt the dress was sexy and flirty without being revealing. Lovely material that draped beautifully. Highly recommend this dress.

links_Review_Title: @thanksitsrtr - you don't need to size up here. Great pattern & the neck tie detail is a nice touch
links_Review_Text: I liked it, didn't love it. Normally I'd recommend to size up in Reformation but I think your true to size would fit perfectly - at least I wish I rented the 10 instead of the 12. I really like the necktie! Not a style I'd usually go for. More on @thanksitsrtr or thanksitsrtr.com

Rented this for my best friend's bridal shower. I normally wear a 0 in reformation's longer length dresses, but I am glad I sized up to the 2, bc this one was tighter and really short - it hit me well above the knees. I am only 5'1" and I don't think I would've been able to wear the 0 without showing everyone too much! The print is beautiful, and the skirt is fully lined so you don't have to worry about it being too sheer.

Knowing that Reformation runs small on me, I sized up. Normally I'm a 6-8 and the 10 fit well. The sleeves, bow at the neck, nip at the waist, and flair of the skirt made for a SUPER flattering fit. I am short torso'd and carry my weight in my mid section, and sometimes Reformation dresses don't work for me in terms of the stomach region. However this was a great look and I felt really confident. Think it would be good for a range of body types too.

I wore this out to a bar for my birthday party with tights and heeled booties. I loved it- but beware that you will need to size up and that even so the dress is extremely short. I'm usually a 0, and the 2 fit me perfectly. I'm only 5'4" and it was as short as I could reasonably tolerate. Overall so cute though and I definitely recommend for someone who is more petite!
This is a great dress to wear to work and then transition to a date night. The dress fit perfectly for a petite frame. Slightly shorter but not too bad. Great fit!
Soooo tiny and the material was thin and sheer. Worse than other reformation dresses. Had to return.

links_Review_Title: I did not wear this outfit.
links_Review_Text: Too short, runs very small.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress, a little to short for me.
links_Review_Text: Nice style and floral pattern.
I usually wear 4 but rented size 6 knowing this brand's sizing runs small. Definitely size up. Silhouette is great for hour glass body.
i normally wear a dress size 8. It wasn't even close to zipping up, so I had to send it back without wearing it. I suggest going up a size.

links_Review_Title: It was so chic and adorable
links_Review_Text: I didn't need to wear a bra and good thing because the back is sheer

I'm usually between a 6/8 and sized up in this dress but probably should have gone up to a 10. The 8 fit but was a bit tight in the stomach. Otherwise, loved the print and cut. As others have said, it's on the shorter side so probably not suitable for work.
Top is pretty short through the torso so you need a high waisted jean and possibly a cami underneath. It's beautiful but It sheds everywhereeeeeee!

I rented this top during the holidays (but you can wear anytime). I loved the feeling, texture and sparkle of it. I don't think I got the size quite right though. I should have rented a small instead of a medium. This top has plenty of room and the fabric is high quality. It is very glittery in person (so keep that in mind if you don't want high sparkle). I paired with skinny jeans and booties. I'd say this top is not super slimming but it is a nice piece.

This top is so so sparkly, I felt it was a little small. The knotting I thought should have fallen at my waist but it hit under my breasts. I would definitely rent again however I would rent a medium.

links_Review_Title: Does not cover well in the front
links_Review_Text: Cute and fun sparkly shirt! Does not provide coverage in the front. If I was younger I would've worn it with a bralette but I'm a little my conservative now.
Very short waisted. Not for a tall gal.

links_Review_Title: Cute top to pair with pants but you will need to wear something under it as it is very open.
links_Review_Text: The front of this top is cut down to almost the waist so expect to pair it with something underneath.
This is cute and sparkly. I only wish I had gone one size up so that it was a little longer and accommodated the girls better. Wore a cami underneath as it is low cut.

links_Review_Title: Great fit but the fabric was not good
links_Review_Text: The fabric shed silver glitter over everything and all I did was try it on. It also seemed more like something you would get at forever 21. I ended up not wearing.
This was heavier than I expected. I was expecting more shimmer effect but it's actual sparkles. Fit was good.

links_Review_Title: Very cute top. Love the sparkles.
links_Review_Text: Fits very well. Sparkles are better in person.
Could not wear this shirt since it was too low cut. If you do not have to wear a bra it could be great!
This is extremely sparkly! It's a lovely top but not at all for every day. The photo does not show just how sparkly this really is.
Super comfortable top. Neckline is plunging, so great for date night. Worn with skinny jeans & boots
Pretty material and color, flattering wrap style. The shoulders/sleeves were a little much for me - and I love a good shoulder moment. Maybe the shine + shoulders put it over the top?
Beautiful color, fun details, easy to wear, a bit flirty -- perfect for a low-key party.
It fit me too big

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear the piece out since it didn't fit well.
links_Review_Text: It was too large in some areas and too small in others.
One of my favorite rentals to date. Luxe satin fabric, gorgeous shape, versatile top that can be worn in many settings. Size 10 was perfect for me, I am between 8-12 for reference
Beautiful shirt and size fit me perfectly. But I'm very disappointed that the string that holds the shirt together in the front (it is a wrap shirt) was broken. I was unable to wear it.
The sleeves are really poofy and it was a little big
Very flattering and the shoulders add some spunk. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Pretty but beware of side slits!
links_Review_Text: This shirt is gorgeous with a stunning material and flattering shape. I was disappointed though because the slits on the side came up very high and exposed my stomach even with high waisted pants... would have been great for going out, just not for work!

links_Review_Title: Significantly more comfortable than I expected
links_Review_Text: I don't usually have much luck with wrap tops and dresses, but the silky sheen of this caught my eye. It was so comfortable and fit true to size. It's a bit lower cut because it's a wrap top but it never came untied.

The color and fabric on this are really nice, but the arms and bust run quite big. The arms are poofy on the shoulders, but also run long. Even with DD, the bust falls open and I'd need a tank top underneath.
Didn't wear, the shoulders are so 80's and not in the good way.
I couldn't wear because it was too large but I will rent again in a smaller size. Color and fabric are amazing
Odd slits in the waist and puffy shoulders. My husband started laughing when he looked at me.

links_Review_Title: The sleeves were WAY puffier than in the picture and made me look like a linebacker.
links_Review_Text: Fit was fine, just a hideous fit.

I liked the rich color of this top. The wrap cut is very flattering. The arms were a little long for me, but I'm short, so most arm lengths are a little long for me... One note - the neckline is cut very low. I had to wear another shirt underneath it, as my bra would show if I didn't. I wore it to work with black pants, but it's probably a little too "flashy" for most work places - I think it would be better to wear to a party, or out for drinks/dinner. It was fun to wear, but I probably wouldn't rent it again for work.

The photos don't do it justice. The structure in the puffy sleeves is sturdy and holds it's shape. For you pear shaped girls, like me, this is so flattering. Definitely draws attention to a small waist. I had to use double-sided tape to keep the top in place because it is so low cut. But LAWD, it was beautiful. The fabric is so soft and silky but has good weight. I LOVE this top.
Gorgeous color and fabric. Picked this up in-store after my order didn't arrive in time for the weekend. They only had one size smaller than I usually wear so it wasn't ideal but still wearable.

links_Review_Title: Looks better in the stock photo than on
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love this but the image does not accurately portray the puffy shoulders. It looks so 1980s and I am not into that. I returned.

This dress ran small on me. I had plenty of room in the top, maybe too much, but the waist was snug. The slit was torn when I put it on but I was able to sew it myself. It was a fun dress to wear! The straps slid a bit but I able to catch that as I danced.

I am 5'3 and wore the 4P. With 2.5" heels, it was a smidge shorter than perfect, but probably better than a regular length on me. The fit was was pretty perfect. The closest hug was through the upper thighs, so you may need to size up if you're thicker in that area. The straps were a bit long, but nothing a quick stitch couldn't resolve. I was able to wear a strapless bra. Overall, this is a sexy gown without being too over-the-top.

This dress was perfect for a black tie charity event! I am 5'11" and with 2" heels it was about an inch above the ground wearing the long. It was a very comfortably dress and would definitely recommend!

This dress was stunning! It has clearly been worn a lot (the slit was ripped a bit (so you can see in the photo that the lining showed at the top of the slit) and the train was fraying, as well as someone had altered the straps to be shorter with a stitch, so I had to remove those). So glad I ordered the Long, as it was the perfect length with 3" heels. My other dresses I ordered were lost in transit so this was an overnight replacement for my original dresses, otherwise I would have replaced it with a dress that was not damaged.

Very nice dress and true to size. Would rent again. The only thing I would say is that I wish I would have ordered a 2 long instead of a 2 regular. Other than that, I loved it and got compliments all night.
I wore this for a 90's formal prom themed party. The dress fit like a glove and accented my curves. I received a lot of compliments on this dress! So pretty!

links_Review_Title: Showstopper. Thinking of buying this dress.
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a black tie gala. I received so many compliments. It was really comfortable and fit like a glove. I'm usually between a size 6-4. I wore a size 4 in this dress. It's the perfect black gown.
This dress was amazing! I was a little worried because I usually wear a four or a six, they only had a 4R left so I ordered it, and it fit perfectly. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Be the best dressed and talk of the party in this classic, flattering black gown!
links_Review_Text: This dress was GORGEOUS and it beautifully accentuated every curve of my body. In my opinion it does run a bit small, so I would order one size larger. I got so many compliments in this dress and cannot wait to wear it again to another black tie wedding!

links_Review_Title: Loved the fit but went with a different gown
links_Review_Text: I thought the fit was really nice, and being on the taller side, I really liked where the dress hit my waist. I would recommend this dress - really nice quality. I ultimately went with a different dress that I rented for this occasion.
Fits like a glove!! Beautiful dress and received lots of compliments!
This dress is stunning, so flattering and comfortable.

This gown was stunning on just too big for me in the top. I think a 10 would have fit better for me but the 12 was all that was available. The straps were long as others have mentioned. I could have pinned them and used some fashion tape to make this gown work but I ended up going with a different dress for this event.

links_Review_Title: Fit like a glove - but too long
links_Review_Text: I was initially worried about the size 2R (I usually wear 4 and sometimes 6 in pants) but the 2 fit like a glove. the slit was sexy but not too much. Only issue was it was too long for me (5'3) even in tall heels.
The top is beautiful. However, the bottom was too tight on my butt and thighs so I was unable to wear it. Size up if you have more junk in the trunk!

I'm a big fan of the Valentino red dresses and this one did not disappoint. This is a nice dress for mild 60 degree weather. You can't tell from the picture but it's a knit. The sleeve detail is well-structured and beautiful.
The dress is stunning. I received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress! Fit like a dream and such a lovely color
links_Review_Text: Nice, thick material. Not clingy like sweater dresses can be sometimes. Pretty ruffle details

links_Review_Title: Fun flirty dress with a great fit
links_Review_Text: Randomly picked this up in store and loved the way it fit. Fabric is a heavier sweater and it felt great. The thicker fabric also meant it laid really well. Wore on my bachelorette party in Austin and it was perfect!

links_Review_Title: I wore to work and to a baptism
links_Review_Text: This is actually thin sweater material. This dress is cute, comfy and super flattering! You could wear to many occasions. I'm a solid size 6 and the medium fit perfect.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress but thin knit shows the lumps
links_Review_Text: Rented with my unlimited for a party. Very pretty dress and fit is true to size but I should have read the description more carefully. This is made with that fine knit that only works if you have no lumps or don't care at all if your lumps show. I have a big rib cage and felt you could really see all my ribs and bra lines, especially with the light color. I knew I would be self-conscious the whole night. Sent back without wearing.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! Would definitely rent again.
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this dress! Originally ordered it thinking it would be good for my engagement party, but the material ended up being more casual than I wanted. Overall, would say definitely size up and the V neck is not as revealing as the model pics.

I received so many compliments on this dress! I paired it with white sandals and colored accessories for a vacation dinner. The neckline is a bit lower but nothing outrageous. I loved the cinched waist and the fuller skirt. Also the eyelet detailing on the sleeves and the hemline are divine. Perhaps a bit shorter than I usually would wear, but still a comfortable length and perfect for a night out.
The top section right under the bust is a little tight, but other than that I loved this dress!

Perfect amount of flow and class for my bridal party! I really enjoyed the comfort of the dress, just had to make sure and sit up extra straight so I didn't look as if I was slouching due to the flow of the sleeves.

links_Review_Title: lightweight, day-to-night dress that was perfect for my honeymoon!
links_Review_Text: Ran small, but didn't need to wear a bra because of it (which was great considering the plunging neckline). Lining was a bit too short.

links_Review_Title: It was so so flattering and comfortable !!!
links_Review_Text: For perfectly ! Will wear for engagement shoot as well

links_Review_Title: Nice white dress for outdoor event.
links_Review_Text: I rented a zero based on the reviews and glad that I did because I think the top/sleeves would have been even larger than they were. The waist is incredibly tight though. If you want to eat a lot this is definitely not the dress for you. I got compliments on this dress though because it did make my waist look smaller. There is a liner on this dress that makes the bottom flare out a lot. And there are pockets.
Perfect fit and so flattering. The zipper was tricky, but the dress was gorgeous

I'm a true size 0-2, so this did eventually zip (haha) but it was super snug - I got a little annoyed at how tight it was while traveling, but putting it back on for dinner was fine. Was too flattering not to wear. :)

links_Review_Title: Borrowed this for vacation but ultimately did not work
links_Review_Text: This dress ran a little small in the waist/back area - I could not zip up the 8. I do have a more muscular/broad back but probably needed to go up 1 or 2 sizes. The sleeves were also not as full as they look in the photos. Ultimately I sent this one back.

links_Review_Title: The dress was cute but looked like it had been over-worn. RTR replaced it with a new dress
links_Review_Text: The dress was cute but looked like it had been over-worn.

links_Review_Title: I wore this for engagement phots and it was perfect!
links_Review_Text: I'm normally a four, but ended up wearing the 6. The 6 fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Fun vacation dress! Was festive for my birthday celebration. Very flattering.
links_Review_Text: Loved the style and fit of this dress. Great look for my birthday dinner- loved the length and the sexy neck line. The perfect amount of sexy and fun while feeling comfortable in it. Would definitely order again.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but not easy to breathe!
links_Review_Text: This dress has no give so if breathing in and out is something you would like to do, then this is not the dress for you. Rented for vacation and couldn't make it through dinner because i was so uncomfortable. I must admit, it did look super cute for the hour I had it on.

tbh I feel like most simkhai stuff is a weird material that is never flattering on me? Not this one though - actually it fit me like a glove and I got so many compliments on it. It wasn't loose, but also not unbearably tight. Did fit closer to the snug side. I wore stickies just in case, but basically went bra-less. Length was perfect, although it did show a lot of leg when sitting down

I typically wear a size 8/10, but ordered a 12 knowing that, as a lifelong athlete that packs a lot of muscle/with a broad back and shoulders, I struggle to fit into anything that zips up at the back. I was hopeful that by going up a size or two, this dress would work since it's super cute otherwise, but there was no way that the zipper was going to close. Sent back immediately to exchange for another item.
Was too small and no t flattering on me
Great length and cute style, too bad it couldn't zip up, very sad I couldn't wear it to our honeymoon in Hawaii.
The cleavage is exposed in this dress. Wasn't a fan of the sleeves, they stick out.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress to dress up or wear casually.
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect.

This dress is really fun. It's made of thin, breathable material-- perfect for Texas summer. The V neck is not quite as deep on me as on the model. I could wear a normal padded bra under it without the front showing, but I found it had enough support that I didn't have to. I'm a 32DD for reference, so finding a dress I can wear braless is usually difficult. Good support here. Ladies with a similar band size and slightly larger cup size could get away with it too. I think it would still be flattering on smaller-chested girls without the risk of a nip slip. The zipper is a bit tricky, so beware of the pinch. Unless you're standing against direct sunlight, the dress is not see-through. Of course, would still recommend wearing skin toned undergarments. I wore flesh-toned pasties just in case, but it probably wasn't necessary. I'm 5'7, and the dress hits me a little longer than mid thigh. It's tall girl friendly. True to size.

The fit was a little snug in the waist for me, but still totally wearable, comfortable and flattering. It's not as sexy of a dress as I was thinking it was going to be. I felt a little bit like I was wearing a "little girl's" dress because of the material and big sleeves. Overall though, this was a great rental, fun to wear and lots of people loved it on me.

This dress ran a little bit snug but I was able to make it work. It was also a little bit more casual in material than I was expecting but still adorable. One complaint is that the chest opening was very narrow, I'm not sure how this would work on someone with a larger chest.
Fits TTS and have no stretch. Nice and comfortable.
This dress runs very small and it's not flattering as it extends way beyond the curves

Rented this for a bridal shower contender. Thought this would be a semi formal option- it's more like summer vacation day option. It has pockets which is great except you can completely see them through the fabric. I'm usually a 4/6 and the 4 was tight in the rib cage but fit in the bust. I'd be nervous to size up due to plunging neck line. Returning and not wearing.
True to size, comfy and fun!
The fit is flattering the colors are vibrant. I want to buy !

links_Review_Title: Beautiful print, flattering ruching but beware of that deep plunging neckline. Can't wear a bra
links_Review_Text: Liked but didn't love, prob not rent again

links_Review_Title: Very pretty but very low cut...
links_Review_Text: Really liked this dress but it was very low cut. It ended up giving me anxiety because I was worried my boobs were hanging out all night! I couldn't wear a bra because it made my cleavage too inappropriate for my husbands work function LOL it was still pretty though! And slightly on the small size. Size up if in between.
Rented for Holiday...cute but tight... :/

Wore this on vacation and absolutely loved it. Got so many compliments... I wish I owned it. I have a very short torso and the straps fit me well. Low neckline but looks good with a fuller bust! Great length to a few inches below the bum and above the knee. I am 5'2, 130 lbs and a DD and this size fit great.
Wore this on vacation. Fit just right and just long enough for my height. Would rent again!
Absolutely loved the fit and color of this dress. It is so cute, yet sexy.
This dress was so flattering. the only reason I am giving it a 4 is that it was really tight on my chest and back.

This color is amazing and perfect for a vacation. I wore a bra with it. It's kind of short but I didn't wear heels with it. I'm 5'8 and it comes mid thigh on me. Danced all night in this flirty fun dress.

This dress is made with high quality material and stitching. It catches everyone's attention and hugs in all the right places. As a petite woman, I crave finding clothing that gives my body shape and curves. This dress fits evenly around the waist and helped give me some of that definition. I highly recommend!

Love the fit, it's great if you have curves. You can dress it down with a jean jacket. Better for girls with smaller bust size. Draw back-- Can't wear a bra with it. It's made of good material, but something to think about if you are busty. Got lots of complements, it's a beautiful color!! ðŸ™ŒðŸ¼
Runs small. I'm normally a large and I needed a 2XL. It's short and flirty. You can wear it just about anywhere.
loved the fit of this dress, it was so comfortable! I received compliments the whole night - loved this dress!
Really comfortable for and cute design. No complaints here!
Beautiful!!! Very slimming and comfortable! I sized down one after the first I ordered was a bit bit. The top is cut low, but was not problematic. Beautiful marigold color.
Wore this to a vineyard, I wore the medium which was a bit snug (I'm a 6) and have wider hips. Also a little on the shorter side for taller girls!

I love this dress. We had a casual summer day get together at my house for my grandma's 81st birthday. Everyone in my family told me how much they loved the dress and asked were I got it, including my 81 year old grandmother! It was a huge hit. I initially had it on without a bra but needed the support and three one on.
I'm obsessed

links_Review_Title: Rented for baby shower. Beautiful color and amazing fit! Obsessed with this dress
links_Review_Text: Normally between a S and XS but wore the XS and I'm a D cup and still fit perfectly

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel like sunshine
links_Review_Text: This is the perfect summery dress! I wore to brunch and then a date right after and felt like literal sunshine. 10/10 would recommend!
Very cute and lots of sexiness. Super right and for fitting but hugs in all the right places. Really doesn't have stretch so if you're between sizes, def size up.
Got a ton of compliments on this dress. I was worried the horizontal strips would be unflattering but they weren't. Could've been a bit tighter
Fun dress to wear that shows off your figure!

I wore this dress for my friend's rehearsal dinner and it was perfect! It fits snug in all the right places with a fun flare at the bottom. I normally wear a strapless bra with this type of dress and I didn't need to wear a bra at all which was great!

I rented this for a Vegas vacation and it was super comfortable and easy to wear on a night out. It is on the short side so if you are scared about flashing everyone or will be moving around a ton - you may want to go with another option. I just wore little spanx shorts under and was perfectly fine! Loved the top and flip of the skirt. Easily covered my strapless bra. I am a curvy 14/16 and the 3x was just right!

links_Review_Title: WOW! Fit me like a glove
links_Review_Text: I've been so drawn to yellow lately - and this dress was just the right shade. I loved it and was so tempted to buy - maybe will start by renting again :) alt angles on @thanksitsrtr
Was saving this for a date this past weekend then he flaked so I slayed it at work. thank u, next!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress, a bit longer than expected
links_Review_Text: Length was a bit longer than I wanted but I'm also not tall. The top of the dress fit well and the width around the hips was good too.
Amazing color amazing fit
Wore the dress to dinners in Mexico and it was perfect! Felt casual yet elegant, fun but still classy!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress - got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress, it's fitted down the body which is super cute.

Great date dress! A little short, if you're on the taller side beware. But I couldn't resist. It is also very low cut - you can adjust a little bit based on how you tie the strap in the back, but it's still rather low. It made me look great for dates out with the bf, but was a bit much for days out with the family. But it is well made, and not transparent, has a slip underneath. No stretch though. All in all would rent again!
This dress has such fun details and fitted in all the right places.
it is short and I got an xl which was a bit lose in the waist but gave a little extra length
Dress was cute but didn't love color or fabric
This dress runs super small but is super cute and I loved it until I sat down and the chest area folded over and you could see down my dress. Fit perfect everywhere else

This dress is really cute and I was glad I went with the medium rather than the small. Medium fit great. Usually I am a small in dresses. The dress is pretty low cut which it doesn't really look like in the picture.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely love but really check sizing
links_Review_Text: Loved loved love this print and dress super flirty and fun. I didn't end up wearing the small bc it was just too tight. I could zip it up and wear it but wanted it to be a little looser. There's no room for error since this dress is made of silk. So order your size and plan on going up size for second dress. I would definitely plan on renting just getting a M next time.

links_Review_Title: I was kind of disturbed that a 14 translated to a 3XL
links_Review_Text: ...but I LOVE the dress!!! I had gotten the dress for a concert my husband and I had attended as an extension of our 20th wedding anniversary (celebrate all year right?) Im 5'5 and I normally wear 12-16 depending on the cut of the outfit. The dress fit perfectly as a size 14! If you have s larger bust (mine is a 38C) you may want to go up a size. I have rented many dresses for various events from RTR, this was the first one that I would truly love to keep! Thanks RTR!!!
I received so many compliments. I am buying in black. Such a great wardrobe enhancement, can dress up or down.
I really liked this dress, I wore it for a wedding. However the sleeves get uncomfortable after an hour or so.
A little right but made it work. Rented for a girls trip to San Diego!
Love the dress just runs small. Going to return for a bigger size
Beautiful dress! Form fitting and flattering. Runs small though. I normally wear a 6 and ordered an 8 and a 10. Both fit but the 10 was more comfortable!

Runs a bit small. I went up one size. Normally a 6- wore the 8. But could have worn the 10. I'm 5'2 and this hit me at my ankle. Which was fine with me. Very flattering. Was able to wear a strapless bra and the dress helped keep everything in. Would rent again!

Definitely runs small! Felt lovely in it, though I didn't like any photo of me with it on when I had it off the shoulder (looked like my chest was way too exposed). I would usually wear a 4 and wore the 8

I'm always wary about renting items online especially because I am an extremely tiny person. But when I got the dress and I tried it on I was amazed how well it fit. I have a 23 1/2 inch waist, about 40 inch hips, and I wear a 32A bra. I received so many compliments when I wore it to my high school marching band's banquet night! Some pros were that it was loose enough around my stomach and it was very comfortable. A con was that I had to adjust the top a couple times.

So glad I read the reviews because this definitely runs small in the top/back. This was my first time in a Reformation dress, didn't know what to expect, and sized up to the 2R but the top/chest/back was still tight. I will say it felt like it stretched or the fabric gave with time. And it's actually the first dress I could wear strapless without it falling down by the end of the night (so points for that!). Loved the cut, style and fabric. Beautiful for the early fall barn wedding we attended!

links_Review_Title: Loved the fit and print of this dress
links_Review_Text: Read all the reviews and decided to size up following the other people's suggestion. I even ordered a 10 as my back up size. I found this to fit true to size. I wish I had a 4 to fit my bust a little better, but the 6 was great. Would definitely recommend for a shower or daytime party.

links_Review_Title: If I could buy this dress I would!
links_Review_Text: Listen to the reviews! This definitely does run small. I usually go between 4 -6 sometimes an 8 an in this dress the 10 fit perfectly. I wore it with a strapless bra which helped fill out the larger top better to keep it up. I had no issues with the mid-section being too tight as others did, the whole thing fit perfect. I am petite at 5'2 and thought it still looked beautiful as an almost floor length dress. My petite friends, don't be afraid to rent this, it's a beautiful comfortable dress!

Ok size up size up size up ladies!! I usually wear a size 2 or 4 in dresses but I followed the reviews and I sized up. I ordered a size 6 and 8, the size 6 I couldn't even get on and the size 8 just fit me!! Honestly, I wish I got a size 10 just so I had a little more room in the stomach and hip area. Overall I loved the style of dress, it was very light and flowy. I got a lot compliments in it!
Love this dress, but it does run quite small. I wish I would've ordered 2 sizes up!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but definitely size up!
links_Review_Text: This dress was absolutely gorgeous, but I'm definitely glad I ordered a size up backup. I'm usually a 0 or even 00 but the 2R ended up fitting like a glove. It also wasn't quite tea length on me (I'm 5 ft 1) but the long length was actually perfect for a black tie wedding.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on the dress, and felt like a million bucks!
links_Review_Text: It was a bit snug, so the sleeves rubbed on my arms a bit. But, overall I loved it.

I'm glad i got a size bigger because it definitely runs small. I'm 5'2" so this was basically floor length for me but it still looked really cute! The top also fit a little too loose so I really had to find a bra that helped fill it out a bit. Aside from that, I loved it!
I was frustrated that the 8 was too tight but the 10 fit nicely. Glad I didn't get hung up about the size, the dress was great.

I've rented this same dress in the past in different color and love the style and how it flows from the hips but is tight around the middle. The off the shoulder look is subtlety sexy. I love this dress. I typically wear a 4 in dresses but I got the 8 because I read it runs small and I'm 14 weeks pregnant, the 8 was perfect but definitely doesn't hide a growing bump!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a summer wedding
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Super comfortable and received lots of compliments. But def runs very small. I'm usually between a 4-6 and got the 8 and 10 based on other reviews and the 8 wouldn't zip all the way, so went with the 10.

I ended up wearing the other style i rented but loved the off the neckline. However the material has no give and was rather tight around my mid section. If you have a bit of a tummy and hips it will definitely be tight in those areas. Runs a bit small and I think would look better on a less curvy figure.

links_Review_Title: Great dress perfect for any occasion!
links_Review_Text: This was a great dress that does run SMALL, I rented 2 sizes up and still had trouble with the zipper- once it was on though I felt so beautiful.
Loved this dress! I wore this to a wedding and got tons of compliments on it.
This dress runs small, I usually wear size 8/10 and the 12 fit me. It's super comfortable and can be worn off the shoulder or on like I did. Would definitely rent again.
definitely runs small. I sized up one size and it fit perfectly. Not super fancy but can be dressed up.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit and cut of this dress. The ruffle at the bottom and length were super cute and the off shoulder was really flattering and stayed up through the whole night. In general, Reformation runs a little small, but as a petite person it works really well for me. I would totally buy this dress if I had more wedding to go to in general.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, simple dress. Sexy while not being too revealing.
links_Review_Text: This dress fit almost perfectly! It was a little tight in the midsection but it didnâ€™t impact me too much. The length was perfect for me being so short. I liked that the sleeves can be worn on or off the shoulders.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful venue and the dress was perfect.
links_Review_Text: I expected to wear the 2, but it runs quite small and the 4 was perfect but still snug.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for an outdoor, backyard wedding.
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a zero, I ended up wearing the 4. It was perfectly form fitting on the bottom half. Too big on the chest but nothing a little fashion tape couldn't take care of!

I rented this beauty for my engagement photos. As most reviews commented, the dress ran about 2 sizes small. I'm usually a 6 and the 10 fit like a glove. I'm also 5'4" and it hit right at my ankles which was perfect for me. I have a more wide-set figure and I found the dress was EXTREMELY flattering and really accentuated my curves. High quality, comfortable (didn't even need spanx!), and gorgeous to photograph. Wish I owned it!

links_Review_Title: This dress was gorgeous for my friendâ€™s rehearsal dinner.
links_Review_Text: I read in the reviews it runs VERY small. I usually wear a somewhere around a 0 & 2, and I ordered this dress in a 6 & 8. The 8 was way too big, but the 6 fit great. The off the shoulder sleeves do scratch your arms throughout the night; thatâ€™s the only reason Iâ€™m not giving it 5 stars. But I always find some sort of discomfort with off the shoulder items. This dress is a gorgeous nice material making it feel very expensive. Perfect length hitting right at my ankles. I am 5â€™3â€™â€™ & 120 lbs.
Love the dress! Size up- I am usually a 0 or 2 and wore a size 4. It fit well!

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress, tons of compliments, but runs small! Sleeves are restrictive, a bit hard for dancing!
links_Review_Text: Runs small, but super flattering. Definitely size up!

I wore an 8, which fit but was snug around the hips. I got a backup size (10) but it was too loose in the chest to keep the dress up. The sleeves are off-the-shoulder, which looks great but wasn't practical dancing. I'm 5'7" so the dress was a little longer than tea-length. I would rent this dress again, but not for an occasion where dancing is involved.
Really loved this dress and that's what made me rent again. I ordered 2 sizes over mine to get it fit. Runs really small.
100% runs small! Get the free 2nd size! Other than that, itâ€™s perfect!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for a wedding and it was perfect for the occasion!
links_Review_Text: I adore Reformation and constantly look at their products but have never been able to afford a purchase. I loved getting the opportunity to actually try the brand out! As most reviewers have said, this particular style runs SMALL. I typically wear a size 6 in dresses; due to reviews, I ordered an 8 and a 10. The 10 fit perfectly, albeit a bit loose in the chest area. The dress itself was flattering, comfortable, and the perfect length. My only complaint was that due to the looseness of the bodice, the sleeves slipped down throughout the night (along with the neckline) and the constant adjustment was a hassle.
Great dress for a pear shaped-body. Hugs every curve. Runs small -- size up.
Great dress for a graduation party. Lightweight and comfortable. I am usually a 6 and the 10 fit, 8 probably would have be ok but a bit tight.

Pre pregnancy I was a consistent size 6. I'd say I'm a good 8 at the moment with my breastfeeding boobs. :P In this dress, I couldn't zip the 8 but comfortably fit in the 10. I had plenty of room around the middle with the 10 and would have had enough in the 8. This fabric has zero give to it. That said, it was still comfortable to sit and dance in. I felt pretty in it, but I chose it because it's not a showstopper. The off the shoulder look made it a little sexy. This picture doesn't show it well, but the sleeves sit evenly off the shoulder.

links_Review_Title: Sweet floral with just enough edge
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for my bff's bridal shower. As maid of honor, I wanted to wear something special so as always Rent the Runway came thru for me! This dress had the edge I look for but with enough girly vibes. Perfect fit for any occassion! Night or day! The sleeves totally make the dress. It def runs small, I ended up wearing the back up size that JUST fit (thx spanx). Rent this dress but size up!

links_Review_Title: This dress is sexy but very forgiving. The sequins added just the right amount of shimmer. Loved it!
links_Review_Text: Great dress for big boob ladies!

I've worn several sequin pieces before and this one hands down takes the cake. It was actually not my first choice but when it came time to rent my first choice was taken and I'm so glad. It was amazingly comfortable. The fabric inside was amazing, no itching anywhere. The design of the dress made it so flattering. The neckline is slightly too low for my taste but I pinned it together some. Overall I love love loved it!

It's super cute but It's also super short. I originally planned to wear stockings and switched over to leggings which made it still look good but also dressed it down slightly for a night out after a cocktail party.
Loved this dress! I am constantly over dressed so a little extra is just my speed. Fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments at my holiday party for work!
links_Review_Text: If you wear Spanx keep the length on the shorter side due to the hemline in the front.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress. I got tons of compliments. I should have ordered a smaller size but it worked
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size order your true size

links_Review_Title: Prepare yourself for a trillion knock em out of the park compliments

links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I definitely needed safety pins to make the neckline a little higher to conceal my bra, but it was very sexy and flattering!
Great dress. Didn't get a normal full length photo but fits nicely overall. Was not too tight like some sequin dresses can be. A bit loose on my chest but otherwise fit great. Loved

links_Review_Title: Show stopper but wrap fit was a little off
links_Review_Text: Size down. I'm usually a 4-6 but the 2 fit great. The wrap is a bit strange in the chest, I had to pin the pieces to avoid a slip. I carry most of my "weight" in my stomach area so this was personally just a little unflattering for me there but overall would rent again.
Dress fit well but was a little boobalicious for my liking. Nothing a well places safety pin or double sided tape couldn't fix. Perfect length and easy to put on and take off!
Form fitting, maybe a little too short when seated.
Cute dress, definitely on a short side. Would look cute with some black tights for New Years or Christmas party.
The only thing I wish is that it was tighter in the busy. Otherwise I loved this dress.

links_Review_Title: Super pretty, fit well, rode up a bit.
links_Review_Text: I have larger hips and a smaller bust. This fit great In the waste but I did have to pin my bust in. The dress is stretchy which made it fit very well, but I did find out it rides up a little bit so I had to keep pulling it down. Overall very comfortable and pretty, would wear it again if I had a chance.

links_Review_Title: Great dress - wore to work holiday party! Received many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fit was great - tight but not so tight that I felt like I had to suck in at any point in the night (even after the buffet). The sparkles were definitely noticeable and stood out, but it wasn't too much. I think this especially worked for me because I'm tall (dress is a little longer than some others may be) and my shoulders are more broad, which made the sleeves not look too puffy.
It hugged my curves and disguised my tummy which I have been feeling so self conscious about since my radical hysterectomy due to uterine cancer two months prior.

I could not have loved this dress more. I picked it up in the store and would have preferred a 10 but they didn't have it so it was too big on me but would fit true to size if I had my size. It's very stretchy and comfortable while still being extremely glamorous. I got many compliments.
This was a beautiful, comfortable dress. I needed an 8 for my bottom half but my top half is more of a 6, so I had to pin it, but it worked! Got tons of compliments.

I was considering this for a holiday party, but decided to go with something a little more conservative instead. Love the sequins. Very comfortable dress & w/ some spanx it would have been a great choice!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress for a casino gala! Iâ€™m 5ft. even and it fit great with a tank under it. Perfect!
links_Review_Text: The fit is very forgiving.

I felt so sexy in this dress!! And as a mom of three busy boys, that rarely happens. So happy to find a great option in such a short time! It was flattering and I was really comfortable all night long.

Gorgeous & fun! My only issues was that it was pretty short in the front and pretty low cut. I feel like a couple well placed pins could have fixed it up. This is definitely more for a night out than a formal affair in my opinion.
Rented size 12 & 14. Wore size 12. I can always count on this designer label to fit perfectly
super pretty sequin detail

This dress is gorgeous. The ombrÃ© glitter is very slimming for those who are self-conscious. This was rented on behalf on my sister who is not full bust, but full hip and 6 feet tall. The downside with this dress is that it is very short on someone who is over 5'5". While it was gorgeous and attracted a lot of attention, for taller folks who don't like shorter dresses, this would not be the best option for you.

links_Review_Title: I rented as a nye option it did not work for the event but is pretty
links_Review_Text: A bit big at the top. Rented for a 1920s theme for nye. It wasn't going to work for that and with the top the way it was. Still pretty

links_Review_Title: Wish this fit it was perfect form flattering.
links_Review_Text: I normally wear 16w-18w. This was too big, it was gathering or packing up in the back which detracted from the beauty of the dress. I needed a size down. It accentuated the breast 42D which is great being as large as I am but made me look thinner in the waist and tummy. They didnâ€™t have 16w in stock at the time. Oh well

links_Review_Title: LOVED this even though I didn't end up wearing
links_Review_Text: This dress is amazing. Comfortable, flattering, true to size, not too revealing but still sexy. Rented this for my company holiday party and decided it was just a little too over the top so I didn't wear it but would love to rent in the future.
Perfect dress. Perfect fit. Love the pockets. Got so many compliments!
Wore this dress several times on a beach vacation. It has adjustable straps. I was comfortable wearing it without a bra. Note: I am 5'4" and it was full length on me
A bit long and kinda heavy. Took more space in my suitcase than I would have liked, butttttt totally worth it cause it made for some great pictures in Naples. I loved it.

This dress is amazing! I wish I could upload video because it looks so beautiful twirling. It also has super deep pocket, so double lovely! It did run a bit large, but not so much that it was unwearable. Also, it's very heavy and would not be fun on a hot day.
Could not love this any more than I do. So feminine, twirly, and comfortable. Tons of compliments. Wish I could keep it.

I would love to own this dress! I got compliments left and right in Nashville. People literally stopped me on the streets. It's flattering (covers any belly situation), I wore a regular bra because I didn't mind the straps showing, it's fun to twirl in, and tho it's a thick material it didn't bother me in the dead of summer. I wore it a few different times while I had it. Highly recommend renting or buying this dress!!

@LallieTand Super comfy and stylish. I styled this with a hat and a walking boot... It has pockets, which was super helpful to me, and the fabric is nice. One thing to note - the fabric is thicker than normal, so it might not be a good idea to wear on a very hot day.
Very cute but too much fabric for a hot day
I got away with no bra on this one. Dress holds up your breasts well. Color was great. Dress was fun

links_Review_Title: Great as a midi for taller women
links_Review_Text: I'm a 6 and glad I got a medium as it was tight around the rib cage. Great midi length with flats for taller women (I'm 5'11'') but would have been more of a maxi dress for most friends. Super comfy for casual wear on cooler summer nights

This dress is great for a cooler summer day as the fabric is heavy and a lot of it. When I picked up the dress on a hanger it felt like it weighed at least 2 lbs. It was slightly loose up top (32B) but not bad. Nice pockets up front that make the dress look more casual. Love the color! Length was just right for my height (5'9''). Wish the fabric was lighter. Otherwise enjoyed wearing it and felt pretty.

links_Review_Title: Got this for the weekend for drinks and a dinner - super fun! Great for summer and fun flirty fit
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'1 so was a bit longer for me but didn't bother me - wore wedges. Loved the design and the flirty frills. Lots of compliments and fun dress for the weekend

I really love this dress!! It's so bright and fun for summer. It is a bit on the thicker side as far as material is concerned. I love in Texas and this might be a little too thick for summertime. My legs felt like they were in the sauna! BUT, omg the cuteness level is too much. It's super flowy and fun to wear. I love the button detail on top, but had to make this work appropriate so I wore a plain white tee over and just tied it to give some shape. I was going to wear a jean jacket but it didn't give any shape and I looked like a tent. The white tee was perfect and actually way cuter. The spaghetti straps are a little thin and I found it kinda dig into my skin because the weight of the thick material. I didn't have to wear a bra because the material is so dang thick! Despite the sauna that forms underneath, I am going to wear this a couple times before I send it back :)

I loved this dress, wore it a million times during my rental. The straps are adjustable, side zip, and the skirt is fairly heavy so you could probably rock the outfit with a sweater in the fall. I am somewhat small busted, so I didn't need a bra for this and I am just under 5'4", and the hem did have to be lifted for stairs but didn't seem to drag
A tailored perfect fit, and perfect for any occasion.
This dress is great for summertime events, but has a lot of fabric. Keep this in mind if you are wearing it outside on a hot day.
Gorgeous dress. Very unique. The skirt is a little heavy but still easy, comfortable fabric to wear. Love the pockets :)

I love this dress so much! The fabric is heavier so it drapes nicely, but is cool enough that I wore it in 90 degree heat and stayed comfortable. I also really liked how it accentuated my waist, but was loose enough that I wasn't self conscious about my stomach. I am 5'3 and it was floor length, but I was able to wear flat sandals and not trip over myself. Awesome dress!

Fit accentuates waist - if your waist is small and curves are kickin' this needs to be in your rotation. Adjustable straps are nice and material is ultra soft and cozy, but very heavy in the skirt. Perfect length for petite girls as it skims the floor at 5'3" and looked great with wedge sandals
This fitted me like a glove. Itâ€™s a little heavy but totally worth it!! I got tons of complements.
The dress was beautiful and looked perfect for WFH - COVID-19 style, but it was way too big. I sized according to the chart but it was at least 2 sizes too large.
Loved this dress! Comfy and very flattering. Will definitely rent again

It's been a while since I rented a dress that got me this many compliments! It is fitted at the top and flows beautifully at the bottom. The length was perfect for someone my height (5'4"). My only complaint is that it is a LOT of dress. The fabric is thick (but not hot) and there is a lot of it in the skirt. It's certainly not an issue, just something to keep in mind if you are shorter than 5'4" as it may make going up and down the stairs a bit tricky. Overall, rent the dress if you're looking for compliments from friends and strangers.
Beautiful well made dress, extremely bulky with all the layers. Do not travel with this dress. Takes up so much space!
This dress runs a bit big, but the fabric is so thick and sumptuous I just belted it and rolled with it! Casual enough for work, fancy enough for a night out. Great design and really long.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress so much!
links_Review_Text: It's a bit heavier than you expect due to the layers.
This dress hits the balance of sweet & sexy just right. Adjustable straps and no bra needed. Loved it
Long Dress

Received a ton of compliments while wearing! I kept referring to myself as a goth version of the cha cha lady emoji all night (ðŸ’ƒðŸ½). I loved it! My only complaint is the dress hits at a slightly awkward length if youâ€™re a shorter gal, and I had a really hard time adjusting the straps. Other than that it was perfect.
Fun and very feminine dress for any occasion. Wore this for a winter wedding. Super comfy and beautiful fit. Fit around top of zipper enclosure is a little tight so I went a size up. Loved this!

links_Review_Title: This dress is gorgeous, the fabric is light, but layered so nicely.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. It was perfect for an evening wedding. Very comfortable, the fabric hung nicely. I had issues finding a good bra and ended up without one, which was not an issue. lovely/!
I absolutely loved this dress. True to size. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Love the pattern and the flowiness
links_Review_Text: Wish I had gone a size smaller - a little too lose for my liking. Beautiful dress though.
Loved this dress on the rack. The back closure is tricky if you need to wear a bra- the zipper only goes halfway up your back, leaving a gap right where your bra sits.
Easy to wear, fits well
I ended up returning it. It was too long for me and it didn't fit in the waist. I am a 32 in waist.

Absolutely LOVED this dress! It was the perfect dress for a formal work event! I'm 5'7 and I rented size 6 because size 4 wasn't available and I think the 4 would have fit a little bit better! Also the straps on the shoulders were slightly loose but that didn't stop me from LOVING this dress. I got SO many compliments on it- it truly was a romantic black dress and made me feel very chic and lovely. Couldn't recommend this dress enough.

links_Review_Title: One of my favorite dresses I've ever worn! I felt so classy and elegant!
links_Review_Text: It fit great! I got so many compliments on the dress. It showed some skin on my back but just enough to look sassy. The length was great. I was able to show off my super cute shoes! Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: I work for an international organization and wore this to their holiday party.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I aim for a more eclectic style in general, but I wanted a dress that held the line between my personal style and being more conservative for a work party. Lame, I know. The straps were adjustable, which helped with them falling down for me. I had some slippage, but if you don't mind making a quick adjustment now and then, it's not really a problem. And the material was so comfy.

Halston is genius-this piece makes you feel amazing and it can go anywhere. Great lines and flow-dress up or down. Only trouble is the back button-unless you're a yogini you'll need help getting in and out.

links_Review_Title: Classy and chic jumpsuit. Rent this!
links_Review_Text: I was stopped by so many people at work and told how chic I looked. This jumpsuit was a good length (I'm a bit tall too) and I wore it with mid-ankle stiletto booties. It was very comfortable and easy to take on and off. Also, #pockets yay!

Fits TTS. Rented this before there were any other reviews. Surprised by how much lower the back dip and slit comes than pictured. Pretty design feature, but no way to wear any bra & you need to be very flexible or have assistance to button closed. If you need to lift your arms much above shoulder height, this is not the jumpsuit for you because movement is restricted by design & the the whole thing rides up unpleasantly. Still cute and got loads of compliments at work

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments and people asking where I got it from.
links_Review_Text: Great outfit yet very hard to unbutton and button on your own. I had to ask someone to button each time I had to go to bathroom!

Stylish and comfortable, absolutely LOVED these. I almost kept it because it is such a chic stylish piece but is also classic. But the reviews are totally correct about getting in and out of it. I did it, but it definitely wasn't easy and it required some flexibility and creativity! But that aside - AMAZING! I wore for work but could easily wear for an event, night on the town, NYE.
Lovely

links_Review_Title: Looks very classy with heels & accessories. Highly rec for a night out or semi-formal wedding.
links_Review_Text: Draped perfectly on body while hiding problem areas like the belly. Good material and comfortable. Only downside is the button in the back is impossible to button/unbutton unless you have a friend to help. Cannot really lift arms past a certain height so not recommended for a night of dancing.
Fit true to size. I'm 5'4 and usually wear a 6 in dresses. It was very comfy, yet stylish and cute. I wore it to an engagement party and it was perfect. Got lots compliments!
Fit was good and I felt high fashion in it. Even worked with my broad shoulders

These were good, basic pants. Fabric was nice, I was happy with length - I am a bit on the taller side and its tough these days to find full length pants, everything seems cropped. They were just not so special. I have others in my wardrobe a fraction of the cost that will due just as well so returned them after one wear. I sized up as someone advised, from a 4 to a 6, but they were a bit baggy, wearable but didn't fit as intended.
This was my Christmas Eve party outfit and wow it was perfect. I felt so confident in it and received compliments all night. Fit like it was meant just for me! Highly recommend!

This could not have fit better, and I think it would work on any body type. There is an elastic waist band that sits at the natural waist, and it grounds the jumpsuit in the center so you're never making adjustments. The top is two layers and does not highlight your chest which makes a no-bra situation easy to pull off.
Super easy and fun to wear! Classy, comfortable and on top of that received compliments all night.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric and color! Flattering at the waist even though I have a pooch. Hard to button.
links_Review_Text: So many compliments, would rent again. Looks very expensive!

links_Review_Title: As much as I wasn't expecting to, I stood out in this gorgeous dress! Loved the colors!
links_Review_Text: The fit was absolutely perfect, roomy and form fitting. Not at all uncomfortable! I did have to use a bit of dress tape in order to keep "the girls" from escaping though.

links_Review_Title: The dress is beautiful and colors are gorgeous!
links_Review_Text: The 16 fit a little more snug than I would have liked and showed way too much cleavage.. so I decided to wear the 18. If you have large breast be prepared to show them! The 18w was a lot bigger throughout and I wish they had a 16w it would have been perfect. But I got lots of compliments!

This dress was a hit! So many compliments. I did have to safety pin the chest area bc it would have been a little much but easy fix. Went with a black satin bra so if you did catch a glimpse it was camouflaged. I ordered and 8 and a 10 and I could have worn either. The 8 was more form fitting, the 10 hung a little looser. Little bit of chafing from sequins by the end of the night but totally worth it! Would for sure rent this again!
The fit was true to size however, I too found the top to be too revealing. I was attending a work event so I needed to pin it, which was challenging, but I made it work.
Dress was pretty comfy except for a few pokey sequins under the arm. Could've fit me a touch better in the bust but I am a busty girl.

links_Review_Title: Rent this and you wont be disappointed
links_Review_Text: Felt like absolute royalty in this dress. Got compliments from everyone,including the VP and owner of the company I work for. Wore it for an award ceremony for my job and I couldn't have been happier. I did have to put 2 safety pins on the V neck. Girls were showing too much for a work function.

I rented this for my sister-in-law's bachelorette partyâ€¦ You can't go wrong with bright sequins! I only knocked off a star because for larger chested women you really need to rock a Cami underneath or else it's just a bit too much. I compromised for that by throwing on a denim shirt over it. I normally wear a size 14, but was able to fit into a 12 comfortably.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! I received compliments all night long!
links_Review_Text: Fit was great. I wore the larger size to have more room. Fabric felt substantial and comfortable. I did pin it closed at bust line.

Very comfortable dress but it does not have much stretch to it. I normally wear a 14 but tried the 16 to see if it would be a little more loose; however, then it was gaping in the back so I stuck with the 14. I did not feel constrained though. The colors are vivid and I received many compliments. I did wear a black camisole so I didn't have to worry about my cleavage.

links_Review_Title: Eye-catching and the ultimate party dress!
links_Review_Text: Pros: colors are beautiful, lots of compliments Cons: unflattering in the tummy if you have a little fluff, the chest is ill-fitting Ladies, I have a 34D chest, wore a size 2R, and my ladies still couldn't keep this dress in check. The chest part is oddly large! And, it's tough to wear a normal bra. I was pulling at it all night. Runs big! I wear a 4 in just about everything and there was no reason to try the 4 on. The 2 fit! It's a beautiful dress and very festive. Still gets 4 stars.

Beautiful Dress! I wore this for a New Years Reception! I received so many compliments on the dress, all eyes on me! The dress hugs your curbs, so for that I wore shape wear! I was very comfortable! I wore clear heels with this, but I'm sure black would look great too! When I stated that it was a rented dress I was told that I should buy it! I was pleased with this rental <3
