Thought this dress might be a little scratchy or itchy with all the sequins but it was so comfy! It runs a little big, I usually wear a size 4 but wore the 2 and it fit like a glove. It was the perfect sparkly and colorful dress to ring in the new year!

Fits just as it should have. It is very low cut so be prepared for that. I felt with the sleeves the low neckline wasn't quite so dramatic. I received several compliments all night. Dress was very comfortable and forgiving.

Gorgeous. I went a size up and the chest was big, but ended up being OK. So many compliments at the wedding. Mostly comfortable, hard to sit in for long periods. Very well made. Didn't lose sequins like other dresses. You'll be a hit!

links_Review_Title: Flattering fit but rented an alternate sequin dress that I liked better.
links_Review_Text: I could have went one size down for a more snug fit. Had some bunching.

Too many compliments on this dress. Bear in mind it is not fitted on the bottom. The pose I'm in makes it appear that way but don't be fooled. This dress will boost your cleavage and your confidence at the same time.

I had numerous people come up to me at a big NYE function and tell me they loved this dress. As suspected there was way more cleavage exposed than the model but the dress was flattering. I do wish the fabric was a little stretchier or the slit higher because it was a slightly restrictive in movement to dance but overall impressive looking dress.

links_Review_Title: The quick turn around time and great customer service!
links_Review_Text: I wore the dress to a party on December 28, 2019. The dress fit like a glove. I am 5ft tall, 130lbs, and my bust size is a 34B....and yes the dress accentuated all of my curves and "boobage." I loved the dress and received so many compliments.

I loved this dress and was complimented all night long. We attended a company Christmas party and this sequined number was nothing short of amazing! The dress was true to size. The only drawback was that I'm not top heavy, however a tiny safety pin and a good push up bra did the trick! I paired it with a black sequined clutch, black opaque stockings and black suede booties. Great look! If you wanna turn heads at a holiday party, this is the rental for you! RTR, you've done it again! Thank you!

My regular size (10) was taken so I had to go up a size which worked fine. The bust area is very loose and definitely made for lots of cleavage. I tried the 8, and while it was too tight, the chest area was still very big, so keep that in mind! And I'm a 34g, so it's not like I don't have anything to fill it out. I pinned it to make it more wearable. Otherwise it's really beautiful. No stretch, but I preferred it that way. Many compliments!

I wore this to my husband's holiday party and got a ton of compliments! I am between a 4 and a 6 and wore the 4 with no problem. It is fairly low cut so you need to be willing to show off the girls a bit if you wear this dress.
Such a fun dress -so many compliments.
I wore this at a community awards function and received tons of compliments. It worked well for the red carpet.

I had so much fun in this dress for my 30th birthday party. Pros: it's beautiful and very shiny, and the overall cut is flattering. Cons: the top gapes open, so I had to find a way to secure it (otherwise my entire bra was showing). It also runs small since it has no give; I am typically an 8-10.

This dress is stunning, I got plenty of compliments. While it is comfortable for the most part, the area where your upper arm would touch the side of your body became chafed from rubbing on the sequins all night. It's also very low-cut, I needed a safety pin to hold the girls in

links_Review_Title: Matched my brand colors for my launch party to a T!
links_Review_Text: This dress is a show stopper and conversation starter. Wish I got it in a 14 bc the 16 made it feel more formal than sexy but I made it work in my favor. Amazingly beautiful dress

links_Review_Title: Such a beautiful and glamorous dress!!
links_Review_Text: This is such an incredibly beautiful and flattering dress. It does run a little large so go a size smaller. The bust area is also quite large and can show a lot of cleavage, so be prepared for that. Otherwise this is a killer dress!!!
I loved the dress as a whole. It was just too busty for the wedding we were attending.

links_Review_Title: So cute. So much side boob.
links_Review_Text: I really liked this dress but I was looking for something more conservative for my event. It is very cute with a great color combo. If you want to put the girls on display - this is your dress.

The dress is very pretty. The top is pretty low and the back part of the neck is loose, which lends the dress to being a little wide open going into the v of the front. Expect a lot of cleavage, have a deep cut bra on and maybe a push up to keep the girls together to fill out the front. Very pretty dress.

links_Review_Title: Rented for a formal charity fundraiser. Ordered a size 20 and back up size 22.
links_Review_Text: The dress was horrible. It is not made for curvy girls at all. I wear an 18/20 so I went for the 20 and 22 just in case it ran small. It wasn't even close. From the waist down, it was like a sausage casing, it was awful to try and get on, and had little to no give. It was not forgiving, and not flattering at all. If you have hips, stay away from this dress. The top was fine in the size 20, but would require either a camisole or double sided tape or a whip stitch to close the wrap front. The top was way too big in the size 22, and the bottom was still a sausage casing, and not much better than the 20. I put both dresses right in the bag, and sent them both back next day. And tried to find something else in my closet that would do for the event I was attending.
Very cute but way too tight. I couldn't zip up all the way. Normally I can wear a 10 in dresses but this was too small all over.

links_Review_Title: Pretty, too large so I didnt wear it.
links_Review_Text: Runs large

links_Review_Title: Fun dress that draws a lot of attention.
links_Review_Text: Dress fits great, the sequins are a little scratchy. I have a large bust and it was still a bit large on top so beware.
I wish this dress had fit for the wedding I went to. It seemed as though it may have been stretched out from previous renters. Other than that the dress was beautiful in person.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress. It was super flattering!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit me perfectly other than being a little big in the top. I was able to wear my usual bra though so that did help.

Wore this to a charity event. Rented both 2 and 4R as I can be either size depending on cut. At 5'2" I was not sure how the length would be on me but it was great and different than what I normally would wear. The 2 was a bit constricted so I went with the 4. As other reviewers stated it is very low cut so your cleavage will be on display - I opted to wear a camisole underneath. Dress was very comfortable to wear and I loved all the colors- perfect for the Mardi Gras event I attended!

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress! It is absolutely stunning!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit me perfect!! I was nervous is would be too big after I read other reviews saying it runs big but it fit me perfect. The bust area is very low cut so I had to pin it up a bit but other than that this dress is a show stopper!

I ended up wearing a different one just because my event was a smidge more formal. This dress was lovely and comfortable. (I think I would have needed some tape to hold down the bust area due to the wrap style.)
This dress was great and I got so many compliments. The 20 fit well, although it was a smidge big in the chest. Overall 5 stars!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous Dress! Beautiful sheer fabric! Used body tape for breast area and worked perfectly.

links_Review_Text: This dress runs true to size and is extremely comfortable. Fashion tape in the front to keep it down. I wore for a brunch and it was a show stopper

This dress was so beautiful and fun to wear. I got so many compliments. It was one of my first items in my Unlimited membership, and it was so nice to have the perfect item for my date. This fit me a little weirdly in the shoulders, but not a dealbreaker. I wore tape at the neckline, and had no problems. Wish I owned it.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress but not for curves
links_Review_Text: Did not wear the dress but the back side continued to ride up. Dress was a bit awkward but so beautiful

Beautiful dress. Loved the cut out on the sides and showing of the back. It was very different from anything I have ever worn. Loved the color and floral print. I took a chance in this dress and was happy with the result.

links_Review_Title: Fun in the front and the back
links_Review_Text: I loved it! I have come to the realization that I have dropped a little weight but I always worry about my hips so I go for the 12. I could have stranded to go down a size because the top felt big. Thankfully, I had tape. This dress was a dream though. It's beautiful in the front and back. It's sexy while still classy. It's an attention getter. Wear it with confidence!
Im an apple shape and some dresses dont fit in my back-waist area but this one just great. I got ton of compliments! It looks and feels expensive and I will definitely re-order in summer!
This dress runs true to size. I am a size 2 and the 4 was big but still looked good. Very beautiful. Got lots of compliments

I fell in love with the picture of this dress. I decided to wear it for my family photo shoot. It is very revealing if you don't pin it. Mine had obviously been pinned before as there were already little holes, they weren't obvious unless looking for them though. This fits on the smaller side. As there is no stretch I recommend going for the bigger size. I usually wear a 2 and sometimes even 0. Very rarely do I wear a 4, so I was surprised I needed it.

links_Review_Title: What a great dress for a wedding!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful and sexy. The cutouts and dÃ©colletage are a real wow factor. Make sure to have fashion tape on hand to avoid a wardrobe malfunction! I only found it to be a bit long since im so petite.
Very flattering, showing curves and skin while not showing too much. The neck line was a little low for me, so I pinned it

links_Review_Title: Definitely stood out but that's what I like
links_Review_Text: I originally got this dress for my 40th birthday but ended up wearing it to my brother's wedding. It moved well and was comfortable all-night. I danced the night away without any wardrobe malfunctions. There were too many compliments to register. You won't be disappointed by this choice. I am tall and the hem met in a good place.
Wore this for my wedding week in Italy. This dress was a showstopper! Absolutely stunning. So flattering in all the right places. You'll love it!

Gorgeous dress, feminine floral details, light, comfortable, and so fun to wear/twirl in. I got so many compliments on this dress. Didn't need any dress tape for the front, but did get some just in case. It shows a lot of skin, but I think the length makes up for it.

I am a true size 12 so I ordered a 12 and this dress fit perfectly. Great midi length with sexy open back. I wasn't sure about the floral print for fall, but the burgundy flowers make it perfect for the season. I highly recommend this dress!
Dress fit comfortably however was far more revealing for my chest then the model. I opted not to wear this to my event.

links_Review_Title: Best dress ever. Love PatBo Brazil
links_Review_Text: Truly a magical dress I need to own. Please carry more PatBo dresses RTR!

links_Review_Title: Loved the front, hated the back
links_Review_Text: Wore to a cocktail attire gala. Dress was beautiful and wispy. Front was super sexy but not inappropriate. I hated the back, I don't know why it was so low cut, it felt and looked inappropriate for Fall ... also it bunched at the back. so I wore a shawl and forgot about it! Paired with simple jewelry and deep red/maroon suede pumps
Gorgeous dress! I got so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! You'll need tape for the top
links_Review_Text: Really loved this dress, runs large in the chest so you will need fashion tape!
Love it I am a size 20 but wore a size 8

Way more sexy/ scandalous than it appears on the model. You will probably need fashion tape to keep the boobs from falling out the bottom if you're not flat chested and plan on moving. But it's a very well made beautiful dress and I got a million compliments! Loved wearing it!

links_Review_Title: This ran big, but I made it work. Had to safety pin the top, and I wish it was a bit shorter.

links_Review_Text: I had high hopes for this dress. I even added a 5th spot to my Unlimited membership in order to get this. I felt overwhelmed in fabric. The neckline was far too low and the backside ruching bunched awkwardly. I couldn't wear it but hope it makes someone else happy.
Wore to my best friends rehearsal dinner and it was a show stopper!! Fit like a glove and sexy but sophisticated. Double sided tape is a must but I'm small on top so nothing was needed at all.

Super cute and funky dress, perfect for an outdoor wedding. True to size. I ordered a size up (that's all that was available) and needed a bit of tape to keep everything in place but that's probably because it was a little big on me. Lots of compliments on this fun dress.
This dress was stunning! I received so many compliments. I went bra-less with plenty of fashion tape and was comfortable all night.

Wow! I was skeptical at first with the open back and plunging neckline but this dress was stunning on. I received so many compliments. While it is slightly revealing I still felt elegant and comfortable. I loved how the dress moved and it made me feel beautiful. Overall the waist was slightly big but that was ok! Would recommend for smaller chests only

links_Review_Title: Wish I could have worn this one...
links_Review_Text: LOVE THIS ONE! I wanted to wear this so bad!!!! It was just too big in the waist, so hopefully the next size down works...
Got so many compliments on this dress! Beware of open back and low cut front, but overall it is a showstopper !

Got for a cocktail party, should have ordered a backup size. Didn't wear. Not sure why I ordered a size 2, maybe it was something in the reviews that led me to think it ran big... I struggled to get into this dress, was just too small- zipper didn't lie flat. But it's a super cute & sexy dress. Made my small boobs look sexy! Planning on ordering again in my correct size.

links_Review_Title: My date was unforgettable and my bf was so happy coz people were coming to me and praising my look
links_Review_Text: The dress looked gorgeous! It fits amazing well! Just in love with the look! People came and asked me multiple times about the dress! Vegas date just became awesome coz of the look!

The material and print are GREAT, it just ended up being too much material and I felt drowned in the dress. The back side didn't sit flat which appears would be an issue for anyone with a bum. I didn't feel like my top would fall out once it was all on. I could see this being great on less curvy bodies, I just couldn't make the 2 or 4 work for me.
Lovely dress, but I ordered the 6 (I'm usually 4-6) and it was too small in the waist for me.

links_Review_Title: This dress did nothing for me
links_Review_Text: Although the dress fit and was true to size, the shape of the dress did nothing for my figure. I looked like I was draped in chiffon curtains. Unfortunately, I couldn't bring myself to wear the dress and had to go with option B, an old dress in the back of my closet. Very disappointed.

links_Review_Title: Wanted to wear this out for a brunch, but was too big
links_Review_Text: Too big in bust, probably should size down
This dress was beautiful but too much for the wedding I am attending. The cap sleeves felt out of place but other than that it was a great dress that fit well.

links_Review_Title: Fun dress! Love the color, cutouts and open back
links_Review_Text: I am 5'5",120lbs ordered a size 2 and 4. The 2 was a little tight on top (across the shoulders) but fit perfectly at the waist. I ended up going with the 4 which fit better all around. I did have to get creative with dress tape to keep the top closed but worked out great.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a fall wedding. Colors were vibrant and I received many complement.
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit and surprisingly comfortable. Sexy but not revealing. I felt amazing in this dress.

I'm a true 12 with an hourglass frame. This dress is beautiful but I had 4 inches of fabric at the waist and a couple inches in the bust. No way I could wear it. I'd suggest sizing down. Maybe I'll try again but WINTER IS COMING!
I checked the tag it says 100 cotton but it feels like paper! It wears like paper and sounds like paper. Did not wear it at all.

I like this brand, and the dress was comfortable, pretty flattering and suitable for work. I'm a little less enthusiastic about the fabric they used for the skirt of the dress, but it wasn't anything I couldn't live with. It was rather chilly out so I had to style it with a sweater.
Fits like a glove, bottom of skirt fitted top is a little loose.
It was difficult to get this dress to fit properly.

links_Review_Title: Fabric is not very luxurious, but the print is nice.
links_Review_Text: This fit nicely, but given my age, the fabric + print made me look like an old lady. The fabric is really synthetic and not great.

links_Review_Title: Highly recommend this dress! Cute and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Comfortable and you could wear without a bra. I ended up ordering a size small and a medium and went with the medium. They both fit but small was a little too snug! Height: 5'7 Weight: 128

Wore this to my work holiday party. It was so comfortable! It has adjustable straps so that you can make it more modest if you're trying to show less up top. I'm 5'6" 132lbs 34D... The medium fit perfectly...
Wore for a charity event. Loved the dress and would rent again.

This is a spectacular dress! The M was too tight for me but I am going to size up to the L and reorder it. I have a small chest and this dress does not require a bra. Dress straps are adjustable. The bright blue sequined flowers against the black really pop and are beautiful. The only negative to me is the bright gold zipper all the way down the back. It did require some help with the zipper.

I rented this dress for a wedding and it was perfect! My legs are super short so I was worried it would be too long but the length was great. The only problem I had was that my boobs didnt fit in my normal size (M) so I had to wear a large but that size worked for the most part (was a little big in the waist and hips). Got so many compliments!!

links_Review_Title: Wore to a wedding reception, didn't worry once about this dress needing adjusting or sliding down.
links_Review_Text: Great fit, first time ever I did not need a bra, full support and held me in all over! The gold tone detail zipper down the back adds a strong statement, along with the adjustable, buckle stype straps. Great dress, would definietly rent again!

Was very flattering for my shape and was also very comfortable. I wore this for the formal night form my cruise wedding and received lots of compliments! If you have a larger chest this dress offers a lot of a support- I did not use a bra or tape. The gold zipper up the back of the dress looked classy in my opinion.

links_Review_Title: Had too much fun to get a good picture.
links_Review_Text: Felt comfortable and expensive and it fit nice. Thank you.

links_Review_Title: Sleek and easy to wear sequins.
links_Review_Text: The zipper down the back would make this a very hot date dress. I wore it to a family party with this black and navy reversible duster which was a perfect match.

I loved this dress, it fit me perfectly and was super flattering. I have a long torso, and the dress fit great - not too short waisted. It was really heavy which I love because it's always a sign of a well-made piece, and the sequin work was even prettier and more interesting in person.

links_Review_Title: Great dress got lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Dress is comfortable but no stretch at all

links_Review_Title: Fit is a little looser then it looks - but still a great dress
links_Review_Text: Overall the dress was great. There's adjustable straps which is always nice. Though the fit was looser then expected in the middle of the dress. Then towards the bottom it is so tight you can't walk properly.
This dress was great! Felt confident and pretty in it. It's form fitting but the sequin detailing makes it detract from any shape issues. It stayed put and the adjustable straps were helpful.
Perfect fit, it was snug and yet comfortable. The sequins are the dress are subtle but eye catching. Honestly I would rent this again in a heartbeat...or buy it.

I rented this for an option for a holiday party. It looks much more expensive in person. I think it would fit someone with an athletic or straight build. The adjustable straps are definitely a saving grace so you can fit to your body. I did not wear due to my armpit fat looking large. I would wear this again but would size up. I am typically a 2 and the 4 was difficult to zip on my own. As for the sheerness, it is on the hanger, but not noticeable when you have it on.

links_Review_Title: Incredibly comfortable and a crowd favorite!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a rehearsal dinner. Incredibly comfortable and easy to wear.
Form fitting dress but beautiful! Received so many compliments. It has some stretch!
This dress is so much more amazing in person! Fit was perfect for my Sz 2/4. Loved the adjustable straps! Can't wait to rent this again and tempted to keep it next time!

links_Review_Title: I absolutely loved this dress! It fit perfectly & was so comfortabl!
links_Review_Text: I don't think I realized that this dress was sequined & the straps were velvet, but all of that was such a pleasant surprise. I loved this dress so much & was so disappointed sending it back!
Even a size large I couldn't zip it. This dress is very tight in the chest.

I didn't actually wind up wearing this for the event I had in mind (prom - just didn't quite fit the vibe), but it looked so pretty! I love the subtle sparkle, and the floral embroidery is really beautiful. The S fit me well, but I definitely needed a decently padded bra to fill out the bust (32A). I liked the length on me, and I liked the breathability of the fabric. It looks sheer when you hold it up, but it doesn't look sheer on the body. While I didn't wear it for this event, I will definitely be renting this again for one of the three upcoming spring/summer weddings in my calendar.
I have rented this dress twice! I love the color & the fit. It's high quality and looks even better in person. Got many compliments!
Love it but a little too form fitting for this mama!

Rented this dress for NYE, could not wear it as it runs extremely small! Typically I am a large (8-10), and the large was nowhere close to this. It was sad because the colors, cut and shape are beautiful.

links_Review_Title: beautiful in person: sequins catch a lot of light
links_Review_Text: flattering cut and the gold double zipper up the back is a nice bonus; I had to wear a camisole underneath due to scratchy sensation.
The quality and details of this dress are amazing. Even better in person. If between sizes, or bustier, I would size up.

This was perfect for a fall wedding. I was initially hesitant about a dress with sequins but they don't look cheap and give the dress a pop. The back is a double zipper that goes all the way down so you can adjust the slit in the back. It was roomy enough to dance in but thick enough that it keeps you in. A little itchy but I would rent again in a heartbeat.

links_Review_Title: Chose another dress.....but will rent again!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress. Fit perfect, but I chose to wear another dress. Detail is very elegant and classy. Lovely color! Will keep in mind for future events.
I'm a true size 6 and fits well in a medium but this one ranks small... would rent it again in size 8

Gorgeous dress, should have ordered a small but didn't have time to get a different size. Warning - the dress is really shear so I wore a black strapless slip underneath it which worked great. It was the perfect dress for a fall wedding paired with a fur coat.

I am a traditional size 4 and could barely zip up the back in this one. Go a size up. Very glam looking with the sequins. It was too much for my event. Definitely more of an evening gala- type look. Very pretty.
This top was so cute and fit perfectly. I can't imagine wearing this if I were busty, though. It also has some glittery threading which doesn't really come through in pictures but is a cute touch!
Is more of a crop so must wear with high waist jeans

Love the material, the colors, the glitter (surprisingly!), and the cut. This sweater felt holiday festive without being overly traditional. It does stop at an awkward place in the midsection so best paired with something high waisted if you're conscious of that area.
The wrap detail is a little off so the sides pull in. Has a subtle sparkle and is a good length to tuck in to high waisted stuff. Didn't like it much untucked.

links_Review_Title: Very short and very low cut
links_Review_Text: I am only 5'3" and this was very short on me. Even if I'd tried high waisted jeansnit would have been short, so just be aware. Granted I'm breastfeeding, so my chest is larger than normal, but this was super low cut. I would have needed a camisole underneath. I didn't wear it. Tags still on for the next person!

I really liked this top, but it needs ultra high-waisted pants. I have a couple of skirts that would have hit right, but I got this one for home (self-isolation time, yay), so a skirt wasn't that comfortable. It's cute and great for small chested women. I just wasn't looking to show midriff (it seemed like a lot to show- so much chest AND stomach), so I didn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a birthday party, super fun and very unique.
links_Review_Text: Fit is slightly small but very flattering.
Love this top with high waisted pants!
The bunching were the wrap is is kind of weird but seems like its how its made. Wear a M normally and wore a M

links_Review_Title: Sexy form fitting top- accentuates the bust- my husband loved it!
links_Review_Text: Went on many dates with my husband in this shirt- he loved it! Very flattering, looks great with jeans, and the sparkle gives it a little edge over other form fitting shirts. Will rent again.
Very pretty but too small. I think medium would have worked best.
This shirt looks great... but it runs small and pulled up above my waist line highlighting my tummy...

I loved everything about this except how deep the neckline was. I couldn't wear a regular bra - even a deep V neck bra. I had to wear a stick in bra and not clasp it closed. Otherwise, the colors, fit and look were great - I still wore it multiple times.

links_Review_Title: Such a fun shirt! Lots of compliments, very flattering, and fit well.
links_Review_Text: Love this shirt. The material is stretchy and clings to your body in all the right spots. I had a lot of fun wearing it. The one thing I would say is that the wrap gets a little bunched up on the sides, but nothing noticeable! It's a v-neck, but not too deep.

Planning to wear this out in Vegas. The color is stunning. It does run small, but the fit is amazing if you size up. It's structured so it definitely holds you in and the adjustable straps make it feel so much more tailored. Can't wait to wear!

The print is what drew me to this rental. I love the different patterns and the easy breeze attitude of this dress. I saw the tie waist and thought that would make it flattering but even when pulled it didn't make the dress flattering on my pear shape. There is a lot of fabric, it's lightweight fabric but makes it poofy. It's a rental so try it anyway, perhaps you can make it work for you!

I rented this for my nephews baptism and a trip to Hawaii. It was perfect for both. I did wear a cropped jean jacket with it for the cooler night and that looked great too. I would suggest wearing a nude color shapewear under it. There is not much to it and it's very see through. It runs a little small. I am a True 14 and the 16 was just right. It hugs you in all the right places but it's not super forgiving near the weird side front zipper. unique dress and good if you don't love your arms.

I rented this for a baby shower and it was perfect! It does draw to the waist which is why I only gave it 4 stars because I like to relax a little bit in my dresses. Other than that I'm obsessed and will rent again for a bridal shower this summer!
Pretty.
Perfect fit and comfortable! Thought it might be too casual but the silky fabric and length washed away all concerns!
Fits well. Cute but no wow factor. Good for everyday. Pretty long too.

links_Review_Title: Feel sexy and sophisticated at the same time!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit like a glove...which may not be how the designer intended it...but if you have curves, rent this dress!

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a formal lawyer dinner - got so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: This is conservative but sexy... if that makes sense.
Hugs your curves with gathering at sides which was very flattering
Love love love this dress. So flattering. A little hard to walk with long column and slit. Shiny material is a bit dressy.

Really enjoyed this dress! Would i buy it for $700? No, But loved renting it. If you are in between sizes, go with the larger. I'm 5'6, 125 lbs, 34b and am either a 2 or 4 (26 or 27 pant)-- very glad i went with the 4, the 2 would have been too tight at the hips
This dress was very flattering on my curvy frame. I am also petite and the length was perfect with my heels.

This dress was a dream! Super light so perfect for summer wedding. It looks conservative but when you put it on, it hugs in all the right places and is actually quite sexy. Low cut but there's a tie if you want to close it. Slit is a really nice touch but not super obvious. I loved this dress because it was classy and sexy at the same time and i find it's difficult to find that combo. Highly recommend this dress. I'm usually a 2 or 4 and this fit perfect!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress with a slimming fit.
links_Review_Text: I loved the light floral fabric - feminine and sexy fit and the ruching brilliantly camouflaged my tummy. I ordered a 12 and 16 as the 14 was not available. I ended up wearing the 12 and it was perfect.

Wore this to a chilly summer evening party with a cashmere wrap despite the light and airy design of the dress. It was perfect. It ran a little tight in the belly area for me but I was still comfortable. I ended up wearing it tied at the neck for a cute prairie look.
I loved wearing this dress. If you have any curves or shape on your bottom half, I would size up. The top did end up being a little too loose, though.
I love Veronica Beard, it does well on my body. Had to wear a cami because it was low cut for the occasion. I was comfortable and wore sandals. Got lots of compliments.

I wore this dress to a bridal shower and added my own pink jacket since it was still chilly. The fabric is very light and airy. Fits true to size...although Iâ€™m normally a size 6, only the 8 was available so it was a little loose as expected but still worked. Thereâ€™s a string that ties by the skirt and controls how high or low the slit goes so itâ€™s nice itâ€™s adjustable. Iâ€™m short so it was a little long on me but with heals at least it didnâ€™t touch the floor. I would definitely rent it again.
4R was more comfortable than 2R
Amazing dress and fit. Loved it

Super flattering! I didn't wear because there was a hook missing, but I'd definitely try renting it again for my next vacation. The material is really nice - a tiny bit stretchy and has that light, summery feel.
Perfect for resort dress code "jacket required" for men. Dress was so comfortable. The fit was perfect for my chest and hips.

links_Review_Title: Great style for a bridal shower!
links_Review_Text: Loved the style and material of this dress. I ordered both the two and the four; four was definitely more comfortable around the hips ( which are fitted) but the top was way too loose and baggy. Ended up going with the two which fit perfectly on top, but found myself constantly tugging it down due to tightness in the hips. Might work better for someone slightly smaller in the hips! Otherwise, overall a cute style.
Very flattering fit and very feminine.
Really wanted to love this dress, but it just didn't quite work. Would never wear it without tights and a cami- the fabric is beautiful but flimsy, and the side slit is VERY high.
Dress is tight and fitted around the mid section and Veronica beard sizing runs small, size up! Top is very blousy

links_Review_Title: Worn to a nice dinner out.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. Fitted in the waist and hips, flowy and breezy up top. The slit is sexy but not something you have to keep an eye on. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Didnâ€™t wear it, it was awkward for my size 10 body.
links_Review_Text: Pro was the print Con: fabric, fit, over style

links_Review_Title: The dress to end all dresses.
links_Review_Text: Yes the snaps and ties take a minute to decipher. But when you get it on it is stunning. Fits like a glove but in a really good way, especially for curvy types like me. The rouching is just perfect, accentuates everything that should be accentuated and nothing that shouldn't be. Love love love. Would buy in a heartbeat if it weren't so crazy expensive!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, but a puzzle to get into and runs small.
links_Review_Text: The title says it all. It's a beautiful dress, but it's not meant for bodies with any curves on the bottom half.
Incredible fit and so flattering

Loved this dress! Wore it to a summer wedding on the finger lakes and it was perfect. So many compliments! Lightweight and such a pretty print. Loose on top and snug on bottom which is perfect for me (I'm narrow but 32D).
Super light weight. Comfortable. A bit challenging to dance in. Good fit for more apple shape.
A bit to high cut to wear and when combined with fabric, made it a dress better suited for an informal occasion.

Definitely was difficult to figure out the ties, snaps, and zips! (I didn't realize that there was a little hook at the breast until half way through my event...). Also, helpful tip - the tie at the top (neck) can tighten/adjust the looseness of the wrap in front (around the chest).
I wore it on a Friday with a jean jacket. It was very cute, flowy and way sexier than I thought it would be. I had to add safety pins to be sure I wouldn't fall out!

links_Review_Title: It is like a puzzle to put on
links_Review_Text: gorgeous fabric, print - small, very little to hold it together and see through. Wanted to love it but, no, just no.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty, Very flattering, hits all the right places (and hides the others!) Perfect for work.
links_Review_Text: n/a

links_Review_Title: The button wasn't strong enough for the girls!
links_Review_Text: The button that clasps underneath the right breast to close the top was not secure enough for my size G chest. I had to be very conscious about not bending certain ways so the dress wouldn't fly open. Other than that, the dress was flow-y and beautiful. A head turner for sure.

I love this dress and it fitted me perfectly even as a short person. I love that you can create a tulip collar with the tie around the neck. Super flattering even as a maternity dress. Would highly recommend this.
Very snug fit
This top received so many compliments and was so cute with a wide leg pant!
Didn't wear shirt because I didn't have pants that were high waisted enough. To wear that top out on a date for dinner. Was slightly snug in the shoulders I may have been able to wear a size four
Super cute! Wish it was a little less expensive to buy. Wore with high waisted black leggings.

links_Review_Title: Fun and flirty super cropped blouse
links_Review_Text: Loved this crop top! The open back was a fun detail and I loved the pattern. I wore it to a concert and felt comfortable and cool. The bow in the back does tend to come undone because the material is so silky so keep an eye on it but overall itâ€™s a great top. I wore an 8 even though I'm usually a S/M or a 6. I might have fit in a 6 but the 8 looked and felt great. The little button at the top was a bit tricky to do up on your own but I managed. The crop is high so be bold or wear a high waist!

links_Review_Title: Great top for a night out!
links_Review_Text: Loved this silly top. So cute and fun. Wish it was a bit looser on me, but I have larger shoulders than most.
I get compliments every time I wear this shirt! Cute, cropped look. True to size and comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Great top for in between seasons!
links_Review_Text: Wore this out to dinner with friends on a not quite fall not quite winter day! The long sleeves made it weather appropriate, and the open back gave it the little sexy touch I was looking for. I would totally rent this again!
Super flattering & looks great with most high-waisted pants. The bow was a little loose but besides that, I loved it!
Loved the open back on this top! The band around the bottom has some give so I didn't feel like I was squished into it. Super soft and silky fabric!
I usually wear a size 4 but 6 was perfect since I have a larger chest. Comfortable, easy to move in. Perfect with high-waisted jeans. loved it!

links_Review_Title: super great fit but not very practical
links_Review_Text: I love the quality of the fabric, the fit, and the pattern of this shirt, I just wish I had something to wear it to! when I rented it I thought it would be more casual, but it's a pretty nice silky material so I felt weird wearing it with just jeans. I am also insecure about my tummy area so I wasn't sure Iâ€™d feel confident given how cropped it is. if I had a specific event to wear this to i would rent again!
The shirt is high quality and has a nice print, but it was a little more cropped than I had hoped for.
This blouse is great, just make sure you break out your high waisted pants. When I lift my arms the shirt goes up to the bottom of my bra, so be prepared to show some skin! Super cute for date night.
The fabric is so pretty but be warned this top will come to just below your chest. It was too high of a crop for my taste. But it is beautiful!
This shirt was so much fun to wear. Warning: it is truly a CROP top. Shorter than expected but I paired it with a pair of high waisted black jeans.
I'm not one to wear a crop top usually but I paired this with overalls and it was very cute. I love the way it fit - very tailored.

links_Review_Title: felt super cute and got lots of compliments, wore it to dinner and karaoke with friends.
links_Review_Text: if you have a larger chest, it'll be shorter, so u def want to pair with some high waisted bottoms.

links_Review_Title: Nice, silky shirt that is great for winter going out.
links_Review_Text: Was a little shorter than expected. Would've liked if elastic band was not fitted as tightly because the shirt kept riding up during the evening.

Rented for a disco silent auction that got COVID-canceled, but still ended up wearing them around the house and for a zoom version of the silent auction. The waistband was a tad annoying, but great otherwise.

Loved. Higher waisted than I'm used to , though lays flat on waist , smooth lines over the hips/bootie , right kinda tight on thighs that flow into the best hippie flare !! Attractive . thinner material , though the darker color print Does not show any bumps . my hip/ waist is 26/37 and the waist Just fits ... so I did a medium . I'm long waisted , I think that's why they fit great through the waist to hips z length ? flip lips , 1 -1/2 inch heels are ok . Higher heels Didbt work .

wore these pants for my birthday party and they were absolute perfect party pants! super comfortable and the material is to die for! stretchy material was perfect for dancing the night away & i received tons of compliments on their fit and print! highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments, felt so adventurous:)
links_Review_Text: Fit very well! I'm very short so I was worried they would be too long, but they were perfect worn with heeled boots.

links_Review_Title: Funky bell bottoms for a cute date night
links_Review_Text: Loved these pants! Fitted at the top and flare at the bottom. Comfortable but cute, would def recommend
Got this for a groovy theme and wanted to keep them. One little thing to mention--elastic is great but rolls up when you bend down.
These are my favorite fun pants. It helps they're also very comfortable with an elastic waist! Wore them to a jazz club.

I wish these were a tad longer, also the waist band is a bit weird and would fold any time I bent over or sat down. I loved the pattern and flexible material. Got lots of compliments. Good for a night on the town.

Wore these for NYE party and they were great! Got lots of compliments. Run true to size. Taller gals watch the length! I'm 5'9 and I was able to pull off the length but they were close to being too short on me
Stretchy material with elastic band, would not order if you are taller than 5'6 or else they might be flood plants. Can be casual or dressed up. Comfortable.

Omg these pants are the bomb dot com! As soon as I saw them I loved them, and once I put them on I loved them even more. So comfy, soft, stretchy, and slimming. What more could you want?! And this print goes with just about anything. I immediately went to the companyâ€™s website and bought a pair, THATâ€™S how much I love these! They are a tad long (which I love), so will need to wear moderate heels with these, which Iâ€™d want to do anyway for work. These are made of a light to medium weight fabric that can be worn year-round. Stretchy as they are (full elastic waistband), I gotta say Iâ€™m a little surprised the XL isnâ€™t roomier. Iâ€™m 5â€™6, about 150 pounds, and normally wear M or L (8-10) in comparable styles, but these fit great. In any case, these are freakinâ€™ awesome and my favorite thing from RTR thus far.
Loved these pants! So cute and planned to wear them for a 70's bbq party that was ultimately canceled. A bit small around the waist so would suggest sizing up.

links_Review_Title: Such fun party pants--Lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Little long for me, but fine with heels. I loved the slimming effect of the top.

links_Review_Title: Run short...not the y'all if you want to wear with heels.
So many great compliments on these pants!!
links_Review_Text: Tight fit and LOVE the bell bottom.

I am typically a medium but I sized up to a large just so they weren't SUPER tight. They definitely fit in all the right places and my hug the booty well. They were so much fun for a night out or party!

Great pants - super soft and stretchy, high waisted, luxe material without being too thick or too flimsy. Definite seventies vibe, but look great. The only thing is that if you wear them high waisted, the elastic on the waistband sort of flips - not a dealbreaker but the only downside of these. Might be tougher for those who are very tall or long waisted, but a great pant. Considering keeping and buying!!

I ended up having to order a long because it was the only size left. I wore some pretty high heels, but it was still dragging on the ground a bit. Still functional though! The slit in the leg is the perfect length and the top is not too revealing.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and elegant with just the right amount of detail.
links_Review_Text: This dress was extremely comfortable. I have a very small chest so there was a little bit of extra room in the top but otherwise it fit like a glove. This dress was classic but with the right amount of spunk to it; the bodice had great detail and the lace was a nice touch and make it more than a simple black dress. I had to iron the lace since it arrived slightly curled up (probably due to cleaning) but that did the trick and it looked great. Got tons of compliments!
The fit was great and it was really elegant. I felt it was a little plain from far away but up close the detail was really pretty.

This dress was the perfect choice for my formal event. I wanted something that was tight but also flowy enough for me to move around in. I loved the lace detailing around the neckline as well as the leg slit. It was the right amount of classy and whimsical that I was going for. The only issue was the zipper was hard to get over the seam when trying to close. Other than that, this dress couldn't have been better!

This dress was perfect. Although the length was a little shorter than I'd prefer, I found that this dress was fit for my black tie event. If I had to change anything on the dress, I would just make the slit a little open so that it actually looks as though there is a slit. Other than that, it is a simple, yet elegant gown.
I wore this dress to a black tie optional wedding. It perfectly, even with my large bust and broad shoulders.

I wore this to a holiday ball and got a lot of compliments. While a simple black gown, the detail on the bodice is lovely and adds a bit of elegance. With the v back you can't really wear a bra but it was fine without. Think material. A petite was still a bit long on me but probably with higher heels it would have been better.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments- amazing detail in person! Quite comfortable as well!
links_Review_Text: Dress fit great. A bit tight in the chest area on me (40DD/DDD) but with some help zipping, didn't need a bra and had great but not too much cleavage! Wore this to my cousin's fall wedding, 3 weeks post abdominal surgery! Was so comfortable, yet felt so elegant. The bodice, while doesn't show too well in dark pics, is just beautiful- with lace and other material. It's amazing in person. Also a nice and sexy, yet somewhat hidden and subtle, slit in skirt of dress. Rent for any special occasion!
This is a pretty dress but offers no shape whatsoever. It is essentially a mumu, or pajama. it was nice enough and I wore it, but would not choose it again.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but the top was stretched out a bit
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous bust detail and draped beautifully. Perfect for summer event.
The zipper was a bit hard to pull up but it fit perfectly. The length was just right with standard heels.
This dress ran short and overall just looked frumpy. I already had ordered the long size, so nothing could make this dress work for me to order it again.

links_Review_Title: Cute but nothing to write home about
links_Review_Text: The fit was great but the length was wayyyy too long.

links_Review_Title: Wore for a Black tie optional wedding and loved it! The form fitting top was pretty and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: I wore a 12R and it fit great with medium heels. Canâ€™t wear a bra because of the open back. The bottom was flowy and beautiful. The lace embellishment on the top made an overall simple black gown a bit more fancy. I was comfortable and received many compliments, thank you RTR!
This dress was perfect for my New Years Eve Gala!! I'm usually between a 4-6 and went with the 4 because the top of the 6 was wayyy too big. Overall a great dress
Loved this dress but it was little big especially the straps.

links_Review_Title: This was a formal Christmas party.
links_Review_Text: I am a size 10 and 5'10" and the 12L fir perfectly! The length was ideal with 3" heels and the whole dress was beautiful and comfortable!

It was super comfortable and hung perfectly and was very flattering. I'm glad I didn't wear it because my friend actually turned up in this dress so we would have been matching. It looked great on her too.

links_Review_Title: Perfect! It was long, not too over-powering and beautiful.
links_Review_Text: You won't be disappointed!
Loved this sexy but appropriate top. Slinky and sexy but great quality and gorgeous light pink color.
I liked this because it's sometimes hard to find a lighter colored top for the holidays. Very comfortable fit
The shirt was gorgeous and fit well. I usually have issues with my tops because of my bust but no issues with this one.

This is a beautiful top. I wore it u def a blazer for work and it was perfect! The buttons are a bit of a pain to manage on your own, and it definitely requires some bra modifications, but the fit was beautiful, it was a perfect shirt for under a blazer.
Flattering color and I think it is a great shirt that can be worn every season
Lovely and fits well, just didn't have a chance to wear.

Okay so the top part is definitely too large and I had to use body tape to prevent any unfortunate moments. BUT this is the most wonderful dress. I can't explain how flattering and amazing it is. The material is so soft and flowy. This is the perfect summer wedding dress!
Fits true to size, flattering, need fashion tape for top tho!
Too loose on top otherwise I would have kept it to wear on vacation

I rented it for a trip to Savannah and wore it to dinner at the Olde Pink house. It was so perfect, flirty and sexy with summery colors. It's definitely a very deep V but my larger bust fit it very well without using fashion tape.

Wore this to our meet and greet of families for my wedding. It was very flowy and the colors worked beautifully with my tan! I normally wear a M but the top was too big for my small chest so I ordered a Small and taped the top down.

links_Review_Title: Felt amazing and comfortable in this simply sexy dress. Perfect for dancing all night!
links_Review_Text: Straps were a little big so had to alter it to give more of a snug fit up top.

I picked this dress out for a cruise but I only wore it to dinner. I would not have felt comfortable wearing this dancing, due to lack of chest coverage. It did the job for what I needed it for!

I'm usually a size 2 or small but ordered an XS for some reason. The extra small still for but was definitely tighter that I would have liked. Tue straps had to be constantly adjusted but I believe that is because the size was too small and tight around my waist, forcing the dress to sit higher than it was supposed to. The dress was absolutely amazing looking and I was complimented so much. No one could tell I was uncomfortable with the size or fit. I wore this to an outdoor bridal shower.

links_Review_Title: Fun dress - need lots of double sided tape!
links_Review_Text: I've always admired Carolina Costas dresses -ove how flouncy and fun they are. Wore this to a wine country wedding - perfect for the heat. However, the top portion wasn't as snug in the bust even tho the waist was snug. Wore a lot of double sided tape to keep the boobs contained!
I wore this to the kaaboo Del Mar music festival and received so many compliments. It made me feel so good :)) highly recommend it!!
The top was a little large on me, I had to pin the straps at the top so they wouldn't fall down, other than that I loved it!!

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress! I had it for a montauk NYC weekend and felt so confident on the beach.
links_Review_Text: No cons - I rented medium because it was the only size available. I'm sure both medium or small would have fit.

Fun, cool flowy dress! I'm a size 6 dress & 34B bra & the top was a little big but didn't gap so I got away with it. You can't wear a bra with it but a bra would have made it perfect. Super flattering on. 5 Stars.

Really loved this dress. The reviews made it sound like it was going to be tight on my rib cage so I went with a medium but wish I had sized down. The straps were long and even when I pinned them they slipped off my shoulders. Would rent again because it is so so cute but will size down

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my friend's Birthday. Got so many compliments and people asking to borrow it.

links_Review_Title: Looks nice, size recommended was wrong
links_Review_Text: RTR insisted I needed XS. It was not possible to zip.

The straps are very wide set and not adjustable so I was hanging out of the dress in the chest - could have potentially worked with tape and some pins but not comfortably. Very pretty dress/fabric/colour otherwise.

This dress is gorgeous and such high quality! It fit perfect except in the shoulders.... it fell off of them unless I was standing up really tall. I would be careful if you are small chested like me! Otherwise fit true to size!
Had so many compliments on this dress during our holiday in Turks and Caicos! SO much so I plan to purchase it!

links_Review_Title: I loved the top it was very flattering

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but the top was too large!
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to love this dress but I'm not sure what was happening with the top. It was much too large in proportion to the size of the dress. If I were to buy this dress I would take it to a tailor to have it taken in, then maybe it would work out better.

links_Review_Title: Love the color and the feel but did not fit my chest.
links_Review_Text: Loved the colors and the feel of the dress but it did not fit as expected. I am 5'0 and the length was good and it fit very well from everywhere except my bust. There was no support and it look awkward from my chest. I am a 36DD and it was loose from the top and I felt I was going to get exposed at any second.

links_Review_Title: How could anyone not like this dress
links_Review_Text: So I don't have a very large chest and that was definitely problematic when sitting down, but otherwise this dress was fabulous and amazing. Fit perfectly, not too tight but also not falling off. And the fabric is smooth and comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Loved it!!!! Everyone said how beautiful it was.
links_Review_Text: It is open, but the right size will be perfect!
If you have a larger rib cage I would pass on this one. I felt it gave me a great shape and I loved the flow of the dress, but it was too snug around the rib cage.
Wore this to a wedding and it was very true to size. Great color for a paler person and I bet it looks even better when you are tan!
I absolutely love this dress! Amazing material and great quality. I will 10000% be renting this again!

links_Review_Title: It was perfect for a day in Napa
links_Review_Text: Must wear a sticky bra

links_Review_Title: Nice colors but runs small - sent back

links_Review_Text: Great summery/spring colors. This fit well but I could've sized down. Its meant to be a loose fitting dress to begin with and I felt like I would have liked the top to be more fitted. Either way, I really enjoyed this dress!
The top is too loose and you can't wear a bra with it.
super cute took a chance since they only had a med it would run small it was huge

links_Review_Title: Make sure you size correctly! I am always a Medium but my boobs fell out of the sides.
links_Review_Text: Super adorable if you size right!

links_Review_Title: super light and airy pretty supportive in the chest surprisingly

links_Review_Title: Nice fit for curves. Fun to spruce up with a belt.
links_Review_Text: I got this to try on (since currently we're in a shelter-in-place) mandate, but have been looking for a jumpsuit to call my own. I liked this fit and felt it managed my curves well. I had a lot of fun with different belt, necklace, shoe options and felt that the suit was a nice canvas for creativity there. It had good enough give in the right places. I have to imagine it'd be fine after a day or night of wear. It was "the one" for me to buy and keep, as it didnt have a ton of personality, but I'd definitely rent again when looking for a solid well fitted jumpsuit.

I wore this to an annual work dinner, and get totally glamorous but not overdressed. This was my first RTR Unlimited rental and I was very pleased! I would have liked it to be just a tad longer, but this is the first jumpsuit I've found that really fit right at all. Very comfy too!

links_Review_Title: Definitely a jumpsuit I would rent again!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely love this jumpsuit. It is so cute on. Got so many compliments on it. I would definitely rent again!
Quality material, fit well, length perfect. had a perfect amount of detail which includes three buttons on each sleeve
The sleeves are too long or maybe my arms are short? Otherwise a beautiful well made jumpsuit

My 17-year-old daughter, who considers anything fancier than joggers to be formalwear, has given me absolute HELL about wearing something "nice" as one of her outfits for senior photos. She hates dresses. Hates dressing up. Hates anything girly. She wanted a "pantsuit" and showed me a photo of a hideous thing suitable for a 48-year-old woman working at an accounting firm. No. Just no. So I found this. She hates EVERYTHING I pick... but she loved this! Dramatic but doesn't show cleavage. Loose enough to suit her but fitted enough to look nice. Very sturdy. Has the feel of built-in shapewear. So incredibly flattering. Comfortable. Stylish. She looked amazing. She hated the Cole Haan pumps I had her borrow from me, and she went back into her Vans for the next outfit change, but this was a stylish, flattering, dramatic, comfortable formal outfit that made everyone happy for once!
Perfect for a work event
Definitely need spanks to smooth everything out. Otherwise awesome
I felt like a superwoman in this! I added a red belt for some color and paired it with some red bottoms and it was a total power suit. Lots of compliments and wish I owned it!

links_Review_Title: Not for short people! Very long!
links_Review_Text: Super cute! Needed a belt but I'm 5'9 and it dragged on the ground I needed to put it with 5 inch heels!

This is my first item and if this is what I will be getting....I cannot wait! It fits beautifully and would be great for travel as it doesn't wrinkle. Beautiful and comfortable material. The V in the front is not too low that it's inappropriate. Total class! Would rent again!
I typically wear a 12R. A 14R fit perfectly. I'm five for 171lbs and was able to wear these with and without heels; the legs were not dragging on the ground. Would definitely rent again, so cute. A+

links_Review_Title: Even the long was short waisted
links_Review_Text: Sadly, I was unable to wear. Extremely short waisted for me. I ordered the 4L and the length and size would have been fine if there was more length in the torso.

I felt like a million bucks! It fit like a glove and was so slimming. I had to do a bit of gymnastics to zip it up (zipper is in the back), but eventually figured out a method. It was worth it. I will be singing in a formal performance in a few months and plan to rent this again. The fabric is rich and it is lined. I didn't have to wear any Spanx, either. Always a plus! One word of warning, I rented the regular length and it was a tad long for me, even with 3" heels. I might get the petite next time.
I did not care for this outfit. It fit a little tight, but that's not why I didn't wear it. It just wasn't stylish and I felt frumpy in it.

links_Review_Title: Show stopper! Received compliments all day long. Definitely a striking piece!
links_Review_Text: It fit just perfectly in all the right places.

links_Review_Title: Long and low cut - best for tall curvy ladies

Wore this for a night out and it was great except you need a friend to unzip and then zip again in the bathroom! The v neck was too low for me so I wore a cami underneath. Torso was shortish so be aware.
a total classic

links_Review_Title: Not flattering if you have a tummy.
links_Review_Text: Not flattering if you have a tummy.

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love, but not for tall ladies!

This fit perfectly and was elegant to wear. It is a little tricky using the restroom so you might need to bring a friend but otherwise, it was perfect for an evening party.

links_Review_Title: Lovely outfit, very classy, versatile and comfortable
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a funeral but perfect for so many engagements.

links_Review_Title: Too long, but that's my fault. Runs small in upper body.
links_Review_Text: I rented the long version thinking with heels I might be able to pull it off. No dice! The L is indeed long! Despite the length, it was still too small for me in the bust. When fully zipped, my chest was tight.

links_Review_Title: The plunging neckline in front was all the detail this otherwise plain jumpsuit needed.
links_Review_Text: The sleeves and legs ran a little long - if youâ€™re petite (re: under 5â€™7â€), youâ€™re gonna need some big heals. Sleeves ran to around mid-palm - it wasnâ€™t the end of the world. Even in 3â€ heels, the legs ran along the ground. Because I have a short torso, it plunged very deeply in the front, but not indecently. I was able to wear a bra with it (and needed to in order to fill it out), but the fabric is thick enough to go without depending on your size. I was at an outdoor wedding and it got to around 50Â° and I was otherwise warm! I would most likely rent this again.
I loved it. Great fit and perfect length. Perfect outfit for the occasion. I felt like a million bucks:):):)
Beautiful fit and design! Fun to wear with a belt. Chest is fairly low cut .

links_Review_Title: I wish it were mine forever!
links_Review_Text: Amazing one piece. Every person I ever walked past this day I wore this blazer jumper complimented genuinely. It was an amazing fit. It complimented my hourglass figure while downplaying my thick arms. A little tight in the breast area but nothing a low black tank top or a safety pin can't fix if you want to go conservative. I am in love with this piece and will buy it one day.
I love this jumpsuit and rented it for a special occasion. It's just too small for me. Will try again in a 4. Fabric and cut were lovely.

links_Review_Title: Great piece. Not made for tall builds
links_Review_Text: This fit well everywhere except the length. I am tall so it didn't work for me. But for anyone 5'7" or under, it would be great

links_Review_Title: Wow! It's like Spanx had a baby with a tuxedo
links_Review_Text: I visited the RTR store for a different jumpsuit and was thrilled when my stylist found this piece instead. I typically take a 6/8 on top and an 8/10 on bottom post baby. This was a 6 and I would say the fit was closer to an 8. I'm curvy, but lean more to pear shaped. The material held me in and made me feel like the best version of myself. I've never received more compliments than I did wearing this.
I would have ordered a 0, but it was not available when I needed it for an event. Butt and chest where too large and the style didn't suit me. Fabric was nice, howwverm
I loved the style but it was too large for me.

links_Review_Title: This is thick and structured as described. It looks very formal on, but I decided to go with a dress
links_Review_Text: The fit is true to size and the back zipper helps ensure a perfect fit, but I decided it was a little too elegant for the daytime formal event I am renting for.
The material felt thin and cheap. Also very low cut in the front. Not sure you could wear a real bra. Not going to wear this one :(
Extremely comfortable dress that is easy to move in!

Very comfy and fits petite well. I got lots of compliments. I wore it for work but you could also dress it up for an event event no problem. It does have a slit in it that shows you leg some when you sitting.
Extremely flattering. Comfy. Lots of compliments

I wasn't sure what would fit and sized up, big mistake. This dress has some stretch to it. Other than that, I loved the fabric (I wore it from work to a award dinner at the country club). The pattern is really cute and the front ruching gave it an elevated touch.

Incredibly comfortable and feminine design. Not my usual print style, but I decided to try something new. The front slit never shows too much when you walk or move, so it is just a modest peak. Would also be perfect for a work to HH event or dinner.
This dress was perfect for work and for the holidays. I highly recommend.

Loved this dress - it's conservative enough to wear to church or work but I still felt feminine and even a little bit sexy (shhh!). It definitely hugs your curves, but there's some well-placed draping in the front that camouflages any extra tummy you might want to hide. Bonus: super comfortable!
Love this dress! It was super comfortable and received a lot of compliments:) Definitely would recommend.
The dress is comfortable and hides any problem areas. The length is perfect. Received lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but the slit drove me crazy.
links_Review_Text: The fit is beautiful and true to size. It's a thicker material and the colors are very pretty. There is a slit in the front where the material comes together that splits whenever you walk. I pinned it so it would stay together while I work it at work.

links_Review_Title: Wearing this dress made me feel great!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a work party. It was very comfortable. I received many compliments. The dress fit very well and was flattering on me.
Fit like a glove, really accentuated my hourglass figure and booty while hiding my tummy area! The front slit was relatively high but still tastefully done, and added some sexiness!

This was a feminine and surprisingly comfortable dress to wear to work (business formal setting). The material is almost a jersey-type fabric and very soft. Fits true to size, though the arm and shoulder area are very fitted (at least on the XS). There is a good amount of stretch. The draping on the front also makes it more comfortable. I was able to get away with the front slit given it was winter and wore this with black tights and black over the knee boots. But I would personally not wear this in the summer to work as the slit is a bit too forward and right down the middle in the front. Would be nice for a dinner or family event though. Was a fun alternative dress for work!
This was so flattering and pretty I would definitely rent again!
I rented the XS and the Small. Small worked perfectly! This is a great dress for work and can be easily worn for a night out as well.
Beautiful dress with a perfect fit. Appropriate for work or a date. My boyfriend never comments on clothes and smiled so big when he saw me in it. He told me I had to buy it immediately.
very festive
This dress was perfect. I wore it to two holiday parties and got rave reviews. It's very comfy, basically pajamas and completely flattering
Love the print and the fabric was super comfortable!
Wore to my rehearsal dinner. Super flattering. Looks great in pictures.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty dress that works for a number of occasions.
links_Review_Text: The dress is pretty and the fabric is very comfortable. The only problem at all is that the waist is a little high which I didn't find all that flattering. But I got a lot of compliments and it was pretty.
I wore this one on vacation with my family and was frustrated about how revealing it was. I didn't feel very secure in it but I got tons of compliments. This is the first rental I felt too old for!
This dress is perfect! The only thing I would change is to order a size up. For bigger chested girls it might be tight across the chest

links_Review_Title: Very Cute - Fits TTS for Reformation dresses
links_Review_Text: Great dress - wore it to my bridal shower. Wore the 0R which is my usual size with reformation. I'm 5'3", ~115, 34A. It was a bit tight at the top - I wore a bra because I thought it looked better for me but you could go without - it is double lined. Straps are tied, I did end up double knotting them so they didn't fall out!

links_Review_Title: I felt so beautiful wearing this dress.
links_Review_Text: Light, true to size, comfortable and easy to zip on my own.

links_Review_Title: the dress is very flattering. I see wearing this to outdoor concert or picnic event
links_Review_Text: Good for everyday wears and I can wear this for brunch or after dinner walk

Really cute dress. The bottom of the dress is so fun and flowy. Really flattering on. I usually wear a size 2 in dresses and I am a C cup but this dress did not fit well in my chest. The straps are adjustable which helped but the dress was falling down on my chest all day. Had to wear a jean jacket closed. Would rent again but probably not for work. The top was slightly top. Would be perfect for women with a flatter chest

I rented this for my bridal shower. It's super cute in person, lightweight and flowy. I received so many compliments on it and felt comfortable and confident wearing it all day. I usually wear a size 6-8 but had read other reviews that it ran a little small so I went with the 8 but they weren't lying and I should have gone up to a 10. The top was pretty tight and gave me kind of a lot of cleavage (not quite ideal for a bridal shower with family) but I just wore a denim jacket over it and it worked.
Where do the girls go? I rented my normal Ref size but this dress was laughably small up top. It was a choice between wearing it or breathing so back it went.

links_Review_Title: this is a stunning dress. I was unable to wear as this one had a massive stain
links_Review_Text: Very flattering, with an amazing pattern and forgiving fit
Perfect dress to match with a denim jacket and white sneaks for those days when you dont know if its summer or fall. As with all Reformation dresses, size up! Runs very small

I wore this for brunch and it was a cute and lightweight dress. The bust was a tiny bit low-cut on me, and the adjustable straps don't provide a ton of support, so the look isn't the most modest or conservative. Overall cute.
Reformation is weird for me, this size 2 was way too small I couldn't have worn it but in other dresses I order a S and they are too big. It's a perfect summer dress just recommend sizing up!
The perfect flowy white vacation dress! Loved the way it fit my chest and the length was just right.

I am never a size 10, but sized up since all reviews explained how small this ran. The size 10 fit but it wasn't flattering or cute - still was right in the rib cage. I wished it fit because the color and style were both so cute, but don't think this one will work for me

I read order reviews about sizing up, I'm usually 10 but ordered a 12, I'm curvy and bust 36 DD, waistline was big and that made the dress look weird, top part has elastic band on the back so in this particular dress I would recommend you get your regular size

It was a pretty dress but it didn't fit my chest. I'm a 32C. There's stitching that makes it impossible to squeeze them in without cutting into your breast or having to pull them out over the dress for excessive cleavage. That wasn't the look I was going for so I sent it back.
Super cute, love the shape but was a little tighter than I wanted in the tummy area
Runs very small size up one or 2 sizes

links_Review_Title: Too small in chest and torso area. Couldn't wear
links_Review_Text: Too tight and i sized up

The top is cut very awkwardly. I read that in previous reviews, but was so excited about a reformation dress being available on unlimited + i have zero bust, I thought I'd give it a shot. (32C). The top was cut bad. Even I couldn't fit in it. and that was the first, um, ever. This May be the worst reformation dress made. Skip it.
Rented this for a BBQ and loved it! Simple but special.

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love this, but just missed the mark!
links_Review_Text: I love reformation and the dresses usually fit well (while they run small). I'm usually an 8 but always order 10 in reformation but this one was smaller than usual in the rib cage, but then fit well everywhere else. I may re order in size 12, but then I'm worried it may be too big in other spots. It was also slightly see through even with nude underwear. Definitely a bummer because it was a cute summer dress!

links_Review_Title: Loads of compliments and so comfy, too!
links_Review_Text: I love jumpsuits and this one did not disappoint! It was so comfortable but still looked incredibly chic. I wore it on vacation and probably should've bought it because I would live in it over the summer. Fit was great and the length was what I expected for being 5'4".
Now detail in the back was beautiful
I really wanted this jumpsuit for vacation and *probably* should have gotten a 6 (my normal size). 4 fit but was definitely a little snug. It was really comfy and the back is super cute!

I loved this jumpsuit!!! I wore it a few times, it was a great canvas to dress up with different accessories. The tie back was beautiful but made wearing a regular strapless bra a little tricky. But the tie back also gave you a little wiggle room on top to let out if cinch in if you have a larger or smaller chest. This photo was at the end of a long day of vineyard hopping in Napa, it wrinkled a little bit held up pretty well throughout the day.
I wish I could wear this every day, it is so cute and flattering. No bra needed, fits true to size, surprisingly doesn't wrinkle

links_Review_Title: From cocktail hour, thru dinner, and on the dance floor this one is a winner
links_Review_Text: Fit beautifully. Very comfortable and easy to move in. Enough support to be worn without a bra. Received compliments all night long, felt like a movie star.

This relaxed fitting jumpsuit was perfect for a weekend vacation. I absolutely loved the back on this as it gave the jumpsuit a cute accent. I wore a size 12 here, because that was the only size available, but could easily have gone with my usual size 10. The size 12 did allow for a more relaxed fit though which was nice when wearing it all day!

I rented this to wear for a cocktail party but ended up wearing this for a casual day of sightseeing. It really can go from day to night! It was really comfy and traveled well in my suitcase. My only issue was the straps fell off a lot during the day

I got so many compliments on this! It was super comfortable, great material, didn't wrinkle nearly as much as I anticipated. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the straps aren't adjustable and the top was a bit large. Everything else fit perfectly!

I wore this jumpsuit to brunch / a rooftop bar with friends and it was amazing! I got so many compliments. The back tie is both fun and helps hold everything place since it's somewhat backless. My only complaint is that the straps aren't adjustable and they were a little long on me so it sat very low. If it was less expensive I would 100% buy and just alter the straps.
LOVED !!!! It was super comfortable and easy to wear. It has very long ties in the back to make a bow, which sometimes comes undone. BUT it's worth it!
This linen jumpsuit is soft and easy to get on and off. Paired with sneakers or heels. Super Versatile
Able to dress up or down, it was so light and breezy for MDW but not see through at all thanks to the light lining. So flattering and fun!
Well lined, comfy and waistline is only as tight as you tie it. No pockets though
This jumpsuit was great on the model but just not my style. I wanted to love it because the material is great however, it just didn't work for me.
Lovely jumpsuit, perfect for a warm vacation. The bust was on the tight side but I made it work. Also know that itâ€™s pretty heavy - youâ€™ll feel it in a carry on bag!
So flattering and cute- loved the open back. Can't wait to wear it in Florida!
I am a consistent size 8/10 and I ordered a 10 since I have wider hips. However, these did not fit me well in the waist or hips. Wanted to like it so much cuz it's really cute :(

links_Review_Title: Cute romper but right around rib cage
links_Review_Text: I rented this for my engagement photos and it fit well until the final zip. It's def tighter around rib cage and I have a smaller frame. I think if I would have sized up then it wouldn't have fit me everywhere else.

links_Review_Title: I wore it for a white party in Bermuda
links_Review_Text: It's really cute, but tighter around the waist than I was hoping for. I was nervous for a second that it wouldn't zip, but it did! I just had a baby too, so my mid section is a little bigger than normal. All in all cute! I'll just wait until I'm more comfortable w/ my mid section to rent it again
so many compliments. I'm usually an 8 but sized up to a 10 because I have a bigger chest and thighs. will definitely order again
It has a tie in the back that I used to make it a bit more snug. Love the wide leg.

links_Review_Title: I LOVED THIS! So cute and elegant!
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit. 4 fit perfect, but I would be cautious of renting if you have a long torso. I loved this so much, I'm thinking about purchasing it from Club Monaco.

links_Review_Title: This was my first RTR & this was my back up style.
links_Review_Text: Pros: cute design, fully lined, nice linen color Cons: showed undergarments lines, snug, wrinkly especially the ties, shoulder straps not adjustable but for me they were right length I ended up not wearing & this could certainly work for other people. Maybe a size up for me but it was my back up so luckily the 1st dress worked.
One of my favorite rentals!

This was a lot nicer than I was expecting. The fabric is thick and good quality. It was also super comfortable and soft. The 2 fit perfectly, and I tend to wear a 4, so I'd say this runs big. I wore it once to an event at my Country Club but wish I'd had something else to wear it to! I got lots of compliments and felt classy and timeless.

i'm typically a 2/4, but rented the 4 based on reviews and cldve worn the 2 or the 4 since it cinches at the waist w the belt. i cannot recommend this enough. it's lightweight, sexy, and super comfortable. no bra needed. loved how chic this looked. fitted around the bust and waist. cannot recommend this enough
I absolutely loved this jumpsuit. The fit was perfect. Can tie it in the front or back, but I preferred the loos bow tie in the back. Strongly considered buying it.

This romper fit perfectly, true to size. It's linen so it can wrinkle easily, but a few sprays of some wrinkle release spray does the trick. No bra needed as it covers all the right places and is not see through like some other linen clothing. It's amazingly comfortable, and easy to take on and off. Dress it up or down. I'll be renting this one again!

links_Review_Title: I've had this rented for over a month
links_Review_Text: I love this jumpsuit. I've been wearing it at least once a week since I rented it. For 5' 3" the length is a little long but it still works.

Loved this jumpsuit. Close fit but it was super comfortable, looks great on and very versatile. I wore it for a casual event but it could very easily have been dressed up. The fabric is great and it is well lined. Straps are long though so they did fall a couple of times but not enough that it was a problem.

links_Review_Title: Cute but straps were too long
links_Review_Text: First off, let me say that once you have this jumpsuit on it is incredibly comfortable. I wore it with a pair of slides and I felt like I was in PJs all day.
