Also, even though it's white, it's lined so you don't have to worry about it being see through. The problem was the straps, which were NONE ADJUSTABLE! When I put it on I wore a balconette bralette which should've been covered, but it kept showing. Since I didn't have anything else to wear, I had to shorten the straps by wrapping it around some bobby pins which then made the chest tighter as I had pulled the whole thing further up. Very cute and comfy, but would recommend it to people who can wear strapless bras or no bra.

I wore this for my bridal shower and it was so perfect! It's definitely made for smaller chested girls, but that worked out for me. It was so comfortable and I got a ton of compliments on it. It's lined and a linen type material. I had a hard time parting ways with it!
Perfect fit for petites! Didn't want to return this
Beautiful material and well made bu runs too small. I couldn't zip it :(

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous white casual and chic jumpsuit
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit, very flattering, you can dress up or dress down! Loved this linen white jumpsuit! Would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Perfect jumpsuit for a date night or cocktail party, perfect fit!
links_Review_Text: Linen so easily wrinkled but fit perfectly!!
Lovely piece

links_Review_Title: Beautiful jumpsuit but wrinkles easily & straps are long and not adjustable
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a fancy tea for my bday with my girlfriends. I loved the jumpsuit but it had some wrinkles we couldn't get out! My one complaint about the fit, which was overall very flattering, was that the straps were too long for me and there was no way to tighten them. They kept falling down my shoulders and I worried I might have a wardrobe malfunction! But other than that, I really did enjoy this jumpsuit.
LOVE this piece! It's so fitting and comfy. Highly recommend.
Was a great dress for dinner

I absolutely love this dress. It's slinky and beautiful. I did not wear a bra but it still fit really well. Probabaly wouldn't have much support if you have more of a bust but I did not want to send this back because of how it made me feel wearing it.
Wore this to our tropical vacation and it was perfect! Comfortable and beautiful.
Styled this with a sweater for a fall look. Great dress and really comfortable. Would we tough to wear a bra if you weren't wearing a sweater over it.
So comfortable. Pick size based on top bc rest of dress is flown. Could have even sized down one. Lots of compliments!

Lower cut and used sticky tape to keep in place but omg is this dress gorgeous. Definitely a thinner material which initially made me think it was too casual for a Cocktail attire wedding but ended up wearing it and received so many compliments. You can't tell from far away that it's thinner.

links_Review_Title: So beautiful and fun to dance in!
links_Review_Text: Fit beautifully and was fun to dance in! Comfortable and sexy and easy to dress up or down. Straps were adjustable which was great! If I rented it again I'd go one size smaller so that it could be tighter around the ribs (so my chest would be a bit more secure). Loved it.

This dress is light, airy and easy and you can basically pair it with anything you have in your wardrobe! Perfect for a hot humid day... very comfortable with a low back. I don't always love a lot of flowy maxi dresses since I'm petite and they tend to overwhelm my frame but this one I was pretty happy with. I wore the straps a bit higher than show on the model as I didn't want to have to deal with boob tape

links_Review_Title: I wish I could keep it
links_Review_Text: BEAUTIFUL DRESS I seriously got like 30 compliments. I wore it several times I am in love. You can adjust the straps to make it lower cut or not. I wore the straps tighter to work with a jean jacket and wore them looser to dinner with friends. Cute with sneakers or sandals or heels.
Very easy to travel with, got a lot of compliments. If you have a bigger chest this might not look great on because it has a slip dress feeling.
Super cute dress but it's super plungy and you can't wear a bra. I hate to tape my boobs in, so plan ahead!
Fit: runs oversized, low-cut with side cleavage. Pros: gorgeous fabric that moves with you when you walk

links_Review_Title: Great length for work on a petite gal; runs a little large.

links_Review_Text: I love this dress. It's so comfy and super cute. Material is great and it has fun zipper detail. I recommend renting!!
Not my typical rent style but this platform has taught me to explore! Love the color. Pair beautifully with pink for a cute spring look. Comfy for my plane ride and it has pockets!!
Not cute if you are petite! I thought it would be kinda of a cute shift and it was not flattering at all

links_Review_Title: Cute but fit was a bit off
links_Review_Text: Definitely tighter in the waist than anticipated but loose in the chest area. Just not quite the right fit. But still a super cute style! Wish the fit was better

links_Review_Title: Be aware of the puffy sleeves
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to love this but something is just off. The sleeve is VERY puffy and this picture does not do it justice. The print is beautiful but the fit just wasn't doing it for me. I'd only recommend renting this if you're comfortable with this cut

This top is so cute but definitely on the smaller size. I think I could have sized up and would have been more comfortable. Also had to wear higher waisted pants with it. Will be renting/wearing again!

links_Review_Title: Perfect crop top for a fancy night out! Comfy, stunning, easy to wear!
links_Review_Text: I wore this top to a eventing cocktail attire fundraiser, and it was perfect! A true crop but I paired it with high waisted black pants and it was perfect, nice length but no belly showing. I am short and petite, curvy on top, but the sleeve length and bust were perfect. Felt stunning and confident all night, lots of compliments. Perfect for someone who wants something special but doesn't want cleavage :) Sorry I forgot to take a picture!

links_Review_Title: Not what I had hoped for
links_Review_Text: It was cute but not as great as I had hoped. I wore it once.
super fun, got lots of compliments

links_Review_Title: So cute but ran a little big
links_Review_Text: I am usually a small and this was a little big on me. I wore it anyways but a XS would've fit a lot better. Super cute and highly recommend! One of my favorite going out shirts.

links_Review_Title: Short girth but very very cute. Good for curvy figure

links_Review_Text: I usually wear a size 14 but the size 16 fit perfectly. I felt really sexy in it and received a lot of compliments on it. I would've bought it if it had not been so expensive.

links_Review_Title: Wish I could have worn it. Great fit and true to size.
links_Review_Text: The wedding was postponed so I didn't get to wear this but I wish I did. Comfortable and elevated enough to be fancy. I don't love it enough to buy it at $250 but I do really like it and would recommend renting it.
Too short for 5'7"
I am short and would have looked weird if I didn't wear heels. Hugs your entire body. If you're between sizes definitely get the bigger size.

links_Review_Title: Stunning and flattering, received tons of compliments. Wore to work awards dinner. Easy and polished
links_Review_Text: There is no give in the material so if you are at a size where you need a little stretch, I would go up one size. Nice thick material so doesn't cling to bumps and lumps. Slit in bottoms near calf adds such a flirty detail. The fabric also has a nice texture that doesn't show in pictures, it's almost crepe-like. Love... loved it!

I rented this too to wear for work and was so disappointed when it arrived and I tried it on. The part that's supposed to look like a wrap effect is so stretched out that it doesn't cover the area where the shirt is held together by a closure. Couldn't wear it

I normally wear an 8...I got the 10 based on reviews. I have a C cup top. Waist fit perfect and top both big and snug. The clasp was a little snug (possibly because I wore a cami under) and the overlay was loose. Would be ok for a club but wore the cami for dinner as was very cleavage-y on me. Overall nice but def be warned of to size up
I chose this to Layer. Under a blazer. Really liked it but did have to use a safety pin so it did fly open.
This top is great but runs small at the busy. I had to wear it open with a bodysuit underneath. But it looked super cute.
Fits great and very cute with high waist black jeans. It is pretty low cut so not for work (definitely if you have any chest) but cute for a girls night or date.

links_Review_Title: really cute top, a little revealing but really flattering
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a size 6 and got a four, it fit a little snug but still very cute

links_Review_Title: The top was VERY small if you have boobs and the front flap hung very weird to the side.
links_Review_Text: Front flap was very loose and hung weird so it seems like it was a mistake. It was super small on chest. It was really cute and I wanted it to fit so badly!
I didn't get to wear this top. If you are a small to medium bust you might have better luck. Not for busty ladies.

I wore this twice and paired it with jeans both times for low key parties. I received so many compliments on this one! It's low cut and I had to use fashion tape to keep it in place but I often have to do that with anything low cut. You could dress it up easily or keep it more casual. Subtly sexy with the red and animal print and the cut. Would definitely rent again!
Waist small and top large

I loved this top! I could have sized up and worn a 6 and been less worried about my cleavage tugging a bit but there's a clasp that held everything together nicely. Would def recommend for a date night or something!

I wore this on two nights out and got tons of compliments both times. The fit was definitely true to size, probably could of sized up for a more a little looser fit but the 6 was perfect. Would totally rent again.
Flattering, everyday, work or play, does have a low slit so my bra showed a little bit when sitting sometimes but I am very flat-chested.

links_Review_Title: Runs small - especially for large-breasted women. It looks cute and is high-quality, though.
links_Review_Text: Runs small - especially for large-breasted women. It looks cute and is high-quality, though.

links_Review_Title: Wearing this to work made me feel amazing.
links_Review_Text: It was such a beautiful color and fit. It was a little low cut but I was able to pin it a bit. I paired it with black dress pants and a black blazer and nude heels. Such a cute look w/ or w/o the blazer. I will probably rent again.

This top fit perfectly everywhere including the shoulders, waist and good length. However it was unwearable due to the faux wrap part across the top being loose and hangy that it was unwearable. And there is no way to tighten it because it is a faux wrap. It's sewn in place. Very odd.

links_Review_Title: I loved having something new to wear.
links_Review_Text: The front draped a little funny. But I am very petite so it probably would fit better on the average torso

links_Review_Title: cute top! size up if you have boobs
links_Review_Text: i'm generally a 2, but in this top everything but the chest fit well! i needed to wear a cami under and leave the front unbuttoned. if you're a 34C you will need a size 4 or up.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Super flattering and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for the wedding I attended! I got so many compliments and I felt very confident in it. It was very flattering to my body and true to size. I am usually a size 10 and wore the size 10. Really happy I rented this!
This dress runs a tad bit big, but was so cute! I received many compliments throughout the night. It was also comfortable

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress worn to a Chamber banquet!
links_Review_Text: Dress was so beautiful in person. Everyone kept wanting to touch it, you know, because velvet!! The color was gorgeous and the velvet keeps you warm and hides any unwanted bits you might have! It was a smidge short so I did wear hose underneath. Fits true to size mostly, I wore the 10, though the 12 fit well, too. 10/10 would recommend!
I rented this for an awards ceremony at work. I usually wear an 8 but felt like the 10 fit better. The color is beautiful and the fit is great. I got many compliments. This dress is a show stopper!
This dress was a showstopper! Perfect for any holiday party!
The fit was perfect and the dress was so comfortable. Wish I could buy this one!
I wore this out for NYE, I received so many compliments. I felt great out in it, pretty true to size. Only negative for me is I am tall at 5â€™10 and it felt a little short for me

links_Review_Title: Wore this to dinner on NYE!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit like a glove! True to size and comfortable fit. The only con is it was really short so I wore tights. Still couldn't really bend over comfortably because of the length but overall great dress.

links_Review_Title: Feels super glamorous while being really comfortable
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. I opted for the 18 cause I was worried about sizing, it was a little roomy but so comfortable. I'm 5'2 and it definitely felt short. Great winter party dress!

LOVED this dress! It was super comfy and warm for a holiday party! I went a size up to the 6 I'm 5'1 and 135 lbs for reference. I could've wore the 4, as the dress stretches but i wanted to feel comfortable and eat without feeling fat lol l. Best dress for the holidays

This color was to die for! I was very happy to have the 10 instead of 8 for length. If you are petite I'm sure you could get away with usual size or one up. The ruching is really flattering and it's easy to wear. Lots of compliments!
Very comfortable and flattering. Gorgeous color

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments wearing this dress. I was comfortable and felt so trendy!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit great in the sleeves, waist, bust, and but. I normally have dress fit tight on my but, but this one was flattering without being too form fitting. I love the fabric and how comfortable the dress was. I would totally wear this again!

This dress is amazing. It hugs every curve so well, and is just extremely flattering. The long sleeves made the winter night super comfortable, without causing me to sweat. Some reviews say its a bit short, but I didnâ€™t get that feeling. I was able to move around all night without needing to pull it down all the time. I can either wear a 6 or an 8 depending on the store. I went with the 6 with this dress because it hugged a little closer than the 8, and i felt way more comfortable. The only cons are 1. Its impossible to zip up without help (lol), and 2. Every piece of lint sticks to it, but itâ€™s velvet so thatâ€™s expected. Iâ€™m really considering buying it, but despite being so amazing, a $375 price tag is a bit much.
This dress was comfortable, breathable, High quality, and made me feel like a queen. Absolutely recommend. Loads of compliments

This dress is so cute and perfect for the holidays!! I wore it to my office holiday party and got tons of compliments. I wish I could keep it!The fabric is pretty stretchy and the front detail is super flattering. Only the size 2 was available - usually I'm a 4 in dresses and occasionally a 2 so I was a little nervous it would be too small, but the fabric has a lot of give, so it worked out! Only con of this dress is that it gets pretty hot, as expected with velvet.
This dress is perfect for everyone! The right amount of stretch and length for almost any occasion.
Runs a bit small so size up if in between sizes. I got a lot of compliments and it was very comfortable!

links_Review_Title: More beautiful in person with a flattering waist
links_Review_Text: The color is absolutely stunning in person but photographs a little weird! The dress is a very flattering shape and I felt like it made my waist look so much smaller. It was shorter and tighter than I am used to but I wore it with tights to make it slightly more modest. Overall the fit was great. I usually wear a 12 and sized down to a 10 because that was the only size available. I would have been more comfortable in a 12 but the fabric is pretty stretchy so I wasn't suffocating all night.

I wore this to an outdoor wedding in November, wore leggings underneath so the dress caught often, so I had to continuously pull the dress down. Otherwise, the sleeves were the perfect length, and the color was gorgeous.
Overall, I thought the dress was cute and it fit me well but it is wayyy too short. I wore it with leggings underneath.

links_Review_Title: This dress was comfortable material but short!
links_Review_Text: It fit very snug and was shorter than I would've liked. I probably would've sized up for length. I did get many compliments on it, but felt like I was pulling it down all night.
Ran slightly small. The area where it wraps in the front bunches up a tiny bit but I barely noticed it.
Great dress for a holiday party. Compliments all night. Runs a bit short.

links_Review_Title: So comfortable and warm and hid my mom pooch
links_Review_Text: The dress was stretchy and the material was thick so it was very flattering and kept me warm in the cold Michigan winter. I loved everything about this dress. I will say, it was probably beneficial having a bigger chest because the bust area would have been baggy otherwise. Also, I'm short so the length was perfect but someone taller might find it too short. I have a pooch from having kids and it his that so well. Just loved it!
Loved this dress! Cute and perfect for a Christmas party. It was a bit shorter than I expected.
The fit was perfect. I'm glad I went with the 8 instead of the usual 6 I wear because it does seem to run small. I received a lot of compliments and felt pretty all night.

I was disappointed this dress ran so short. Even with the larger size, it barely covered my butt. I thought maybe I had the fabric bunched up somewhere by mistake, but it was just that short. I'm 5'8 with an athletic build for reference. Too bad - the fabric was really beautiful.

Such a great, flattering dress. Perfect for the holidays. Got a ton of compliments at a company holiday party. It is a very form fitting dress - so if you like it that way go true to size. If you don't like it skin tight, size up. I ended up wearing my back up size which was 2 sizes up for my normal size because I felt more comfortable in it.
Only downside is it's pretty short. Love the velvet and long sleeves.

This dress is amazing! Such a flattering cut, gives a lot of wiggle room to cover a belly but still very flattering from the back. Does run a little short but has nice thick material to keep you covered. Perfect for a winter wedding or holiday party. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for a nonprofit fundraiser that had a theme that velvet was a win for!
links_Review_Text: The dress was great - it is definitely made with someone that is a little bustier, the top part fell weird on me but I still loved the dress and received a ton of compliments on it.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress! The length was short but flirty! The color and velour were awesome! stretchy!
links_Review_Text: everything was perfect.
Wasn't a fan of how it looked
Love the fit. No zipper but form fitting. This designer does not disappoint. I loved the thickness of the fabric and the bright color. Felt great!
Liked the peak a boo effect and coverage on arms. Lots compliments. Good for my age.

links_Review_Title: I had a Burlesque of a Time in this dress!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for my Birthday Celebration. I wore it to see a Burlesque show and it was a hit! This dress does run an entire size smaller and it is extremely short. The slit in the front does open, but the positive part is that the dress is lined so there was not a peek-a-boo show. Besides the short length, the top part is extremely comfortable. The dress definitely was a show stopper the MC at the event stop the show to pay me a compliment! If you want to turn heads then this is the dress for you!
Sexy red dress. Surprisingly comfortable, and great color. But beware- this is SHORT in front.

links_Review_Title: Red hot dress! I was truly a lady in red.
links_Review_Text: Wore this for a work holiday party and loved it. I'm 5'9" so fair warning to tall ladies it is a little short. The size 6 ran a little tight in my hips so I ended up wearing the backup size 8. It has a lovely silky/shiny texture and I paired it with some sparkly nude/gold tights and white square toe booties. I felt like a fancy go-go girl from the 60s or some Mad Men character. Got plenty of compliments throughout the night. Would've kept the dress if I could! A+
Fits great was an excellent choice for a holiday office party
Got so many compliments. It fits true to size

links_Review_Title: If I had $495 to spend, I'd buy this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress was incredibly flattering - I have large boobs and a small waist so I struggle with finding clothes that don't swallow me!! This dress was wonderful (and so comfy).
I was nervous to try this one without any reviews but it was perfect. Very true to size and no stretch. I'm 5'9" and it wasn't too short. Perfect for holidays!

links_Review_Title: We rented this for a Father/Daugher dance for my senior in high school.
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress! Very flattering! The material draped nicely and was a perfect fit.
If you're over 5'9" this probably won't work

I wanted to wear it so badly but I couldn't. I'm on the taller side and if your bottom has any short of "extra" to it, it's going to be hard. The bottom is super thin and I just didn't feel right. I'm not sure if sizing up would even help.
Everything about this dress is perfect

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color but a little weird fitting
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous colored dress, a real stand out piece. A little harder to wear if you are curvy. Had to wear tights because he front was really short. So size up if you have curves!

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress that fit like a glove but didn't make me feel constrained.
links_Review_Text: It was a stunning dress that was flattering in all the right places. It fit perfectly and was very comfortable to wear. I received so many compliments throughout the night.
Sleek stylish and not too revealing.

Fabric is beautiful but I'm usually a 10/12, and the 10 was nowhere near being able to zip... I'm afraid the 12 wouldn't have fit either, and that this dress with zero stretch runs quite small. So bummed!
Satin was gorgeous, still debating if I'll wear it bc the back is super big -- doesn't hang right bc of the zipper due to my big hips and little waist. Still a beautiful dress.

links_Review_Title: Love this skirt! Can be dressed up or super cute with booties and a leather jacket.
links_Review_Text: I will be buying this skirt. So comfortable with the elastic waist. Many options to dress up or down. I got lots of compliments on this skirt.
Worn it for a Christmas gift exchange with my girlfriends. It was perfect for dinner and drinks after. Beautiful, comfortable, and sexy!
I wore this dress to a Holiday Party and it was amazing. Great quality, fit true to size and perfect length. Many compliments and inquiries about where I bought.
Soft, comfortable sparkly, light fit amazing.
Elastic band makes it easy to pull on

links_Review_Title: Added fun sparkle to my birthday party.
links_Review_Text: I packed this for a party out of town. Great fun option to bring on trip because you don't have to worry about wrinkles. It's stretchy so it's super comfortable to wear.
Length is perfect

Loved this dress, it has great structure and although it isn't forgiving, the slit helps with movement. The navy and gold pop so perfectly. I added gold shoes and gold statement earrings. I wore a bra, but prob didn't need to. Note- I have long legs abs a short torso so this dress worked well with my body shape.
Absolutely show stopper for a spring wedding.
Lovely dress. I loved the gold roses. Unfortunately it runs large. The straps were far too big and just overall too big. Also it was on the long side for a petite dress.

The dress was great but it has nooooo give. I wear a size 12 in jeans and the dress 14 fit but wouldn't zip. It was not stretchy fabric. I had to hike it up to sit at the wedding but got all the compliments on my dress.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear, but it's a beautiful dress!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for an evening at the opera. I chose something else, but this dress exceeded my expectations. The brocade is beautiful, it's comfortable, and the cut is sexy and fun. I think itâ€™s TTS â€” I sized up to 10 (8 was unavailable) and it was a bit big in the hips. I did not find the cut slimming, though. I would also suggest that those around 5â€™5â€ or 5â€™6â€ & planning to wear higher heels go with the longer length, because I def wouldnâ€™t have wanted it shorter. Might rent again!

Loved the fit of this dress with a few exceptions: straps are on the longer side and bust area was a little loose on me (34B). The rib cage area was tight and a little tough to sit down in, however my hip area was fine and I could dance easily in the dress. Loved the pattern and overall material, which was perfect for a winter wedding.
I'm 5"3 and I usually wear size six. Dress fit and felt great. Very comfortable. It was long so I had to wear very high heels.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric and pattern but runs Extremely small
links_Review_Text: Very very tight in the hips. So much so that I had to go up 2 sizes. But when you do the top gets baggy. So because of that I ended up showing a lot more cleavage than I would want. The straps are flimsy and really do not hold you up. And it exposes a lot of skin on your back and shoulders. Despite this I received tons of compliments. I highly recommend for woman that are tall and narrow or people with an hour glass figure

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for a formal wedding
links_Review_Text: Dress felt true to size. That said, there's zero stretch to the fabric so if you're between two sizes, size up! I'm 5'3 & 125 and the 2P was perfect with my 3" heels.

Gorgeous details in this little number. Straps could have been more snug as there was almost a wardrobe malfunction or two but other than that - lovely! I was able to sit, dance and walk without issue.

links_Review_Title: perfect dress for black tie event
links_Review_Text: LOVED this dress. I first rented the 6 and it was a little tight in the thigh area. Exchanged for the 8 and it was still a little snug but comfortable. It was a liiiittle big up top, but overall fit very well. Next time I will order long because dress looked a little short with 4-inch heels. Got a ton of compliments and would rent again!

I love this dress so much. This was my first rental and at first I was a little nervous because it's really hard to find a good size for me in formal dresses (for some reason I am always between sizes). The fitting was beautiful and I received a lot of complements at the wedding I went this past weekend. Absolutely gorgeous
Sexy yet classy and yes you can dance in it!

links_Review_Title: Loved the hi-low hemline & unique style
links_Review_Text: Loved this unique style/ruffled slit/hi-low hemline but what most had said, straps were a bit long and slipped off my shoulders occasionally throughout the evening. Size 8 I couldn't even fit over my hips but 10 fit well. Bodice felt fitted but around tummy a bit looser w this type of fabric, which was fine. You'll need heels w the long back of this hi-low hemline, even Regular length left it pretty long for me @5'7"HT. I ended up in my champagne ballet flat tieks for comfort at reception.
This dress was a stunner! Classy, sexy and super flattering. Highly recommend. Compliments all night.
So pretty but runs small! I'm between a 4 and a 6 and the 6 was really snug!
This dress was perfect! The fit was great. I loved the cut out, up the side! I received so many compliments.

Adored the fabric and the way it fit. It does run small. I typically wear a 10/12 in pants and I had to wear my back up size of 14 and it was even a little tight. One of the straps seemed longer than the other and was not adjustable so it wanted to fall if I wasn't standing up super straight. Received a lot of compliments, though and it photographed well!

Beautiful unique fabric and cut! Agree with other reviews that say the straps are VERY long and the neck cuts pretty low. The fabric also has no give - I wear a 2 or sometimes 4, and the 2R fit well standing up but once I sat it was a little uncomfortable - tight in the waist and hips. Would have rented the 4 if it were available. Still felt gorgeous in it though and it was perfect for the occasion!

The dress was stunning. I received so many compliments. The straps are a tad loose like others said so I went with a size 4. I probably would have been more comfortable in a 6 because as the dress is tight in the torso but again was glad I didn't because of the straps. I'm 5'2 and with wedges the length was perfect.
Stunning dress! You definitely have to wear heels or it would be too long.
The dress is exquisite but I have a large behind and I literally couldn't sit down in the dress. It was right in weird areas but looked KILLER

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, but tight on the butt and hips
links_Review_Text: This was a beautiful dress however I did not end up wearing it because the butt and thigh section was too tight and I couldn't sit down. There is no stretch. I wear a size 8 normally but think a 10 would've worked better for this dress. Girls with larger bottoms should size up.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments at my friend's African wedding
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric but zero stretch... I had to literally go up 4 sizes... so unless you are a toothpick and have no curves, you'll need to size up.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress but beware of long straps.
links_Review_Text: This was a beautiful dress for a fall wedding amongst a sea of black dresses. There's no stretch in this dress so just be aware in case you like having some stretch. The 0 fit pretty well other than the length of the straps. They made the dress a little more low cut than I would have liked for a wedding so I did spend a good amount of time pulling them up. Other than that, I really loved it and got a lot of compliments.
Couldn't even get it on

This dress is absolutely gorgeous. The straps are long and not adjustable, creating a lower neck line. The dress was tight in the hips but had extra fabric in the belly. Didn't look bad though. The slit is high, statement but still classy.
Had too size up two sizes. Waist was too tight on original size. Size up the straps were too long. One side the straps completely tore off.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress. One man told me it was the best one at the wedding.
links_Review_Text: The dress was made from a great fabric, was comfortable and fit beautifully. The hip area is bit snug, so it was good to go up one size (I had to go up two due to availability and that was too much). The straps are NOT adjustable which is a huge negative since for it to fit well you need to size up and I was worried about flashing people all night since wearing a bra isn't really possible. Overall, it was a beautiful dress and the compliments were probably worth the annoyances.

links_Review_Title: Loved the dress! Received so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Tight around the hips

links_Review_Title: Many compliments, even from strangers! Pretty dress.
links_Review_Text: Straps were tricky to keep up, as others reported. Tight and unforgiving in the torso. Beautiful dress, though.

links_Review_Title: Do not attempt if you have a booty.
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful in person, and it fit everywhere else but I could not get it around my booty and hips. I'm 5' 7" 145lbs and usually wear a 4, but even the 6 wouldn't zip. There is absolutely no stretch to this fabric. It is a gorgeous dress and high quality, but if you have curves it may not work for you!

LOVED this dress. I wore it to a 20's themed party and it was so great. I would definitely recommend this dress. If you do have a large bottom area, caution, the slit does not like when you sit, so just watch for that but show-stopper!

Beautiful material, well made dress with a flattering cut, but runs narrow/tight in the hip/butt area. This combined with the thick material with no stretch made it too uncomfortable to sit down in, so I didn't end up wearing the dress.
True to size and beautiful dress. The fabric felt very high quality and prettier than the pictures. Being 5'1" the hi/lo length was perfect with 3 inch heels.

Loved this dress! I Definitely felt like I was wearing something unique and fun, but still classy! It was a little tight on me, but I am 5'8" and should probably have ordered it Long rather than regular.

The dress was beautiful but it was difficult getting this dress past my butt/hips. Once i was able to get it up the stomach area was large and i had no movement in the thigh area. The material has no stretch at all to it. Neither the 6R or 8R fit. The 10 may have fit but it was unavailable and i believe would have been to large in the abdomen area.

links_Review_Title: I received many compliments on this fun but sophisticated gown!
links_Review_Text: The straps were stretched out and the neckline dropped by the end of the night. I reinforced it with a lot of fashion tape but there were a few close calls. The length was perfect for me, 5'2" in my 4" heels and I added a crop jacket to stay warm and cover up a bit.
Fit nice through hips and length perfect. Zipper falls at mid back so if you have a broad back this won't work for you...

Rented for a formal wedding and it was beautiful! Definitely high slit, had me just a bit worried while seated... but as far as I know didn't have any indecent exposures. Adjustable straps are a lifesaver! Fabric made me feel luxurious.
Highly detailed dress thatâ€™s great to rent for a cocktail party!

I rented this to see Erika Jayne starring in Chicago on Broadway and it was perfect! I wanted long sleeves and something that would look good with black tights and booties because of being in the NYC snow in January. I even waited outside after to meet her and it was so comfortable and great with my winter dress coat! Def size up, the chest is tight. Mine arrived with one of the wrist ribbons in tatters so I sent pics to RTR and they overnighted me a new one, such a great experience!
Fits perfectly and so comfortable
I rented this dress for a party. I ended up not wearing it because it was just a little too covering. Perfect for a family or work function though!

This dress was perfect for a winter holiday party! The dress fits true to size, but is a bit tight in the bust if you have a 36D cup or larger. Plenty of room in the arms and the waistline on this dress hugged my body perfectly. I 100% would rent this dress again!

rented for a christmas party. the details were soft and perfect. dress was fun and flirty and very flattering. it fit perfectly and was fully lined which help smooth everything out. i loved the velvet ties on the sleeves and on the bottom hem of this dress.
This dress was perfect for my Husbands Christmas party! I loved that it was a dress meant to be worn when it's cold out!! I had so many compliments!! Thank you!

The design and details are prettier in person. Ex: the cuffs have velvet ribbons on them. The dress was loose on me (size 4) but size 2 was not available. Since I wore a jacket most of the day and it was black, the loose sides didn't really show. Overall nice dress for a party.

I was so happy with this dress. It's so much more colorful than the initial pictures show. The green and the purple really stand out. The waist was a bit long on me but that was my only complaint. The length and rest of the fit was perfect. Wore this at 17 weeks pregnant and it hid the bump fairly well.

I rented this dress for a winter wedding and it was perfect. The vine detail and the velvet sleeve bows made it look elegant while not being too formal. The sleeves were a little restrictive so I sized up to a 12 when I normally wear a 10. Would recommend!

I wore this dress for a rehearsal dinner. I got lots of compliments, and personally loved the details on the dress (embroidery, lace and velvet trim on sleeves). However, I am very glad the only activity I had on the agenda for the evening was sitting/standing pretty (read: not a dancing dress for tall girls). The dress ran small to size, especially in regards to length. I typically wear a size is 6/8, but due to length of the body and sleeves on this dress I wore a 10.
Like everyone suggested, I sized up and the dress fit perfectly! I received so many compliments while wearing this! Beautiful dress and gorgeous embroidery!

This dress is far more stunning in person than photos could capture. Order a size larger than your normal dress size. I got so many compliments all evening. It was comfy enough to sit in, but there is no stretch.
Loved this dress. Great fit. Stylish. Wonderful quality

links_Review_Title: It is all in the detail ..
links_Review_Text: As the other reviews stated the arms and the sleeves are tight.. so need to size up for sure. However beautiful dress. Did not want to return back.

I loved this dress and it was very comfortable (although I would definitely size up). I usually wear a 12 or Large in tops/dresses and ended up wearing the 14. Overall very happy and received compliments all throughout the night!

links_Review_Title: I rented this for my birthday weekend! It was a great fit and I received many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Amazing dress. Beautiful details and unique.

Fair warning, if you're large chested size up! I normally wear a 14/16, I wore an 18 and it was perfect! I had so many compliments on this dress and I'm obsessed! It's well made and has beautiful embroidery. It looks very luxe and expensive. I love it! I want it!

Loved this dress! The sizing does run small due to the type of material and the material does not stretch. Perfect for a winter wedding! Side note: the flowers that look white in the pictures are actually a pale rose pink color.
Sized up a size as recommended by others and fit great. A bit tight in the chest/shoulders since a large chest, but wasn't uncomfortable.

links_Review_Title: I donâ€™t want to send it back!
links_Review_Text: I love this dress! The material is very heavy. Definitely runs on the small side, I wore two sizes larger than I typically wear.
Great material. I wore to work but you could wear to a nicer event.

Love it and will rent again. I listened to others and sized up from my normal size 4 and happy I did. Any smaller and my arms would be restricted- so no hugging or reaching. To avoid ripping it please size up if you have big arms. I did have some space on the waistline which I'm 27 in and 38 hip. I am also 5 ft and as you can see in the pic it hits above the knee . Yay! Will rent again.

This ran large but I liked the extra room to move around in the sleeves so I didn't mind, but a size smaller would have made a better silhouette. The embroidery is gorgeous but understated in darker colors, and the velvet ribbons at the wrists made it for me. The length is great, even for us tall girls. I wore high stacked heels without feeling provocative, just felt beautiful.
This dress is stunning in person. The embroidery is awesome!
This dress was perfect for Christmas with the velvet bows on the sleeves and green and red detail. It runs small in the arms but is great for covering up you mid section. Good length.
Dress fit small, had to go up to size 16. So glad I did, i have broad shoulders and a 14 wouldn't have been comfortable or zip up. Received many complements!

I rented this for Thanksgiving Dinner out with my family and thought it looked great! My only complaint is the arms/chest don't really have any give and it was hard to lift up my arms in the dress. The rest of it fit fine
Really wished this fit. The detail in the fabric was so pretty, but no stretch at all so didn't fit. Was very straight lined, no room for curves. Didn't fit :(

links_Review_Title: Runs very small. I usually wear an 18 and had to size up to the 22.
links_Review_Text: Runs very small. I usually wear an 18 and had to size up to the 22.
Cotton dress with odd sleeves. Not flattering for curvy ladies as it is made of a stiff cotton and doesn't flatter the body.

links_Review_Title: Rented this for a party on a cold South Florida day. Loved the details and cut.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect except the skirt was a little short. I wore it with tights and then it was perfect.

I actually got this as a back up size dress for a different dress. The back up size for the other dress I picked was not available and so they sent this as an alternative. I didn't like that it was heavy and uncomfortable. It didn't fit right anyway. But it was pretty.

The embroidery was beautiful, through ran a tad christmassy. It was a tight six, though I contribute that to being between 6-8. I couldn't lift my arms over my head on the dance floor and that was the one downfall. But great for photos, the ceremony, and sitting and eating :)
Beautiful dress. High quality. I should have gone up a size, as the dress was too snug for my comfort. I did not wear this, but I would have had I ordered the larger size.
Sleeves/wrist/shoulders a bit small but gorgeous, detailed, and feminine.
Very pretty dress

links_Review_Title: Sizing is way off - Rent 3-4 sizes larger
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to love this dress. My husband gave me many compliments on it and noted the beautiful detail. However, it didn't measure anywhere close to the online measurements listed.
Very happy with the dress selection. It fit true to size.

links_Review_Title: Cute but less shirt than I expected!
links_Review_Text: Cute, fun top for a night out. Be prepared to show some skin. The top is a wrap with a tie. I skipped the bra but based on where it fell, with proper tying you could probably get away with a bra as well.
Fit great. A little loose in the chest area for me, but I am a 34B. Was still very flattering, sexy and may wear it again. The pants were mine, not RTR.

links_Review_Title: Perfect top for date night with hubby!
Perfect for casual dinner with friends
links_Review_Text: Felt a little exposed in this top but I got so many compliments. Paired it with loose linen pants to dress it down and it looked pretty casual.
I bought this to pair up with some high waisted pants. It matched beautifully and I received a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Fit perfectly. Loved the neckline silhouette.
links_Review_Text: Fit my body type perfectly. Not overly revealing in the chest area which I think balanced it being a crop top well. The parts of my skin it did cover also kept me surprisingly warm.
Brunch vibes, simple, classy and great under a cropped jacket.
5'5" 125lbs. Top has stretch to it and fits snug. Any undergarment would show Comfortable and fun. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed with this top and want to buy it
links_Review_Text: I sized up bc I have big boobs and didn't want the top to be too cropped. It's a stretchy fabric and is kinda sparkly which I loved
I love the fit and style but the material was a bit itchy. Wouldn't necessarily rent again.

I had originally order this for a birthday party but then found out the attire was much more casual so I wore this to work. I liked it, the sleeves gave a great impact and I got some compliments. But it was super hard to get in and out of by myself and I found it slightly short in torso and a little uncomfortable, probably not a good choice for taller girls.

links_Review_Title: I just had to have this in my first Unlimited shipment!
links_Review_Text: Would have been perfect for party or date. I had to have it in my first shipment so I wore it to work and everyone loved it, I got so many compliments! It was comfortable and super flattering. Only con was having to unzip the back to use the restroom!
This jumpsuit it awesome! Perfect for an event or party. The torso isn't very long so it does feel tight at first. I would rent again

I rented this jumpsuit for a funeral and it was stunning, appropriate, and beautiful. So many people complimented me on it. I am 5'4", 135lb and the 6 fit perfectly. The only down side was that if I didn't drag my sister to the bathroom with me, I was all alone trying to unzip then re-zip the back of it.

links_Review_Title: The jumper versions of a "little black dress"
links_Review_Text: Love this jumper. I rented this for my sisters rehearsal dinner and ended up getting an extra wear out of it by pairing it with a blazer for work. Loved the fit & very comfortable to wear for an extended period. A few notes: - pant legs ran slightly long on me. - the arms have a fun open slit. - pockets!! - zipper runs to your neck.

Huge fan of jumpsuits and this doesn't disappoint! The fit is true to size and there is very little stretch. This jumpsuit has a very 80s feel and pockets!! It's sort of baggy in the front which hides everything but also adds bulk. I still loved it so much I kept it and wore it to work the next week!

links_Review_Title: Super cute and unique work day outfit
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this rental! It was perfect for the summer to fall transition as I didn't freeze in the morning or melt in the afternoon. The pleating in the front could have added bulk but was somehow flattering. The only drawback is the zipper is hard to do yourself so bathroom trips can take awhile!
Wore this to a work dinner event. It was perfect, really liked the open sleeves. It was a bit short waisted if you have a long torso.

It's nice not to have to fuss about a top and a bottom and get it all in one. The legs were a tad too long for me (5'5") but if you can go stilleto you should be fine. Loved that it fit my curvy frame.
Fit uncomfortably all around I did not feel comfortable at all with the bottom or the sleeves. Top was nice
This was too long for me.

This was a nice, conservative, flattering piece. The sleeves made the outfit. I felt like I was putting my hands in my pockets the whole night to smooth out the bubble of material that formed by the belly button. It was just a lot of extra material. Overall, however, it was flattering and the length was perfect on my 5'4 frame.

links_Review_Title: Should have paid attention to the other reviews.
links_Review_Text: This would probably look great on someone with a shorter than average torso and a leaner build than I have. It's cute, but read the reviews and heed them!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful piece, very comfortable with lots of compliments. Iâ€™ll be renting this again for sure!
links_Review_Text: Want everyone to notice you at a party...this is what you wear! Gorgeous detailing, keeps you warm in the winter and itâ€™s just fabulous. You can feel like a Hollywood actress at your next gig! It was a little long on me in the legs, but with some heels and creativity I managed to pull it off!

Hard for me to give this the right amount of stars...It was very pretty, BUT I never wore it. I was attending a business event alone, and I couldn't reach the zipper when I tried it on to fully zip or unzip. My husband had to help. I really liked the look, but I need to be able to unzip and rezip my clothes to use the restroom. If you don't use the restroom a lot, or have a bestie joining you, then perfect! My first RTR order so totally bummed.
Low rise crawls up and waist hits right at belly button. Pleats exaggerate tummy. I think it would be good if I sized up.

links_Review_Title: Not even worth taking a photo of.
links_Review_Text: Are usually try to find something good to say about the garments that I rent but this had so many bad points that I could not find any good. The material is cheap, the construction was mediocre, zipper sticks, and the overall fit was extremely large. I am normally a size 4/6 and I rented the six. You may want to size down one or two sizes to make this thing work. Keep in mind, I am 5'4" tall and the length and arms were ridiculously long.

links_Review_Title: I ended up not going to the event but the other jumpsuit I ordered looked great on
links_Review_Text: It runs small. I couldn't wear it because it was too narrow and tight to get into. This was my backup outfit and the other jumpsuit I ordered was a 4P and fit perfectly, this was a 4R and too small. It looked really small right out of the bag. I would suggest ordering a size up.
It's absolutely lovely. Great material, easy to go from work to a night out.
The shape of this was unflattering on a fuller bust
The piece fit perfectly, it was beautifully made, and I got lots of compliments!
perfect for work/interviews! Conservative and subtly sexy

links_Review_Title: If you're tall it may not fit
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'8. This jumpsuit was very short in the torso. There is no way I could have worn it out of the house. While I could get it over my shoulders it gave me such a severe wedgie (front and back) that it wasn't appropriate for public. It did seem to be well made and would have otherwise been flattering. I should add that I'm tall but do not have a particularly long torso.
Feminine, well-made and professional jumpsuit!
I wish I owned this! It's a great color. Sheer but not in a bad way. Fitted but not uncomfortable. Would rent it again!! Got lots of compliments on it on a night out in Vegas.

Loved this top for Mardi Gras, but definitely needed some help. It's right and had a tendency to ride up so I had to wear high waisted jeans. Kinda sheer but I was good with a nude bra. All in all fun going out top
So many compliments on this top! Great versatile piece! Will be renting again.

I loved this top! It's very stretchy material and hugs in all the right places. Unlike stretchy tops and body suits I did not feel like a can of pastry dough waiting to bust out of the top. It was perfect. Not too tight and not at all loose fitting.
Cool material, matched with an array of colors
Fits TTS. The arms are see-though but the body is lined. Very flattering!
This is a gorgeous top with beautiful details, especially loved the sleeves. Fit a little snug in the stomach area but overall a nice date night option.
Great top that can be worn any number of ways. It's stretchy and although it's a mesh material it doesn't seem to be see-through with a nude bra.

links_Review_Title: Cute top and a fun print
links_Review_Text: This top is a nice change for the winter to wear at work under a blazer. Only an XL was available but it fit fine - a little roomie, not too snug and cute under a blazer. The fabric is thinner so if you want body con, order your true size.

I rented this because it's a little out of my comfort zone compared to things I usually wear. I really liked this shirt. The neck did choke me a little, but I just left the top few buttons undone and you couldn't even tell.
Rented this shirt to wear out in Las Vegas and it was perfect, not the cliche vegas glitz but a sexy fun top to play up jeans and black boots. Perfect!
Obsessed with this top!! Paired with jeans and booties and a pencil skirt. Can't really go with anything. On trend, but unique because of its feminine lilac color. Will rent again!!

This is definitely form fitting but not so tight that you're self conscious. Purple snake skin gives it that little something extra and different than other snake prints. Multiple buttons in back were difficult by yourself
Absolutely loved this top! It was soft and comfortable but held its shape , went perfectly for a weekend outfit with jeans.
You might want to wear a darker undergarments underneath. I wore white and could tell. Sleeves are sheer. The lightweight fabric is lavender with the snake print. Great for layering, also.
It's not see through and it stretchy! I got so many compliments. I wore it for a night out with the girls

links_Review_Title: Perfect to make black suit pop!
links_Review_Text: Slim fit, chest is lined, arms sheer. Love the on trend snake print
I wore this several times. An evening party and it was warm out 80's and it was not too hot. And I wore it again to fly home. Great top! So many compliments. I'd definitely rent again
tight but flattering
Wore this with light wash jeans and white sneaks. Super cute and fit well. Body part is lined so not sheer. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Color, material and pattern are all a hit!
links_Review_Text: Only the large was available, and I'm happy I got that instead of the medium. The sleeves are a good length and it's not too tight, while also being fitted. Wish I could buy.
I wanted to wear it to work and I did not want it tight. I love this shirt.
Such a nice variation from the usual snakeskin print shirt, the purple isn't too out there

links_Review_Title: I love this top!! I wore it for several different occasions.
links_Review_Text: Stretchy and fabulous! This top worked on its own and for layering. Definitely recommend.

links_Review_Title: Liked this a lot! Stylish but not over the top.

links_Review_Text: I wore this to a mediation with a white blazer and black pants. Loved the fit but wished the shirt was a bit longer. I spent all day pulling it down as it rode up my back with every move. Probably should have tucked it in!

links_Review_Title: So nice, I wore it twice
links_Review_Text: I loved this top! The lavendar color is undexpected in a snake print, which makes me love it even more. And the sheer sleeves are to die for. The mesh is soft, not scratchy like mesh can sometimes be. I paired it with black jeans and boots, and it made the perfect outfit for a night out with friends. I even ended up wearing it to sunday brunch with family with heels and a black skirt. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Modest yet sexy, all wrapped up in 1!
links_Review_Text: This was a great top for a few evening casual cocktail parties I attended at a conference, it was a unique yet modest option for the fall weather. However, its more see-through than the photos show (even in my own). When you are up close you can see the bra/tank that I had on. I wore a blazer over this, but for the photo here you can see it all! It was super cute and true to size, but too see-through for my liking.
the under arms smelled very bad before i even put it on... kinda gross. they should check for these things.

links_Review_Title: Fun print, comfy and flattering fit.
links_Review_Text: This dress is super cute. Short. But cute. It's comfortable but stylish. The pockets are a plus.
Easy dress to wear for all body types. Runs a tad large but looks and feels fine. Just plain fun.

links_Review_Title: The cutest dress and really fun to wear!
links_Review_Text: Fit great and love this dress!
I liked the sleeves on this dress and the material felt well made. Didn't photograph great but looked good in person.

links_Review_Title: So cute! A wee bit short ;)
links_Review_Text: Love the pattern, detailed sleeves, exaggerated skirt. It is a bit short but overall great flirty dress!

I actually really wanted to buy this dress but forced myself not to... but it was really that cute. Fit really well! I thought the sleeves would look weird on me but it didn't at all. Also, I really don't think the boots on the model do the dress justice; with the right shoes and accessories this is a perfect cocktail dress! Of course, you can also wear it more casually too.
I love the trendy puffy sleeves and the fine lines of the pattern
Loved this dress! It was a little shorter than expected, but I wore with flat boots. Super comfortable and fun.
Thought I would try this out even though it reminded me of a drape. Turns out it is super cute on! I love it.
Loved this dress
Overall loved the dress and received so many compliments! Next time I want to try the medium. The large was a little loose around the waist and ended up wearing a belt with it.
I liked this dress but it runs a little large so wasn't very flattering
Loved this was roomy in chest and great silhouette
Perfect for any event!

links_Review_Title: Great dress quality! Order a size down. Warning: it's short!
links_Review_Text: I wore the dress to an office Christmas Party. I'm 125 lbs and usually wear size S/4, so I ordered a small, but I wished I had gotten a size smaller, as the material is stretchy, and it was too big. I've got a large chest, and the dress worked great for a big bust (it also might be good for enhancing a small chest) and small waist. I wasn't super pleased with the shoulders (padded). The dress is short; I'm 5'8, so with heels, this dress showed a lot of leg.
Sexy LBD with beautiful cut outs and shoulder pad detail
I loved this dress! It shows just enough skin and is just form-fitting enough. It was also surprisingly comfortable! Would recommend, would rent again.
The dress wasn't as flattering as I anticipated but cute, sexy LBD with cut-out.
Stretchy and structured dress. Super comfortable and would rent it again. Love the cut of the top of the dress and the cut out was sexy but not too extra. Felt great in this dress.

links_Review_Title: Pair with a big faux fur
links_Review_Text: Sexy and curve hugging. I added a faux fur and wore this to a film screening
Wore this dress in Vegas and it was perfect. So flattering and the cutout makes it fun without showing too much.

links_Review_Title: Loved the dress but hated the shoulder padding
links_Review_Text: I would have ADORED this dress had it not been for the shoulder padding. I have athletic shoulders and the shoulder pads accentuated my shoulders in a bad way. Such a shame.
Fits true to size. A bit short but not too short to wear to most occasions.

The dress is very pretty and flattering, especially for curvy girls. I rented it for a birthday dinner in the desert. Unfortunately the temperatures dropped into the 60s so I was a little chilly. Like the other reviews I did find it quite low cut and the slit in the front is high. It's a perfect summer night dress, for sun kissed skin and dinner or drinks by the beach or pool. The colors are very flattering and the draping is very kind.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! Ordered a size up for my sons bris and it's great at hiding the belly bulge.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit so well and the silk fabric is even prettier in person. Important to know it's very low cut so I had to wear something underneath to hide cleavage for religious/family event and I had to wear a slip underneath. Would definitely rent again!

This dress is actually more of a pinky-nude with a subtle watercolor effect which was a pleasant surprise. The fit is smaller than expected. I am typically between a 6 and 8 and this 8 is a little snug in the thighs. The slit is also a bit revealing. The material is slinky and pretty thick but not lined.
Great fit. Comfortable and easy to wear.. when I sat the front gaped open. The clasp in the front stayed closed but it still gaped... loved it anyway. Lots of complements!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for summer formal attire
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit! Lots of compliments. I do recommend a slip or nude under garment because it's slightly see-through in the back.
Wore this to a wedding. 5'8, 34B, 145 lbs, size 6. It was right on back side and very thin material so you need spanks. Flattering, but wrinkled easily. Would consider buying.

This dress is very stretchy and the placement of the knot/rousing makes it maternity friendly. With my height + the bump, the front slit was a bit high. But I got so many compliments and felt it showed off tbd bump, rather than just making me look generally big. I would totally recommend and might get it in a size larger for an upcoming event
Material is shiny and soft, cut is sexy with the slit up the front, pattern is borderline grandma but it works.
I had to pin the chest, it would have been scandalous otherwise. Got lots of compliments.

Loved this dress and the twist detail in the middle, so flattering and fun to wear, make sure you have a thong the back is a tad see through but not terribly so. Material is stretchy and forgiving. The pattern reminded me of Hydrangeas and it was just as pretty in person. Could easily be dressed up for a formal event or worn casually.
Rented to take on vacation, but couldn't wear it due to running super small. The material and pattern were really nice so would consider sizing up and renting again.
Did not wear. Material was flimsy and cut too low for work.

I'm big chested so this dress did not work well. It does have a clasp to close it but it still kept opening up. The slit on the front is very high, you can see all the way up when you sit down. The material is sheer, you definitely need spanks. The dress is gorgeous and hugs all the right places. Just too revealing for work. The material is silky.

links_Review_Title: See through and right in all the wrong places
links_Review_Text: This did not work at all for my body. Would not recommend if you have curves. Also was super sheer

links_Review_Title: Fabric was thin and the slit in the front was too high for work.
links_Review_Text: Snug

Wore this for our engagement party. It felt bridal, without being "too bridal." The cut is super flattering and worked well with my petite frame. I'm typically an extra-small/small in tops and 0/2 in pants. There was maybe a little extra fabric in the stomach area, however, the ruching still hugged my body and didn't make the extra fabric look frumpy. I'd say the 2R fit perfectly. I received so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Can be dressed up or down for work or a special occasion.
links_Review_Text: Flattering fit, low cut so I did end up pinning it up to keep it somewhat appropriate.

Ordered an 8, but needed a size up. Fit right in the bottom to wear comfortably without the front sit looking pulled. Would have worn the size up and I think this style lends well to a more relaxed fit.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress that made me feel great
links_Review_Text: What kept me from 5 stars is that while it fit my body, it didn't quite fit my boobs ... was a bit gaping.

links_Review_Title: Small and really awkward in the chest
links_Review_Text: Runs small, I'd size up next time. It's also strangely gaped in the chest. The clasp is in an awkward spot that just tugs at the fabric instead of allowing it to rest.
Dressier than I thought, slit is a little high for work so I wore to dinner and it was a hit
Too small
This was a great date night dress, the pattern is beautiful. Unfortunately, it was see through and I wasn't able to wear to the event I had planned on wearing it to.
Gorgeous dress. Just didn't wear it because it was over 100 degrees!!! Too bad. Maybe I'll attempt to rent again.

links_Review_Title: Wonderful dress. Wear it with a slip.
links_Review_Text: Great fit and style. Soft and luxurious fabric. It's transparent though so you need a light-colored slip that is short enough to fall above the slit in the front.

links_Review_Title: Planned to wear to work, but it's satin and too fancy
links_Review_Text: I wanted to wear this one for work, and it fits flattering and would be great for that, except that it's a really shiny satin so it would look silly at the office. It's meant for a wedding or cocktail event or something else semi-fancy, not for work. It's flattering to my curves yet not too tight, and the pattern is really lovely. Great dress, just not for the purpose I wanted.

This dress is prettier in person than in pictures. The material is stretchy but also slinky, feels almost like silk. It does run a bit big - if you're between sizes, I would size down. The top is made to be low-cut, but a safety pin makes this dress work appropriate.

links_Review_Title: Not as high quality as it looks
links_Review_Text: many aspects of this dress leave me wondering why it costs what it does. cheap material, hugs all the wrong places, and just doesn't sit right. not for me!

links_Review_Title: It was an outdoor wedding in July. The perfect dress and weight!
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable!! Would definitely rent again.

I'm reliably a size 12 but I ordered a 14 based on the other reviews. The 14 fit pretty well but it was just awkward on me. I have a 36DD chest and there seemed to be too much material at the chest while it was very tight in the hips/ butt. As several other reviewers note, it is SHEER. If you're going to wear this, I'd think you'd have to skip underwear and just go with Spanx because it's also a very thin material. And I probably could've figured this out had I read the RTR description more closely but the fabric has a sheen to it that I think kind of cheapens this beautiful pattern. I wanted to love it but didn't end up wearing.
This dress has a clingy cheap feeling polyester unlike the other PG similar design in silk. It was only lined on the top. Fit was just weird. Pretty print though if you can make it work.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty but runs a little small and needs slip
links_Review_Text: This was a really pretty dress. The color is more tan/beige than ivory. The material hangs really beautifully around the hips but is very clingy, kind of thin and see through. Would have been fine with a slip though. I am almost always a 16 but found this one to be tight across the chest, although still wearable with a cami.
Very cute dress. Got lots of compliments but I realized mid day that it's very very sheer in the back. I recommend wearing a slip
i have worn him before same knot dress in different color and it was fine this was too tight it was wierd it did not fit sent it back

Stretchy material gathered in all the right places with deep rich fall colors. The material is very light weight and if it didn't have such an involved pattern it might be somewhat see through. The puffy shoulders add a tinge of vintage eighties elegance.
Loved this dress! So fun to wear over Thanksgiving in California. !

links_Review_Title: Love this dress ! So classy ! Wore to BDay part and Valentines Day
links_Review_Text: Great fit , I added a belt black belt with black and gold buckle that was perfect . Iâ€™m 5â€8 165 lb and wore a med . I loved the sleeves ! Colors are beautiful and fabric is so soft . So many compliments! I will say this rental is more for someone taller . I will def rent again or maybe try buying at some point .

links_Review_Title: Glorious print, flattering roushing, and stretchy fabric for the win! Puffy sleeves are just perf
links_Review_Text: Size down for a sexier, more form fitting look

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress if you love the 80s!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was borderline too 80s but I kinda dig it! I played it down with a leather vest. Cute and flattering ruching throughout. Perfect for an hourglass shape! I love the flowers and I got lots of compliments at work!

I loved the high neck and puffy sleeves. I was worried this would be too tight, but the fabric is a little stretchy so the XS actually fit well. I love the color/pattern of this dress. You could probably style with a statement necklace or a high waist belt.
Great dress! It's stretchy fabric so it's comfortable with great ruching and a super flattering cut. LOVE!!
I loved this dress very much. I wish I could've kept it. It hugged my body in all the right places. Perfect dress for any event. I wore it for New Year's Eve

This dress is fantastic! I was so comfortable all night. The strategic ruching placement hid all of the cheese and chocolate I had all holiday season long. I felt curvy, yet thin. One of my best RTR rentals to date!

links_Review_Title: Incredible Dress. Rented this for a rehearsal dinner.
links_Review_Text: Amazing dress I never want to return it. It's perfect if you're petite but have curves...shoulder pads and clings to the body. So comfortable and awesome print. Highly recommend.
I was 3 months postpartum when I wore this dress and it hid all the parts I was self conscious about! Beautiful and fun!
The fit was slightly lose on me but still worked well. Next time I would order an XS.

Gorgeous colors and beautiful dress that fit like a glove. I found the sleeves to be a bit costumey and ended up not wearing - I typically love a statement sleeve but paired with the busy pattern it was a bit much. Would recommend for anyone edgier than me! ;)

A wonderful dress - I wish I took a picture but both the color and the fit are fantastic. I received compliments all day long at the office and then at an alumni holiday party. This dress stands out in a good way!

links_Review_Title: Rented this dress for a dinner out with husband and friends in the Fall. Lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Could have sized down to a small for a more snug fit, but the Medium was comfortable.
This dress was so beautiful. Super flattering and a very comfortable material.
the shoulder pads can't be removed so you need to commit!
I looooooooooved this dress!!!! Got so many compliments on this. The fabric has stretch to it so you can def size down for a tighter fit.

This dress was super fun and the Medium Fit well. The shoulders were pretty dramatic for me so I ended up with a more classic look for the night. Would recommend to friends that are a bit more daring.

This dress is even more beautiful in person. The colors are much deeper and warmer. I loved the little small details in dress shoulders I wasnt able to see in picture on the website. The con for me is that I wish the dress fit more snug. The XS is a 0-2. I wish it was a solid 0. I recieved compliments all night wearing this amazing dress.

links_Review_Title: Loves the pattern and length. Cute puffed sleeves
links_Review_Text: It's a faux wrap but fit really well.

I pinned the chest area as the girls would have been a bit on display and I did not want to wear a cami. A little big, I would size down next time. Love the sleeves and comfort of the dress. Paired with caramel colored suede square heeled pumps- perfect for office to client meetings to cocktails.

Makes a great office staple. Pros: high quality material, fitted elastic waist with bow tie, puffy shoulders Cons: slightly tight throughout the arms, had to pin the V neck for work, slightly too long/out of proportion for us petite ladies

Loved this dress and the puffy sleeve details! It's a super flattering dress, cinched right at the smallest part of my waist. While I did say it runs big, only slightly. It was easily fixed by tightening the belt. Although, it was still a little baggy in the chest (and I'm a 36D.)

links_Review_Title: Should have gone down a size
links_Review_Text: RTR recommended a large, as I normally wear a 8-10 in dresses. However being a smaller-chested woman, I didn't quite fill out the top. Had to safety pin and it was a big big under the arms as well. Adorable dress- might order again in a smaller size!

Love this dress! I want to buy it. It was perfect for my son's baptism. I am 5'11" and was worried the sleeves would be too short (which they were) but I was able to push them up a little so they were 3/4 sleeve and it looked great
So many compliments! Fun should poof detail, great length. A tiiiiny bit low for work but loved this overall!
Cute fall dress. Thought it ran slightly big but it worked out.

links_Review_Title: Fun pattern, good fit, odd fabric
links_Review_Text: Dress fits nicely, good length (I am 5'10), but the fabric feels cheap/plasticy. Perfectly fine for a day without any humidity.

Fit and flare type of dress. Very flattering. I have long legs and I felt like the dress was the perfect length. Easy to move in. I would buy this dress and wear it again! The sleeves are the perfect touch of detail.
Fun, flowy fall dress. Perfect knee length, neckline isn't too revealing. Arrived new with tags! Shoulders exaggerated but adorable, very on trend, loved this one!

Rented this dress for work and ended up buying it because the fit was flattering and the print it great transition for Spring. I can see this being a go-to dress for daytime events (luncheon, showers, wedding).

links_Review_Title: Loved it so much I had to buy it ;)
links_Review_Text: Perfect work dress - makes the difference with the puffy sleeves and is very comfy to wear.

links_Review_Title: Very cute for a bridal shower
links_Review_Text: I loved the sleeves and got complimented on them several times. The XS dress was a little baggy around the bust though despite me being a 32DD.

links_Review_Title: Super cute, I wound up buying it
links_Review_Text: Fun with boots or flats

links_Review_Title: Wore it to work and then dinner!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly! Lots of compliments and I felt great wearing it ðŸ’•
Cuter in pics than when I put it on myself. Hemline went to knee (I'm 5'5) and since it was a flow it cut already, I just felt like I looked frumpy.
Pretty dress in flowy fabric was great with boots for regular office day. Runs a bit big so had to pin chest, but length is just right.

Fit was perfect. The puff on the sleeve is not overly dramatic but definitely adds interest. The print and color are classic for work during the day or dinner at night. The material hangs really well and the tie is flattering around the waist. Best part, it's machine washable in cold. I hate dry cleaning chemicals on my clothes.
Loved the shape of the shoulders -- structural but no 80s padding. Material was lightweight but nicely tailored.

I rented this dress for a baptism. Great quality dress and stylish. Neckline was a little too low on me. But double sided tape made it work! The puffy sleeves weren't my absolute favorite, but overall the look was nice. I am also 13 weeks pregnancy and the dress shape gave me plenty of room for my tiny bump to be comfortable in!

links_Review_Title: High quality dress. Great for summer but ok for winter

links_Review_Text: Made me feel cute, nice rental... worked in the winter month even though it should have been more of a summer material dress.
Rented this when I had to make a quick decision. It was a cute dress...nothing super special about it. Fit well; wore it with tall beige boots to work. Conservative for work.

links_Review_Title: Class With a Touch of Sass
links_Review_Text: Loved wearing this dress for work! Classic wrap style is super flattering, especially for an apple shape like mine, and the puff sleeves made it fun and stylish! It was a bit low, but I just used a small safety pin to bring up the neckline touch. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Pretty color and interesting, unique dress.
links_Review_Text: loved the sleeves;. the skirt added volume to my hips which i didn't love. Also a little low cut for my taste so had to wear a cami underneath. still got complements
Work to work. Used fashion tape to ensure work place modesty when reaching down. Very comfortable. Wore with sued booties. Loved it.

I wore this dress to a baby shower. I'm 8 months postpartum and not down to my pre baby weight yet. My cup size is about a 34DD and I'm around 145lbs. I wore the size small and it fit me perfect. The arms were a tiny bit tight on the top but wasn't bothersome. I don't know if shoulder pads should be worn with this dress to keep the sleeves puffy because they looked a little deflated on me. The medium was way to big on me. This was a very cute dress and I paired it with some booties.

links_Review_Title: Classy boost to the workday outfit
links_Review_Text: I think a S should have fit better, but only an M was available. It still fit fine--the sleeves are short on my long arms, but I wore them pushed up most of the time. There was some excess fabric around my waist and chest. Was a little skeptical of how the shoulders would look, but I was surprised at how much I loved those shoulder puffs by the end of the day!

I wore this at a work event I ran and it fit like a glove! Pushed the sleeves up since they slid a bit but material was pretty, light and perfect for a fall event with boots! Never wanted to take it off and wanted to keep it! A little low for work but I put a tank under it. Love this dress.

This dress was easy to wear. I paired with boots. The colors were great for fall. The material has a little stretch. The sleeves hit right at my wrist and came up while working, so I pushed them up to 3/4 sleeves most of the day.
Such a weird fit with the elastic waist and super-puffy shoulders. I felt like it was a badly-made Halloween costume. Was super excited about this - bummer.
This dress was great for work but could be worn for a date night or out with friends. It ran a little big but I wore a bodysuit underneath which worked perfectly.
Extremely comfortable dress for the office, cute enough for outside work as well. I did put a camisole under the dress for my modest work environment. Dress has nice stretch to it.
It was a cute, innocent dress. Fit nicely
Everything I have rented from this brand I have loved!
Nice fabric and pattern. Flattering and feminine cut. Year round dress - you can wear it with tights or without. I wore to the office and received a lot of complements. Will rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Comfy and beautiful but runs large
links_Review_Text: It is short and such a cute piece but there was no strings and it was big at the top. I have to adjust it to fit me
Loved the fit and high quality fabric! The boning was sticking out a bit and poking me at times, but I stuck it through and still very cute.
Loved this so much I bought it. Took straps off because they were too long. They are removable if you don't like them!

This romper fit very well and is super cute Make sure when you do the straps though (if you wear them cuz they come off forms strapless option) that you crisscross them in the back or it will fit wrong. I saw another review on here stating the straps were too long and bust too big, no that girl just didn't crisscross the back as it's meant to be worn (shown in pic when you order). I'd order this again for another trip for sure

Flirty fun romper in tropical print that I love. Straps were a little long so I pinned them otherwise fit was good. Because this fabric was such a good quality, it was a good choice for whatever we did and wherever we went.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for my birthday beach vacation!
links_Review_Text: Typically a 6 or 8 and I went with the 8. Super short but great in summer and since it's a romper, didn't feel too revealing. Loved it!
This romper was so comfortable and loved the pockets. Wore it to Basel and was the perfect daytime piece.

I rented this for a holiday in Mexico and it was perfect. The vibrant color and fun print screamed tropical. It's pretty versatile, appropriate for the pool and the material is thick enough, so it can be dressed up for dinner. I especially liked that it wasn't too short like a lot of rompers tend to be.
Flattering. Loved the pockets. The top was slightly big but it stayed up fine.
Wore this in Napa for my anniversary vacation! It was super chic and the emerald color was stunning. It fit super well and held me up perfectly! Highly recommend!

This romper is high quality and gorgeous! It fits true to size and has no stretch. The length was perfect and didn't give ride up at all. The colors are bright and you will definitely stand out in a crowd!
