links_Review_Title: The print on the jumper was perfect for the event. I received so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: As mentioned before, the straps were a little too long. Just cross in the back and it fits perfect. Plus, there are different slots for the straps to help with the adjustments. The material was of high quality. It made the length and overall fit perfect.

I always want to wear rompers, but usually cannot because they're too short in the crotch. This fit perfectly! I wore it to a boat party for my 10 year MBA reunion, and I got so many compliments. Like many others said, the straps were long, but I crossed them and they were perfect, it just made using the restroom a little awkward. The fabric on this romper is so much more beautiful than the pics show - it's thicker, and embroidered, so very flattering.

Loved this bold print! At 5'9" rompers are tough for me to pull of but this one worked. The strap length is adjustable in the front which was necessary, needed a few pins to get it just right. The bodice has boning which is a bit uncomfortable but manageable. The raw silk like material looks rich but is a little itchy. Overall great looking but not the most comfortable

Wore this to a Caribbean themed party and it was perfect. Perfect length, thick fabric so everything stayed in place, and the bit of boning in the bodice gave it a great structure on the top. And POCKETS! I was able to keep phone, lipstick and a few other things on me all night. Compliments galore. Wish I had more events to wear this to because I would love to buy it!
This romper was great! Very cute and had pockets. It was definitely tight so I would suggest sizing up. Shoulder straps were long though.

links_Review_Title: Poorly fitting top with way too long straps
links_Review_Text: Was so excited to get this and wear to an upcoming event but it was way too big. I put the straps on the tightest option and they still fall completely off my shoulders. There's boning in the front and being pretty flat chested, it's awkward fitting. The waist down fits better than the top, but I couldn't get away with wearing this because the top part is so ill fitting. So bummed because I had been eyeing this piece for a while.

Beautiful print and quality fabric. It does run large. I normally wear a size 6/8, but the 4 fit me perfectly. I am 5â€™4â€, 34C 130lbs. I did not have an issue with the straps being too long. I had them crossed in the back and I think that made all the difference. The only reason I did not get this five stars is because the top did not lay flat at the bust ( you could see the sticky strip that was supposed to lay flat against your chest ) and you cannot bend over in this. I did not expect it to be quite that short. Other than that it was a great rental for a beautiful summer day.

links_Review_Title: Loved this romper but it stabbed me
links_Review_Text: This romper is SO cute! However, the boning is made with these weird plastic pipes that were sticking through the one I rented and stabbing me in several different places. Wore it anyway but wasn't ideal
Can be worn strapless but I wore straps. Perfect length!! Mardi Gras Luau

Was perfect, compliments all night, no issues with straps, as other mentioned. I am usually a 4, based on reviews I went with a 0. The material, the print, wow, tempted to purchase it. :) overall 5 stars...

Nice, structured fabric and boning in the bodice. Had to cross cross the straps, otherwise they would have slipped off my shoulders. Nips in really nicely in the waste. I have a long torso, so it pulled a bit in the ahem, groin area, but that's par for the course for my body type in a romper and didn't render it unwearable. Felt hot! To quote my friend, "I'm loving this palm beach chic". For reference, I'm 5'6, 155lbs, broad ribs/shoulders, 34D/DD.

links_Review_Title: The print is so much fun'
links_Review_Text: Loved the length and the fit of the romper my only complaint would be the straps. Even with adjusting them they were still too big and kept sliding off.

links_Review_Title: Perfect outfit for a birthday dinner!
links_Review_Text: Alterations to the straps made it fit better. Quality material and flattering.

Half of the respondents said it ran large, so my back-up size was smaller than normal. That ended up being perfect! I wore this to a Lizzo concert and we went to a nice dinner beforehand. I felt great all night, totally comfortable even as I noticed so many eyes on me. I noticed both men and women admiring the easy elegance. Also loved the color and fabric.

Absolutely loved this romper and got compliments all night!! Well made, sturdy material, but not too hot to wear in July. And the shorts are not too short or riding up. Fitted and flattering at the waist. Definitely think it runs big though, especially in the top. I always wear a 6 or an 8, but usually an 8 in anything with bottoms, but for this the 6 was good, still with room in the top, but it was barely noticeable. I'm a 34D, 5'6", and about 148 pounds for reference. Rent this!

I ordered a size 10. Normally wear a 8 or 10. Fit in body was good, but a little too loose on top. Great color for summer! Also I read reviews about the straps being too large. You have to make sure they cris- cross in the back.

Order a size down. This fits large in stomach & bust area. Very forgiving if you have a gut. The top was loose on me ( I'm a 34B now) and I wish I had rented the 4. But I made it work. Others also complain about the long straps....so here is my solution. I twisted them around each other (kinda like snakes lol) in the back a few times then hooked them forward in place. It shortened them enough and looked really cute from the back. I'm 5'2" so I look short in everything but this romper was great. The fabric is lined and thicker which felt really good. The color is perfect. I'm 45 & considered for half a second that this might be too "young" for me. Nope. Hell with that. Have fun & wear cute things ladies!
Should have sized up, worked great without a bra, but was tight elsewhere. Other than that, super cute and received many compliments

Took the advice I saw on other reviews and ordered one size UP. The band around the middle is not forgiving, so be mindful of that when ordering. Aside from that, great little pool party cabana outfit, lots of compliments.

Well-constructed. The waist was a bit snug in the 4, so I opted for the 6. The straps have multiple settings, which was very helpful. Got endless compliments all night and friends texted me asking where I got it when I posted photos to Instagram. Highly recommend for an outdoor party or summer event!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous print outweighs the long straps and poke-through boning
links_Review_Text: I wore this out to a food fair in the Bronx and it was a big hit! The print is amazing and the fabric is thick and luxury. It also has pockets! Straps are removable but for this event I wanted a more casual look, so kept them on. These were the LONGEST straps in the history of straps. I wound up having to pin them and they still slid off a few times. This is a structured romper with boning, and as usual the boning was coming allll the way through the fabric underneath. I had a sharp thing sticking my stomach/rib cage area for two hours but it was worth it because this jumpsuit is so cute. I would rent again, but have to figure out a better solve for the boning/corseting poking through

This was absolutely a great fit. I wore this hosting a fashion show and got a lot of compliments. The cut of the romper makes it look like you have a cinched waist. Definitely recommend this. Definitely dressy material.

links_Review_Title: Sexy and secure at a bachelorette party
links_Review_Text: This outfit made me feel sexy without feeling trashy. It's very form fitting (and a bit tight in the waist if you're more of a square than an hourglass shape), but made from a thick material that feels very high end. This was perfect for the bachelorette party I attended in Palm Springs, CA. The straps were oddly long, but they're detachable and I didn't miss them given the tightness of the outfit and the sturdiness of the fabric.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a golf tournament brunch and received lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: The material is very nice and the green color is very vivid. It does run big, especially up top...I usually wear a 4, but went with the backup size 2 and wished it was a 0.

I loved it! As soon as I put it on my husband told me to buy it. I'm almost 5'10 and it was a TAD short, especially since I wore wedges, but I was comfortable in it all night. It's a thick, nice structured material. I do wish the straps weren't sewn onto the front & therefore truly adjustable how they were intended to be, but it worked fine. I got lots of compliments! I wore a size 2 & got the 4 as a backup. I wish it had been a tad tighter in the top. I didn't try on the 4.

links_Review_Title: Cute romper but overall too big!
links_Review_Text: Loved this romper, it's color + adjustable straps, but it was too big. I wish got a 0 because it was long and just overall big.

Overall fit was fine. But the bust area was very large, even for me 36DD. Straps are very long, and I had to wear them on the shortest setting, which I think contributed to the front gaping even more. I dont think people knoticed the top didnt fit me right, and it was a fun color to wear. Biggest concern was that I couldnt get in and out of it by my self. Zipper is in the middle back, and it hard to get to zip over the middle waist band seam. I had to have a friend come with me to the bathroom so I could get in and out of it durring dinner.
I have larger hips, and this fit me well on my bottom half, however, it was a bit large for my midsection/chest area. Still loved the piece!
I did not wear this. It was very short and my legs are my less toned area. It didnt cover much of the back of my thighs.
Cute and comfy

I don't think I have a broad rib cage but I couldn't zip it all the way from the mid back up . It fit everywhere else and seemed to be a fun and sexy dress. One heads up too: the background is more yellow than beige, bone, or white. Some of the pictures don't show the true color. I guess I needed a medium but it seems like it would be too big in other places.
Beautiful! Fits like a glove and so fun to wear

links_Review_Title: Memorable colors & pattern; small in bust
links_Review_Text: Fun, flirty colors and pattern. Could not wear a bra or it wouldn't zip but worked without one. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but not good for larger chests
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love this dress but it just didn't work with my 34 DD chest! No support at all from the straps. Still it is lovely and would work for women with C or below cup size! Wish I could have worn it out.
The fit of this dress and the colors are over-the-top gorgeous. Loved everything about it.

links_Review_Title: Omg this is one of my favorite dresses ever! SO unique!
links_Review_Text: I rented it for a trip to Savannah, Georgia and I got nonstop compliments. The fabric is silky and magical, the colors are unique and vibrant, and the skirt is full and fun to play with. I also wore it when I got back to colder weather in NYC with a sweater over it and it looked fantastic!

links_Review_Title: You will feel like a beautiful peacock!
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit! It was a little tight in my upper rib cage after eating haha as there isn't any give in that area, but I still think S was the right fit. The material is very luxurious and the pattern is so beautiful. Made me want to TWIRL (and I did--hello boomerangs)!
Gorgeous dress. Made from the best material!
I rented this for a bridal shower at Descanso Gardens. The colors on the dress are gorgeous and the dress flattering. The chest area is a little revealing but manageable.

links_Review_Title: Bright happy dress perfect for daytime.
links_Review_Text: Perfect dress for daytime events or brunch. I paired it with pastel vans for a more casual brunch and it was great. Bright colors, corset-esque top and received a ton of compliments when I was wearing it and also after I posted a photo in it. Would rent again!

Loved this flirty, pleated dress! Tons of looks and compliments every where we went. Kind of an Audrey Hepburn classic with bold colors to make it modern. I was surprised that it fit so well around my ribs and bust because I am so narrow. It was an Instagram hit @Drcjames
Wore to Nobu in Mexico City for my birthday dinner and it was perfect. Such a gorgeous fabric. Maybe better for larger chested women.
The fit, fabric and color were excellent! This dress turned a lot of heads! I felt sexy but very romantic at the same time. I'm thinking about buying it.
The colors were unreal! Highly recommend this dress for your next event. Even wore this during the day with a sweater and sneakers. Beautiful dress and nice fit.
Beautiful colours, flattering and shiny fabric. Loved it!

Hands down the most BEAUTIFUL piece I've ever rented on RTR. I wish I could buy this piece! Picture doesn't do this dress justice- the fabric is incredible in person. Very flowy and feminine with a super saturated ombrÃ© vibe on the hem. I'm a DD so this was a bit exposed, but nothing drastic. Rent this dress and feel like a million bucks.

This dress was absolutely beautiful and so unique. Like everyone else mentions, I received non stop compliments all night long. It was a little snug in the chest but I was still able to wear a strapless bra with it. For any mamas with babies this is a bit hard to nurse in, I had to have my hubby unzip it. Otherwise everything was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Fun and flirty for a Fall Wedding
links_Review_Text: I got sooooo many compliments with this dress. It's really a unique and is super comfortable. The pleated skirt makes for some fun dancing and twirling. I wore the small which was a perfect fit since the extra small drew a lot of attention to my boobs. So word of warning if your larger up top and don't like the girls hanging out to much.

I wore this dress to a Renaissance festival; received many compliments! The material is silky and light, and the fit was perfect. I didn't wear a bra because the cut of the top was a little small for one. I could have easily worn sticky boobs though. But the material and cut off the top of the dress made it fine to go bra free. The large fit perfectly, and it was a nice length to mid-shin. The dress was pretty light and airy.

I loved this dress! I got so many compliments on it - the color and print are just so fun and unique. It was pretty long (like tea length) on my 5'2" frame. It fit well, XS wasn't at all tight for me. I definitely needed a push up bra (32A) for the pretty peasant bodice to be as flattering as it could. This looked really gorgeous and it was such a fun dress to wear. Great for dressier summer events. Threw a denim jacket over this and kept it casual with sandals and a woven tote for brunch with friends.

I rented this for a wedding where bright colors were highly encouraged, and this dress did not disappoint! The pleated skirt was so flowy and pretty, and I got so many compliments on the dress! My only issue was that it's a bit low cut, so I had to keep checking to make sure my bra wasn't showing (probably really just an issue for small-chested people out there). Other than that, 10/10 would wear again

Gorgeous ombre color.. I wore this with long purple ombre nails, nude heels, blue crystal and evil-eye jewelry, and a hardcore pushup bra. Fantastic for a summer wedding, and the silky fabric was comfortable and cool (though note, it doesn't stretch). Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: TTS but a lot of cleavage - material and pattern is 100
links_Review_Text: Saw this dress on a few instagrams and needed to rent it, despite not really having any event that required it haha! I really loved the material, and the colors are absolutely stunning. See more things I loooved on @thanksitsrtr !!

links_Review_Title: Compliments all night and flattering in every way. Super unique
links_Review_Text: I have smaller boobs so I still had to wear a strapless bra to give the girls a little lift. Super comfy and no complaints - just compliments. I'm 5'3" 120 lbs FYI
Perfect swirl capable dress for a summer wedding!

I have 32DD boobs. Not for one second did they fit into the top of the dress. I would not have been able to wear it out of I didn't tie a denim top over it. It was also huge everywhere else. The color is stunning in person tho
The top was pretty revealing but other than that it fit great and I got a lot of compliments on the dress
This dress is stunning. It fits well with quality material - not too heavy or light. The colors are stunning and the dress moves beautifully in the wind. Prepare for compliments galore!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to my bestest friend's rehearsal dinner - smart cocktail attire.
links_Review_Text: This fit me beautifully. I felt totally appropriate despite the German lederhosen-esque lace up bust, which wasn't even really noticeable, but I can see how bustier ladies who have commented may feel this is a bit risque. I got so many compliments on the color and pattern, and I feel like it (and I!) moved with such grace the whole night. I loved this so much I plan on buying it.

links_Review_Title: Semi-formal wedding, and this dress was great for lots of twirling :)
links_Review_Text: Great fit - Large probs wouldn't fit larger than me around the bust (36B). A little busty, wouldn't wear it for a work function. I'm very tall, found the straps and length to be perfect. Great dress - lots of compliments on the amazing colors!
I am in love with this dress!!!! The pattern was unique and colorful and it accentuated my body perfectly! I loved the skirt - it had gorgeous movement and was 100% twirl worthy!!!!

This dress definitely works better for someone with a smaller bust size, which i fortunately have, and the small fit me perfectly! And the bottom flows so nicely on the dance floor. Glad I rented this!
I am obsessed with this dress! It was the perfect fit and even more beautiful in person. I will definitely rent this again
This is my first rental from rent the runway and I'm hooked. Literally would fit a taller girl better.. also better for small chest! Rent you will not regret

links_Review_Title: I love this dress! So fun and something no one else would be wearing! Super flattering.
links_Review_Text: The dress is a little difficult if youâ€™re big busted. Iâ€™m a 34DD and the cups were a little small for me, it was also a little hard to zip at the top. I felt like the straps were a little too long on the large though. The straps come twisted which I think is a stylistic choice and why they are made a little longer. Didnâ€™t bother me, still really enjoyed it.

links_Review_Title: This dress was the perfect summer evening wear look!
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove and the colors were a show stopper!

links_Review_Title: Stunning, colorful dress that makes a statement
links_Review_Text: I would normally be a medium but it wasn't available so I ordered the large. Thank goodness! It was definitely tight around the rib cage. It was also a bit revealing in the bust area which is why I added the cardigan. It honestly fit like a corset but I didn't want to draw that much attention to my top half. I also had to pin the straps for a DIY alteration for better fit up top. The uneven hem is on trend for 2019 and I got tons of compliments in Napa during winery tours.

Wore this for MDW in Fire Island and got a ton of compliments. Most importantly I felt incredible in it! Love the colors. It's true to size but a bit big in the rib cage/upper bodice area. Definitely shows cleavage so this is not really a work ensemble.
Gorgeous dress, with beautiful detail. Fit me like a glove but could see how this would be restrictive for some. Considered buying!

Love this dress! Got lots of compliments and I felt comfortable. It was longer than expected which is rare because I am tall. Runs very tight though and the fabric has no give so size up at least once if not twice.

links_Review_Title: It was so easy to rent and return and worth the money for sure
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress and got so many compliments! Definitely size up. I am usually a 8 and opted with the 12 for more breathing room and I'm glad I did!!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a 100th birthday party!
links_Review_Text: As others have noted, this dress is very fitted along the upper legs, which restricted walking and dancing to small steps/moves. The detail of the flowers and birds was pretty and it was an appropriate dress for a family gathering.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a pre-wedding party and to a bridal shower.
links_Review_Text: This dress has beautiful colors and embroidery. I wore a size 14R in order to be comfortable but the 12R fit beautifully as well, just a bit snug. I wore it to a party and then to my daughter's bridal shower. Got plenty of compliments. I couldn't part with it so I bought it at a very reasonable price!

links_Review_Title: Very cute design and fits well!
links_Review_Text: Was perfect for a semi outdoor wedding in Los Angeles. Amazing pattern and fits well. A little slim in the hips so if you're pear shaped, consider sizing up. Love the length and received a lot for compliments !!
Beautiful dress! As other reviews have mentioned, the material is not very flexible. Size up for comfort. I loved wearing this dress.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but SIZE UP BIG TIME
links_Review_Text: I usually wear an 8-10, and had to have a 14 overnighted when the 10 and 12 didn't fit... but the dress was incredible and the detail was exquisite. I was receiving complements all night!
Wore this beautiful dress to a destination wedding. Got so lent compliments.

links_Review_Title: Normally a size 2 or 4 but had to go all the way up to a size 8.
links_Review_Text: Runs incredibly small in the hips. The fabric doesn't have any stretch, so to be able to sit comfortably in this dress, I recommend going up at least two sizes. Once you get the correct size, the print and fit are very flattering.

I received so many compliments on this dress! I thought it was a great option for a winter wedding. It had darker colors but still stood out with the embroidery and color. The flower buds are actually a light lilac. The material is on the stiffer end so that may affect your sizing. I was able to fit in both the 8 and 10 but the 10 was more comfortable due to the fabric/movement.

links_Review_Title: Elegant and lovely but SUPER tight dress
links_Review_Text: I didn't read the reviews and didn't size up. Well, I actually could zip it but it was extremely tight around the hips, to the point that I couldn't hike it up to go to the restroom - has to take off the whole thing from the top LOL. But the top fit perfectly and if I did size up, it wouldn't have been as nice. So bottom line, best fit for someone who is more straight and narrow. Still I LOVED it.
True to size, very cute and feminine.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but movements are bit restrictive
links_Review_Text: Very tight fit but I think that's what makes it flattering. I'm not sure how great this dress would be if you wanted to dance around and be active because there's not much give in the material however I got a lot of compliments and it is very pretty

Lots of compliments on this and I felt so confident! I'm not used to wearing tight dresses, so was a little nervous about this form-fitting look when I tried it on. The 4 actually fit perfectly and hugged the curves nicely. If you're not into that sort of thing - I'd size up or pick another style. The fabric is definitely tight, but not restricting. I just had to get used to how it felt. Also, the tight part ends above the knees and I had a lot of mobility to dance the night away!

links_Review_Title: Cute idea in theory, pretty pattern, maybe good for someone younger
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love it. The dress looked really cute online, and I love the colors and the pattern. (Disclaimer: I'm in my 40's - though people usually think I'm in my upper 30s.) Somehow it didn't quite work, and my husband thought the length and the skirt shape made it a bit matron-y. I'm not really big in the tummy area; I'm not completely flat either, but at 5'4" and 114lbs it was a bit disconcerting to feel like my stomach was pronounced in this dress. I'm probably being self conscious though. If you're taller/younger, I would think this dress can be very cute. My waist is 26.5-27" and I tried size 4. It was close but not overly tight. If you want to eat and be comfortable, you might want to size up. Mostly TTS.

links_Review_Title: Runs small, not suited for curves
links_Review_Text: Runs small, not suited for curvy figure
The top was a little itchy and it was tight around the stomach, should have dozed up. I didn't get a chance to wear but really pretty on.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but runs small and narrow.
links_Review_Text: Ordered this dress 2 sizes up. Although it did fit --it was not comfortable in the hips as it was so narrow I couldn't walk comfortably. Also the zipper was difficult to work with. I was sooo looking forward to wearing this dress but it just didn't work out. Also there is no stretch to it.
I ended up wearing 4 sizes up - they were out of 2 sizes up from my normal dress size! It ended up working just fine but the 2 sizes up would of fit perfectly!

Love this dress! Got so many compliments on it as it is something different! There isnt a lot of give in this dress- the 4R was tighter in my hips and bigger in my chest but i have a small chest! Overall it was extremely flattering and i would rent again!
Beautiful dress. Runs small! Size up one to two sizes for sure!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely beautiful dress but runs tight. Definitely add 1 size up.
links_Review_Text: My favorite dress so far.

links_Review_Title: Unique design, can be dressed up or down. Fitted.
links_Review_Text: Works well for straight and narrow body type. Fitted thru hips makes for a lovely look but did limit movement
I am 5'7", 104lbs, small chested, with a thin frame and the dress fit perfectly. I got tons of compliments! I will definitely rent it again.

I'm 5'9" about 170 lbs, so I rented a size 10 and 12 thinking that either of those would be perfect. I couldn't even zip up the 12. It was such a shame because this dress is so beautiful and well made, the embroidery is especially impressive. Order at least 2 sizes up.

A great and fun dress for any formal occasion! It definitely runs small so you need to order one size up from your normal size. A great length as well. The dress is snug but comfortable! Would recommend!
I rented this dress for a winter wedding. I loved it. It runs on the small side. I got so many compliments. Would definitely recommend
This dress hit my curves in all the right places! The detailing on this dress was also very nice- appeared to be hand-sewn. Would recommend.

Beautiful dress, would have loved to wear. I usually wear a 4, sized up to 6. I could zip it but would not have been comfortable to wear for a long period of time, especially to sit in. Plan on trying again in an 8 since it was such a beautiful dress!

Cute and fun dress! Fit a bit tight in the hips and looser in the chest, but overall fit pretty true to size. I ordered a larger backup size after reading some of the review but ended up wearing my regular size. The zipper is a little tricky in some spots.

I love this, and got lots of compliments. Only thing is that it runs really small--I often wear 2/4, or even 6, but I needed to get this in an 8, so I was happy i found it at the rent the runway physical location.
Gave this dress 3 stars only for the colors. Other than that, it was extremely small - definitely size up.
Rented this for my birthday dinner and loved it :) Sexy, feminine and warm enough for late fall. Keep in mind, it doesn't have much stretch and needs a strapless bra.

links_Review_Title: Received so many compliments on this dress. It's form fitting, but not skin-tight.
links_Review_Text: Classy, but sexy.
Gorgeous dress.

So cute for Easter or a spring wedding! The dress is beautiful and comfortable but runs a little larger in the waist area. I normally wear an XL and even the Large was too loose on my waist. I would recommend going one size down if you're an hourglass.

The medium fit ok - I don't think the small would have zipped in the bust. However, it made the rest of the dress a little baggy in the butt/thighs and it was pretty long. Overall, I felt that it was too matronly for me.

This dress is perfect for spring! Since it is lace, it tends to be a little snug around the hips and butt if you're curvier, so size up. I didn't find myself tugging too much around the hem to keep the lower layer long, but I did catch myself tugging the neckline up. Make sure you adjust the straps before going out so you're not in the same boat!

Honestly, I couldn't believe how perfectly this fit. I'm a true 8, but I'm curvy so I often don't believe when online ordering says a "Medium is size 8", and I go large, but I took the risk and this was amazing. Could not recommend any more! Order this!!!! You won't be disappointed.
This dress is beautiful and fit perfectly! I got many compliments and it was actually comfortable!
The fit was great and the dress was beautiful. I am small busted so the top was big on me but the lace fabric overlay was very forgiving and didnâ€™t give away.
Love love love Didn't car for the slip being short but over all amazing
This dress was perfect for a February wedding. I felt amazing in it. True to size and perfect for any formal occasion. Highly recommend!!

links_Review_Title: Loved the look and feel of this dress! I danced the night away at a warm, humid outdoor wedding!
links_Review_Text: It runs small through the chest area. I normally wear a 10/12 dress and had to wear the XL. Thankfully I ordered the backup size and had read the reviews.

I sometimes have fit issues, where if an item is big enough in the butt/thighs, it's too big in the waist, but not with this one! It fit everything perfectly and gave me an hourglass shape (which I do NOT have). The length is great (even if you're super tall), the fabric on the outside is thick and high quality, the lining inside is silky, the color is vibrant, the straps are supportive and don't dig in (but note that they're not adjustable). 10/10

Very fitted dress but also very forgiving. Did not wear shape wear since the lining and the lace lay nicely. My chest cavity is broad so had to go with the XL. Overall, the dress is true to size. Because of the lace detail, the zipper can be a bit challenging but move slowly and it will go. Detail and lace is beautifully done and for that makes the dress a little more heavier than it looks. Dress came in two days early and return is a breeze.

links_Review_Title: Had to size up so I could sit in the dress ;)
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress. Did not end up wearing. Went with other style I ordered. Would have worn the Large, otherwise would not be able to sit. Material n pattern is beautiful.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress! I felt like Elle Woods meets Barbie. I got nonstop compliments at the wedding!
links_Review_Text: Because of the cut of the bodice, the straps stayed put even when loosened, which was great because we danced a LOT. The lace of the overdress is very sturdy but caught a few times - if I hadnâ€™t been as aware of my body, it could have ripped. The dress doesnâ€™t offer much warmth, so if youâ€™re at an outdoor wedding in February like me, be sure to bring a jacket or wrap!

I love the colors and the lace used to make this dress. It is so vibrant and makes you feel pretty, extravagant and happy. I received complements from almost everyone at the event. The shipment was so fast and the store associates were wonderful. I enjoyed my transaction.
I got so many compliments on the dress. Loved how the dress fit my every curve and that it looks good on a petite body despite being long.
The fit was great and the quality was good. Wore it for a birthday party in Mexico. Received a lot of compliments.

This dress was absolutely gorgeous and is perfect for tall ladies. I'm 6' tall and was 16 weeks pregnant for this wedding so ordered a L and an XL, I ended up wearing the L and probably could have worn a M. The length of the lace is super flattering and elongating, and the slip hit at the perfect length as well. Nice thick lace was perfect with spanx underneath!

Wore for a May black tie optional wedding and it was great! It stood out in the crowd and was comfortable. My only complaint was it was a bit booby but since it was colder, I wore a shawl so that made it a little more appropriate.

I loved that the dress was long so it was classy yet had a shorter interior hem to give it a sexier look. I got a ton of compliments. It was very comfortable and the adjustable straps were a lifesaver. I wore a strapless bra underneath and didn't worry about it showing at all. I highly recommend this dress!

This dress was beautiful! Bright colors, the lace/crochet overlay was very delicate and added a great touch. Got lots of compliments wearing to a summer wedding. Wish it had a tiny bit more give to the fabric - I wore a size up from what my normal dress size is. Otherwise loved it!

links_Review_Title: Stunning vibrant colors!! You will get a lot of compliments!
links_Review_Text: The fit was wonderfulâ€¦ The color is so vibrant in personâ€¦ I am 5 foot 110lbs and it fit great!! Since I am only 5 foot it was more of a tea length which is fine to me. I received the words "classy" "stunning" and "how beautiful!" !!! You won't be disappointed! And Yes.... I bought it so I can have it always!!

I rented this dress for a garden wedding in Mexico that started at 2pm and last last midnight-so I needed dress that would transition from day to night. The floral lace was stunning and it (as well as the lining) had a little give so it wad very easy to wear.
Absolutely loved the fit and look of this dress!
This dress is so beautiful. The color is amazing and I am still struggling between this and another RTR dress. I love them both
A tad tight around the upper body and looser around the hips but overall, great

This dress was very pretty. I am short so it was a little longer than I would've liked. I was also surprised the medium wouldn't fit, it wasn't super tight at the top clasp, I just don't think it was cut big enough for someone with boobs and a large rib cage. The straps were concerning-ly fragile and small but they did not break! The shape of this dress being straight/sheath may not have been the most flattering but I did not feel big at all! Love the color and pattern, got many compliments.
This was the best dress I have ever worn. Fit so well, danced all night with no dress issues. Did not want to return!

Loved this dress! Beautiful color and the fit was great! The straps are adjustable and the top portion is structured enough that I did not need to wear a bra. I wore medium, which was a bit on the snug side, but the large was too big. Overall, it was comfortable and I did not have to tug or fuss with anything all night. I wore it for a beach wedding and received so many compliments all night long. Would rent again!
The dress fit perfectly. I absolutely loved it and received compliments all night.

links_Review_Title: Seeing my two friends that have been together since HS finally tie the knot!
links_Review_Text: This fit very well! It hugged all the right spots. The length was perfect. The straps were a little loose.

Absolutely loved this dress! Maybe my favorite RTR rental to date. I got compliments all night long. The colors popped, it was comfortable, and perfect formality for a beautiful summer wedding. Highly recommend renting for your next event!

links_Review_Title: It was perfect! Could not have made a better choice.
links_Review_Text: Fits snug and very flattering. Head turner. You can feel the quality of this dress. Easy to sit for dinner, stand, and of. Purse dance.

I'm normally between a M and L depending on the dress, the large fit perfectly. I drive a Jeep and it was hard to get up into it because you have limited leg movement. Besides that I have no complaints! This was one of the first ones I've rented with ADJUSTABLE STRAPS, so I felt perfect all night and got tons of compliments. Was very sad to send back!

links_Review_Title: I felt amazing in this dress and received a ton of compliments. Perfect for an outdoor wedding!
links_Review_Text: Pros: Stunning dress! The color, length, and design is amazing. I like that I could adjust the straps. Took the advise of other reviewers and did not wear a bra and still felt completely comfortable. That part was amazing. Had compliments all night long. Cons: I have to agree with the other reviewers when they say there is no stretch or give to the dress, especially in the mid section where I carry most of my weight. I ordered a L and an XL. Ended up wearing the L to the wedding.

links_Review_Title: A perfect fit and soo many compliments!!
links_Review_Text: Runs true to size, classy but still fashion forward. I have another wedding coming up and tried to rent this dress again in another color but couldn't, that's how great this dress is. You won't be disappointed!

One of my favorite rentals!! I'm 5'9" and 150 lbs and this fit me like a glove. So perfectly snug in all the right places but still comfortable. Beautiful print and colors. Couldn't have been better (other than if it had pockets)!

links_Review_Title: Statement colors for a summer wedding
links_Review_Text: Loved the overall cut/fit of this dress, most importantly the pattern and color were so unique from typical dresses I have rented and worn before. It was great for a summer wedding and the midi length allowed it to be a little more formal. It hugged my figure in all the right spots. I am short but I didn't feel like it drowned me. The zipper was extremely difficult- I almost didn't wear it but was lucky to have someone help me. It's not so much because the dress was formfitting as it is the material (all lace- it was hard to even unzip from the hanger). I definitely recommend renting your normal size plus a size up for a back up. I ended up going with a small but probably would've had an easier time moving around with one size up. I was able to dance sit and walk just fine but it's not a dress that allows for a lot of free movement. Beware of using the bathroom- practice moving the dress beforehand or bring a friend :) Other than that I love this style and was happy with how I looked!
Fit nice and very comfy. Danced all night in it and it kept everything in place. Love the color and it's very well made. Got lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress for a summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! Runs true to size and fits like a glove. You won't regret it!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for warm weather wedding!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved the dress. Fit perfectly, and allowed for movement when dancing! Fun and vibrant.
I got so many compliments on this color! The dress was super comfortable and flattering. Material was great and I loved the sexiness of the straps.

links_Review_Title: Perfectly comfortable and elegant for the tropics
links_Review_Text: I wore this to Cuba where I ate and drank everything in sight. It was comfortable, required no bra and looked great. The color and movement of the dress is excellent.

I love the color, the fit, the fabric! I LOVE IT ALL! I wore this to dinner on vacation and it was perfect! I didn't have to wear a bra and it fit like a glove! It's the most amazing creamy orange color. Looks even better with a tan!
I rented this dress for a casual day to evening look. It is definitely on the dressier side which I loved! The only thing was that it is a highlighter orange color. I got nonstop compliments on it!
Loved this dress! So comfy, such a bright fun color, flowy and fun. The straps are adjustable, which is great!
This dress is incredible! Not too much fabric to the point where you feel lost in it. Don't need to wear a bra. Travels really well.

links_Review_Title: On trend, flirty neon orange dress
links_Review_Text: Loved the twirlability of this dress. The fit was very flattering- and it looked amazing with my cheetah print t-strap heels! Could go with strapless, but I did stick on bra instead. Comfortable for dinner out for my husbands birthdays, and got stopped by strangers to compliment the dress!

I agree with other reviews that it's not super flattering bc where it's so flowy it doesn't give you much of a shape. However, I still loved it bc it was so bright and I didn't have to worry about eating too much since it was flowy! ;)
I didn't wear- it was too much dress for me and hid my body.
This dress fit well but it was even more orange than in the pictures. The material also seemed a little cheap. Can be color shock but photographs well especially if you have a nice tan

links_Review_Title: Such a comfortable, lovely, BRIGHT dress for a music event. I had so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: It fits very true to size (8), comfortable, lovely. Did not need a bra with it.
brighter than the picture, kind of neon orange.
Very cute! Super comfortable and flattering. Great for a beachy/summery vibe.
A beautiful orange. I wasnâ€™t able to wear it on vacation because it was too cold but will probably rent again when the weather warms up.

links_Review_Title: beautiful bright orange, super flowy. perfect for my summer rooftop event.
links_Review_Text: runs true to size.
Beautiful dress, but very neon in color. I opted not to wear it, as it felt too bright for the wedding I was attending.

links_Review_Title: Great color! Flattering silhouette if you have a tummy to disguise
links_Review_Text: Word of caution to those getting dressed alone: This is a little difficult to zip at the seam of the dress. I realized that when I was unzipping the dress before even trying it on. It definitely can be zipped you will just need a partner to help you. Other than that, fun dress that looks great with a tan!

links_Review_Title: I love the vibrant color of this dress! It's a fun dress & perfect for dancing the night away!
links_Review_Text: The fit was ok - I sized up from my usual size 10 as there is no stretch at the waist. My only issue with the dress was that I was not able to zip the side zipper up completely. NOt because of sizing but because the zipper was twisted or something. I had several people try. I was also not able to completely zip the dress up when returning it. There were also spots on the fabric under the top ruffle. Fortunately, neither of these things were super noticeable to others and I had fun wearing the dress.

I got so many compliments on this dress! It really does stand out and draw attention. I liked the style, but similar to other comments I will say it was a bit unflattering in the hips and made them look bigger than they actually are. Overall, still thought it was a fun rental and would probably rent again for a specific occasion that would call for a bright colored outfit.
Dress made my chest look too large and and was not flattering. Cute style but looks much better on model

Appropriate for work and super cute for a night out as well! The bottom part was a little odd around my waist so I ended up tucking it in. Otherwise a unique color and sleeve combo in a great velvet material!!

This shirt was absolutely gorgeous on the hanger but I just really couldn't make it work. I think maybe it was just too big and I should have gotten a medium. It was too bulky with dress pants and I couldn't decide tucked or untucked all day when I wore with jeans. I felt awkward in it when usual RTR gives me more confidence :(
I got a lot of compliments on this top at our family's christmas eve party. Great color and fabric.

Loved this crushed velvet hunter green top! I normally am a large-xl and I got the xl and if I rented it again I would get the large so it would be a little more fitted but it's overall an adorable puffy sleeved little top!
I liked this in photos but it didn't sit right on the arms and was really big even though I got the XS

links_Review_Title: Fit perfectly, different than what I would normally wear!
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly in the arms and body and hit my waist right below my pants line. It was fitted, but not tight.
The neck was really stretched out - large for a medium

I wore this to a holiday party and felt very on trend given the green velvet. Also given that it's a statement top I expected at least a couple or comments, as I get with a lot of fun RtR pieces, however this might've looked weird on me or not as statement as I thought... the material was comfy and stretchy and felt that it fit well, but I probably wouldn't rent again.
Green velvet was fun for holidays.
I wore this on Christmas with the family with some velvet leggings. It kept me warm, comfortable, and a little bit dressy but still able to sit on the floor with kids while opening presents.

Got a lot of compliments. The darts in front make it look elegant. The sleeves have an odd wired bar inside to make the ruching and "poof" stand up. It feels odd when you first put it on but you get used to it and it is comfortable. The fabric attracts other fibers so don't wear anything that sheds. If it wasn't so ridiculously priced, I would buy it!
Fits TTS. I have a long torso, but no issues with this top. Super comfortable. An easy way to elevate an everyday look. great day to night top.

links_Review_Title: Cute for fall, wires in shoulders Are strange
links_Review_Text: Loose fit, cute color, wires in the shoulder area are strange and don't stay in same place much

This is a beautiful top, high quality velvet and amazing color. It runs ever so slightly large, but not too large. The only drawback was the difficulty of fitting the sleeves into a suit jacket, otherwise a perfect top.
I wore this at work tucked into high waisted black pants. Got tons of compliments. The material is so luxurious. It is runs a bit big. Next time will rent medium.
This top was very flattering on. Loved the sleeve detail.
Loved this top- it was a tad too big but still was able to wear it for a night out and to work. Definitely recommend this top but size down!
Loved this but the princess sleeves were maybe a tad too extreme. But still a great piece that got compliments!
The Velvet felt weird and the shoulders are VERY poofy - a bit too intense for me
I rented this dress for a wedding trade show and received so many compliments. Very lightweight and comfortable and the print is beautiful!
People stopped me on the street to compliment this dress. Probably longer than the fit was intended, but I liked it on my 5'1" frame.

Absolutely stunning, elegant, stand-out dress that is perfect for holiday events. You really feel like you're wearing a $1,300 dress (which you are). I am obsessed with the toile print. Pros: You will feel beautiful Full skirt = no sucking in tummy Doesn't wrinkle, even after a full day Cons: Petites may find it a bit long Full skirt can draw out the hips I don't want to return it

links_Review_Title: Time travel with this unique dress!
links_Review_Text: Runs true to size, maybe a bit on the small side. No stretch to the fabric, because it's 100% silk. Looks beautiful and you will really stand out. It's lightweight, but you can add a sweater or coat for cooler weather.
Flowy and fabulous! I wear between a 6 and 8, this was the 8. Extra room in the waist but not in the armscye.

Incredibly comfortable and flows pleated dress. The material is light and easy to move in. I went to the grocery store with this on and received compliments from 7 complete strangers. When I was in the city, someone rolled down their car window to tell me they loved the dress. It's captivating!!
Wore it without tie. Very translucent... but beautifully feminine
I wore this dress to church this morning and received dozens of compliments. It really stands out. A beautiful garment.

Rented this to WFH in--looks great on Zoom! But I am normally between a 6 and an 8, rented the 44R, and while the shoulders fit, the waist was absolutely huge and as a result the belt looked kind of sloppy. I think you could fix it if you used a thicker cinch belt, but it wasn't a good fit at all for me. Totally worked for my purposes, but in the future when what's below shoulder level is something people see, I think this probably isn't the dress for someone with a smaller waist.

links_Review_Title: A lot of dress for a petite person
links_Review_Text: The fabric of this dress was beautiful (very lightweight silk) but it ran a little large and almost overwhelmed my petite frame with the volume of the fabric/length of the skirt. The belt also refused to stay in place despite the loops. I received compliments on it but I won't rent it again.
Large, unflattering and not meant for hourglass shape. Top was tight, waist was large. Meant more for pear or straight body types.
Lovely dress I got many compliments. It was easy to wear

links_Review_Title: Lots of Compliments, Dress does NOT have an open back
links_Review_Text: Really loved dress, thinner fabric than I thought so a bit see through. Back is fully zipped to neck unlike pics showing it open backed. Pleats are playful.

links_Review_Title: A little baggy in the shoulders/sleeves
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a birthday dinner. I thought it would look cute with boots! I don't love the fit and it's a little sheer (but still passable) so I think I'll wear something else....

This dress is a cute long sleeve dress, but it's so short! Couldn't wear this to the event I planned even with flats because was way too short. I'm 5'9 for reference. Otherwise is a great fit and quality so might work better for someone shorter.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit for a petite gal!
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove and was a great work dress. Could easily be worn for a date or night on the town.

This dress was so cute I wished it fit! I sized up based on reviews and it fit perfectly from the chest down. Unfortunately the shoulders and arms were so loose it threw off the whole look- it made my shoulders look very wide. I'm typically a small or medium and rented a large- a medium may have worked for me.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress for work or play
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'@, so the length was perfect--a couple inches above my knees, which made this appropiate for work and for going out. There's a little vit of extra room in the best but it's not noticable with the cut naa fabric of the dress. Sinc I'm wearing it in winder, I like that I can wear a long sleeve thermal underneath! The fabric is light and breezy otherwise and would be great on a summer day.
Comfortable to wear with tights and boots to work. Not my style generally though

links_Review_Title: Never wore as did not fit
links_Review_Text: Cute print
A little lose in the chest but wasn't a big deal. I loved the tie - it didn't do much to adjust the fit but I just liked the style. Loved this dress and will def rent again during the holidays!
Great quality & fit. V was deeper than I expected, but still cute! Perfect winter party dress.
This dress looks beautiful on, and is very flattering. It would be great for a date or a cocktail party. The material is a gorgeous color and it's a head turner. Would rent again!

I wore this to a show in Vegas in early spring. It was perfect paired with black tights and knee high boots! The only issue i had was it was a tad short for my liking and the lining would sometimes stick, so i had to pay attention when i was getting in and out of my seat. Otherwise it was a beautiful material and very flattering!

Got many compliments on this dress. It was a tad short for my liking but it worked out well. Very comfy and great quality for a colder winter wedding! The wrap isn't a true wrap dress, it's more of a detail, but I loved the bow. I felt so good in it.

links_Review_Title: Wore this pretty dress to a winter wedding.
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this dress. It was so pretty and flattering. I got lots of compliments, and the fabric is gorgeous. Iâ€™m very short and itâ€™s so hard to find dresses that arenâ€™t awkwardly long. This was short and just perfect. (Would probably be way too short for a taller person.) If youâ€™re petite this is the dress for you!!
I was worried the XS was going to be too small but it fit perfect. It's very flattering and easy to wear. I love the weight and material of the dress.

I needed a medium but I'm iffy on dress sizing so I ordered the large. It was super comfy and flattering. Covered the belly area perfectly. I'm 5'6 and the length was right at mid thigh. Not too short. Perfect with OTK boots! Great Valentine's Day night out!

I wore this as a top over jeans for a friends bdy night out . If I rent again I will definitely wear as a dress to be a little more sassy. The material was comfy and the tie belt was nice. The only thing is my chest is on the smaller side so I had to pin the back so the front would stay up. I will try the xs next time I rent it to see if that eliminates the pinning.

This dress was perfect for a Valentine's date night. I got compliments from strangers and my husband all night long! It was short without being too revealing and the deep neckline left just enough to the imagination...sexy but not risquÃ©. It was flattering and comfortable. I would HIGHLY recommend this rental!!

I loved this dress! It was actually a replacement backup for another dress that didn't work out well! I was so happy! They overnight shipped and it arrived early in the A.M. before the work party I was attending. Super flattering and way comfortable! The sleeves and top part was large on me so I actually pinned a lot of it to fit better!
Wore this to my boyfriends holiday office party. A tad short for tall girls but worked with opaque tights. Holiday-ish but nothing uber the top. Flattering wrap cut.
Great for full busts and petite girls. The color was gorgeous, the fabric was soft. Exactly what I needed! Beautiful dress!

I wore this for my office holiday party and it was a huge hit! Everyone loved it. It was the perfect amount of formal but still fun! I'm smaller on top so I did have to be careful as the v is quite low, but I was fine! This dress was super comfortable, not too tight and was perfect for any and all dancing!

Wore this for a New Years party and felt like the dress was really flattering and stylish. The drapey arms + red/shimmery fabric made the dress stand out. I got tons of compliments. I'm a 4 on top and a 6 on bottom and the dress fit great! It wasn't too tight on the booty which was a huge plus.

Material is beautiful and high quality. There was no opening in the back as mine zipped to the top. Fit true to size (I usually wear 4-6 and S fit well). Allows for a little adjustment with the wrap tie, but it's not a true wrap dress. Sleeves are on the longer side as I have long arms. I am 5'9" so mini dresses are usually too short but this one was perfect. I received compliments all night long, and I cannot recommend it enough!!

I'm usually a S but got this in XS and it fit just fine (S would have been way too big); very comfortable fit; the bow on the side can be untied and readjusted (I tightened it so the dress would fit tighter)
Beautiful dress for holiday party! Nice velvet fabric with a little shimmer. Fit true to size.
Really comfortable and pretty.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size!
Overall this is a beautiful dress. The quality is nice. It is definitely short but great for a date night in the city. The waist was a bit tight and the top a bit loose but definitely flattering.

links_Review_Title: This dress makes you feel like a million bucks!
links_Review_Text: First time ordering from RTR, this dress is amazing. I am 5'5 and I weigh about 130lbs normally I order a medium or small but after reading the reviews I ordered the small. The dress definitely fit a little "loose" but for me it was perfect. The quality is amazing, it's velvet on the outside but the inside is silk making it perfect to wear through the night. I got it for a date night and I feel like it was perfect. Not too dressy but not too casual. It's going to be hard to give this one back!

links_Review_Title: Loved it! Much prettier in person than it looks on screen. Got a ton of compliments from strangers!
links_Review_Text: If you have bigger boobs, may need fabric tape. Slightly low cut.
I listened to a review that said to size down but shouldn't have. Couldn't get this passed my hips. Very pretty dress but couldn't wear it. Next time I'll get a large!

I wore this to my work's holiday party and received a lot of compliments on it! I ended up wearing black tights with it, because it was a little too short for my liking since I am tall. The dress kept me warm, and it was a comfortable material.

Ignore the facial expression, I LOVE this dress!! I'm contemplating HARD whether or not to buy it. It's absolute perfection, for me like a glove and makes a beautiful figure while being super comfy at the same time. POCKETS!!!!!!!!! True to size. Zipper comes with a long strap to make it easy to close and open, which is very much appreciated!

Omg this has to be one of the most comfortable dresses I've worn, it's elasticized in the waist and sleeves, so it has a lot of give. The pattern is beautiful and bold, but the fabric winkles super easily. I didn't love it because I think it was a little overwhelming on my frame, perhaps too busy and I'm used to wearing neutrals. Still a fun spring prairie dress.
Sooo comfortable and figure-flattering! Such a fun and unique fit with super convenient pockets. Made a great vacation dress for walking around in mild weather!

links_Review_Title: The stuff WFH dreams are made of
links_Review_Text: First, THIS DRESS HAS POCKETS. Ok now that we have that out of the way- this dress is stunning! Well fitted in the waist, not too much fabric at the hips, flattering bust. It's just beautiful. My husband loved it so much he told me to buy it. Definitely recommend! Looked great with heels and Birkenstocks. Perfect midi length for either one but I am short.

I wasn't sure about such a bold print, but this dress is so pretty and fun to wear. The fabric is light so it has volume but isn't heavy. Wore to a baby shower with booties, but you could dress it down with sandals and a denim jacket. Or dress up with heels. Got tons of compliments!
Sleeves are a statement, but it looked sophisticated
This dress was perfect if your looking for something stylish and different for a party!
Loved this dress. Size down for a more flattering fit. I got a 0R even though I'm usually a 2 or 4 because the sleeves were so puffy. Super comfortable and stylish
fitted waist gives a girly feel. beautiful and super unique print, as always with ulla. voluminous sleeves up the fun factor.

I rented this dress for a gathering and photo shoot. It fit well enough, where it sat on my hips made me look a little wider than I actually am. It was comfy and very light. The sleeves were cute but bunched up the arm. Overall, totally fine, but not super in love with it. The pattern and colors were my favorite part about it.
Love Ulla Johnson and loved this dress but the sleeves had a little more poof than I expected. Still super cute and sooooo comfortable!
Dress fits true to size. The sleeves add a bit of volume, so it may seem large in the shoulders and up top to some, but that is the style.
Loved this dress. Flattering cut, interesting print and shoulder detail, and most importantly, super comfortable. I received compliments all day at work!

Have always wanted to wear something by Ulla and she does not disappoint! Quality is great, the dress has structure without being stiff. 5'6' and everything fit perfectly. I love a dramatic sleeve moment and this checked that box. The green is perfectly rich, balanced by the light pink. It's so comfortable and light enough to wear on an 80 degree NYC day!
I wore this dress for work this past week. I got lots of compliments on it. The material isn't too heavy and the dress has pockets. It accentuates your waist - very flattering.
This dress was totally overwhelming on my frame. The sleeves were every more pouch in person than I expected so it made me look like I was shooting a period piece.
Love the full sleeves, the print is gorgeous. I wore this for Easter and loved it!!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress! Can be dressed up or down
links_Review_Text: I never actually got so wear this dress due to everything being cancelled because of the coronavirus. I had planned to wear to a rehearsal dinner and it would have been perfect. I went with the size 4 over the 2 for a little more room in the bust but probably could have done either size.

Gorgeous dress. Love the fabric. Solid, quality, thick but not heavy. Sleeves just didn't work for me and I didn't really have an event for the dress. I thought I could use for everyday office wear but the sleeves were cumbersome to work with. Def a cocktail or summer party option where moving and using arms isn't as necessary (clearly one has to pick up a plate but not giving a presentation, etc.)
I rented this in January. Loved the dress but it is more lightweight than I thought so it is more of a Spring/Summer dress. Will rent again then!

This was my absolute favorite RTR rental. Length is great for any height heel or flat. Can be dressed up (I added a chunky green necklace / earrings set from J.Crew), or dressed down with minimal jewelry. I wore nude stacked heels with fewer straps for less distraction, but I would wear again with higher black strap sandals for an edgier look. Rented a size 0 because it was the only one available and I was running out of time before trip departure. It fit fine since the fabric has stretch to it, but I my normal size is 2 would have been better. I plan to buy this TTS.
I love Ulla Johnson and love that I have access to this dress via RTR. The material is substantial but the dress is so fun in a modern way. Definitely a statement. I will rent again.
fits great feels great
I love this dress! My friend rented it in a 2r and It fit me as well as the 4R so the sizes are interchangeable. I love the fabric and pockets, I almost bought it!
Loved everything about this dress- the fit, the style, the fabric.
I love this dress, and have gotten tons of compliments. Fits true to size, I wear a 4 in almost all brands.
I adored everything about this coat, I got endless compliments on it too. Rent it! The stock pictures suck of the coat, it's 100x better in person

Rented this badee for Vegas! Turning heads and heard "boujee" several times. Soft lining and warm. Surprisingly not itchy. This piece is big and loud so it can easily wear you. A big personality is recommended ;) Will rent again (or buy).
I ordered a size bigger but i don't think I needed to. It was warm, stylish and perfect as a coat with my formal outfit. I got a ton of compliments. I felt like a ROCK STAR!!!

links_Review_Title: Super fun, comfortable, very warm and goes with everything!
links_Review_Text: I love this piece! It's so fun and goes with so much stuff from jeans to formal wear. I rented it for my birthday weekend but ended up keeping it longer to just wear wherever! It's very warm and doesn't cause my hair too much static which is cool.
Love this so much I'm considering buying it...Fits a bit oversized and is nice and soft. Super warm, too!
This jacket is everything. Sadly the only pic I took in it but as a petite person hair up in a knot is the way to go so it doesn't seem like it's eating you! So many compliments. So warm!
I am OBSESSED with this jacket. It is so cute. I got a million compliments on it. It's so soft and definitely warm. Just rent this already. You won't regret it.
The fit is true to size and it is a bit bulky. I wore the L but wish I had had the M. I felt really glamorous even wearing with blue jeans.

Rented to wear for a date over a sequin jumpsuit but WHOA NELLY the working girl vibes were real heavy. I decided to pivot on the date night coat and wear this around all week to work and errands. Heavy and very warm!
This fit so well, and was so comfortable. Very warm! Wore to a winter wedding in the Midwest. I love this jacket more than any other jacket I've ever put on my body. I felt like a queen.

I liked it. I've preferred other RTR non-real furs over this one but it was still fun. I'm 5'8" and it was very short, most of my shirts were longer than this jacket so my biggest trouble was the shape. It's very square and I do better with more rectangle shapes. Other than that, it was a show stopper! ðŸ˜

Absolutely love the coloring and look of this coat! So trendy! Also love that I can style it down or up. Here I wore it with a super low key outfit (jeans and a basic top) and hoops and it made the outfit!

links_Review_Title: Perfect faux fur to dress up or down!
links_Review_Text: I can't even begin to describe how soft, super warm and chic this looks and feels on-- definitely a fav rental!
This jacket looked great with everything and was super warm and looked almost a little too real. I found myself letting people know it was fake every time I got a compliment

links_Review_Title: The fur ohh the fur. Warm and fuzzy and so comfortable

links_Review_Text: No reviews when I ordered it on it but my regular size small fits well. The silky lining is nice and I adore the higher neck. Yesterday was the coldest day in NYC so far and this thing held up to 31 degree weather. I was one of the few on the busy streets to not look miserable :-) It's a statement jacket but still sophisticated and not as blatantly showy as other faux furs because of the neutral color tones and pattern. I wore it casually but it's definitely a piece for nicer events.
LOVED this fur jacket. Felt confident and stylish in it. Had so many compliments on this. Extremely thick so it does get very hot! Would definitely recommend and wear again.
A bit bulky on
Great with jeans
Great fit and warm for a cold winter New York night. Wore it over a slinky dress and it finished the look. Felt like a million bucks

links_Review_Title: Beautiful coat for my 40th bday party
links_Review_Text: The coat came just a pictured, wonderful condition. It was warm, true to size and made me look fabulous for my 40th birthday party! Completed my sequin dress well.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on this jacket - it's a show stopper!
links_Review_Text: True to Size A little Fluffy - VERY WARM!!! You have to take it off to eat dinner - unless you want to get the "fur" in your food.
Honestly, very fun, very bougie, but something about the collar didn't sit right. I think a longer because and/shorter hair would have worked better. But, very warm and very soft, glad I rented it
I love this coat!! Many compliments, fun to wear. Warm soft comfortable!

I swanned into every room like a first wife who took everything in this coat. It's absolutely old school glamour -- wish I had a photo that captured it. The collar is just high enough to nestle into like a jaded starlet. It even kept me warm in the DC winter, which I didn't expect. Will rent again.
Fits slightly large, very warm for faux fur. Ideal for pairing with a tight/form fitting dress or jeans. Lots of compliments from friends
So comfy and insanely cute!

I rented this jacket for a night out in NYC and received SO MANY compliments! I have now worn it to so many events - including my company Christmas party, and everyone wanted to know where they can buy it. My husband is also obsessed with this jacket - I never thought I would own an item like this but I just couldn't send it back!
Awfully warm, very comfy, and closed well considering I'm rather busty. Will definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Love this coat - sad to return it
links_Review_Text: I loved this fur coat. It was such a fun item to dress up a pair of jeans. I wore it a lot during the time I had it. I would have loved to keep it.

links_Review_Title: it definitely kept me warm and the talk of the party.
links_Review_Text: Runs bigger then expected, might want to go a size down when getting this.
Love the idea of this but it just looked huge on me. I'm petite so someone taller might be able to rock it. Nice quality and warm though!
This is so bulky and ridiculous looking. So bummed because it looked chic on the model but just looks like big furry mess on.
I did notice some of the fur that started collecting on my black dress underneath, but overall it fit nicely and was very warm.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable & pretty with many asking, â€œwhere did you get that dress?â€
links_Review_Text: This dress is so comfortable & I loved that it has pockets! I received so many compliments from friends, family & the bride herself! The color is beautiful, a tropical burst of color (darker than the stock photo). I usually wear a size 12, which is the size I wore, but had to pin it at the back of the neck to have it fit properly; should have had my backup size a 10 instead of 14. I felt pretty & feminine in this dress.

Loved the tiered look of this dress. This was the perfect neckline- not too low and felt appropriate. Sizing doesn't seem consistent with this brand, I typically range 4-6, but this dress was a bit tight in the waist area so I sized up to 8. I had room, but the 6 was uncomfortably tight.
Perfect dress!
Striking color and comfortable fit. A bit fitted in the chest/ribs so if a larger chest, size up. Would absolutely rent again
Perfect yellow dress for vacation. I wore this to the beach in florida. It is a little bit thin, you could see my swim suit underneath.
A beautiful dress. Very flowy and comfy. I received so many compliments . Perfect for dinner at resort or any casual summer affair.
I wore this to an influencer event and received so many compliments! I highly recommend this dress. They were out of the 6 so I rented the 8 and it was a tad big but not noticeable.

This dress is so gorgeous!! It's a lot of fabric on the bottom, but not too heavy or uncomfortable. I felt like I should twirl around in it... the skirt would be amazing to twirl in. Top fit perfect. All around hit!

links_Review_Title: Romantic night in the gardens with the perfect dress
links_Review_Text: The dress fit TTS in my opinion. I loved the pockets- I didn't carry a purse- just enough space for lipstick, my phone, and a card case for my ID/debit card. I thought the dress was going to be a brighter yellow, but it was more subdued which turned out to be nice, too. I have never worn a yellow dress but it went nice with my coloring, darker hair, and a lip with a pop of color. I love Kate Spade and every dress I have ordered from RTR that was designed by her company. Oh, and the dress has snaps in the shoulder area to keep your bra straps from showing- an added plus!

I love this dress so much that I'm truly sad I need to wear anything else ever again. Felt like a Disney princess. It's so beautiful and flattering, not to mention comfortable. Runs a little big, I'm a 4/6 and I could have prob gone with the 2 but the 4 was fine! I wore it 3 times and wish I could have kept it. Will rent again ASAP!

links_Review_Title: Love this dress! Fits true to size and has a lovely neckline and silhouette - very classy and comfy
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress - was surprised and feel like it looks better on! FYI there's a decent amount of fabric so takes up a bit of space

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, loved everything about it!
links_Review_Text: I am 5'10 and usually wear a size 4 but Kate spade runs big so i sized down and got a 2 and it was perfect. The color was stunning and the dress moved so well. It was comfortable and fashionable and good for all summer occasions.

I'm usually a 10 or 12 and the 10 fit fine. This dress is somewhat heavy and has a lot of material. It was a huge wrinkly mess out of the bag. I steamed it, I ironed it some on the bottom, and it still bothered me bc it was so wrinkly. I also didn't think it was very flattering on my body type. The color wasn't the prettiest mustard yellow either. I think this dress would look better on darker skin and darker hair. I won't rent it again, but may work for others.
I rented this for a vacation in Cartagena. Perfect for a summer evening.

links_Review_Title: Sunshine and buttercups everywhere I twirled
links_Review_Text: 1. This dress is a perfect size 8. True to size. 2. The lightweight poplin is amazing for summer. The top part of the dress is like wearing nothing, but the pleats and folds on the bottom give the dress the structure it needs for PERFECT swirls and twirls. 3. I have never received so many compliments. The ruffles are fun and the length is perfect for wearing flats if you're not someone who likes heels. 4. My only complaint...The color is a bit more of a mustard than a daffodil. I was disappointed at first because I expected a BRIGHT yellow, but once I put it on I decided that the mustard looked good too.

links_Review_Title: lots of compliments on this perfectly fitting dress!
links_Review_Text: fitted at the top, I am a 34B and it fit perfectly and I am only 5-3 and the length was ok as well. Such a statement dress, I received many compliments on this.

links_Review_Title: Too big and not flattering on me.
links_Review_Text: I really wanted this to work, but the ruffles were a bit much and the dress was too big. I'm a "spoon" shape (long torso hourglass ". The 6 might have worked better.

links_Review_Title: Love the bright color and style of this dress
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly. the dress has a lot of fabric in the skirt, so it arrived a bit wrinkled at the bottom and I had to steam it out. Got lots of compliments on this.

I was so disappointed with this dress. I'd been looking forward to having an occasion to rent it for a while, but I really didn't like the way it looked on. My husband said "it looks colonial and old fashioned." It's probably just me though, because it looked beautiful in other reviewers' photos!

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect! I wore it for an outdoor wedding. It was fun, colorful, and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove. It was comfortable, flattering, and hung really nicely. The snaps to hold your bra straps in place are a nice touch and pockets are always awesome to have.

links_Review_Title: Really fun pop of color - not too too bright can wear in summer or fall
links_Review_Text: Zippered side
This dress fit like all other Kate Spade dresses fo on me. The color was bright. I loved it!

This is a beautiful dress. It is a lot of fabric and a high quality fabric, which makes it a special dress. I often find Kate Spade runs big through the hips, but this style is loose through the hips. The top is fitted and ran true to size.

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing it
links_Review_Text: The neckline gaped and the waist was a bit unflattering. Too bad - the color was amazing and the fabric was pretty (not lined). It just didn't work with my frame and bust size.

The dress fit really well. I'm very short so it came all the way to my ankles. It's a lot of material so it felt a bit overwhelming. It wasn't as casual as I had hoped - felt more appropriate for a summer garden party or wedding.
Loved this dress. Flowy and fun! Super flattering and has pockets too!
Easy to wear and fun. Lots of fabric. Good for day or night.

I love the weight of this dress. It's summery and breathable, but it also has some weight to it. The zipper sticks a little, which is annoying. However, the dress is comfortable and very flattering. I should mention that the yellow is much darker than pictured. I still like the color though. I would rent this one again.

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear it--it looked like a giant little girls dress on me
links_Review_Text: pretty color though
Color is a show stopper. Size down. Long maxi dress. Heavy dress. Lots of material. Many compliments.

links_Review_Title: â¤ ELEGANT STATEMENT DRESS WITH FUN SNEAKY PRINT â¤
links_Review_Text: Three Floor knocked it out of the park yet again with this dress. So beautifully made. Loved the color block and print mix. I thought the print would be a standard floral, but was happy to see it had a few surprise well manicured hands holding flowers mixed in - I am all about a sneaky print! 9 out of 10 people won't even notice that detail when you wear it. The pleats were perfect too! Pleats can go wonky and look awkward on me but these were just right, stayed smooth and didn't add bulk to my frame. It did run small. I have been a consistent US 6 in Three Floor, but had trouble zipping this one. I got it zipped up once, but the second time I put it on I couldn't get the last 2" zipped. It was fine everywhere else, just the ribcage area gave me difficulty. There's no stretch either, so size up. Can't wait to wear it again when the world opens back up! See more RTR pics on my Instagram at agentcheryl. ðŸ˜Š
Perfect for #events #gardenparties Fits like a glove and great for an hourglass shape. Colors are beautiful and vibrant.

links_Review_Title: I received tons of compliments in person and on social media. Really comfy and I felt pretty.
links_Review_Text: The zipper on this particular garment was extremely stiff. It took 4 hands to zip it (2 to hold it together + 2 strong hands to zip) and 2 hands (other than mine) to unzip it. The dress wasn't too tight, but the zipper needed some WD40. I got by with a little help from my friends!

Flow is amazing, fabric is quality and not to heavy or light. Had to get help to zip bc the top is snug. I'm a 34D and it's rare I don't wear a bra, but I totally didn't need one. I usually don't "repeat offend" a print like this but I would totally wear it again. RENT IT!

Such a stunning and flattering dress! The pattern is so unique, and I loved everything about this dress. A standout party dress for someone who doesn't like to blend in! But- sizing is way off, I had to order this dress three times. I'm a true 4 but had to wear an 8 in this dress.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments; print was a conversation starter!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress for a Valentine's weekend wedding. Got compliments from friends, strangers, and the wait staff! It twirled beautifully on the dance floor. Snug on the ribs & chest, so fit true to size for my small chest, but I'd recommend getting the size up for your extra dress. Also: look closely at the print- it has tiny creepy hands on it. But that made me love the dress all the more! <3

links_Review_Title: Very well made and beautiful dress
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It does run pretty small. I am always size 0 in dresses but I had hard time fitting into size 2 with this one. But struggling to close that side zipper is worth it. I am tall and not curvy at all and I still loved how it looked on me.
In love with this dress, so unique and beautiful! But 2 people helped me to close the zipper in the upper body, so totally recommending you to go size up!

links_Review_Title: Cool print but not for me
links_Review_Text: The print is so fun but it just didn't work. It hugged all the wrong places on me. Sleeve/ upper body was oversized compared to waist/hip.
