I wore this dress to the Russian Orthodox Church in France, it was perfect! The dress is one sleeve and stunning. I highly recommend, size up!

Perfect dress for a fall wedding! I was in love with the dress since it complimented my curves and got compliments all night. My "warning" about the dress is that it is very hard to zipper. If you have a big rib cage or big boobs I would suggest sizing up. Also you will definitely need help getting zipped into the dress, the way it's designed is impossible to close on your own.
I've never felt like more of a best-dressed wedding guest than when I rented this. It was beautiful, comfortable and I received compliments all night long

THE HAND PRINT IS AMAZING! I was super worried that it would be waaay too small based on the reviews, but I had no issues. The zipper was a little tough to get up, and it was on the snug side, but fit perfectly. i'm usually between a 2 and a 4 - the 4 was perfect.
I'm 5'8 and normally wear a 4. It runs a little small.
This dress made me feel amazing. It was very comfortable, and I got tons of compliments. Fit was very flattering and I didn't have to fuss with it. You do need a strapless bra for this number.
Fit gets a little snug up top , I would size up. Other than that , the material is beautiful and it flares and cinches in all the right places. I was spotted at NYFW for it !

links_Review_Title: Unique, gorgeous dress- runs very small!
links_Review_Text: This dress is great for this transitional weather. It's also unique and elegant at the same time and it's great for hourglass and pear shapes since it cinches at the waist. Please note this dress runs VERY SMALL. I am typically a size 4/6 depending on the brand and I could barely zip this up. I wish I had ordered an 8.
This dress runs very small. I could not zip the dress and I am normally a 0-2
Reviews said this was too small but it fit me perfectly. Very unique design and print. I couldn't tell in the photos on RTR but there are tiny hands with nail polish on the print FYI!

For some reason when I ordered this dress, I did not look very closely at the pattern. I just assumed it was floral and even after I had taken it out of the bag, it was awhile before I notices the hands all over it. That made it kinda weird. And everyone else is right, it runs VERY small. Very, very small. Go at least two sizes up, if not more. There is no stretch in the waist. I wasn't able to wear it because there was no way I was going to be able to zip it up. The skirt would have been so fun to dance in though!

I rented this to wear to a wedding but I was between two dresses and chose the other one. I held on to this for a few more days, thinking about where else I could wear it, but, alas I had nowhere to go. I loved this dress so much. It's so unique and fits perfectly. I can't wait to rent it again for a special occasion.
Should've listened to the reviews!!! Too small to wear. Size up 2-3x

Complements all night long, this dress has beautiful details. I felt like a princess! Very snug in the rib cage- be sure to size up once, and then again for your backup size! I'm typically a 2, wore a 4, and was wishing for a 6 when I had to try and zip it. I will probably rent this one again.

Great material. The length (sleeve and the bottom) were great, but I should have listened to the reviews, I would say, size at least 1 size up! I could not even get the zipper zipped around my rib cage. But I worry if I go up, everything else may seem a little loose. So pretty- bummed I could not wear it.

I was so bummed this dress didn't work for me. I read a lot of reviews telling me to size up (I wear 0-2), so I ordered a 2. It was still super tight I couldn't even zip it up. Also- the pattern looks a bit different in person. Zoom in to make sure you like the hand prints on the dress. I didn't quite catch that before ordering it.
Unfortunately this dress was too small in the bust and waist area to wear. I would definitely size up!
The dress was pretty, but the 0 was too small and it just wasn't going to work for the wedding. But I would recommend renting.

links_Review_Title: this dress is beautiful! got so many compliments on it.
links_Review_Text: Definite runs small! size up one and 2 sizes from your normal size. I wear a 4 in dresses normally and had to wear the 8 in this dress. Couldn't even zip up the 6! I read the reviews before i ordered which is why i chose the 6 and the 8 instead of getting my normal 4 and 6! good thing i did!

links_Review_Title: So unique and love the pattern
links_Review_Text: Got lots of compliments on this Dress. It fit great and was very stylish. The side zip was wonderful so I could get in and out of it without help.

links_Review_Title: Didn't get to wear the dress
links_Review_Text: The dress is beautiful but it ran small. I wasn't able to zip it up

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress! It was such a crowd-pleaser. I received non-stop compliments!
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly. The detailing, including the sleeve, buttons and pleated skirt was spot on. Easy to dance and move in. The print is gorgeous and the coloring is fantastic. Definitely a dress of my dreams!

I rented this for an event at an Indian wedding so I wanted something colorful and fun. The fit was great and I got so many compliments. Honestly I think I could have sized down one, but the chest was too tight (i'm a 34D).
The dress runs small in the bust/ waist area. I wore a size up from my usual. It was well made with a unique print. I really enjoyed wearing it!
The fit is very small I saw on the label that it said xxs, so this size 2 would actually translate to a 00. The pattern was a little too funky for me, I didnâ€™t see that it was hands on the picture.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but too small for me to wear
links_Review_Text: This is really glam and gorgeous BUT the chest runs SUPER small. Like: I am a 4 in most dresses and wear a 32B and could not get it zipped so had to return. SIZE. UP.

This dress is eye catching and will be different from any other dresses in the room, but I felt like the cut/print wasn't particularly flattering on me. As other reviews mentioned, size up by 2. I ordered an 8 (normally a 4) which fit in the waist but was a little roomy in the chest/sleeve area. Ultimately didn't end up wearing- just wasn't doing it for Metz

links_Review_Title: The fit, the pattern (tiny hands!) The color this dress is everything.
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size with little to no give up top (bottom is much more forgiving) if you are in between sizes I would size up as the 2 juuust zipped up for me. Even if you're on the shorter side this dress is perfect. The best part is no need for Spanx and it's so comfortable you almost forget you're wearing such a stunning piece

First, let me say that the dress is very fashion forward. The colors, thankfully are vivid and the flowers and lovely (and lilac, which I loved)! The sizing is guess can be tricky. I'm a true hourglass figure and listened to other reviews that said to size up. I'm an 8, but ordered a 10 and 12. Both of my sizes were too big! Thankfully, I was able to get my hands on an 8 which fit perfectly. The one shoulder makes it sexy yet still sophisticated. Would definitely recommend but sizing is weird.

Totally gloriously beautiful. A little tight/hard to zip, as all the reviews say, so size up if you can. The color is lush and beautiful, the fabric breathable with a gossamer sheen, and I've also never gotten more attention in my life. Highly recommend if you'd like to feel like a glamorous queen.

I didn't end up wearing this for a few reasons: 1. I couldn't zip it up on my own with the one sleeve up. 2. The length is really awkward. 3. The pleating made me look bigger, not smaller, even though it fit snugly. I did LOVE the one sleeve - fit perfectly and was really unique. I just wish it could decide if it was a long or short dress. The ruching around the waist isn't that flattering.

This dress is comfortable and gorgeous! I never want to take it off... except that the shoulder seams are off the charts scratchy. It's pretty enough to power through! Love the elastic waist that hits at the perfect spot.
The color was amazing and the fit was so comfortable.
So elegant, chic and comfy!! Perfect length for petites! Oh I love it so much

Loved the rich color and fabric. Like other reviewers the sleeves are a little restricting but I chalk that up to the fabric instead of the dress size. It's a very flowy dress so you'll want to keep an eye on it if it's windy. Received many compliments. Would rent again!
4R was just tight in the bust for me. And it's tough to take off without assistance. Other than that. Perfect!

I wasnt so sure about this one. It kind of fit like a sheet but once I was all "done up" it was perfect. I wore it to a formal catholic wedding. I was a lector and knew I wanted to be covered up while on the altar. You can certainly size down, I'm usually an 8 but I could have gotten away with a 6 or even a 4 honestly. Such a beautiful rich color, loved wearing it!
I received so many compliments in this dress. The only negative is that the sleeves were tight. Otherwise the most perfect dress I've ever worn.

Loved the dress!! I suggest sizing up if you have broad shoulders or big arms, it's a little small in that area. I added the belt to give it more shape and did not close the top bottom. The material is very lush and the color is beautiful. Would rent again!
Great color and fabric. Super comfortable! You can dress up or down
This dress was really comfortable. I received tons of compliments. I'm 5'2" and it was the perfect length. I left the top of the dress unbuttoned like a few others suggested.
The fit, material, comfort level...everything was superb.

I loved this dress!!! It was my first rental with RTR so I gave this a shot. If I was going somewhere fancy enough for this I would've worn it! It was a bit big and long for me. I'm 5'0, 220 lbs, and usually size 14-16, 38 DD. I went with another dress that was a size 14 for the photoshoot.

This dress is incredible. From the color, to the shoulder detail, to the hemline... it's simply a show stopper. Added bonus is that it made me feel just as great. It runs TTS for my body type (5'9" / 145# / 34C / slightly hippy), but if you have a bigger chest or arms, you may want to size up, because there is no stretch to the material. I would recommend it to anyone, and I honestly would contemplate ordering again.
The fit was perfect and I received so many compliments. The color is gorgeous in person!

links_Review_Title: Awesome dress! Beautiful and so comfortable!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for NYE and received so many compliments. It's super comfy - no zipper, just a light elastic waist. It does run a little large, so I recommend you size down for your backup.
It's for great and was very comfortable all through the evening. I received many compliments on this dress!

links_Review_Title: I got lots of compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: The style was beautiful and comfortable. The fabric, unfortunately was damaged and pilling. I thought it ran a bit big. I normally wear size 14 in pants, and got a 12R and 14R. The 12R was a bit big in the waist, so I probably could have done at 10R. If you didn't look close, it was fabulous for a Minnesota wedding in December :)
Gorgeous and versatile. You Can leave the top open for a more casual look or close it for a more formal/classy look. Overall, it was Flowy, flattering and the color is fabulous. Will def. Re-rent.

This dress was absolute perfection for a Winter wedding. Long sleeved but with an asymmetrical hemline for an added bit of flair to show a little leg. GORGEOUS emerald green color with a hint of metallic for dimension. I am 5'4 around 160lbs postpartum and wore a size 10. It was incredibly comfortable and lightweight (not a heavy material despite the velvety appearance of the fabric), sat right at the waist with the right amount of give so I didn't feel self conscious. LOVED IT.
Super comfortable but be mindful that the sleeves are very tight below the shoulder poof.

links_Review_Title: Excellent quality and the ease of ordering and returning the items.

links_Review_Text: I was not crazy about this dress when I first put it on because of the elastic waste but grew to love it as the night went on. Wore to a networking holiday party. I received a ton of compliments.
Really gorgeous color and fit, flattering waistline and option to keep neck open or closed, received lots of compliments

links_Review_Title: Winner of THE Holiday Dress of the season
links_Review_Text: The fabric and color is just beautiful. It's so flowy, you'll feel like a princess but so comfortable because it's short on the front part. The only downside was that the cinch that was supposed to go on my waist was just down my boobs. So it made me look a little boxy. Im thinking I should've sized up.
Loved this dress! Received many compliments!
I loved this dress for a client work event. It was light-weight, flowy and flattering. Loved the details on the sleeves and paired great with some stockings and boots!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for twirling, accentuates your figure without being too constricting
links_Review_Text: The shoulder puffs are a little funky and the top part looks better unfastened but all in all, a really fantastic dress. Hits right at the waist without being too constricting so you can actually enjoy the food you traveled 6 hours to get to. Decently warm without getting too sweaty so it's perfect for a fall/winter wedding
I'm 5ft and the length was actually great, loved the way this dress moved. The color was fabulous and the sleeve detail was unique. Got a ton of compliments!!
True to size. Shoulder pads a little itchy. Definitely good for cooler weather - would not recommend for hot temps.

This is a beautiful dress that flows so well when you walk. I received so many compliments all day! I wore this to officiate my friend's beach wedding, but I feel it can easily transition from beach to ballroom. It's gorgeous and comfortable!

I wore this dress as the ring bearer (!!!) in my friends wedding. Granted I got the only size available which was one size too big... but this dress was HUGE on me. It's important to get your size (back up with one below), as the elastic around the waist is very stretchy. I changed when it was dancing time because the dress kept losing its shape.
The dress was perfect for being a wedding guest. Great color and elastic waist for comfort.

Glamorous green silk gown that flows pleasantly with every step. Fit great, was flattering, and was easy to dance in. The deep green color was an elegant statement. Received so many compliments both on the day and on social media. 5 stars!

Comfortable yet formal enough for a black tie wedding. I sized up to a 4, which I wouldn't have done if I wasn't pregnant. While it didn't completely hide my second trimester bump, it did a pretty good job of not making it obvious (which is what I was going for).

This dress felt so comfortable and it was great for a fall wedding. I got so many compliments. It was very flattering on my figure. I wasn't feeling great about my core and hadn't worked out in a couple weeks, and in my first trimester so was feeling super bloated, so the stretchy waist worked to my benefit. It was very comfortable and true to size.
Absolutely LOVED this dress and will definitely be renting it again. The tail of the dress billows beautifully.

Loved this fun dress. It has funky shoulders which sort of make you feel like you're in the 80's. I wore it to an event that was more eclectic so it worked with the vibe. I had initially rented it for a wedding but decided it wasn't quite right. So if considering keep in mind that the shoulder pads sort of change the tone. I'm normally a 0,2 or 4 but only the 6 was available. It fit fine but only because it has an elastic synch at the waist, so was able give me a shape at my waist.
This color is beautiful and the fit was perfect! It's an elastic waistband so it has some stretch!

links_Review_Title: A beautiful dress for a fall wedding!
links_Review_Text: I had so much fun in this dress. I got so many compliments! The dress flows as you walk and has a more formal look .. it would be difficult to dress this one down.. I wore heels and it was almost too long (I'm 5'6" for reference). The shoulders and arms were a little tight but the rest of the body seemed to run a little big. If you are more broad in the shoulders I would size up. Tough to send this one back!

links_Review_Title: Loads of compliments on this dress. Color was perfect for winter event.
links_Review_Text: Easy fit and comfortable. I am tall so the front hem was just at my knees when standing.

I rented this for my wedding shower! I rented an 18 and 20, and I'm glad I did because I usually wear an 18, but ended up wearing the 20. My only complaint was this dress is VERY short. If it was a little longer definitely 5 stars! It is very tight-so I would recommend sizing up and wearing spanks.
Beautiful cut and fabric. I'm 5'1 so the length was aperfect, right above my knee for work. The detail on the sleeves makes it look very classy and feminine. Loved it
Wore this while taking my engagement pictures. Loved the dress, fit, and style.

This dress was amazing! I was nervous about the white and nervous the sleeves would be too puffy. But they weren't! The white is not see through but you will need a nude bra and nude undergarments without seams. I normally wear an 8 but the 8 in this was just a tad snug on my hips and rode up a bit so I went with the 10 which fit well but was a tad loose. But overall the fit was great. I am curvy so that's just how it goes. If you are curvy, size up. If you are slender, normal size probably will be fine. My husband loved this dress on me. I got compliments all night long. Great dress! If you decide to rent it, be sure to have the confidence to go with it.
Classy, sexy, fitted winter white.
At 6'0 with a long torso, I wish there was an inch more of dress but all in all it was a fun winter white for a Christmas party!
Gorgeous fit. Great puff shoulders. Not see-thru. Perfect length.

links_Review_Title: Extremely comfortable and perfect for our company holiday party!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'10 and normally wear a size 12, I ordered the 14 and 16, tried the 16 on and it was snug putting it on but fit perfectly once on. I loved the arms and sleeves, made it perfect for a winter holiday party. I got a ton of compliments on the dress. Wore all night and was extremely comfortable!
I wore this dress twice while I had it. I added a jeweled skirt and belt and it was beautiful. I also wore it with and the cut is just so modern and cool. I would rent this again
Perfect winter white. I wore this for a charity event. It's beautifully made. Great tailoring. Love the puff sleeve. Awesome length that's sexy yet appropriate.
Perfect dress for winter when the LBD seems a little too common! Very classy dress, the sleeves were a nice touch to make the dress feel a little edgy
Runs super small but I felt amazing, it's a showstopper
I loved this dress! It fit perfectly and was really flattering. I loved the long sleeves. It was perfect for my company Christmas party!
I'm between a size 6 if it's stretchy and a size 8, I wore the size 8 and was perfect, true white, the sleeves make it more stylish, nice length, very comfortable

The dress arrived in perfect condition. Perfect for a fall LA dinner date on an outside patio. I usually avoid renting things with sleeves as I have an athletic build,broader though the shoulders. The fit was great. A little extra room through the hips. This made it a great dress to eat comfortably in. Looked great with heeled booties, as well as nude scrappy heels. Overall a slightly edgy fun dress for a night out!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for a bridal shower!
links_Review_Text: I really felt beautiful in this dress, however it did run small. I am normally a size 14 but had to go with the 16, which was still a tad snug. Overall, I received a lot of compliments! The only other thing is that even with spanx, you could still see my belly button slightly.

links_Review_Title: That it was canceled due to Coronavirus :(
links_Review_Text: Love the shoulders. Was worried it would be too short but it wasn't.
The long sleeves were a good balance to the short length of the dress. Conservative and sexy!
Really love this dress! Elegant yet simple.
Could barely even get it on, yet alone zip it. Very sad! No stretch and definitely runs small. I usually wear a 12 and 14 was not remotely close to fitting.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a "Black & White" Themed party. It was a hit!
links_Review_Text: I did not like the lining since I am a little curvy, but with this dress, a lining is necessary

Rented this for an industry winter gala. Unfortunately, I was unable to wear this because it was so tight and small. I was expecting this to be looser-fitting, however it was not. I usually wear a size 4, and I couldn't even zip this size 4! I'd recommend sizing up 1 or 2 sizes. This is definitely not a loose fitting dress.

I love this dress and got so many compliments. I usually wear a 4 but got a 6 as a backup, and I'm glad I did. While the 4 fit, it was skin tight, and would have been uncomfortable for eating and dancing, which I did at the party I attended. The 6 was a little big in the bust and shoulders, but fit everywhere else. Do yourself a favor and get this dress!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but the hips were too high for me
links_Review_Text: Cute dress but the hips were too high for me
Fit in a size 6 but wore size 8 since I wanted to be more comfortable
The dress is fitted and the shoulders are pretty voluminous. I'm usually right been a 6 and an 8 and I should have ordered an 8 instead of a six in this. It zipped but was very tight.

links_Review_Title: It was so small I couldn't get it on.
links_Review_Text: The material was nice and I loved it on the hanger, but I couldn't get it on. Not even close. Size up.
Great dress
Wore this for a rehearsal dinner and loved it so much! I have an athletic build so it was a little tight in the shoulders going on but then felt comfortable all night! Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for my birthday dinner.
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress. The sheerness and short black slip underneath gave it a little sexy appeal. It fit a little tight in the front waist/upper torso.

There wasn't much I didn't like about this dress. I was nervous when I saw it online for how short the underlay would be, but it was surprisingly mid-thigh length. The sheer overlay was an added elegant flare, that was more stunning in person. I also loved how it accentuated my waist. I got TONS of compliments on this dress and would totally wear it again!

links_Review_Title: I legit never wanted to take it off!!
links_Review_Text: I actually can't rave about this dress enough. I was hesitant about this dress but I am SO glad i rented it. It is so beautifully designed & the details, THE DETAILS! I got compliments everywhere I went on the uniqueness. It fit me like a glove which was an absolute bonus! I am 5'0 tall and it hit right at my ankles. I wear a 32 B & it fit perfectly around. My only small small issue was that when adjusting the straps, it make the back bunch up a bit. But, here's the real bonus, no need for a bra

Rented this dress for a "Shanghai Nights" themed gala and it was TO.DIE.FOR!! Seriously, sooo much more beautiful on/in person than in the photos. I'm 5'9", 135lb, 32DD, athletic build and the Small fit perfect. I was on the fence about wearing this because I wasn't sure if the sheet lining would look tacky in person, so I ordered a backup dress just in case. But it was so so beautiful -- one of the most fun dresses that I've ever worn! Had people stopping me all night to give compliments!!

If I had a dollar for every compliment I got on this dress I would've come out of my event a very wealthy girl. This dress is incredibly sexy but in a subtle way, which made it perfect for my work holiday party. I was able to wear this without a bra and the slip underneath was not too short. I would recommend this for someone taller though, so the length hits at more of a flattering midi dress. Overall, very comfortable and I felt SO CONFIDENT all night long. Ready to buy it!!!
The slip is stretchy and comfy, but definitely rides up a lot and made me self conscious about standing up. Otherwise very modest but still eye-catching embroidery/color, and pops in pictures!

links_Review_Title: Beautifully well-made dress but felt exposed!
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous, no doubt about that. Loved the overall tea length and if the black slip underneath would have been 2 inches longer I would have felt like a million bucks. The slip was tight but that is the intent. Overall fit was great, minus the length of the slip, especially when seated. I also made the mistake of wearing a normal strapless bra so I was in a constant tug of war to pull the neckline up high enough to not show my bra and pulling the skirt down. Long legged ladies beware!

links_Review_Title: The perfect holiday or winter wedding guest dress! Sexy but classy.
links_Review_Text: Ran a little snug but wasn't uncomfortable!

Unexpected and loved! I felt super cool and hip at a party in TriBeCa and at a bar in midtown. The only thing a renter should be aware of: the slip is SUPER short. Frequently I had to pull it down to cover my butt. I wore black tights which helped. If you are looking for coverage or at all worried about coverage, this is NOT the dress for you.

Fits very well. There's a black slip underneath that's a lot shorter than the actual dress so most of the skirt is see through (kinda obvious but in case you couldn't tell somehow). Slip wasn't tight or anything which is good. Didn't wear long enough to know if it rode up or anything.

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress!!! Perfect mix of sexy and sophisticated. So many compliments!!!
links_Review_Text: I was hesitant to get this dress based on the photos of it on the model because I thought it could come off as tacky but I was wrong! It was gorgeous and not at all tacky. I loved the way the mesh overlay looked combine with the red flower/cherry appliquÃ©s. It's unique and stood out at the fundraiser I wore it to. I'm normally a size small but only the medium was available and it ended up fitting well since the fabric is stretchy. Loved everything about this dress!!

Got this dress for a fancy NYE party and felt incredible. SO flattering for us hourglass girls. The sheer details for cleavage/legs are modest and sexy. I could dance and eat all night and felt amazing. Definitely runs small and is somewhat corset-like, but I liked that because it felt secure. One of a kind experience and I got TONS of compliments. You will love this dress!!!

I wore this for NYE and it was by far the hit of the evening. It's fitted, sexy yet classy on top and flowy with gorgeous detail on the bottom. Note - this dress is LONG. I'm 5'10" and wore 3" heels and it just scraped the floor.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful details on this classy, flirty, fancy dress!
links_Review_Text: True to size, felt glam, love the see through mesh on top and bottom of long skirt- Gave this formal, fancy dress a sexy feel!

This dress is Great. It's even better in person than in pictures as others have said. I wore it to a holiday party that I hosted without tights, and to a very fancy dinner with tights. It was beautiful both times. I got so many compliments.

This dress is even more beautiful in person and I received so many compliments all night! The embroidery is gorgeous and loved the sheer detail. It was just the right amount of sexy and classy at the same time.
Prettier in person but a bit long in the torso if you're a petite.

Like the other reviews, LOVED this dress. Definitely on the tighter side in the middle, I originally had the M which fit but I wouldn't haven been able to eat or dance comfortably...so the L was perfect. The slip was definitely on the shorter side and rode up so be careful! Overall stunning dress and recommend to anyone - perfect for a winter wedding, tons of compliments.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments this dress was amazing
links_Review_Text: This dress was absolutely beautiful the quality was amazing the color was gorgeous the detail was on point I have bigger breast so I had to go with the large because the fabric does not stretch. I got so many compliments I would definitely want to buy this dress
A great dress for a party! So many compliments, so comfortable to wear for hours and just fun!
This is a gorgeous and fun dress for the holidays! It does run small so go up a size for backup. Did not need to wear a bra

I received compliments on this dress all night and loved wearing it. I have a large bust and that was really on display even through the mesh overlay, so this isn't for conservative ladies if you have a large chest. The dress liner underneath was a little snug and would ride up, but I also have a big backside that's done a lot of squats. Maybe size up if you're the same. I was able to wear a regular black bra.
The dress was beautiful and flattering. The arm bits allowed for little to no movement and things got uncomfortable after I forced in some dance moves.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! Great fit and comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly, boning have structure at waist and sheer overlay was just the right amount!

links_Review_Title: THE BEST DRESS TO RENT ON RTR. PERIOD.
links_Review_Text: If you want compliments galore, rent this dress. If you want to feel sexy and classy at the same time, rent this dress. If you want to wear something truly unique and stand out at an event, rent this dress. I felt like a freakin rock star in it. It was tight on top but the sheer overlay holds in the chest well. The lace and the colors of the dress are truly stunning - this is definitely a designer to keep your eye on because everything they create is magical.

I cannot begin to describe how this dress made me feel. My confidence skyrocketed and I received countless complimentsâ€”I truly have never felt more beautiful. I never wanted to return it! A once in a lifetime wear.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments! In love with this dress
links_Review_Text: Beautiful and perfect dress for a CA/Fall wedding. It did fit a bit snug and needed to have two people help me zip. But once on it wasn't terrible or too tight. Also wear something underneath because the slip would ride up at times. It wasn't super noticeable because I was wearing spanx under and it looked like it was supposed to be that way.

Was brand new. Beautiful. Perfect fit. If you rent it for a party and plan on eating go one size up (it's true to size but the fabric isn't stretch so there's not a ton of space for food!) Loved it with casual boots, an XL black sweater and tights. The bottom part is transparent!

Looooved this dress! Being only 5'2" I was worried about the length but it hit me perfectly at the ankle. Was able to wear it without a bra with no issues. Received lots of compliments Only issue is that the dress has zero stretch so can be a bit uncomfortable if wearing for an extended period of time. ...also this is the only pic I had of the full dress. Note that the stitching has gold thread running through it which gives the dress a bit of shimmer without being over the top.
This dress was such a hit. Super flattering, fun and unique. It was a bit tight through the waist, so you may want to size up.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but runs very small
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous stitching, loved the look and quality was very nice. Definitely a show stopper, but dress under the sheer portion is very very short and overall ran very small.

This dress was slightly different than what I'd usually rent for a wedding, but WOW i got so many compliments and the cut and quality of the dress was amazing. Its so much more beautiful in person than in photos, the embroidery is amazing. I felt sexy, but still appropriate and despite being slightly snug in the shoulders (no stretch) could still dance the night away. Would rent again.

Fit true to size. I have broad shoulders, typically avoid a sleeve of this style but the cap sleeve was not too form fitting and therefore worked well. Love the details of the dress, received many compliments. High quality, but the black slip does ride up. I read a review that said she wore black shorts underneath so I did the same and it was definitely the way to go!
the fit was great def need a bra

My sister ended up wearing this (5'6, 115#) and wore the XS. It fit her perfectly and was a gorgeous dress. The liner is super short, but with the shear outer piece it made the dress much more conservative and you couldn't tell the liner was short if you weren't the one wearing it. She might buy it because of how unique and gorgeous it looked on.
the fit was true to size. I really liked the cap sleeves, they made the dress a bit dressier.
Fabulous dress for holiday party. TTS. The embroidery details are stunning. Low cut, but sheer overlay keeps it elegant.

links_Review_Title: It would be a mistake to pass on this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is fantastic and the pictures online don't do it justice. The detail is amazing and it's beautiful on. It runs a little small through waist and the slip underneath is short. As a girl with thick thighs you have to watch it riding up but other than that it's an amazing dress. Compliments all night! Perfect for a wedding around the holidays. Rent this dress you won't regret it. No pics, sorry to busy dancing!

links_Review_Title: It was an excellent choice for a Christmas party. Beautiful and excellent fit.
links_Review_Text: I usually wear size 2, however the XS was a perfect fit .
The fit was true to size and the length was very work appropriate, my one complaint is that it did wrinkle very easily.

I got a 0 as my backup, by my chest would not have it! The size 2 was perfect! I loved the fabric, the weight, and I chose silver accessories. I also chose to wear the scarf with one over the shoulder. And, my daughter wore my back up dress!
Fit me great! Perfect for a work meeting. Not "stretchy" per se but does fit well even with lower body curves. Would 100% rent again!
Wore to a work event in Miami. Loved the fit and overall feel to this dress. Felt polished, profesh, and fun!

I love the way badgley mischka fits, and this was no exception. I am on the tall side and this hit right at the knee. The color was a beautiful light purple and the fabric was a quality medium-weight fabric. I would have given it 5 stars, but the garment was pretty worn - the slit in the back was torn and the fabric showed signs of serious wear. Still happy I rented it, but RTR should probably take it out of the rotation fairly soon.
Great fit and color! Tons of compliments!
Casual work day dress for me. Would look fabulous for any occasion. Easily dressed up or down.

Originally I did not rent this dress, it was sent because one of the dresses I rented was unavailable. I typically would never pick something form fitting. I tried it on just to see and to my surprise, it was soo flattering! It hugged all of the right curves. It also felt like it holds you in but not in an uncomfortable way! Overall ever pleased with it!
A bit shorter than I thought it would be and I am short. The dress also needed a better dry clean but overall nice dress.
I wore this to a networking breakfast and it was professional and classy. I got a ton of compliments and it was super comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Great color for any special occasion!
links_Review_Text: Great dress! Color is a nice pastel lavender and the cut is classy with a bit fo sexiness.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress true to size received a lot of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Loved the color it's true to size.

links_Review_Title: Structured & Cute ... but didn't work for me
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress in hopes to wear to a semi/formal wedding but unfortunately the sizing did not work out for me. There is NO stretch in this dress and my usual size 16 did not fit my tummy area. The size 18 fit but was too big in the hip area (I do not have hips lol). It fit my full best very well. The neckline is a little weird and the back / zipper felt a little high. I would have really loved to wear this dress, but the overall fit was not flattering for me.

links_Review_Title: Stunning power dress; great for important meetings!
links_Review_Text: This is a beautiful, classy, dare I say almost sexy dress. Wore it to an important meeting and I definitely felt more confidant in it. Pros: the neckline is gorgeous and creates a gorgeous line with the higher neck and the longer, fitted length. The cut is fitted but roomy enough for my big chest. My racer back bra worked well with it. And the color is so dang pretty for summer/spring. Cons: it is tight through the hips and thighs. I hate wearing smoothing undergarments but had to wear some medium compression. The color while gorgeous is unforgiving, especially in photos. It won't be the dress that makes you look ten lbs lighter but listen as a size 14, I'd rather wear a beautiful dress than always wear black.

This dress is absolutely stunning! The fit is amazing. The fabric is nice and structured and doesn't wrinkle easily. I rented this for a conference that I was presenting at. I wanted to wear something other than a boring black dress. I received so many compliments. If I could keep it I absolutely would.
Really pretty. Fit well and I got tons of complements!!

links_Review_Title: This dressy was an elegant and edgy mother of the bride dress!
links_Review_Text: Great fit!
Fit is a bit off â€” usually a size 18, but this dress in that size felt too tight. On the other hand, the next size up was a tiny bit too loose.
My favorite RTR rental ever! This dress was so pretty on. It's a high quality material, hugs the curves, creates a great shape, and is long enough for taller ladies.

links_Review_Title: Another winner! I've had some hit and miss items, but this is a win
links_Review_Text: Fits well even in the busy
I loved this dress! Wore it to play music for Palm Sunday mass and also to work. Beautiful lavender color and sturdy material.

links_Review_Title: nothing because I did not wear it
links_Review_Text: This was such a beautiful dress, however it was too big on me all over. The armholes were too long, the hips were too wide and the length was too long. Its unfortunate because it is beautiful and I love the color.
N/A
Beautiful dress great fit beautiful color

I ended up not wearing this bc I could hear my coworkers calling me a flight attendant ( men with little fashion sense, but wonderful humans). I try to avoid any discussion regarding my apparel so I sent it back. I thought it was cute though
I liked this dress a lot. I didn't wear them but only because I ordered it during the winter instead of the summer. I will definitely order again.

links_Review_Title: Dress just arrived and looks great on me.
links_Review_Text: Looking forward to wearing it. Size 6 is too big.

links_Review_Title: Wasn't in the best shape. I didn't wear it. Plus I ordered wrong size.
links_Review_Text: Cute
Rent this! Love it! The dress runs large but even with extra room is fit very well, was flattering and modest length. I wore it to a bridal shower and was showered with compliments!
Fits beautifully. Loved the color. Great dress for my son's Bar Mitzvah.

This dress was simply elegant and perfect for the office during the summer. The fabric is heavy enough not to be concerned that too much body was showing, especially for the office. I rented a 14 because I was afraid it would fit small. I should have stuck with my true size of 12. Will rent again.

The dress fit well and comfortably without limiting function. I had compliments all night. I'm usually a size 2 but that dress had technical issues that I addressed with RTR. Luckily the size 4 fit well and not too bulky. Loved this dress.
Great fit. Quality fabric. Can wear to work or to an afterwork event. Very comfortable.
I really liked this dress. It fit nicely - very pretty shade of lavender. I wore it to a baptism and baptism party.
Doesn't have much stretch but the fit is just fine.
Beautiful color
Fits extremely well and extremely flattering on the figure, while being sophisticated and classy enough for work. Love this dressâ€”the fit, the style, the color. It's perfect.
This dress was a lovely color and fit well, but the tie at the neck just made me feel like I should be working as an air hostess.

links_Review_Title: Very nice color. Overall good fit.
links_Review_Text: The arm holes were too big.
Loved the length and fit
